item.text: @##// rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya palcabangasha ti pradz+nyApAr mi tA mu khanAmam hA yA na
sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin po sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba
theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
'o/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi khoms
la lha thams cad kyi mtshan mo'i gnasan/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dum
dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lha dang/ lha'i bu dang/ lha ma yin dang/
rlung lha dang/ namamakha' lding dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ srin po dang/
rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang/ 'byung po dang/ log 'dren dang/ sha zadang/ snang ba dang/ mi snang ba'i ma
mo'i tshigs shin tu mang zhing rgyacha ba dpag tshad lnga'i dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa sha stag dang/ dge slong stong nyis brgyalnga/
bcus bskor cing mdun du bdar nas chos ston te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje/
rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyis yongs su bskor cing rig pa'i tshogs dang/ phyag rgya'i tshogs de dag thams cad kyi
rig sngags 'chang bye ba phrag du mas yongs su bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bar
'a[Â©]// snapalas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das/
la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag
na rdo la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po lishartsa lnga po 'di rnams ni/ pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo yin no/
oM sas rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// o byang chub kyi sAms rdo tshushes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa'i sgo'o// o kun tu bzang po spyod pa shes rab kyi phartsol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o yid bzhin gyi nor bu shes rab kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgolo/ e 'gog pa med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo// o skye bar 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// so rnam par shes pa h+phams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// u0f00 'bar ba chen po'i chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o brtson/
'grus shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// u0f00 thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rdo rje thams cad brtan pa'i sams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o/
oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o
las rnam par sbyong ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i se'o// oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje can phaT shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o 'dod pa la 'dod chags rnam par dag pa shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o mgyogs pa'i rdo rje can shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// oM hUM thams cad du 'gro ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// u0f00 shrI shes rab kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o a zhes bya ba'i sgo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// e shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o oM ba hU~M shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa 'a sgo'o// o so shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// o de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
kyi gsung rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i sgri'o// oM de bzhin gshegs pa kums cad kyi thugs kyi rdo rje shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// bcom
ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsalanas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang klams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yin dang//
dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten ya rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo nyi shu rtsa lnga pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
be 'a mdo rdzogs so//@#// rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya kA rti gu gya a lang+kA ra bya ho tan rA dzanA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ blugs kyi gsang ba rgyun gyi bkod ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+mo la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
bdag gis smos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje yuges rnal 'byor gyi debang phyug chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs

pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes phyag rgya chen po'i dam tsheg ga byani gyi rlabs kyi rdo ro'i sku chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs
rdo rjel shes rin po che chen po 'acod pan gyi rtse mo'i gtsug phud kyis dbang bskur ba brnyes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes kya dang nge
'dzin chen po dang ldan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ rgyugs rdo rje ye shes kyi las sna tshogs pa chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje ye shes mchod pa chen po sde ba'i dam tshig gi gsang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor
chen po dam tshig ga de kho na nyid dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje ye shes gsang ba chen po'i sAng po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku
dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi mnga' bdag chen po dang/ de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes kun tu bzang po dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa shAms cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje ye shes dpe med cing mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nam mkha' lta bu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung
dang/ thugs rdo rje rigs dang/ sAng po dang/ phyag rgya dang/ gsang sngags dang/ rigi pa gnyis su med par gyur pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang
thugs rdo rje ye shes pha rol tu phyin pa'i sang po la dga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes kyi lhag pa'i lha'i sang
bo mdzes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa klams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ klugs rdo rje ye shes rgyan chen po bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i sAng po la/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi
rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa 'a rdo rje ye shes chen po 'ba' zhig dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'ang 'di lta ste/ so mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang/ nam mkha' sgo zhes

bya ba 'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang/ a po dza'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen mo dang/ 'gyur ba med pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje yum chen ma dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma zhes bya pa'i rdo rje yum

chen mo dang/ gzhan yang ma lus shang lus pa med pa 'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i rdo rje btsunamo stong phrag brgya la'ang 'ad lta ste/ mda' mtshon/

[@#]cha'i lag ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsunamo dang/ dbang phyug la lta ba'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang/ nye bar zhi ba'i bzhan ras zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang/ gyen du lta ba'i bzhan ras

zhes bya ba 'a rdo rje btsun mo dang/ 'dod pa 'a zla mtshan rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang/ brda sprod pa ma zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang/ 'bri ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang/ rol pa

dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang/ 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rdo rje btsunamo dang/ dbang phyug gas bde ba'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo dang/ dmags pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun

me dang/ brad las skyes zhes bya ba'i rdo rje btsun mo ste/ de dag la sogs pa rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar to// gzhan yang dpag tu med pa'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo rnams

dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ sAde skul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nyamo chen mo dang/ gdug ba thams cad 'gugs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen ma dang/ rjes su mnyes

pa rdo rje zhes bya ba 'a rdo rje go ka mo chen mo dang/ khrag 'gug sa pa zhes bya ba 'a rdo rje po tAm chen mo dang/ thams cad 'phrog pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje pho nya mo chen mo la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten

gyi khams rgyas pa'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo rnams dang yang thabs cag ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje 'babs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rjesgo srungs ma chen mo dang/ dam tshig gsum ldan zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo

srungs ma chen mo dang/ 'jog pa'i yan lag can zhes bya ba'i rje rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang/ thog ma pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma chen mo dang/ gdul dka' 'dul zhes bya ba'i rdo rje sgo srungs ma

chen mo la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje bran mo chen mo rnams dang yang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste// sku gsung thugs thams cad rdo rjes 'tshang ba ma zhes bya ba'i
rdo rdzobran mo chen mo dang/ 'jigs pa 'a ma'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran mo chenamo dang/ gtsugs shing rnam par 'gyur ba'i gdong zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bran me chen mo dang/ 'jig
rten gsum 'ching ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rjebran mo chen mo dang/ bskal par gnas pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'adzi rje bran mo chen mo'o// gzhan yang dpe med pa'i rdo rje rol pa mo chen mo rnams dang yang
thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'dalta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rjodagyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rjerol pa chen me dang/ kun nas 'babs pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo
dang/ 'jig rten gsum rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang/ rang tu dga' ba'i rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rol pa chen mo dang/ thams cad dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i
rdo rjedal pa chen mo la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad rgyas par gang ba'i rdo rje'i yab rnams dang yang thabs cag ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa 'a dbang phyug ces bya
rtsa ba'i rdo rje yab chen po dang/ mkha' 'gro'i rdo rje dbang phyug dang/ dra yi dbang phyug dang/ stug po bkod pa dang/ zla ba'i 'od dang/ 'dun pa bsal dang/ skye bo yongs su dor ba dang/ legs par
sbyangs ba dang/ 'dod pa'i rdo rje dang/ gdung ba skyed pa dang/ 'dul bar byed pa dang/ gdug pa thams cad sel bar byed pa dang/ de kho na nyid kyi mgon po dang/ gnas pa po dang/ brtse ba can dang/
chos 'chang dang/ bskyod pa bo dang/ sra ba po dang/ 'ching ba po dang/ skor ba po dang/ de dag la sogs pa rdo rje yab rnams so// gzhan yang mtha' yas pa'i rdo rje pho mo 'phrog pa'i rdo rje

bran po rdo rje'i tshogs dang thabs cig ste/ de'ang 'di lta ste/ rdo rje rlung zhes bya ba dang/ rdo rjem dang/ rdo rje ma 'khrugs pa dang/ rdo rje chu dang/ gzhan yang rdo rje rgyal po chen po bzhi la/ 'di
lta ste/ zhi bar byed pa dang/ rgyas par byed pa dang/ dbang du byed pa dang/ ma shes pa thams cad zad par byed pa ste/ de dag la sogs pa'o// gzhan yang mchog tu rgya chen po sangs rgyas kyi
ye shes rab tu gnas pa'i mtshod pa dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das ston pa rtag pa mchog gi mnga' bdag ste/ kun tu bzang po'i sku yisan// 'jig rten gsum gyi dkyil 'khor sbres// bcom
ldan rdo rje 'dzin legs bzhugs// gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor bsaso// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i yum gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dus pa thob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
thams cad kyi yab dang lhan cagi du dga' ba'i bde ba rjes su byung ste 'khor dang bcas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te/ rdo rje'i glu 'dis mngon par bstod nas zhu ba zhus pa/ sangs
rgyas kun don khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// thugs kyi rin chen mchog khyod 'dud// chos kyi blo gros khyod la 'dud// chos rnams kun mchog khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs
dgongs pa khyod la 'dud// dam tshig mchog gsemchog khyod 'dud// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag 'tshal 'dud// grags pa chen po bdagacagan// mgon po khyod la zhu bya zhu
sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed yum// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ donas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i yum rnams la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum rnams de skad ma sa zhag/ 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'di la ma 'ongs pa' sams
can rnams dad par ma 'gyur zhing/ rang gsams yongs su sun 'byin la/ des ma mthong ba'i chos la ma dad pas rang gi sems yang dag par sun phyung sta/ mnar med pa rnams su skyes nas
bskal pa stong phrag mang por mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal rjes su 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de brgya lam na mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal las grol te/ mi rnams su skyes par gyur kyang rnam par 'gyur

ba 'azhan du 'gyur ro// brjed ngas pa rnams dang/ blo gros chung ba rnams dang/ khyi dang/ bya rog dang/ bya la dwang/ phag dang/ stag dang/ glang po che dang/ seng ge'i nga ro 'dra ba dag tu 'gyur ro// de
dang 'gre bar mi bya zhung blta bar mi bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyod pa'i yum de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltarare mas/
can de rnams kyi mar med pa'i sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang gis 'di'i ming bzung nas yongs su zad par 'gyur ro// bsod nams de 'a rgyus
de'i las kyi sgrib pa zad pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sal ba can du 'gyur ro// de nas de dag yade dga' skyes nas yang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol/
to bcom ldan 'das basman du gsol/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyus dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ gang ma
'ongs pa'i sems can rnams kyis dran pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu bzang po chen po 'od 'phro ba gsal ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ rang ga su dang ! gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i dam ba 'di bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor kun gyi yum
gyur pa// stong nyid ye shes nyid du bshad// tsa zhogi nga yis bstan par bya// rtog pa sboms cad rnam par spangs// sems can rnams la phan bzhed pa// gang zhig cung zad bstan par bya//
dokun sgyu mas sgyu ma go/ 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bu r shes// desan sgyu ma lta bu las// sgyu ma lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bya// nam mkha'i khams kyis khyab pa yis// thams cad yum gyis yang dag
ka 'khrugs// phyir ba yang na brtag par bya// gsang ba'i da kyil 'khor bum rnams kyis// ben zhing dga' ba'i gnas su ni// yid kyis legs par 'dus byas pa//
nam mkha' la na blag chas gdab// thog mar de bas dam bsaso// de nas rnal 'byor chen pos blog/ gsang ba'i yum gyi dkyil 'khor ro// mu khyud dag gi rnam bdun du// kun nas yongs su
bskor bar bya// dbus kyi cha ru dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor la lta bu r bri bar bya/ kun s brgyud gnyis mdzes pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi la dbus su gro/ 'khor lo 'i leba'i dbus sun// brtsa/
ga ze 'bru ldan ba bri// mtshamasadrang mtshams su 'dab man// ji lta ba bzhin bsams bas pas// srid bu lnga yas yang dag 'khrugs// srid bu bzhi yas ke bang sgras/sgo bzhi dang na yang dag
ldan// rnababasrasang ge dag gis brgyan// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan sogs/ blashes steng du bres ba dang/ ngani chen rdo rje pad ldan sngon// dpag bsam shang gi lcag las khyab// bum bzang
la rin chen ldan pa'i mchog/ rgyan 'phrang glang po ldan pa ni// phyi rol gnas te legs lagi/ rtog dang ma rtog rnam spangs te// dkyil 'khor chen po'i debus su na// gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rje bu/mnyan
par gzhag cing spro ba yis// sems kyis brib nyer du bya// denas lha mo zhal ba zhus// shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba// phyag bzhi pa la spyan yangs ma// phyag gnyis kyis ni tshes 'chad cing//
zhi ba 'a g.yas par rdo rje ni// g.yon pa b.ris rnam par brgyan// dkar dang dmar po cher sro ba// sngo bsangos rin chenamchog mdzes 'od/ gtsug na rin chen gtsug tor che// gtsugargyan cod pan dam
ba can// skal ba chen po 'od ldan ma// rgyun rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// gos kyis lta na legs bsgribs pa// bzhin rgyu dekyil 'khor 'dzum bcas gang// sna tshogs kos na legs gyon pa// dbu

ma 'a zhal nas gsar gyi 'do// zhabs gnyis dbus su 'khor lo ste// mdunan rin chen bdun gnas pa// pad+ma mchog ldan seng ge'i khri// zla ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gdan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phrob//rgyab

du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni// dpa' bo de yas bri bar bya// 'di yi mdun du bra bya ba// dpa' bo mtha' yas pa yi zhal// stong phrag du ma'i phyag ldan ma// mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag rdzogs// rgyun rnams
kun gyis rnam par brgyan// phyag gi rdo rje 'chang// sna tshogs phyag rgyas phug gzhand grags// gtsug ldan dar gyi cod pan can// dbu rgyan pad+ma'i bzhin ras ma// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dal la bzhug/
de 'od khyim lta bu'i 'od// dpa' bo'i rnal 'byor ldan pa ya// dpa' bo desan bri bar bya// rdo rjesems dpar ba dag bsgoms te// der na sems pas 'gro bar bya// dpa' bos lho ru bro bya ba//
gshin rje'i 'dab ma mdzes pa la// mchog sbyin nam mkha' dge ma yang// zhi chen khri la legs par bzhugs// bzhin ras sogs la sbyin dkar ba/ 'dzum bcas nor bu'i 'og pag can// mgul rgyan rinaM
chen 'phreng ba mchog/ rkang gdub gdu bu rin poche// yid bzhin nor bu'i lag pa can// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dgongs ma// de nas blo ldan rab song ste// nub tu yang na de bzhin du//
dpal dang ldan pas legs par gi chu las skyes ma yade 'phrog ma// dmar po'i gos 'dzin dag pa ma gtsug na cod pan gyis smras ma// sgyu la rgyan sna tshogs lus can ma// dar dang rin chen gyis
klubs ma// pad 'byed pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyag gal 'dab dang ldan bs// zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// 'a ma du ma'i snang ba can// ji ltar rigs pa bri bar bya// de nas byang du phyin nas su//
cha song ste dpa' bos bri bya ba// mag yo bzhinaras grags chen ma// mar gad 'bar ba mtshungs pa mo// dkar po'i dar gyis yang dag klubs// gtsug na nor bu+od pan bzang// gtsug rgyan sna tshogs dag
gis smras// rdo rje dril bu'i lag bkram// snyatshegs rgyan dang gos ldan pas// zla ba'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// 'od kyis gtams pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de nas mtshams kya'i dab ma la// me tog

bdug pa dra ldan ma// rdo rje snang byed dag ba ma'i// mchod pa sngags ragi pa yas khros// gzugs sgra dradad ro dang reg/ rang gi bdag po'i phyogs su 'o// 'dab ma 'dab mar thams cad du// gzhad dang sgog

dang dbyangs chen mo/ kar gyi phyag rgya grags chen po// sngags pas 'bad de bri bar bya// pad+ma la skyes 'dab ma la// mas cad du na 'grub pa bri// sgo rnams dag na rmims chad la// so skyong ba na rnam bzhi dang//
phyi rol tu yang lha la sogs// mang na yang dag bri bar bya// de nas khrus byas lus byugs la// me tog bdug sogs kyis bdugs te// skya tshogs gosanar ba gyon la// me tog 'phrang dang gos kyis brgyan//

gtsug phud cod pan dang ldan zhing// mdzes pa'i ngar gyis yang dag klubs// rdo rje la bu lag par ldan// sbyor ba bzang ba'i rnam gzhag gis// de nas thams cad dgug par bya/ rdo rje ma mo dka' thub che/
bzlog dang rnal ma'i phyag rgya yas// rdo rjesams dba' bzlas nas su// rdo rje'i sbyor bas gar bya zhing// lan gsum du na g.yas bskor bas// rdo rjemame'i dkyil 'khor rnams // dmatshig ldan pa thas+sa
cad byon// glu dbyangs kyi ni rgyal pos bskul// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs gar gyis// dregs pa yas na g.yas dang g.yon// 'gying ba dang na 'dud par bya// 'dir gshegs 'dir gshegs sems can don
mdzad brtson pa po// ser sna ma mnga'asangs rgyas tshogs mchog mtha' dag dang// bde gshegs dam pa'i yum gyur srid pa'i bskyed pa po// pha rol don mdzad dus la de 'ang bab ba lags// shes so// de
nas de dag rang nyid kya// rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pas byon// mtshanam dgan bzang bo rnams // dkyil 'khor dag blta bar bya// rang dom gzhan la bab sogs pa'i/ mtshanas ji ltar mthong
ba na// de tshe nges par ma mo// bde gshegs sprugs kyi dgongs par byon// de nas mchod yon zhabs bsal cho ga ji bzhani rab brtags te// de tshe babs pa'i sems can bsod nams ldan la khri bar bya/
gal te de na mi sa ban hU~M gi yi ge dang// ldan pa'i glu dbyangs kyis ni yongs su bskul ba nyid du bya// de nas shes rab ldan ma gzhug/ slob ma'i gtso bo h+phal sbyar te// mig la
mag dar rgyas g.yogs la// rab dga' bdag yin yang dag dga'// ma mo thams cad la dmigs te// deran ma tog dor bar bya// ma rtog gang la ltung gyur pa// ma mo de ni di yis 'grub// de nas
go rims ji bzhin du// so skyong ba nas brtsams nas gu/ shes rab pha rol kyin pa 'a bar// slob ma la bshad par bya// dam tshig klob bar gyur nas su// sdom pa dag ni gzung bar bya// ma mo'i
sngags dang phyag rgya ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bstan par bya// gzhan du slob dpon blo nganan// nges bar dmyal bar 'dod bar 'gyur// des kyang yang dag de 'grub cing// myur du domyal bar 'gro bar
'gyur// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa 'am// ramis dang gdon dang dug sogs kyis// gdungs te nad kyisargyun dun// 'chib ru yang 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje slob dponasnyad pa na// rtag tu dmyal ba

nyid du ni// rab tu rmongs pa'i slob ma 'gro// mkha' las rdo rjer bzhin// den bu skye dam tshig na/ khyod kyis rtag tu srung bar byos// ma mo kun gyi sdom pa na// theg pa chen po'i cho gas gnas// de nas
yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dang de 'dzin la bzhugs te// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyis yum rnams kyi dmatshig la bka' stsal pa/ rin chen sems kyi dam tshig gis// rnam pa gsum na sbyang bar
bya// thog mtha' bar gyi sbyor ba yis// chung 'brang mchog gi dbye ba yas// de 'dra'i dmatshig yang dag pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis bka' stsal to// dzam+bade semasanasmyungs kyi bar// 'bad pa
yas ni bsgom par bya// bud mong thams cad mthong ba na// lan gsum dun bskor nas kyang// sa 'os phugan byas nas su// lan gsum bar du gsol ba btab// bdag gi ma khyod bu yin te// ji srade
byang chub thob bar du// byang chub yan lag nu ma las// byung ma rang ga 'o mas skyongs// de nas sbyor ldan rab dge ba'i// dbang bskur ban sbyin par bya// gser la sogs pa'i bum pa ru// dri yi chu yis
yongs bkang la// dar dang rasasogs kyis g.yogs te// me tog chun pos mgul brgyan nas// rin chen snyan kyis rab bkang ba'i/ gcig lhag bcu drug bzang po la// ma mo'i snying po nyid kyis ni// brgya
rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa yis// sngagasashes pas ni dbang bskur ro// slob ma zhi ba bzang po yis// thog mar zhu ba byas nas kyang// zhabs gnyis la namagos btud nang// bdag na tshige mo rdo rje// byang
chub sems ni rnam sgom pa'o// slob dpon zhabs kyi chu skyes la// dbang bskur phyir na zhu ba bskyed// skal ba chen po bdag la stsol// slob dpon mchog tu rmad byung ba// dbang bskur rgyal ba thams
cad kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// des na bdag gis sems can rnams // don gyi dem pa bdag gis brgya ]/sangs rgyas kun gyi don bgyid pa// brtul zhugs bzang bo khyed kyadrin// denas/
dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa'i go 'phang gnas// slob ma ye shes rdo rje la// go 'phang la na bzhuganas su// bum pa bzang po gcig gam na// yang n
b.ru drug la/ gaman// lnga 'am yang na bcu musan// dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ro/ dkyil 'khor gyin mdun du ni// dkyil 'khor pad+ma bri bar bya// pad+ma lo 'dab brgyad pa la// ge sar
lte ba ldan ba bri// de ya dbus su rdo rje bri/ sna tshogs rdo rje 'od zer 'phreng// de yi mdun du 'khor lo bri// chen po rin chen bdun gyis bskor// lho yi phyogs su rin po che// nub tupad+ma
'di yin te// byang du ral gra chen pogro/ 'bar ba'i 'byung 'khrugs 'od zer can// sgra yi phyogs na thams cad du// ma tog bdug pa dri zhim pa// 'ong ldan pa ni skul ba che// sgo dang sgo ru bzhi
nyid do// byaril tu yang ma 'che kun// gcig nas gcig tu rgyal sgrogs pa// bde byad gcer bu'i malugs te// mang thosapa dang ldan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yaM
tsha dadus su ni// slob ma bsems dang bcas pa gzhug/ chos nyid rang bzhin gtam brjod de// de yang khyod na rigs su skyes/ 'khor las sbyar ba'i rgyal po tshe/ rtag
pa dam pa'i dbang phyug pa/ thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i dpal// dag pa'i dbang phyug kun gyi bdag/ rdo rdzopad+ma lag byin te// gnang ba bzang po rab tu sbyin// bu yis
bya ba chen po byasi// sangs rgyas kun gyi go 'phang gnas// der ni sbyor ba 'ongasanas su// gsang ba'i sdom pa smin par bya// 'di ni mchog tu dga' ba ste// yum rnams
rab tu rmad byud ba'o// dus su 'dod pa nyid du rgyas// dam tshig mchog tu gyur pa 'o// brtul zhugs bzung bos ru 'byor pas// de nas yon na phul byas nas// slob dpon
gyi na zhabs la 'dud// ma dang chung ma bu mo dang// sring mo srang mo'i bu mo dang// bu rnams dang na bdag nyid dang// rgyal po longs spyod gter dang// nor dang 'bru dang grong
shing rta// glang po rta dang pa klung sogs// ma nye dang ni ma he mo/ gzhan dang gzhan yang ci 'dod pa// bla ma la ni chen pos dbul// bya dang ma bya rdzas kyi mchog/ thams
cad kyang n dbul bar bya// denas bcom ldan ma rnams la// rgyan 'phreng rnams dang bzhad gad dang// sgeg dang rtse 'jo dga' ba dang// rab tu dga' ba'i bde chen dang// bza'
btung bca' ba la sogs pa// rnam pa du ma thams cad kyis// mchod nas gshegs su gsol bar bya// sems can kun gyi don dang na// bdag gi yang na cher ches mdzad//
bde gshegs gang du gshegs pa der// ma mo thams cad gshegs su gsol// shes rab ldan pas yon phul te// slob ma 'a ma chog dang bcas pa las// gar byos la//
pa mgor gzhag ste// rim gyis 'gyed dang 'dud par bya// de nas bzang mo rnams mnyes te// klams cad sgrub par byed pa'i mchog/ bdag gi skal bzang/
stsal nas kyang// rang gi sras kyi gnas su gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje ye shes yum chen mo rnams kyi phyagargya ye shes kyi
dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i yul bcom ldan 'das ma rnams kyis yang gsang ba 'dus pa las byung ba
rang rang gi sgrub pa 'i thabs rgyas pa bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces zhus so// shes rab ye shes mchog sgrub pa'i// sems dpa' chen pos gsung du gsol// thabs kyis
sems can thams cad kun// sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras thob pa/ rdo rje ye shes mchog gyur pa// rdo rje sku ste rdo rjemchog/ dngos grub kun gyi bde ster ba// rdo rje chen pos/
gsung du gsol// thugs kyi rin chen ldan pa'i mchog/ gzi brjid rdo rje snang ba can// sems can rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul can// 'grub pa'i yon tan 'byung gnas gsungs/
sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor chen po dbang phyug che// dpa' bo'i sbyor bas gar gnas pa// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// las kun gyas na 'bras b.res
bas// sna tshogs mkhyen pa dbang phyug che// sems can rnams kyi yab chen po// sna tshogs dam pas bshad du gsol// zhes bya bas so// de nas bcom ldan rtag pa'i rgyal//
dam pa'i dbang phyug kun mkhyen pas// gsung mchog nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i// zab mo ya na tshes bka' stsal// 'di na sgrub po gang yang med// dngos grub bam na sgrub
thabs kyang// thams cad rnam par rtog las byung// rnam rtog kyang nadamags ma yani// bdag med sangs rgyas rnams kyang mad// chos rnams med cing chos nyid med//
sbyor ba med cing sems can med// de bzhin pha dang ma yang med// byed pa med cing skyong ba mad// 'bras bu med cing rgyu yod mni// longs spyod med cing zab mo med// shes
mod shes pa po yang med// rnam shes med 'di shes bya med// brdzun min bden pa'ang ma yin pa// des na snang ba thams cad na// sgyu ma lta bu nyid las byung// de ltar chos
rnams rnam ragen// grol nas gos par ma 'gyur te// dngos grub chen po 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// zab mo'i chos ni thos pa na// mkhas pa gang
zhig dad gyuran// snying po phyag rgya sngags rage rnamaMs/ gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni bcom ldan gsungs// thams cad dag par byed pa'i mchog/ gsang ba'i
rgyun la legs bzhugs nas// sems can rnams la bstan pa po// de nas yum rnams tshim gyur te// rang byung ba la zhu ba zhus// grub pa'i sgrub
pha thangs rab sbyor ba// mnga' bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyis gsungs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rnams
zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha' dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi steng du ma nyams pa// nam mkha'imazla'
klas khyab pa ya// phyogs kun tu na rab 'phro ba'o// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// dus mtha' ma dang mtshungs 'dra ba// de ya stong du sa chen po// gser gyi ra ba dang
mtshungs pa// de yi steng du chu rashes bya// zla ba gang ba kha ba 'dra// sngags pas cho ga bzhin du bsam// rin chen bzhi yi rang bzhin bzang// stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa
tshul bzhi ya/ dpag tshad kyin tshad tsam pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhu ya rtse mo can// 'a bo chen po lcog brgyad pa// dbus su rdo rje'i ra ba mchog/ de yi
steng du rdo rje che// kun tu phyogs pa yongs su bsgom// sngo bsangs mar ga ta 'dra ba// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrugs// de ya steng du rdo rje che// rtsomo lnga pa rnam
0 par bsam// dkar po shel dang 'dra ba po// 'od zer lnga yas rnam par spras// de ya steng du rin po che/ chu skyes sngon po'i 'i dang 'dra ba// sna tshogs 'od zer stong gi
'phrang// phyogs bcunam mkha' khyab pa'o// de ya gtsug tu pad+ma che// nam mkha' khyab ba ya na mchog/ lo ma stong phrag du ma can// lte ba dang ni ze 'brusadakralags/
de yi mdun du nyi ma che// 'od zer stong phrag du ma can// de yi steng du zla ba che// dkar po'i 'od zer 'bar bas dkrigs// nam mkha'i khams na gang ba ya gza brjidi
dkar po 'phro ba 'o// de yi dbus su ma mo bri/dus gsum bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang// yongs su dag pa mkha' 'dram// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phro bamo// phyag gnyis
ma la sprugs zhi ba// bsam gtan spyan ldan bsam gtan yadi// bsam gtan mchog gi phyag rgya yA// sor mo gzhon nu rab bshad pa// dkar po'i gis 'dzin mdzes pa mo// dkor
bo yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan// ral pa 'i sbyor tshugs cod pan bzang// gtsug gi nor bu 'od ldan pa// ye shes gdan la mnyam par bzhugs/ ba sa rnams kyi bu ga nas// rgyal
ba rab tu 'phros pa ste// byang chub pha rol son par mdzad// de yi thugs kar rnam bsam pa// ya gi mchog tum 'gyur ba// yi ge rnams kyis yang dag dkrigs// thams cad
du na legs 'phro ba'o// sangs rgyas rnams na mdun gnas pa// rang tu thal mo sbyor ba 'o// de bzhin byang chub sems dpa' rnams // rig sngags khro bo'i
tshogs rnams na// chos nyan pa yi tshul du yang// dkyil 'khor du na gzhag par bya// sgo ya phyogs ni thams cad du// sgo skyongalan bzhi rnams so// sAn pa la sogs
rigs par// bcu drug pa yang gzhag par bya// me tog 'dug pa ma ma che// ji lta ba bzhin gzhag par bya/ lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang/ dra'i lha mon dmyal las byung//
'di rnams thams cad lhun po la// kun nas yongs su gzhag par bya// de nas me tog 'phreng ldan 'jug/ dri dang me tog yang dag ldan// gos dkar 'dzani ba dpal dang ldan// rgyun
rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// shes rab 'phro dang lhan cig tu// rdo rje sems dpa' rjes dran pas// bdag pas de na dag par bya// shes rab sbyor bas gang gnas pas// sgo yi
[c= ]drung du legs 'khod la/ glu 'di yisan spyan drang du// thugs rje mnga' ba chos kyi dbang phyug sangs rgyas yum// rang gi yab kyi tshogs dang sras dang bcas te byon// skyon ga sbyon trag
lha dang srin por bcas mchod pa'i// 'jig rten dbang phyug yang dag byang chub sprugs mnga' ba// spyon cige sbyon cage thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'jig rten gnyen// chos kyi yi go bde bar gshegs
pas rjes bskos pa/ mal ra ltar longs dag du mar dam bca' dran par mdzod// ma mo rnams na mchog glus bskul bas byon par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma byon par mthong
nas rang gis me tog ga sum pa dang/ mchod yon dang/ zhabs bsal dbul bar bya'o// oM bdag gi mchod yon zhabs bsil 'ad/ 4bde b.ran bzhes su gsol// de nas
de dang lhan cig tu 'dres pa ru ni gyur bar bsam/ oM sarba ta blug ta pradzA dzAn sa ma ya hU~Ms ma ya ste/ de nas 'di las brtan par bya ste/ o mthatu b+ha ga ta tsal sa ma ye mtshal
!/ de nas 'das mnyes par bya/ oM sarba ta blo bag ta man san sas ma ye rgyu'i ko byeha dza: de nas dpag tu med pa'i ngo mtshar chen po lta ba'i phyir/ oM sarba o ga puN+Da ri ma hA b+ha ga
bAn sa le sar sgyur sa ra su ra sarba aM ga a bA yu bu me zhwa bud+d+ha sa mu dAn glu hUM kaM/ 'di las ma mo bskul nas su// sangs rgyas sngon na 'od po che/ (dkyil 'khor pa la spro bar bya// de
nas gsang sngags 'di yis na// bsngags te me tog dor bar bya// oM sarba saM ga puN+Da ra pra dz+ha ku su ma aM dza la a/ de nas ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa rnams la/
rig sngags 'dis ji ltar bshad ba ltar legs par byan gyis brlabs la/ rang gis dbang bskur rang ga snyade po rang gis blang bar bya'o denas las thams cad kya nus pa dang ldan pa dang//
dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas ma tog la sogs dang// bza' dang btung dang ro dag gis// mchod la sngon gyi rim pa bzhin// slob ma'i
rgyal po gzhug par bya// 'khor los sgyur ba'i rim pa yi// sbyor ba yasan dbang bskur ro// rdo rje ni chen de bzhin pad// las kyi rdo rje de ba zhanano// zhags pa lcags kyu dral khu
dang/ lcags sgrog rngal ba dang na gdugs// ral gri mag sman thur ma gnyis/ rgyal po 'a zhu bar spyod pa dang// de la rgyan rnams brtan nas su// dkyil 'khor der ni dbang bskur ro//
rgyal ba'i yum rgyas dbang bskur ga/ las kun byed pa rab tu bshad// dam tshag gam na sdom pa yang// rang ga slob ma mnyan du gzhug/ zhi ba dang na skyes pa 'a las/ dbang dang
drag shul skyor ba na legs par rnam par dag sems kyis// ci 'dod par na khyi pos// las rnams kun gyi 'bras bu yang// sbyor ba 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas
bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams pa' chen pos slar yang las dam ba rgyas par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// ja ltar gzugs kyi spyod
byas la// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus su gzhug/ zho dang mar gsar 'o man// tsan dan dmar po dang bsros te// ga pur dang na ldan byas la// yid la byed pas bzlas te sgrub/ zla
panyi ma gzas bzung tshe/ sbyor ba bzang po'i rnam gzhag bya// thegamar men sar byas nas// 'bad pa las na rlung gis bu// gsar gyi snod du bsdu bar bya// khar ru na yi/
khu bas sgyur// nyi ma dang na zla ba la// slar yang rdzas de bsam par bya// de nas lce ru lha mo yi// khrag dang sa bon blugs par bya// de yis myur du rdzas dgun// 'grub par
'gyur te thertsom mad/ grub nas thog mar lha mo la// cung zad tsam zhagi dbul bar bya// de bzhin du na slob dpon la// skal ba nyis 'gyur dbul bar bya// de nas grub pa
gzhan rnams dang// rang gi slob mar skal ba bzhin// de nas byin rlabs sbyor ba las// khyag rgya dang ni lhan cig tu// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// zas kyis sa bon dang
na bza'// skad la de la gzugs brjes te/ rdo rjesams dpa' lta bu r gyur// gang dang gang gi gzugs rnams su// sgrub par 'dod pa'i sngagus pa yis// de dang rdo ya
bsam gtan gyis// blo gros brtan pas bza' bar bya// de dang de yi gzugs su na// gdon mi za bar brje bar 'gyur// gzhan pa ya na rdzas dag kyang// 'di 'ad kyis na
bsgrub par bya// mig sman gyis na mgi byugs pas// khor yug tu nam snang 'gro// sAde la ldong ros kyis byugs na// yid kyi spyod yul nyid du 'gro// ba bla yis sa lus byugs
na: mkha'al bar 'gro bar 'gyur// mig sananag po blangs nas su// nag po'i phyogs la bza' bar bya// de yang bshang ba'i mar khu las// dud pa
mkhas pas bsgrub par bya// de yas mag la byugs nan// sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shang/ stobs nadapal ldan rdo rje'i mtshon// 'di 'gyur zla dang 'chib med// mig
san dang na ba lang tshor// ma he dnganar nyid dang// ma ya mag snyanu nyid dag ni// mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas su// sngags pas gzung ste bco bar bya// mag snyan chen po mchog
tu bzang// 'di yas mag la byugs na ni// grub pa bde du 'ong bar 'gyur/ ma snang 'grub pa thams cad kyis// blo gros chen po rgyal por 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis
chen po// nges par thob 'gyur gzhan du mne/ rdzas kyi gnas skabs le 'u 'ad// mtshungs med chen por nyer bshad do// gos dang gdugs sogs ral gri dang// mtshon cha dam/
ba bsgrub par bya// sa po sang khar byas nas na// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rjesamasadapa' rgyal po ches/ pad+ma' sams dpa' bzhin ras mchog/ de yi
zhal phye byas nas su// de dang ldan pas bsgom par bya// mnga' bdag gang gas dbang phyug ltar// skad cig de la de 'gyur ro// ngo nyid kyi ni spyi bor char// mchog gi dam
pa bsam gtan bya// skad cig de la mchod pa che'i// sangs rgyas sund 'gyur sho/ de yi sa gtsug nyid du na// sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya// de ni kun gyi rgyal dbang po//
las kun byed pa 'a don grub 'gyur// rdo rje snying khar bsam par bya// de la dbus su sAng po blta// de nas rdo rje rig pa 'dzin// mnga' bdag rdo rje'i dbang po 'grub// rin chen chas/
po ma brgyud pa// snying kha ru namakhas pas bsgoms// ra na sAng po bsam pa yis// rin chen rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// bar chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ya de la bsgoms pas
skud cig la pad+ma tshe ldan mnga' bdag gis// pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mkhro' yas pa// ji ltar sbyor ba 'tshog yas// mchog dang dman pa'aphrang po/
yi dngos grub dam pa bsgrub par bya// sAde khar zla ba'i de la 'khor bsam// yi ge dam pa bsgom par bya// ji lta'i sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad bdag tu bsgom
par bya// de las langs to bdag zhi bis// zla 'od kha bltar bsal ba'i// 'od zer sngon gyis cher gtums pas// bsgrub bya'i bar gzhug par bya// skad cig de la gdug pa
dang// gza' dang dug sogs rab 'phrogs shing// tAm gcig gam bdun naman// bslab bya zhi 'gyur gzhan du man/ rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sAng bo'i
@#cu// mchogan bsgom par bya// 'od zer sar po' 'phrang mdzes pa// bsgoms pas de rgyas par byed// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnasapar// mnyam par
bzhag pas lha mo bsam// dmar po'i rang bzhin 'bar dag pa// bsgrub bya'asams la 'bro bar bya// slar yang sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang gi lus la gzhug par bya//
'khor los sgyur ba lta bu yang// den pa sadabang du 'gro// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sna tshogs rdo rdzobasgom par bya// de la dbus su ya gi na// mar gad
'od 'dra bsgomaM par bya// 'od zer sprin gyis yang dag 'khrugs// mkhas pa yas na so khar bsam/ bisgrub bya la na sAng po'i 'od// bsam pa'i skad cig de la 'bab//
rdo rje gur gyi gar byed cing// phyag rgya sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor dang// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma sbyor ba'i// phyag rgyas thams cad ston par 'gyur// 'das dang ma 'ongs rtswa'adod pa//
lce brkyang bas na sla bar byed/ sku 'dod dang ma 'dod dge ma dag/ rdo rje'i ngag gis sa bar 'gyur// yang na legs par sbyar ba 'am// grong ga'am bla ma la skud dag gas// 'dod
dang ma 'dod dge ma dag/ 'tsho ba 'am na 'tshab dang/ khams dang ma kems rang gzhan gyi// de dag thams cad de yis sa// de las gzhan du de mi// 'di ni bcom ldan rdo
rje can// dbang bdag rdo rje'i dbyangs kyis gsungs// khros te lce rtser bsgoms nas su// lhame ya nasang po 'amchog/ lcags kyu'i rnam pa ra spros nas su phyag rgya dang na phyag
rgya' lan// rlung la bzhag ste skad tsakel// khrag rnams thams cad dgug par bya/ char rgyun 'bab pa'i sbyor ba yis// rang ga kha ru dbab par bya// de na 'khrungs pas sngags shes
te mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin bar 'gyur// nam mkha' kun tu spyod dpal ldan // cha ma'i snying ba lta bu r 'gyur/ 'di nyid kyan ni la 'byor gyis/ 'o ma zho dang mar bzang po
mar khu chu dang ma rtog kun/ rlung gis dgag pa nyid du bya// zhags pas mgrin pa bcing byas te/ lcags kyuyas nasang kha nas// rlung gis kun nas bteganas su// lha mo
de bzhin gnod sbyin no// mi mo de bzhin lha man mo// brgyad brgyu kho na bzlas pa las/ bud med tshul du dgug par bya// bsgrub bya sgrub byed mang po kho nas// ka ba rtsig nga
de ba zhin khum/[â ]/dril bu rnams dang bum rnams la'ang/ lha mo yanas ri po pa// brgya bzlas pas na 'babs bar 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ma mchog/ khra ba dang/
yang dag ldan// gsal byed kyison gsal byas pas// las rnams dag na thams cad bya// dur khrod re na mi nyams pa// mar ngo 'i brgyad la bsdus nas su// byang du phyogs togazhag
bar bya// de la khar na mnyam bzhag pas// gsang sngags legs par bzlas nas su// rdzas kyi dam pa mirogs pa// ba bla mig sman rje chu dang// lceng res dang
yang yang na btsag/ dkar rtsa sol bi da dang na/ (gur kum dang ni rgya skyes sam// ru rtashu dag ga pur dang// tsan dan de bzhin a ka ru/ sha dang khrag dang nyid dang// de bzhin sor
mo' gdu bu ni// rnal 'byor ldan pas gzhig nas kyang// de yi snying du bsdad la bzla// nyi ma shar nas de blangs pas// grub pa'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// dman pas dngos grub
dman ba ste// rab kyis rab tu rnam par bstan// bar mas bar mar shes par bya// mtshan ma med na dbang du khyed// ces so// skyes bu dag ni thams cad dang// bud med dag ni
thams cad la// reg pa tsam gyis dbang byed pang// mag la byugs pa yis kyang ngo// tsan dan gyis na yongs byugs te// gur kum rgyas na thag le 'o/ la gu yusan bdug par bya//
dkar tshu sol ba btsag gis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i ming dang na// yongs su spel te bris pa yis// dbang ma song ba dbang 'gro ste// rdo rjesems dpa' bka' bzhin no// khams kyis
sang ni bris pa ni// dbang du byed pa' mchog yanin// sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed// dkar rtsa yis na dug 'joms so// la khris skad cag de kad la// so bar 'gyur bar
glu tsam med// ru rtaa ka rus bdug nga sa/ dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// sol bas yongs su 'gugs par byed// gnod sbyin mon nges par 'gugs// sha dang khrag gi bdug pa/
yas// srin po 'gugs par byed pa 'a mchog/ tshun dan sa rgyal ba dug pa yis// lha na 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/ ga bur tsan dan 'dug pa yis// sangs rgyas mchog tu gyun 'dren
pa'o// ga pur gang gis zos ba yas// gzhan du 'ang de yi dbang du 'gyur// rig pa chen mo ya gi bzhu/ mnyam par gzhag pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'khrugs pa dngan sil ba'i dus//
nges par sha ba bsgrub par bya// brtul zhugs can gyis gang bsgo ba'i bka' lung de yis myur du byed// phrag par khur te bran po des// lhun po'i steng du skyel bar 'gyur/ grub pa
ya ni mchog rab kyi// rdzas na blangs nas 'ong bar 'gyur// gtum po' ya degs 'a mo yi/ rgyal gyi mtshan mo sol ba gzung// gtum mo'i ma tog khu ba yas/ brtul zhugs
bzang pos brtags nas su// pad+ma'i nang du gzhag par bya// de nyid mtshan mo gcig gam gsum// de las blangs te sbyor ba yis// mkhas ba pas na mar zhu bya// de nas lha 'am
grub pa 'am// sangs rgyas kyis kyang bsngags pa 'am/ rig sngags grub pa'i grab ma 'am// gdon ma che bar mthong bar 'gyur// 'gro dang ma 'gro'i skye bo rnams // dbang ma grub
pa'ong dbang du byed// rang gi khrag gis mang bris la// de lta kyi na phyems dang// jisodi bskams par ma gyur par// de sradi ma'i 'od bar 'gyur// gang
dang gang gi lha dag gi/ ram pa 'di yis mang bris te// khro bo ldan pas bzlas par bya// de 'dis skad cig de la 'grub// de yi bka' bzhin byed pa dang/ ngang gis de na dbang du
'gyur/ dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa// gsad pa'i don du sngags rig bas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// zhal bzhi pa la cher 'jigs pa// zhags pa lcags kyu
[â ]spyod pa can// bdag nyid myur du bsam par bya// gsang sngags dang ni spel ba yi// mang nasol bas bris nas su// gdug pa de namanan nas kyang// rang gi gdug pa'i srims kyis bsnun// 'di

nyid kyan dwange 'dzin gyis// nges pa ru yang nges par byed// khams kyi sa bon dang spel ba'i// khams kyi ming ni bris nas su// khams de yang drag mnananasan// khang pa ru ni rgyun du gzhag/ de na myur
tsha du des 'gyur te// de srid du nam ga por gnas// rma bya'i sgro 'am gtsug phud kyis// yongs su blangs la bsgrub par bya// rma bya zhes bya'i rtsa ba yag/ mkhas pa yas na mings su gzung// dmag la/
sngags rig pas bskor bas// de nas dmag dpung 'jige pa dang// rmongs pa 'am ni rings pa 'am// skad cig de la la bor bar 'gyur// khyi dang phag dang bya rog gi/ mgon yongs su blangs nas su//
mag san dang na mnyam por bya/ lha mo'i sngags kyis bsngags pa yis// sgrub pa po yi gzugs rnams kun// 'jig par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ tsaN+Di'i mi rtog bcud nyid kyis lcags/
kyis g.yogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ya kha ru nges bcug pas// na sha mad par rnam par rgyu/ rims gtong gzugs na legs bris te// de yi kha ru gnod byed na// sbyor ba yis ni bcug nas
su yongasasu mnan la shin tu bzlas// rims gtong de la gzugs kyis na// rab tu 'dzin par gdon ma zi// gatha' 'am yang dag pa degs sam// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po dang// gzhan
ba ya ni nad rnams kyis// 'dzin pa la na dpyad ma dgos// ga ni rje bris te bsnyad par bya// de yi zhal du dgra bo ste/ rmongs pa'i bdag 'di ma 'gron// de ni myur du nges par 'chi// gsad
pa la yang 'ad nyid kyis// yongs su mnan nas nges par bzla:/ gang du gter na yod snyam gyur// der ni sngags rig pas song ste// lce yongs bzung la bzlas pa bya// de yis gsal po'i
tshig gis sgra// tshad dang yod dang med pa dang// bgegs dang bgegasan joltar gnas// ji srid de ni dgyes smras n// de la gter ma ni bar bya// gal te bgegasan ma sman// der ni
mchod yon rab tu brtag/ pus mo gis btsugs gus pa yis// nor 'dzani sangs rgyas yum las so/ phyogs bzhi dag tu phur bus gdab// de nas gnas rnams bskrad par bya// de/
nas mtshamasan bcing bar bya// mnyam par bzhag ste bskor bar bya/ sbyor ba shes pas sngags 'di yis// de nas rdzasan gdon par bya// oM ba su de sat+'a apas/

da nasA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya u d+ha ra u d+ha ra rak+Sha rak+Sha/ san+nAmAn tsa yaM pradzra tsa Ta Ta sa hasAhA/ yang na rig pa 'di yas kyang// las rnams dag ni thams cad bya// phyogs bcing ba dang de bzhin srung//
phur bus bslad pa de bzhin no// rin chen gsum na klog mar sbyin// cha gcig dang nanor 'dzin lago/ sdug bsngal can la chagacig go/ grogs po rnams la de dang mtshungs/ lhag ma/
rnams ni rig pas dpyad// dkon mchog gsum na legs mchod bya// gzhan du sdug bsngal thob 'gyur te// rgyal po chom rkun sogs 'jigs pas// gal te bla ma der bzhugs na//
lho skal ba bzang po gnyas dbul lo// gzhan pa yi ni spyan rnams la// rdo rje theg pa rtogs gyur pa'i// skal ba re na sbyin par bya// gzhan du dam tshag gdung bar 'gyur// 'ad ni bcom ldan
rnal 'byor can// gsang ba rgyan gyi rdo rjes gsungs// de nasasangs rgyas thamasacad kyis// yum rnams kyis ni der btud nas// dpa' bo che la zhu ba zhus// rgyas pa ya nadakyil 'khor na//
gsungs shig gsungs shig dpa' bo che// yum rnams kun gyi dkyil 'khor ni// rgyal po'i dbang phyug rab gsol ba// sems can thams cad 'dir 'byung ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rdzalas byung ngo// dkyil 'khor ji ltar sngar

gsungs pa// 'on kyang seng ge'i khri dang ldan// de yi snying du pad+ma che// der na ri bong can dkyil 'khor// de ya stod du sku ma che// 'a ma der ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ cha brgyad pa la dbus rin chen//
de yi skad du rgyal po'i yum// sor dang spro ba'i 'od chen po// gser gyi ri bo dang mtshungs pa// phyag gnyis kyis na chos 'chad cing// g.yas pa yas na mchog sbyin pa// g.yon gyis 'ani chen lan
bumachod// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// gosan 'phyang zhang sna tshogs pa// gtsug tor mu tig thor tshugs can// de yi mdun du rin chen khri/ g.yon du bum pa bzang po mchog/ g.yas
pa'u na dpag bsam shing// rgyab tu rin chen lan bu 'o// mtshams rnams sun bum ba brgyud// gser gyi rang bzhin gzhag par bya/ tshanichenalnga mas yang dag 'khrugs// dra lnga dang na yang dag ldan//
bza' la sogs pa'i res gang bgi/ bum pa bcu drug phyi rol tu// ser po'i gos kyis yongs su dkris// me tog ser po sogs kyis brgyan// de mdun blo ldan bla bya ba// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin
dge ma// dmar dang ser dang ches dkar ba// rin chen ldan pa'i phyag sbyin pa/ ser po'i 'od ldan 'phreng mdzes ma// rin chen bzang po kun gyi sras// nam mkha'i zla skar ma yas// kun nas yongs
su bskor ba'o// gtsug phud yod pan gos la sogs// 'breng ba dang ldan dges pa mo// de ya lho ru bro bya ba// tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge ma/ cung zad sar ba'i rin chen
lus// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyad// sna tshogs gos ni yongasasu gyon// mdzes pa'a'i phreng ba'i chun po 'gatsug zhes ldan gtsugan gtsug tor mchog/ yid bzhin rin chen dam pa'i phyag/g.yon

pa'i skyil krung rin chen bzang// tshog jibazhin rab tu bsam// rgyud du bzod pa ma zhes bya// cung zad 'dzum zhing sar mdzes ma// dmar po'i 'osan legs par gyon// rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan// thams

lho cad rin chen mchog 'dra zhing// dmar po 'a gisan 'byung ba ma// gtsugan 'anichen mchog dang ldan// seng ge mchog gi khri la bzhugs// khyad du brtson 'grus chen mo ni/ rdo rje go chas brgyan pa la//

zadapal mo rin chen dbyug gu'i phug/ g.yas pa sbyin pa'i pha rol song// pri yang ku la sngo bsangs dkar// rdo rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs// lhag ma rnams nagazhag bya ba// dkyil 'khor byas te rani chen

ldan// sgo dang sgor sgo ba ma// rami chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de nas phyi la phyi nyid du// rin chen sum pa'i la ga ba mchog/ phyogs skyong ba na h+phams cad na// guram sa bzhin du gzhag par bya//
de la phyi rol thams cad du// mkhas pas klu dang gnod sbyin hra/ rin chen bum pa bzang po dang// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan lag/ gtor ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang// lha bshesarab tu//
ba zang dge ba// bza' dang btung ba'i ri mchog dang// mar dang ka ra nyid dang ni// zhe dang bu ram hAgs dang bcas// 'o ma mar dang sbrang rtsi dang// rgyal pa'i bza' ba dam pa'i mchog/ bza' ba
lasogs rab mchog go/ de nas sngags pas 'jug par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas su// ser po 'a gos 'dzin dug ba dang// 'phreng ldan dra zhim ldan pa'i las// sgo ya char na zhugs
nas su// thog mar lha na sbyan drang bya// phyag rgya bcings te dbyangs sanapas// rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis su// lhar bcas 'jig rten dag la sman slad du// kun tu bzang po'i smon lam drin mdzod la//
rin chen dam pa seng ge'i khrir bzhugs te// 'khor bcas lha dang de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin/ de nas de dag legs khyen te/ sras bcas 'khor dang bcas rnams kyang// sems can rnams la
dngos grub ster// sgrub pa po la khyad par du// de nas klal mo legs sbyar la// rani chen gyis bkang me tog bcas// gsang sngags brjod de gtor bar bya// ci bde ba na bzhes su gsol// de nas
rang gas dbang 'askurabya// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// sa la lag pas reg nas su/ bsdoms pa yis ni 'thon par bya// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya/ ma tog dris na yang dag sdud//

ser po 'a gos bzang yang dag gyon// lag na dzani chen dri bzang po// dga' dang bcas te snyam pa de// snga ma'i sngags kyis dor bar bya// gang gi drung du lhung gyur pa// lha de de yas 'grub pa yin/ de
nus g.yas nasarnam bskor te// slob ma de na byung bar bya// bzang po'i sang ge'i khrir gzhag ste/ dbang bskur ba la sbyor ba byas// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan dang//

mdzes pa'i rnga yab g.yob pa yis// de bzhin du yang dbang bskur te// bum pa brgyad dang 'du drug la// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yas// go rims ji lta ba bzhani no// de nas sbyor ba de 'ong ste// 'khor

los sgyur ba'arim pa yis// 'khor lo rin chen bzang po'i lag/ rgyalab rgyal ba'i sgra dge bas// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// lte ba ru ni dbang bskur ro// 'di bdag gder rgyun rin chen 'dzin//
rdo rje rinaMchen 'dzin par 'gyur// dam tshig gnadam pa yas// sangs rgyas kun gyi don rgyas pa// 'bad pas de ring blangs pa yis// 'phongs pa'i dri ma 'phrog par byed// de nas dpa' bo 'chi med/
'dzin// rin chen tshogs kyis mchod par bya// gzhan pa yi yang du ma na// rgyal po dbang phyug dam bas so// de bzhin dbang bskur lnga pa yis// skabs med kyang na bdag med 'gyur// gling ba'i
tsha dbang phyug dpal ldan yang// gnod pa med par thob par 'gyur// gsang ba las kyang ches shin tu// gsang ba yas na mna' bsgogs te// de yi sgom dang sgrub pa'i thabs// slob ma la ni de
nas bslob// gur kum dang na tshun ngan dang// dri dang mar ma bzang po la// dam tshig gin gsal byas pa// lan gsum du na 'anyung du gzhug/ bu kye 'anyung zhig gsang ba che// dam tshig shin tu
'da' ba dka'// gal te 'di las 'das gyur na// myur ba nyid du 'chi bar 'gyur// ga nas kyang ni dmyal sdug bsngal// rab mang ngu 'bod nyid du gnas// kal te ma ru sku 'dod pa 'am// nam/
zhig dngos grub thob 'dod na// de bzhin 'phongs pa'i sdug bsngal las// rang du nges par khyod kyis skyobs// 'di dag legs zlos slob ma la// gsang ba'i sgrub thabs bshad par bya// ji ltar rgyal
rigs bu mo ni// gzung nas gsal ba'i rnal 'byor du// ma bdun na nges par 'grub// rgyal po'i phun tshogs thob par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsam
gtan bya// rgyal mo tshog bzhin bzung ste// sgrub pa pos na myur du 'grub// 'am gsum gyi rgyal po mchog/ gdonami za bar thob par 'gyur// bram ze'i bu mo skal chen mo// nor chen la na bsgrub par bya:/
rjerags snatshegasasbyor ba yis// mtshungs pa nyid du bsgrub par bya// de yas dngos grub mchog rnyed de// rgyal po 'jig rten gsum gyi rjod// dmangs mo dpa' bo'i sbyor ba yis// bsgrubs na sngags kyi
dngos grub 'gyur// gnod sbyin rgyal mchog grub pa dang// gnod sbyin rnams kyi re bar phyug mchog/ draman pa'asamasasu bshad pa dang// mchog gis mchog ni chen po dang// bar mas bar ma'i dngos
grubani// skyo ba 'di la thob par 'gyur// de nas las rnams bslab pa ra bya// zhu ba dang ni rgyas pa'i las// de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod dang// gzhan pa ya yang sna tshogasan// sems can rnams la
dga' ba 'o// shes rab pha rol phyin dge ma// dkyil 'khor sbyor bas bsgom par bya// kun da dkar po zla ba 'dra// 'od zer dkar pos mdzes pa mo// skye bo nad pa 'chi
ka ma/ de yalus la gzhug par bya// de nas de na stobs ldan 'gyur// brgyad gnyis pa ya ladatshor ldan// nad rnams kun las rnam par grol// rga dang 'chib rnam par spangs// bstan bcos
kun gyi don rag cing/ shes rab dran pa mchog dang ldan// de bzhin rang 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// nam mkha' la na yang dag bsgom// mdzes pa'i rin chen sna tshogs pa'i thams cad du na char 'bab pa//
rad yis 'phongs pa rnam par sal/ 'phongs pa rnams la rab tu brtag/ mthe bong gi natshadatsam pa'i// nor rgyun ma la rnam pa khya// lha mo la na mnyam par gzhag/ de yi mdun du gsang sngags bzlas//
nga sride 'bum phrag kho na ste// de nas dngos grub bsgrub par bya// zla ba gang ba'am bcu bzha'am// brgyad pa 'am gzas bzung nyin bar la// mchod pa chen po byas nas su// mkhas pas mtshan mo thog
thag bzlas// de nas dga' bas gzugs brnyand// gdon ma za bar 'bar bar 'gyur// de nas bzung ste mdor bsdu na// ma la 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur// bzlas pas mtshan ma bzang byung na//
rnal 'byor pa ni nor chen 'gyur// bar mas glu de ni thob par 'gyur// tha ma yis na khor yug go/ thams cad du ni bzlas tsam gyis// longs spyod zad par 'gyur ma yani// rgyal po thams cad dbang
'gyur zhing// bud med thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// snying khar rnal 'byor byas nas su// nor bu lag par bcangs nas na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bsgom// myur du rin chen rgyal por
'gyur// phyag rgyu 'dan bus gyur pas// rtag tu sgom pas bsgom par bya// ji ltar 'dod pa 'grub red de// rdo rje 'dzin pa ji bzhin no// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal te//
de nas sbyor ba ji bzhin du// yum de rnams na legs byon nas// las kyi dkyil 'khor lags gnas pa// stonapa lan zhu ba zhus// gang du rgyal ba kun bzhugs nas// bla na med pa'i don mdzad pa//
sems can kun la bde slad du// myur du las na 'grub pa lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das las thams cad kyi dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi yum gyi dam tshig ga dam pa de rnams la las kyi dkyal 'khor bka' stsal pa/ rlung ga dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yadabus su gru gsum pa// de yi steng du lha mo gzhag/ 'bar ba'i mi dang/
mtshungs pa la// zhal bzha me la cher 'jigs pa// mtshab rad tu gtsags pa mo/ thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i rtsed pan can// rdo rje lcags kyu thod pa dang// zhags pa g.yas dang g.yon par 'dzin//
pags pa chen po gos su gyon// khro mo ma'i 'bras rab phyung ba// mche bas mchu mnan zhal chen mo// de la mdun du bri bya ba// mtha' ma'i zhal na mdor bsdus pa// sna tshogs gtum dang drag pa'i
zhal// du ma'i phyag gis yang dag 'khrugs// zhags pa lcags kyu thod sogs dang// rdo rjecan gyi sog la 'dzin// byed pas lus la bres gyur cing/ rtsod pan
chen pos 'jigs byed me// gshanidzodapa' bos bri bya ba// mtha' gdong dam pa ya na mchog/ sngon po 'bar ba'i rang bzhin khros// mgo bo' 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan// byed pa'i 'phreng ba'i/
cod pan can// stag ga pags pa'asham thabs can// ral gri rin chen thod pa dang// rin chen dbyug gu 'an pa'i mchog/ de nas lha mo legs grwa// pad+ma'i zhal ma 'jigs chen po// dmar mo phyag na

nyazla 'ani// bskal pa'i me dang mtshungs pa mo// g.yon pa ru na khro mo che/ ma sbyos man sku rigs mgul// las kyi rdo rje dra ldan mchog/ mchab rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal// gtsug na zed pa 'jigs su rung
rab gatum stobs dang gsal ba mo// 'byor ldan chog rig pas bris// phyi rol tun las/sa bri ba// khro bas 'jags pa dang bcas pa/ ral pa'i thor tshugs chen po can// khrag gas gang ba'i thod pa dang//

phyag rgyabazang pos phyag mtshan pa'o// de ya phyi ra lha rnams ni// sAm pa rab sbyar ya dem pa// klams cad du na yongs su gzhug/ 'jig rten skyong ba gzhag par bya// sgo rnams dgan thams cad du// so skyong ba

yang de bzhin du// de nas gtor ma'i chogani// ga bcas btung ba ro dang ldan// de nas go cha bcings gyur pas// thod pa'i cod panachen po dang// khrag gam chang gis bkang ba 'am// thod pa ldan pas 'jig par
bya thams cad 'grub pa'i ma mo rnams // 'di yas spyan ni drang bar bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i// gsad pa'i don du ma mo rnams // de ring nyid du dkyil 'khor 'dare// 'jigs/
chen ma rnams thams cad gshegs// 'jags pa'i sgra dang chor gsum dang// kha nas 'od zer stong phrag na// mthong ba dang ni thos pa na// mtshanamar yang ni shes par bya// de nas de yis arga sbyin//
bder bzhes shig 'jigs mdzad ma// gdug pa chen mo gsol bar mdzod// gdug gtum 'jigs par byed pa yis// de nas bdag la dbang bskur te// thod par gnas pa'are yas na// srang tsam gyi na sha zos
nas: ma mo thams rbad bsgrub par bya// de nas mngon spyod las rnams kun// dam tshig bsrung ba yis na bya// dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed dang/ bla ma rnams la 'khyal stsab// rtag tu gsod pa
lha mo rnams // brgyud par bdag na rjes su zung// de nas chog de nyid kyis// slob ma'i dam pa gzhug par bya// khro bo'i lha la bskul nas su// ma tog dmar po dor bar bya// bdag ga mi tog dam pa
'ad ci bde bar na bzhes su gsol// bdug pa 'di na bzung nas su// gsol byed 'di na ri sol bar mdzod// lha mo gang la lhung gyur pa// de yis de la mchog gsol lo// denas dbang bskur
byin nas su// dkya'i 'khor gyin mdun gzhag ste// thod pa ru na gnas pa yas// khrag gse dbang na bskur bar bya/ de nas sgo ru bos nas su// dam tshig 'bad pas 'dzin du gzhug/ rab tu
gdug pa'i sAng gi khrag bzang po 'di na 'thung zhig khu// khro zhag zo zhag shachen bo// btung ba 'jigs pa chen po 'thung// gzhan du nan 'chi'agyur te// mkha' 'gro
ma dang gza' rnams dang// gnod sbyin srin po gtum po las// rang por ma thogs rang du tha// de nas mngon spyod las rnams ni// stong phrag dganubaslab par bya// de yi sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis//
rang nyid khro bor bzung gyur nas// gnod byed thams cad gsad par bya// dgra rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// gdug pa thams cad bcar bar bya// sAn po thams cad gzhom par bya// mtha' yas
T+Thazhal ma'i sbyor ba yas// gsad dung gzung ba de yas bya// zhal bzha ma ya sbyor ba yis// thams cad 'gugs pa'i dem pa la ni// mkha' gdong ma yas thams cad du// rin po che ya tshogs 'byung ngo//
bad+ma'i zhal gyi sbyor ba yis// chang ga dem pa btung bar bya// ma spyom ma ya sbyor ba yis// sha na 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no// nam mkhas rengs pa chen po ste// dmag dpu 'byor pa'i dam pa 'o//
rmugs dang rmongs pa thams cad du// dpyad pa ru nam bya 'o// sngar bshad pa ya las rnams dang// ma bshad pa la ci 'dod pa// bskrus pa tsam byas kun bya ste// thams cad du na tha tsos mad// dur
khrod kyi na lbel ba la// dgra bo'i bozugs na 'bad pas bya// ming dang spel bar byas nas su// mamo'i ral gris gtub par bya// de nas lham bdun na na// rlag par 'gyur bar gdon mi za// gang lus
ji ltar bcad gyur pa// de dang de la yan lag 'chad// zhal ba zha ma ya sbyor ba yis// sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pas bcad// de yi mgrin par zhags pan// mkhas pas spros te bcing bar
bya lcags kyus sange khar phug nas su// rlung gis bskyod de drang bar bya// de nas de ya mang bskul nas// de nashes rab ldan pas dgug/ dman dang mchog gdabye ba yis// 'di yi 'bras bu nga
yas bshad// mdor bsdus pas na shes par tuM// sngags pa'i rgyal po sbyor ba yis// shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad na/ de yis dngos grub gsol ma
'gyur// 'bar 'tshob 'dzags rnams dang// gdon dang gnod sbyin srin po bcas// ma bi zad nad kyis btab nas su// sha nas mnar med nyid du 'gyur// de nas de bzhin dbang bskur gyis//
dkyil 'khor la gzhag yum rnams kyis// dbang bskur gsang ba'i dam tshag sbyin// gsang ba'i sgrub thabs nyan du gzhug/ rang yum ma mo'i sa bon gyis// rang gi rnam rtog bdag yum mni// lta
bus yab gyur bsgrubs nani// nyami bdun rab tu 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi yab ston pa/ dkyinamakhyen yashes spyod yul te// drag po kun dang bde chen po// yeshes kun gyi mchog gi mchog/
shes rab kyasi ni thams cad bsgrub// las rgyas pa ya dam pa'i mchog/ bye brag tun bskul nas su// byang chub kyin yon tan gyi// thams cad dun 'od gsal ba'i// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub
bar du// shes rab kyin las dbye bas// gzugs dang dbyibs nyid dag gas so// phyag rgyudang phyag rgya'i lan// de bzhin dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang// bza' ba dang na nyar spyod
pa/ gtor ma lha bshos nyid dang ni// shin tul de pa 'a stan nyid dang// de dang de na nges par gyur// bzlas dang bsam gtanas 'o na// rangag lus khyab pa nyid do// gsang sngags dag na gloms cad las//
gsang sngags 'di na rib tu bsngags// tshe 'dir dam pa'i rjes grub cing// gdon mi za bar zob pa'agyur// 'di ni bcom ldan kun rdo rje// ye shes 'byung gnas mnga' bdag gsungs// las kun gyi
zla sbyor ba mas// 'dan sgyu mas 'gro la bzhugs// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog tu dge/ ye
gis chen pos gsud du gsol// gang gis mngon par rgyas pa tang kun// mnga' bdag dusaa ring bar 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par

zhugs nas 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// phyag rgyartags su yang dag pa shad// blo snyadatsan du rnam par brtags// sangs rgyas kun gyi kla klo'i skad// phyag rgya thams cad la ngadag bshad// 'on kyang mgon
bo mchog gis brtags// lag pa'i rnam dgod mtshanaa nyid// gang gis med chos 'og sa skye rnams / dam tshig shes pa'i lha rnams ni// sgrub po rnams kyis rab bskul na// grub pa'i dam pa rab tu
stsol// dus las thams cad byon nas su// slar yang gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur// lag pa zla ba nyisar bya// shes rab thabs su rab tu brtag/ de nas sngags pas yongs su sbyar// rang gis bon dag gis
mtshan/ o pA ro pA ya sa mA yo ga/ denas thal mo nges par sbyar// phan tshun rjes su rtogs chenapo// khu tshur gan du kan dpar bya// khu tshur bsdams pa lta bu r cing// so so ru na sbyor bar bya//

snying gi dbus su nges par bzung// g.yon pa 'inang du lag kha ga las// bzhag ste sor mo so sor bya// lag ga yas bsgrengs nas phyogs kun tu// 'khor lo'i sbyor bas spro bar bya// rdo rje sgo lcags lta bu r
bskum// sor mo thams cad cibs su bya// o sa d+hatsakrus ma la/ ! de bzhin g.yon pas yongs su so// sor mo rtsibs kyi sbyor ba pas/ shes rab steng du bsring bar bya// gu yas pa yang na de bzhin no//

rtsa mo cung zad sbyar bar bya// chos kyi las na tshon po byed// de nyid snyan du bskums pa na// las kyi phyag rgya zhes su grags// de bzhin mang med byas nas su// lhag ma rnams ni gdong du sbyar// phyag rgya chen
pa shani tun// dngos grub thams cad rab tu gsol// phyag rgya 'di rnams bsdams na ni// rang nyid shes rab bdag por 'gyur// kun tu bzang bo rgyal po che// lha dang lha man bcas pas mchod//
casaso// de nas ma mo de rnams kun// slar yang gtsobo la bstod nas// shes rab chen po rnam bzhi yi// phyag rgyazhu ba rnam par byas// phyag rgya bzhi la rab kyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
stsol cig/ gsang ba'i phyag rgyar yal ga mchog/ shes rab thabs kyis lus bzang ba/ gang zhig gsang ba'i rnal 'byor na// gang gis rnal 'byor pa bde ba// rdzu 'phrul
'phel dang yang dag pa'i// rdzu 'phrul skye ba 'dir rnyed pa// bcom ldan ston pas bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i phyag rgya rgyal ba'i gzhu// gang gis myur du sgrub po kun// rab tu bde bar gnas pas/
'grub// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// ma nyes te gsang ba'i dem pa gsungs// phyag rgya ba rol phyin pa rnams // bde ba chen po rab tu sgrub// rdo rje thal mo dam par bsdams// rdo rje dbus su
gzhag par bya// gsang ba'i dam tshig ces su bsgrags// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor dang zhu sgrub// de ni rdo rje lta bu r byas// bskyod pas bde ba skyed par byed// 'dan chos 'dzani zhes bya ba'i//
phyag rgyagasang ba sgrub pa'o// g.yon par thabs nabaskums nas su// bskyod pas bde ba 'gugs par byed// dag pa'i las zhes rang du grags// bde ba thams cad rab stsol byed// de nyid kha
dang kan lan// sbyar ba chen mo zhes su bshad// rdo rje phan tshun yang dag sbyar// lcags kyu'i kha nibaskyod par bya// kha na phan tshun yongs sbyar ba// gsang ba'i zhags pa zhes su grags//
de bzhin bskum par byas nas su// dam du bsdams te bcing bar bya// 'di ni ches nga bsdoms pa'i rgyu// ye shes sdems par b tu 'grub/ thams cad rdo rje ltar rdo rje// de bzhin bskyed cing
ba bskor bar bya// de 'du gsang ba rab tshim pa// tshim pa donan ster bar byed// lcag ma phyag rgya chen po ru// shes bya phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa'o// de nyid las kyi phyag rgya mchog/ las kyi dbye
bas sbyar bar bya// zhes so// de nas ma ma de rnams kun// yad 'tsham zhing mgu ba yis// rdo rjesams dparatshan yangs pa'i/ lags so ba na nges par phul/ lags so legs so
gsang chen po// legs so legs so mchon chen po// legs so legs so rnal 'byor che// lags so legs so rab tshes mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnams kyis dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor zhu ba bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ sangs rgyas rang bzhin khyod la 'dud// spyod pa'i rin chen khyod la 'dud// dam pa'i rgyur
gyur khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs mdzad pa khyod la 'dud// dpa' bo 'dul ba khyod la 'dud// gsang ba'i chos ldan khyod la 'dud// zhi ba'i thugs la phyag 'tshal 'dud// mgon po khyod la bdag
cag zhu// bdag gi dkyil 'khor zhuba'i phyir// mnga' bdag rgyal dang sems can rnams // de nas 'acom ldan 'das de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje btsun mo'i dekyil 'khor bka' stsal pa//
de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su// dbus su pha rol phyin ma dgod// zhes bya ba shes rab can// khabs dang ldan pas gsal byas pa// 'ad yasasngags pa 'jigs med par// zla ba phyed kyis nges par
'gyur// rig pa 'di yis de yisan// las rnams thams cad byed pa dang/ dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba dang// tshim dang 'phrog dang 'bras chen po// zhibs zhib zhes su/
bshad// brnyas ma zhes pas rgyas par bshad// dbang dang dgug dang dbye ba la// byed ma'o dab nga la drag mo lani// shA ya mtha' ru bdud gsod ma// gsod pa dang na sil bar bya// 'gro ba dang ni yang
dag ldan// sor mo zhags pas dkri bar bya// thams cad du na drag po dgug/ drag po drag po'i go 'phang gnas// 'di yi tshig ldan pa yis// las kyi tshigs kyi mchog kun bya// sems la rnal
'byor legs bsams te// brgyad bslu kho na bzlas pa yis// dbang bcas ri dum dbang chen bogo// stobs kyis mgo bo mnan nas su// ma mo' tshogasakun de yis bzla// dus mirang bar 'grub par 'gyur//
gzi brjid chen pos bka' bzhin du// mgo bos bar phyag 'tshal te// 'di yis ma mo thams cad kun// gzakharjid kyis na gza ldan pa// sngags kyi rgyal po 'od ldan pas// go rims ji lta ba
bzhin du// dpe zla med pa'i dngos grub byed// grub pa'i lam la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa yas// 'dan ston pachan pos gsungs/ ma skyes
skye ba med la bzhugs// rtag pa ston pa thams cad pa// nam mkha' nyi zla drim med// de dag thams cad rab dga' ste// dngos po spangs pa'i btsun mo yas// gar dang glu dang sal stan mchog/

bzhad dang sgeg pa'i sbyor ba dang// bud med sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul dang// gling bu pa wang rdza rdzasogs// ting ting shags dang dung sgra dang// ro dang reg pa dri chen po// gzugs dang sgra sogs bde ldan pas//
dpa' chen la na mchod byas nas// sems dang bcas pas phyag 'tshal te// slar yang mgon po la gsol btab// rdo rje btsun mo'i dkyil 'khor rnams // mgon po la phyir ma gsungs// yab
rnams kyan thams cad dang/ yum rnamasakyin mdor bsdus pa// mchod pa yang na thams cad de// khran bcas pho rta pho lhamo// 'jig rten pa ni many+dza' dug ga/ gtsobo chen pos gsung du gsol//
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gnyis su med parnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de dag nyid
kyis sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje la gzhug pa dang/ dgug pa dang/ bcing ba dang/ mnyes bar bya ste/ 'di kya sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rjeganyis su med pa bskyangs pa dang ldan pa la
mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so// denas yang bde ba yongs su skyes pa rab tu dgyes pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad lhan cig spyod pa dang bas pa/ bran dang bcas pas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// mgon po
dbang phyug rdo rjesams// rdo rje snang ba mdzes pa'i sku// gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor na// dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol// gangags rgyal ba kun spyod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i grags chen po/
da nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsol to//

a ma sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// zhu bar nga du zhus pa na// gang phyir de la dngos med kyang// zhu ba zhus pa thams cad thos// gsang ba chen po'i smon lam dang// de bzhin sang rdzo'i pha rol phyin//
dran pa mad las dran pa yang// dran 'gyur dran po bzhin gnas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po// shes rab pha rol phyin dge ba// chos dang chos man rnam par spangs// brjod du med pa bshad

(par bya// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag nyid de rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po bka' stsal pa'i phyir/ slar yang glu'i dbyangs
'dis zhu ba zhus pa/ chos dbyangs mi g.yo de la lo gsakhazhugs dam pa'i shugs// phyogs bcumatha' yas sangs rgyas kyis zhabs legs btud pa// bde mchog lha yi lha ste sa dbang 'jig rten bla//
zhi dkyil 'khor bde ba mchog la bzhugs gsol bde chen gyis// sa gnyis gtsug gi phyag byas bde ldan pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis// rnam pa kun tugar mdzad sbyor ba'adakyil 'khor dam pa gsungs shag kye//
'gro kun phan dgongs rab tugazhug gsol mchod pa chen po kye// tshalugs rnam pa du mas 'gro kun 'dul mdzad kun gyi dam pa kye// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba

btab cing bskul ba'i tshig nyid kyis thugs la bzhag nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bsgyur ba chen po rab tusam pa bde ba la longs spyod pa rnam par bsgyings pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i taphange 'dzin la
snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs te/ bde ba chen po 'khor los sgyurab la rab tu gnasanas da kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje rnams las rab tu phyung ngo//

dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin brus la// de ya le bar 'di dgod do// rdo rje chen po bsam gtan pa// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug dag dang ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi yab// kun gyi thog mad+ma' rab byung ba//
de la sogs pa'i rim pa yis// thams cad kun tu brtag par bya// pad+ma'i lo ma rtse bas lan rang bachos dang rad tu sal// mamo rnams na thams cad kyis/ mchod pa la sogs rab tu brtag/ sgo
ru sgo ba yongs su brtag/ sgo yu phyi ra so skyong ba// btsun mo lhan cig spyod bcas pa// kun nas lha rnams gzhag par bya// de nas rang gis bon gyis// klu dang gnod sbyin 'bar ma gzhan// dra tha
rnams dang ma 'amachi// lha man nam mkha' lding dbuzhin// 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad na/ sgo ru gnyis gnyasi gzhag par bya// gdon dang dug dang rims dang nad// yi dgas sha za
srin po dang// dmyal ba brgyad po phyogs brgyad kyi// 'khor lo'i phyi ru gzhag par bya// de nas 'khor lo'i mu khyud bra/chen po rin chon bdun rang bzhani// de yi sgo ru bri bar bya/
shar du 'dod chags skyes gnas lag/ zhe sdang drag po lus gnag pa// byang du lags par bri bar bya// gtumug nub tu bri bar bya// lho rung rgyal nyid yin no// sog la
dang na gos nag po// de bzhin dbyug gu 'jigs chen po// 'di rnams phyag rgyar brtags pa 'o// de nas ji lta ba bzhin 'jug/ de nas gsang ba rdo rje'i phyag rgya des par bcings pa'i lag par
gyur pas rang ga dam tshig rjes su dran pas/ phyag rgyad nyade kyis 'gugs pa'i rnam pa dang bcas rdo rje'i glu 'dras bskul te/ dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// 'dir gshegs 'dir
gshegs sangs rgyas zhal nas sangs rgyas dpal// bde bar gshegs pa yum dang bcas pa mtha' dag gis bskor te// 'dir gshegs 'dar gshigs pad+ma'i spyan ras pad 'a sa 'khrungs// dam
tshig rnam dag rnams kyis dpa' bo dam pa'i phyag/ glu dbyangs rgyal po 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i blo gros nges par bskul// byon 'gyur byon 'gyur song zhig ces// 'khod cig 'khod cig 'khod par/
bya tshim zhing tsham la rab tu chem// zhugs shag zhugs shag 'jug par bya// kA kye zhes brjod bskul ba yis// sa la gnas kun rab tu 'bebs// de nas me tog dor bar bya// bcom ldan
bde bar bzhes su gsol// lha dbang gang la lhung 'gyur bzung// de yi sgrub thabs brtsam par bya// yang n yid la gang 'dod pa'i// sgrub byed sgrub po dam pas byed// de nyid du na dbang/
bskur ba// rnal 'byor pa na mkhas pas blangs// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dar la sogs pas gdong g.yogs te// phyag rgya bcings pa'i lag
bzang pos// de bzhin du na me tog dor// sa ma ya saM bdag gis brjod// me tog gang la ltung gyur pa// de yis sbyor bas dbang bskur bya// yang na gang 'dod rnal 'byor gyi// sbyor ba
bsgoms te dbang bskur bya// yang na bdag po'i rnal 'byor gyis// gal te de na sbyor ldan 'gyur// gdugs dang rgyal mtshan bla khro sogs// b+hing gar yi bum pa dang// rdzuyab rnam pa sna tshogs dang//
songale'i khri nabazang po dang// gsar dang dngul gyi dbyug gu dang// rin chen datsug gu du man// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gzhag/ dbang bskur spro ba chen po yis// de ni stan la bzhag nas su//
rnal 'byor ldan pas dbang bskur ro// dbang bskur ji ltar rags pa yis// gsang ba'asbyor bas dbang bskur ro// thog mar sdom pa ldan pa yis// de na dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug/ 'dir ni nga
yasi dam tshig zung// phyi dang gsang ba rnam pa bzhi// sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// sangs rgyas ye shes rab gsal byed// gdug pa thams cad gsad par bya/ 'jungs pa rnams kyi nir
dbrog bya// lta ba ngan la brdzun du sa// srog chags gsod la smra bar bya// gzhan gyi bud med mngon bgrod par// ci bde bar ni phrogs shag bu// gzhan rdzas 'phrog par byed rnams dang// /
dkon mchog gsum la 'gal byed pa// bsad dang gzhom par bya ba dang// de bzhin khrag rnams btung ba ru// 'bad pa yis na thams cad byos// dam tshig rnam pa
gsum po las// de nas yon na phul nas su// bla ma la ni gus pa las// zhabs la mgo bos nges gtugs te// rang lus rgyal po'i longs spyod dang// chung ma'am yang na bu mo dang//

bu rnams dang ni bran nyid dang// sring mo sring mo' bu mo dang// ma dang rang gi mna' ma dang// khong dang yul gyi longs spyod dang// shing rta 'gro dang glang padang// rnam par bkra ba na rta rnams dang//
rgyu nor gyis gang ba'i grong rnams dang/ ba glang ma he ra rnams dang// lug rgod rnams dang gzhan rnams dang// mo mdzes pa'i dzamo me// gzhan yang gzhan yang gang 'dod pa// ji ltar rags pas
mchod par bya// rim bzhin rang gaslob ma'i tshogs// mgon po mchod nas gshegs su gsol// gang gzhan rdo rje spun la yang// de nas sgrub thabs dam pa bslab// srol dang thur sel sbyor
ba yis// sems kyis brtan pa nyid du bya// zla ba rtsa ba lta bu r dgang/ chashas dag na bcu drug kyang// de yi dbus su rnam bsos pa/ (gtso chen 'dod pa'i dbang phyug go/
mdor bsdus nas na spyi bar bya// brtul zhugs can gyis rang lus bsam/ bdag nyid 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rgyal// 'dod pa'i zil gyis mnan nas su// rnal 'byor can bdago
dpal ldan 'grub// lha dbang bcas pas phyag 'tshal zhing// nad dang mya ngan 'jigs pa sel// skadang 'chi ba rnam par spangs// zla ba gcig tsam bzlas pa yis// dpa' bos
las kun byed par 'gyur// zhi dang rgyus dang de bzhin dbang// drag shul spyod pa'i rim pa yis// dgug dang dbab pa'i las rnams // skad cig tsam zhig bskul ba yis// sngags pas
thams cad byed par 'gyur// sngags kyi sbyor bas sngags zlos pas// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsungs// yan lag lnga las skyes pa gzhung// 'byung po'i nyin mtshan mo gung// lcags
gsum gyis na dkris byas la// rang gi kha ru gzhug par bya// bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pas bzlas// de naning par mthongam 'gyur// lhar bcas grub pa'i sems can gyis// thams cad rnam
par kun tu 'o/ bsal par gnas shing shes rab che// bstan bcos thams cad rab tumakhas// gzugs dang lang tsho phun sum tshogs// rig pa 'dzin pa'i mnga' bdag 'gyur// bcu bzhi'i nyin
bar sha ba ya// gdol pa'i ga yon gyi rtsib logs na// sbyor bas bzung ste 'phur 'gro ma// gzugs brnyan lag pa bzhi pa bya// zhags pa lcags kyu rtsa gsum mtshan// g.yon par thod pa 'dzin pa po//
rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// spyan gsum rnam par gtsags pa po// thod pa'i 'phreng ba'i cod pan can// gsum ldan sa zur chen po pa// 'jigs pa chen po'i dur khrod du// rnal 'byor ldan pas
de bzhag sa// cho ga ji bzhin mchod par bya// gsang sngags rgyal po bzlas par bya// thod pa 'phreng ba'i cod pan can// khrag dang sha dang mar khu yis// de nas lha mo de
'grub bo// mtshanam yang na blta bar bya// mtshanam yas na dngos grub che// sa ma ring bar bzang po 'thob// dman pas dman pa ni dngos grub ste// bsam yasAnihAr nA'o//
mtshan ma med na chung ngun// rab tu 'grub par dpyad mi dgos// lha man bzang po dgug par bya// ma dang mda' na bskul ba yis// de yi skad cig nyid la byed// khrag nyid kyis ni bris pa la//
dbang du bya ba'ad 'ad nyid kyis// de bzhin bud med thams cad dgug/ grub pa'i rdzas kyang mang nyid kyis// dgug pa'i sbyor bas dgug par bya// dmag dpung rnam par bzlog pa na// rgyal
mtshan rtse mor rnam gzhag go/ rengs dang rlugs par bya ba dang// rmongs dang 'ching ba de bzhin du// khyab dang bsad pa thams cad ni// cho ga dag dang ldan pas byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi yum rnams dang yab rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyis dkyil 'khor gyi zhu ba chen po 'ad zhus pa dang/ gang la bzhugs nas rgyal ba kun// yum
dang yab rnams de bzhin du// de yis sbyor bas sbyor bdag nyid// sems can rnams na snod du mdzod// gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi// rnal 'byor chen po'i rnam dbye ba// gang gas ma 'ongs me
rnams na// bde bas sangs rgyas nyid la 'jog/ de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// 'dzum dang bcas pa'i snyan rgyas pas// gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor na// gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa//
gang phyir bdag nyidi dkyil 'khor bshad// sems can dag pa'i rdo rjecan// bdag nyid gsang ba'i rgyan ces bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags nyid de// bdag 'di rig sngags dam tshig kyang// gang phyir
bdag nyid sdom pa ste// bdag nyade bshad dang 'chad pa 'o// pha dang ma rnams de bzhin te// dngos grub sgrub po las kyi mchog/ bde dang sdug bsngal khams gsum pa// zhes so// de nas
bcom ldan 'das la// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang yab rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol lo// de phyir gsungs shagi bcom ldan 'das// bde bar gshegs pas gsung du gsol//
sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyis// phan dang bde ba thob pa'i phyir// zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum dang yapa nyapar longs spyod pa rdo rje dpal zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa zhugs nas/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje las 'ad byung ngo// sngon bshad cho ga'i rim pa yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag bris nas su// de yi dbus
su bdag bsal bya// dkar dang dmar dang 'od chen po// sna tshogs rgyan gyis lus la sgras// dmar po'i 'phreng ba gtsug tor can// sna tshogs gos rigs mnabs pa// dmar po'i 'od kyi bla gos
can// phyag bzang g.yonan dril bu sa// bsnyams khams 'dzum bag ldan pa'i zhal// phyag gzhan na na rdo rje can// snying khar rab tu ba sor mdzad pa// bad+ma rgyas 'dra'i
spyan mnga' ba// zhal gyi dkyil 'khor tIshar mtshungs// rdo rjesang ge'i khri la bzhugs// dmar po 'i gos na 'chad ba po// mdor bsdus nas ni bri bar bya// g.yon du shes rab yongs su
dri sngon bshad pa yi gzugs can la// g.yas pa'i phyag ni 'phyang ba 'o// lho ru spyan pa chen mo na// phyag rab ra'i chen stsol ba mo// byang du bzod pa chen mo ni// byams pa'i ya lad 'dzin
sgyur pa mo mdun du brtson 'grus chen mo na// rdo rje'i lag pa chen bzang ba// shar dang lho pa mtshams su na// bsam gtan pha rol phyin ma bri// bsam gtan phyag can spyan yangs ma// zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor 'od bzang ba'o// bden bral du 'phal ma bra/ rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan// nor gyi rgyanan stong phrag gis// sems can mang po bde par byed// smon lam bla bya rlung gno//
sa mtshams su yang dag mtshon par bya// dbyangs snyan pa ya dag brjod pas// sems can thams cad skul bar byed// blo gros ldanupas dbang ldan du// thabs kyi yi shes slob pa so/ lag pa
gnyis kyis gar byed pa// sgeg dang dga' bas 'khrugs pa bri// dpa' bos shar sgor bri bya bar// shes rab pha rol phyin dgo ma// ye shes lcags kyu mdzes pa'i phyag/ dmar po'i dar gyis

mngon par mdzes// dbang na nub kyi sgo ru ni// 'ching ba'i bdag nyid bri bar bya// shani tu byu ru dang mtshungs pa// rdo rje lcags sgrog 'dzin pa mo// byang gi sgo ru bro bya ba// stobs kyi pha rol phyin
ma mchog/ rgyal ba thams cad mnyes byed pa// dril bu bzang po 'khrol ba'i bdag/ gshin rje cho'aphrul bri bar bya// 'bar ba'i sngon gyis yang dag 'khrugs// phyag na rdo rje zhags bkra ba//
rdo rje'i glog 'phrang dang mtshungs ma'o/ drung ya mdun du shes ldan gyis// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug brgyan pa bri// pad+ma rA ga'i 'od gsal ba// mda' dang gzhun 'dzin pa'i mchog/ de yi mdun du
dkar po lnga// zla ba'i 'od 'dra grags chen po// zla ba shar ka' 'od mdzes pa// 'dzum bag can la gzhon nu'i gzugs// rdo rje 'dun pa chen dmar ba// mda' lnga dang na gzhu 'dzan pa// skye
ba'adzoms pa dpa' bo na// lagan 'khor lo gzi brjed mchog/ de yi g.yon du bri bya ba// dkar dang dmar ba'i 'od chen po// rdo rje dzang sgrogs rgyal po ni// dril bu 'khrol ba dang ldan pa//
