de yi rgyab tu khri bar bya// gsar dang gur kum dang 'dra ba'o// lo yi phyogs su khra bya ba// mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// sngon po char sprin dang 'dra ba// lag na ral gri rin chen
ldan// de mdun dpa' chen 'dod pa ni// rgyal po bdag nyid chen po bra// 'od zer dmar po lag na gzhu// rin chen 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// de yi lho ru bro bya ba// rdo rje rnam par sod pa
mchog/ nye ma'i dkyil 'khor lag pacan// rab tu rno ba'i 'bar pa'i 'brong// rdorjedum pa 'dul mdzad dpal// rdo rje rin chenamchog gi tog/ kha dog dkar po cher spro ba///
gos sngon rnam par 'phyang ba po/ rdo rje TA ki'i dbang phyug rigs/ lag na ra chen shin tu mdzes/ de yi rgyab du ba rgyu ba// dgod dang bcas pa' bzhanir sa mchog/ nga yi rgyab tu bla bya ba// dril
dbang phyug dbang phyug che// lagan pad+ma sAbasar 'tshang// ban d+hu'i me tog rnam pa 'dra// de la mngon par phyogs pa ya/rdo rje sgrol ma spyan mdzes bri// dkar ser bzang po sna tshogs pa// lag na
zla ut+pal sngon po bzang// de la g.yon du dag pa/ lag na 'khor lo ches dkar bri// sngon pos legs pa'i gnas thob pa// mchog tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin ras can// lo ma'i rtse mo rgyab tu khra/ lag
na yid bzhin nor bu mchog/ kha dog sngo bsangs dpa' chen po// sams dpa' ldan pa'i thugs chen po// de yi lho yachadun// chos 'chang mchog na bro bar bya// rgyumtshan phyag ldan rab dkar ba//

tshul mashar ka'i snang ba 'dra// nga ya byang du ba bya ba// stug po bkod pa grags chen po// shin tu ljang ba'i margad mtshungs// las kyi rdo rjemchog 'dzin pa'o// de la mdun du bri bya ba// rdo rje skyod bya
yad 'phrog bkra// bzhad bcas rdo rje'i lag pa can// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de ya lho ru bro bya ba// 'gro ba'i rtse mo lags brgyan pa// lhang tshor nag po budab 'dra// rdo rje'i
gsalashang 'dzin pa po// rgyab turdo rje 'ching ba bri// lag pa yang dag sbyar bsdams pa// rin chen kun gyi 'od dag cing// 'dzum bcas mchog tu ngo mtshar ba// 'khor byed g.yon du bri bya ba// lag/
na mgal me'i 'khor lo can// lags sgo dar la bab pa po// rab rgyas pa lta bu'i zhal// de nas sgo ya tsha dag tu// sgo ba rnam pa bzhi po bra/ shar du rdo rjes g.yo ba// lag na rdo rje lcags kyu

cha lho ya sgo ru rdo rjes// lagan rdo rje zhags pa 'bar// nub tu rlung na ston pa ste// rdo rjelcags sgrog 'dzin pa 'o// lus ngan du na chu ba ste// zhags pa ldan pa'i dril bu 'dzin// de nas sbyor ldan
'ongs nasasu// dgyil 'khor gyi ni shar du bra// shar du mda' ya mtshon tshalag/ rab dmar pad+ma ltar 'bar ba// lho ru chen po dbang phyug can// sngon mo dbang phyug rdo rje ma// lag na rin chen/

ma can// rin po che yi rgyan gyis brgyan// rdo rdzanyer zhi dekaramadzes ma// rgyab tu rtag tu bri bar bya// lag na pad+ma bzang po 'dzin// pad+ma'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rdo rje steng zhal mdzes ma na//
sngo bsangs kun gyi yon tan ldan// lus ngan duyishis ldan gyi// g.yas su rdo rje rtse gcig bri/ shar gyi mtshams su rdo rjen// dus tshigs zhes bya bzang mo bro/ dbyar gyi sprin ltar mdzes pa mo//
lag na bdug spos grags chen mo/ nub kyi mtshams sur ri ta// laganam tog 'phreng ba 'bag/ cung zad dmar la dkar ba mo// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// nub byang du ni bri bya
ba/ lag na ya ge sna tshogs bri// lag na sgron ma rab dmar ba// cung zad sngo ba'i gos gyon pa// dri ya glang po ltar 'gying ba'i// rol pa nam mkhas pas bri//
sngo bsangs dmar po mthon mthAng 'dra// rab tu dgod cingamag mdzes ma// rdo rje'i lag pa mag mdzes mgo/ de yi shar du bra bya ba// rdo rje mchog ga'od ldan pa'i// rdo rje dbang phyug bde
ba ma'o// de bzhani lho ru bro bya ba// gsar sogs dang na mthon ma nga 'dra// rin chen sgron ma rin chen lag/ 'od mchog ldan pa'i lha mo na// nub kyi dkyil 'khor dag la bri// 'od
kyis sang zhing mdzes pa la// lagan 'od zer legs mdzes pa'o// rdo rje brang skyes cher bkra ba// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan/ lagan sna tshogs shes ldan pa// byang du rtag
dubri bar bya// de bzhin sbyor bas bris nas su// pho nam yang legs par bra// sung skul byed ma mdzes ma ni// shar du legs par bri bar bya// rdo rje myu gu mda' ldan damar// mig gnyasi
dang na gos sngon po'o// de dang nye bar dpa' mo na// lag na lcags kyu zhags pa mchog/ gdug pa 'gugs pa'i lha mo bri/ sngo bsangs dmar la legs brjod nga 'o// rjes su mnyesama'i pho nya/
che nub tu rtag tu bri bar bya// rgyal ba thams cad manyes byedas// pags pa'i zhags pas lag pa mdzes// khrag 'gugs pa yi pha 'amo// byad du gnas pa bla bar bya// mdog gnag pa la cher
za ba/ lag na thod pa legs mdzad pa'o// thams cad 'phrog pa'i pho 'amo// ma ya mtshams su bri bar bya// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa mchog/ dmar gnag dka' thub chen po ma'o// de yi
byang du dpa' bo yis// sgo skyong stobasachen bri bar bya// rdo rje 'bebs ma legs dmar ba// lag mah+phal dril du dang ldan pa'o// dam tshig gsum ldan spyan gsum ma// rtsa gsum rdo rje 'dzin pa mo//
'jigs pa'i lus can cher gsal ma/ 'od zer dmar po 'bar bas 'khrugs// 'bar ba'i ma lce'i lag pa can/ ma ya phyogs su yang dag brten/ lcamochen mo thog ma ma// lag na rdo rje'i
gtsub shang can// dmar zhang sngo ba bra bya ste// ji lta ba pa rim pas so// gdul dka' 'dul ba 'a lha mon// sgo skyong ba yi gnas na gnas// dpa' mo rdodzadabyug gu'i lag/ byin za 'bar ba dang
mtshungs ma'o// de nas bran mo bri bar bya// rang gi phyag rgyas lag pa mtshan// 'jig rten gsum 'ching bran mon// nub tu yang dag bri bar bya// 'ching ba chen mo'i log pa can// rab dmar gur kum 'od
zer can// bran mo 'jigs pa'i me gdong ma// sgron bcas lag pa'i rtse mo mchog/ rab gnag pa la lus chen mo// cho ga ji bzhin rtag tu bri// bran mo gtsags shing rnam 'gyur gdong// 'khrug
pa'i tshul la rab 'jigs ma// lag na thod pa rlon pa can// shin tu dmar zhing 'od chen mo// sku gsung thugs 'chang bran mo na// shar du yang dag bri bar bya// dkar zhing dmar la lus chab// zhagos/
dpa lcags kyu'i lag pa mchog/ de nas rol pa mo bu bya// ge ramis ji lta ba bzhin no// de bzhin gshegs ma dgyes man// mdzes shang rin chen gyis nyar brgyan/ mda' gzhu'i
lag can dmar ba mo// gos dang 'phreng ba dmar po 'dzin// byang du sngags pas bu bya ba// kun nas 'bebs mtsho ba'i mchog/ mdzes pa'i lag pa 'dzan pa mo// bde ba 'babs la legs par gnas//
'jig rten gsum 'dzoms khro mo na// rdo rje rol pa mo zhes bya// drag shul chen pos bsngags par byed// mnyam par bzhag pas shar du bru/ rab tu dga' ba rjes rtog ma// sngags pa spro bas rgyab tu bri//
'dod chags phyag rgya'i lag pa ma// 'gro ba'i gtsope mnyes par mdzad// dga' byed ces bya bro bar bya// thams cad rdo rje rol pa mo// dga' ba'i rtse 'jo' lag can bkra// rgyan rnams kun gyis
brgyan pa na// sngags pachog shes pas bra// rdo rje tshu mdzad legs gnas pas// phyi rol rdo rje bri bar bya// rang gi rigs g.yon du gnas// dbang por mag gsum bri bar bya// rdo rje can gyi rdza gsum

tshu 'dzin// g.yas pa yis ni phyag 'tshal zhing// rang ga chung ma sogs pas bskor// chu sbyar tshangs pa chen pon// gdong pa bzhi pa bri bar bya// sgo ru skye ba chen po na// rdo rje lcags kyu stobs po che//
kun nas dmar zhing cher gtum pa// sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o// lho ru legs par gnas pa 'amchog/ lag na zhags pa dam pa bra/ sams dpa'i grags pa chen po dang// sangs rgyas
rnams na 'jug par byed// 'ching byed drag po chen po na// brtan pa'i rdo rje yang dag bro/ bal po so 'u'i ma tog mtshungs// rags shing stan lasam g.yo ba'o/ na tso khug rta dang mtshungs pa' /
mnyes byed mchog ni bri bar bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed rung// rig sngags pha rol phyin rnams kyang// rdo rjed byug gu' lag pa mdzes// zhi ba sogs kyis yongs su bskor/ gshan rje
'khor lo'i lag pa na// shan tu mdzes pa 'i rdo rjes mtshan// sar po 'a gis 'dzin gnag pa po// mtshon chasogs pas yongs su bskor// lus ngan du na dbang po bra// rdo rje'i lag pa rab tu mdzes//
de nas mchod pa rnam par bri// rdo rje me tog 'thor ba'i gzugs// lag na me tog sum pa mdzes// me tog 'phreng pas rnam par brgyan// sngags pas rdo rje bdug pa pa yid sam byed pa'i dam pa
na lagan bdug pa mig yangs ma// mkhur tshos cung zad dkar ba ma'o// lha mo rdo rje snang byed ma// gsar bsregs pa yi mdog 'dra la// lag na sgron ma mkhas pas bla// rgyan rnams kun gyis
rnam par brgyan// dri zhum lus la tsha lugs bzung// lagan dra yi snod mdzes ma// ut+pal sngon po'i lam mtshungs// mdzes pa'i gzugs la yid 'phrog ma'o// gzugs kyi rdo rje mdzes pa'i gzugs/

rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lag na rdo rjeme long 'dzin// 'dzum bas dgod pa'i dkyil 'khor na// sgra yi rdo rjesna tshogs lus// dkar dang sngo ba'i lus dang ldan// pa wang gling bu ting ting
sogs// sgrogs pa shes rab can gyis bri/ ro ya rdo rje nal chen mo// lag na ro yi snyid 'dzin pa// rgyan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag
ldan// rdo rje rig bya sngo bsangs che// muskyes sngon po 'dab 'dra'i mig/ rnam par gsal zhing cher dgod pa// rang ga dpung pa bsdams pa mo// bzhad pa'i rdo rje bod bcas pa// rnal 'byor pas na mdor
bsdus te// bri bya sA tshegs gos 'dzin dkar// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa ma'o// rdo rje sgeg mo dkaramachi// sgog dang bcasashang yid du 'ong// rked pa khu tshur gnyis gzhug cing// mdzes
pa'i 'phreng ba'i chun po btsugs// rdo rje glu mkhan legs dmar lus/ glu len pa la rab tu brtson// chu skyes dmar po rgyas 'dra' bzhin// glu len lag pa rab tu mdzes// rdo rje gar ma mkhas pas
gar dang bcas pa'i lag pa can// sngo bsangs dkar po cher dkar ba// mag che ba la 'dzum bcas mchog/ rdo rje sal snyan drag mo che// dur du ra ya rdza mdzes rdung// rdo rje rje chen lhamo che//

rdzachen rdung ba bri bar bya// rdza rdum ni mkhas pas bra/ rdza rnga rdung bar byed pa mo// lha mo mu kuN+Da rdung ma// mu kuN+Dam bzhin mdzes ma'o// pa Ta han rdung byed ma// rdo rje pa Ta ha zhes bya// rdza rngachen

po rdung khyod ma// rdo rje rdza rnga ma dzes na gri/ gulngardung byed dga' ba mo// dgod bcas pad+ma'i mag can ma/ rdo rje gaN+Dadapa' bos khri lus kun gyi nadam pa 'grub// lag na rdo rje ting ting shags/

rdo rje ting ting shags bu bya// lag na rdo rje cang te'u ma// kha dog dkar mo 'od zer che// 'khar rnga rdung ba'i lag pa can// rdo rje 'khor ma bri bya// rgyud gcig pa wang sgrung ba bri// rdo rje pa wang sbyong

ma 'o// pa wang rgyud gsum sgreng ba'i rgyu// pa wang rgyud gsum sbyang ba bri// rdo rje 'khar khrol lha mo che// dmar po yin gos bgos pa'o// rdo rje gling bu rnal 'byor pas// gling bu 'bud pa ldan pa
dr-i rdo rje pa wang skal rmanamo// pa wang sbrang la rab spro ba'o// rdo rje 'bud dung 'bad pas bya// dung dkar 'bud pa'i rang bzhin can// dung ma lag na zangs dung 'dzin// 'dod pa'i gzugs
mchog 'azhi pa mo// rgyal ba'i dril bus lag pa mdzes// khrol ba yang dag bri bar bya// legs so ba la gzi brjid che// rnam par rgyal la spro byedama'o// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dmar// pad+ma
dmar po kha 'byed ma// gar gyi rgyunas rab gnas pa'i// lag pa stong ldanu bri bar bya// rin chen gnas lhamo che// gar gyi bdag nyid legs par bA/ lag na rin chen so ma can// lag ma du
ma gdong brgyapa'o// rdo rje gar ma bsams bcas ma// lus 'chu ba dan dang ldan pa// rnal 'byor pas ni cho ga bzhin// rdo rje sbyor bas rab gnas bra// sna tshogs gar ma skal chen me// rdo rje/
thal mo sbya bor 'jog/ 'dzum bcas pa la mag mdzes ma'o// sna tshogs sgyu ma legs soms ma// smin ma bskyar ba'i mig mdzes ma// sras bcas gdong gi rnam 'gyur na// mthong na dga'/
ma 'dzum pa'i bzhin// gdong gi dkyil 'khor sngo bsangs mchog/ rdo rje mthong ma skal chen mo// rab tu dgod cing mig rgyas ma'o// rnal 'byor chen pos srid bya ba// rnal
ba 'byor mig gis lta ba mo// rab tu gsal bas 'khrugs pa can// 'khor lo bskor ba ltar byed ma// seng khar lag pa 'jog pa na// sdig pa ma lus 'joms par byed// ji mar bcas pa'i
mig gnyis na// steng dang 'og tu 'phags pa yis// mthong ba 'gugs byed bde chen gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed// sgo ru skyo ba chen po na// rdo rje lcags kyu stobs po che/
thams cad srung zhing cher gtum pa// sangs rgyas mchog tu spyan 'dren pa'o// sgoru legs par gnas pa'i mchog/ lag na zhags pa dam pa bragi/ sems dpa'i grags pa chen po dang//
sangs rgyas rnams ni 'jug par byed// 'ching byed drag po chen po na// brtan pa'i rdo rje yang dag bri// bal po sa 'a'i ma tog mtshungs// rags shing rnam par g.yo ba'agadong// ne tso khug rta
tsha dang mtshungs pa'i/ mnyes byed mchog ni bri bar bya// rig sngags pha rol phyin rnams dang// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// dbang por gzhon nu bri bar bya// gshin rjer gshani rje
nyid yin no// chu lhar chu lha bra bar bya// lus ngan po na khung phyogs su// 'di dag bsdus te bri bar bya// 'khor gyis mdun du bdar ba// phyi ru dmyal ba brgyad po khri la dgas kyang ni
thams cad du// rdo rje rgu mdzad la gnas pa// sngags pas cho ga bzhin bris te// phyi yi rdo rje bri par bya// rang gi rig ma g.yon du gnas// dang por mig gsum legs par bri// rdo rje can gyi
rtsa gsum 'dzan// g.yas pa yis ni phyag 'tshal zhing// rang gi chung ma sogs pas bskor// chu ltar tshangs pa chen po ni// gdong pa bzhi pa bri bar bya// rdo rje dbyug gu' lagA pa mchog/
zhi ba la sogs rnams kyis bskor// gshan rjer 'khor lo'i lag pa can// rdo rjes mtshan cing rab tu mdzes// ser po'i ges 'dzin gnag pa po// dpal mo la sogs rnams kyis bskor//
lus ngan dun dbang po bra// rdo rje'i lag pa rab tu mdzes// mag stong pa na che ba'i lus// bde sogs sogs kyis mdun du bdar// dbang ldan dun dbang ldan bra// me ya phyogs su ma lha 'i/
bden brul du na bden bral grags// rlud du rlung lha nyid yin no// shar gyi sgo ru dpung bzang phra// muts+tshad+ma Ta na nub tu'o// lus ngan dun grub pa bri// lho ru bdud rtsi 'khyil ba 'o// cho ga
'dis ni sngags shes pas// dkyil 'khor bzang po bris nas su// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// yab yum gtso bo dam pa rnams // cho ga ji bzhin sngags pas gzhug
dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bdag/ rdo rje lcags kyu'i lag pa yasi// cho ga ji bzhin bdag brgyan te// rdo rje sams dpar bsams byas nas// snyames dang bcas pa sa langs
nas su// gsang ba'i sams dpa' dbang bskur te// 'di yas spyanan myur du drang// yab dang yum bcas sangs rgyas sras bcas pa// bran dang gnyen
bcas nye du dang docas shing// dpal mchog rdo rjesams dpa' yongs mnyis pa'i// lha dang lha mos legs bskor 'dar gshegasashag/ glu 'di yis bskul ba yis// de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad byon// byon nas dngos grub chen po ni// sgrub pa po la stsol bar 'gyur// yang na mtshan ma snang 'gyur te// 'bad pa'am snang bo blta bar bya// gal te bsod nams rab dman
klu na/ de yis ci yang mthong ma 'gyur// des na slar yang gsol ba gdab// yang dang yang du bskul bar bya// lha yi rnal 'byor de nyid kyis// nga rgyal yang dang yang byas te// mchod pan tu chen
bo ru// de nas mchod yon zhabs bsal yang// gsang ba'i de nyid kyis bskul te// sngags kyi de nyidirig pas dbul// sangs rgyas kun bdag phyag na rdo rjen// mdzes pa'i shes rab kyis
'khyud sbyor ldan pas// yab yum sras bcas 'khor bcas po nasogs// bran bcas skye bo'i tshogs kyis bskor nas byon// sams can kun la ban dgyes pa// khyod la bdag 'du zhu ba bgyid//
'di ni khyod kyi dus lags pas// sems can don mchog mdzad du gsol// gsol ba btab cing bskul bas kyang// gal te mtshan ma byung gyur na// rdo rje sems dpa'i rnal 'byor ni// de tshe slob
ma 'bad pas bsgom// rdo rje pad+ma'i yan lag bcing// sbyor bas dkyil 'khor nyid du gzhug/ de nas sgo ru mkhas pas gzhag/ dam tshig dam pa mnyan du gzhug/ ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang//
de bzhin bu mo dag kyang ni// som nyi rnam par bral sems kyasi// khyod kyis rtag tu bstan par bya// sems can thams cad gsad bya zhing// brtul zhugs spyod pa bskyang bar bya// 'jungs pa rnams
kyi nir phrogs te// skye bo sdug bsngal can la sbyin// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma'i sbyor bas// yang na bdag nyid kyis kyang spyad// dkon mchog gsum la mchod bya zhing// blam la na gus par bya// brdzun

gyi tshig kyang snyam bya// chang ni btung bar ma bya 'o// dam tshig dus na ma gtogs shang// byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig dang// gzhan yang bde bar bya phyir dang// slobadaponamanyes par bya don dang//
dkon mchog gsum la phan pa'i phyir// brdzun gyi tshig ni rtag tu myos// gzhan gyi bud med bgrod par bya// dam tshig don du sbyor ldan pas// gzhan pa mang na thams cad kyang// sems can don
la brtson pas bya// gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di dag ni// blo gros ldan pas bsgrug mi bya// dam tshig ldan pa ma gtogs pa// bla ma'i bka' gnang sngags pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen
po lag na rdo rjes byin brlabs pa// gal te rmongs pa'i bdag nyid kyis// dam tshig dam pa 'di bzlasan// rdo rje rdo rje'i mnga' bdagache// rgyal po 'dis ni nges par gsod// kun nas 'bar
ba'i rdo rje yis// lus kyi spyi ba 'gams par 'gyur// de nas 'di yis me tog gi/ 'phreng ba bzang po dor bar bya// oM sam+b+hata g+hA ga ta mA tApa dri pa ti ma hA su kha sa man+tab+ha dra pA

pa dIts+tshadi pu any+dzalasmiM du dzaHhU~M baM ho: b+ha ga wAn ma hA su kha sa man+ta b+ha dra sa ma ya sti sa ma yos ma ya ma hU~M/ 'di yis bzung ste myur ba ru// rdo rjesams dpa' snying rje che/ de ni blas te spyi gtsug tu//
blo gros bzang pos bcang bar bya// sngags pa'i rgyal pos sngags 'ad yis// de nas mgan rab tudabya// oM badzra dz+nyAnam nAn dra ud g+ha Ta ya titsakyu/ mgon po chen po ltos shig bu// sangs
rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog/ ya shes chen po kun gyi mchog/ rdo rjes mas dpa' bde chen po// ram pa ji bzhin legs bstan te// dbang bskur phyir na gsol ba btab// dbang bskur ba ni
yadi 'ong ba// mal ba chen po bdag la gsol// gsang ba yi ni rgyan ces par// rgyal bas gang sngon bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i sbyor de bdag la ni// rgyal ba kun dngos sul du gsol//
de bzhin dkyil 'khor bum pa yis// de bzhin dbang bskur sbyin par bya// slob ma chen po rnam pa lnga// daran sbyor bas bos nas su// gsang ba'i rgyan ces bya ba ya/ dngos grub shes pas/
dbang bskur ro// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i rnam 'phrul gyi// der ni mchu yas legs bzung ste// lce yi rtsa mo mkhas pas sbyar// rdo rje'am yang na chu skyes kyis// phyag rgya dang ni phyag rgya'i lan//
[/ ]de nas 'dzin ma rnam par rgyun// de nyid la yang mkhas pas sbyin// gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i bde ba bsgrub par bya// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to//

de nas yon ni dbul bar bya// bla mar phyag 'tshal mchod byas nas// ma dang bumo nyid dang yang// sring mo ya na bu mo dang// srang mo'am yang na chung ma dang// rgyal po longs spyod skye bo'i tshogs//
grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer dang// nor dang rin chen la sogs dang// gzhan yang ci dang ci 'dod pa// mkho ba'i longs spyod gus pa yis// bla ma' zhabs la phyag 'tshal te// dngos grub
kun gyi don gyi phyir// dkyil 'khor ba 'ang legs par mchod// pha dang spyan yang mchod par bya// de bzhin spun zla'i bu yang mchod// bza' btung yid du 'ong ba dang// gos dang rgyan dang me tog
dang/ de bzhin dra dang bdug pa sogs// ji ltar bdog pa thams cad kyis// mchod pa byas te gtangabar bya// lha rnams dag thams cad la// de bzhin du ni mchod par bya// gsang sngags

rgyal po gshegs su gsol// badzra mu: zhes brjod pas gshegs// de nas sngags pa'i slob ma'i mchog de la/ sha gas nas sa gang la dad/gsang ba rnam par 'dzin la gsang ba ya// rgyal pos gsal mdzad rgyal ba'i
gsang bdag gas// gsang ba mtha' dag legs par bslab par bya// gsang ba'i phyag rgyu mag yangs ma// blo gros brtan pas bsgrub par bya// rang byin brlabs pa'i rim pa yis// shes rab
kyis na byin gyis brlab// bdag nyid sa mas dpar legs bsgoms te// gsang ba rgyan gyi sbyor ba yis// 'am bdun gyis legs 'grub par// 'gyur ba 'di la sbe
tshom med// lha mo shes rab che de yang// rang nyid rdo rje 'chang gtso ste// nam mkha' kun gyi mchog dpa' bo// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug rnal 'byor che//
bdag nyid 'dod par dgongs pa yis// 'dod pa'i longs spyod 'grub par 'gyur// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gtso bo ste// de yang 'dod pa'i dbang lha mor// 'grub 'gyur 'ad la the tsom med//
'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug kun// dran dang 'dra bar 'khod par 'gyur// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khoraM yad 'ong bar// mkha' 'gro'i sa bon bsgom par bya// de na sbyor bas spros nas su//
rang gi snying khar gzhug par bya// bcug nas rin chen chen po na/ sud pa 'joms par bsgom par bya// yadi bzhin rang bzhin rin chen mdzes// khyim bdunan de 'gyur ro// 'dam skyes/
dmar po'i dbus su na/ 'bad pas kun nas dra yis dgang// dri ya dbang phyug rgyal po che// bdag nyid sems dpa' yid ches bsgom// de nas myur du blo ldan te// dri za'i bdag po'i
bdag por 'gyur// dri yas myur ba nyid du ni// brtan dang g.yo ba'i dug 'gugs byed// don yod kyin dkyil 'khor du// sing po sing ga sbyor ba bsam// yid la bsams nga 'a dngos
grub 'gyur// de la phyag rgya 'ang de dang mtshungs// rin chen gyi yang rani chenache// rin chen gyi ni mig 'od gsal// de bzhin dra dang ldan pa na// sgrub pa po yis 'grub par 'gyur// de la sogs
pa'i dbye ba las// lha gzhan dag kyang rig par bya// dkyil 'khor raman dam tshig kyang// bsgoms pas myur du 'grub par 'gyur// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya dang// rig sngags kyi yang sbyor
ba las// de rnams kyisan di nyidin// bsgomasan gyur du nges par 'grub/ 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor can// gsang ba rgyan bdag dam pas gsungs// phyag rgya bzhi yi mchog gi mchog/
phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang yum de rnams kyis gsol pa/ myur du sbyor bra mchog bsgrubs pas// sgrub pa pos na ji
ltar 'grub// de dag thams cad myur du gsungs// bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bdag gis// snying po sngags dang phyag rgyudang// rig sngags kyang na legs par 'grub// btsun mo mchog gi
gnas dbang phyug/ dpa' bo chen pos gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya
ba'i ting nge 'dzin la soms par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab dang yum rnams kyis zhu ba'i tshig rdo rje 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje rnams las rnam
par phyung ngo// lha rnams kyi na snying po dang// sngags dad phyag rgya de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor du na legs par bshad// ji ltar sngon du kha dog sogs// de nas de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsudadu gsol// sems can rnams la phan bde'i phyir// rnal 'byor ma ya phyag rgya dang// mtshan
ma la sogs dam pa rnams // de nas bcom ldan kun tu bzang// rdo rjedam pa gsor mdzad nas// lag pa'i mtshan ma bka' stsal pa// gang gis lha rnams mtshon gyur pa'o// lag pa zla
ba 'am ru// mkhas pa yis na bsam par bya// shes rab thabs kyis bonan// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu spro// slar yong sdud pa'i sbyor ba ya// rdo rjepad+mar rnam bsam bya// de nas
shes rab pha rol phyin// sor mo'i rtse mo dgod par bya// de nyid sbyor bas bsdus nas su// phan tshun nges par sbyar bar bya// rdo dzapad+mamanyam sbyar ba'i// bde ba myangs pas 'grub par
'gyur/ snu'achang ba chen pos bcings nas su// lha mo'i sa bon gyis mtshan pa'i// gsang sngags rgyal po sngags rig pas// yang dang yang du byin gyis brlabs// bcangs te 'od
ldan rnam pa gnyis// brkyang nas rtsa mo sbyar bar bya// de yi sing po zhes bya ba'o// gnyis pa grags pa ldan pa yani// sAng po yis ni mtshan byas nas// rim gyis snying khar bskor bar
bya rdo rje mnyam par sbyar byas te// der ni bcings pa gzhug par bya// 'din dam tshig ces bya ste// dam tshig ma lus sgrub par byed// 'di yis lha mo mtha' yas zhal// thams cad
dun nges par 'grub// de nyid bsdigs pa lta bu r sbyar// las kun byed pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje gnyis ni pad+ma yi// sbyor ba bstan pa mchog tu rmad// de las phyi rol bskums
pan// gsum pa run 'gyur ba yi// snying kha ru na snying po bsam// sang dga' byed pa zhes byar brjod// rdo rje gnyis po de bzhin sbyar// dram tshag bdag nyid byed du 'gyur// do nyid kun
gyi 'byung gnas gsal// chen po'i las ni byed par 'gyur// de nyid mdzod spur sbyar ba'i brjid// phyag rgya bdag nyid chen por 'gyur// de srid chu skyes rnam pa ru// supakhar bzhag pa
sang po mchog/ de bzhin rdo rje mnyam sbyar ba// dam tshig bdag nyid can du 'gyur// sang khar kun bsngogs sbyor ba yis// rab rgyas pa ya bzhin ras mchog/ bsdoms pa byed pa
thams cad kyang// 'dis na las byed 'grub pa yin// de nyid kha ru sbyar bas na// phyag rgya chen po rab tu 'grub// de nyid 'od ldan rtse mon// thur du bstan te sangakhar gzhag/ 'di
na 'gyur ba med pa yi// snying po'i chos sgrub byed pa 'o// de nyid sAng khor yongs su bskor// saMng gi dkyil 'khor nyid du gzung// 'di na dam tshig dngos grub che// bdag nyid chen pos/
bslab par bya// las kyi rdo rje mnyes pa yis// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed// dbab dang 'khor ba nyid dang ni// gar byed chen po de bzhin du/ de bzhin
thal mo sbyar nas su// snying khar bzhag pa snying por bshad// spyi bor bskor ba byas pa na// dam tshig ces bya bdag nyid che// stong du bsngags pa las su 'gyur// mchod pa ma lus rab
sgrub byed// snying po la sogs 'og tu gzung// chos la sogs par yongs su brtag/ de nyid bskyang sa snying khar gzhag/ sing po zhes su legs par bshad// bskor ba dam tshig ces bu
T+Thiso las thams cad ni di bzhin no// de las thal mo rdo rje gnyis// stong bsgrengs snying po la sogs bzhin// sngon bshad lhamo thams cad kyi// gsang sngags rig pas shes par bya//
gnyis su byas la g.yas man pas// bsgrub bya'i mgrin pa bzung nas su// mngon par phyogs te gzhag par bya// gzugs kyi sad po ches che ba'o// de nyid kha la phyogs bzhag la//
tshal sgra ma sAng po yad 'phrog pa'o// de nyid tshung zad bskums nas su// lce ya rnam pas kha ru gzhag/ ro myang ba yi sbyor ba yis// de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi// phyag rgya sngags pas
shis par bya// ro 'phrog pa yi las rnams so// de ni gnyis su byas nas su// g.yas pa 'am na g.yon pa yis// sangakhar legs sbyar sbyor bdag gis// reg pa'i phyag rgya ngo mtshar
kha0 dache/ 'di yis chos dang dam tshig dang/ las kyang rab tu skye ba yin// chog shes pas rnal 'byor sbyar// reg pas 'babs pa'i mchog yin no// de bzhin sbyar bas so sor bya//
g.yon pa rked par gzhag par bya// gums pa kha ya phyogs su gzung// khro ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin du// 'di na bzhad ldan zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu rmad byung ba'o// de 'am/
bkrol te snga ma bzhin// rked pa ru na legs par gzhag/ de las langs te slar yang khar// mkhas pas dal gyis bskyed par bya// de gnyis sang khar yongs su sbyar// bsams pas sdud
dang 'byed par bya// ji srid spyi bor gtugs pa yis// chos dang la sogs kun tu 'gyur// snying po la sogs sngags rig pas// phyag rgyu 'di yis rgyas btab na// dngos grub thams cad thob
'gyur te// rdo rjesams dpa'i bka' bzhin no// thal mo mnyam por legs par sbyar// g.yon pa'i stang du de bzhin gzhan// de dag snying khar bsgrung bar bya// de ni phan tshun shes rab yin//
sngags pa chen pos sbyar bar bya// gzhan na sbyor bas rnam par spro/ 'dan chos kyi pha rol tu// 'gro ba'i chos kyi mchog tu bshad// de bzhin thal mo mnyam por sbyar// snying khar g.yon/
par gzhag par bya// 'od ldan rdo rje'i gdong po dang// mdor bsdusanas na sbyor nas su// g.yas pa thur du 'phyang bar bya// de bzhan stong bstan mchog sbyin no// mo tog snyim pa yang dag sbyar//
rdo rje gnyis na dbus su gzhag/ bzod pa gnyis po de la sbyar// sbyin pa dag ni phyi ru bskum// de na stong du le gas par gzhag/ 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ yid
bzhin rgyal po'i 'bras bu ster// de na sbyor pas so sor bya// g.yon pa sAng khar yongs su gzhag/ g.yas pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// yongs su bskor zhing bskor nas su// g.yas kha ru nagazhug par

bya rdo rje thalamo brkyang nas su// rdo rje'i stang du 'od mdzes ma// phyi rol bskul ba'i sbyor ba yis// de yi stod du gdod pa gzhag/ phyag rgya 'di na phyag rgyu cha// brtson 'grus pha rol phyin dge ma'o//
de bzhin lag pa stong du sbyar// rtsibs mchog rin chen ma ru 'gyur// lhag ma'i bya ba de nyid kyis// de bzhin zhag gcig bsam par bya// sbyor ba de yaMs bcing ba ru// sngags shes gtso bo
sngags pas bya/[â ]rdo rje thal mo mnyam par sbyar// khro mo'i rdo rje'i sbyor ba yas/ sang khar blo gros ldan pas gzung// de na lcags kyu'i rnam pa yis// bltas nas lus can 'gugs par byed/ de
lu las sor mo'i rtse mo rnams // cung zad bsnol te brkyang bar bya// rdo rje mcha ba lta bu r bsung// kha sbyar mol byed ngo mtshar che// rgyu 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na// las rnams thams cad byed
par 'gyur// de las thal mo sbyar nas su// gzi brjid rdo rje de bzhin no// de ltar lcags kyus dgug pa ste// de yi mtha' gdong zhags pa 'o// sog le'i thal mo nges par na// 'dir na thod
[j]ba nyid du 'gyur// 'di ni gnyis pa nyid yin te// las kun gyi nadam pa sgrub// de bzhin bcing ba legs bcings nas// rab tu sbyin pa brkyang bar bya// g.yas pa stong du byas nas su/
gsad pa lta bu r bcing bar bya// 'din ji rdzomadung thung ste// srin po thums cad phye mar byed// 'dir ni de bzhin thod pa dang// zhags po lcags kyu nyid dang yang// sog le dang nu gri thung na// rdo
rje thalamo' tshogs bya// rdo rje thal mo so sor bya/ 4 lag pa g.yas pa stong du ni// rin chen lta bu r byas la gzung// sor mo thams cad spro bar bya// g.yon pa'ang de bzhin spro bar bya// de
dag sku zla shes par bya// thal mo bseng ste shes rab dang// las kyi rdo rje rtse mo sbyar// 'di na las rnams thamasacad kyi// sna tshogs lasumchog sgrub par byed// de bzhin dgug dang zhags
pa dang// thod pa rdo rje nyid yin no// de las thal mo thod pa yis// phyag rgyu'i dbus su bu ga na// sgron ma can ces legs bshad de// 'di na rdo rje ngo saMtshar che// zhugs pa lcags kyu de bzhin
du: slob dpon blo gros ldan pas shes// gzungs rnams dang na thams cad kyis// sngar bshad pa ya phyag rgya nyid// thod pa rdo rje'ang shes par bya// phan tshun gcig la gcig tu ni// thams
cad gzungs kyi phyag rgyar// dkyil 'khor du narab tu bsgrags// 'di rnams sbyor ba ji lta bar// dkyil 'khor bzhin rtag pa ru// rdo rje slob dpon gyis bya ste// phyag na rdo rje'i bka' bzhin no/
'din bcom ldan rnal 'byor gsung// kun bzang bdag nyid chen po pa// sams can kun mchog las kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas mchog gtso mnga' bdag che/ zhes so//
de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po yang 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de dag thams cad la yang dang yang du gzigs te/
sems can thams cad brtson 'grus zhan pa sobs pa dman pa la mos par gzigs nas de rnams la bka' bsgo ba/ dbang po'i ma mo rnams kyis shod// rang rang ga ni sgrub sA tshogs// de nas de
rnams legs tshim nas// rdo rje can la gsol ba na// ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi steng du rdo rje che// rdo rje lan dang po mchog/ 'am
gser mdog dang mtshungs par// gsang sngags shes pas de bsgom bya// rang gi lus las spros nas su// rang gi rnam par bsam par bya// de nas sngags bdag 'grub par 'gyur// sngags
kyi de nyid bdag po cher// kun tu 'gro ba sna tshogs che// rdo rje sams dpa' 'du ba gzhan// gnyis pa'i de nyid bsgom pan// dkyil 'khor pad+ma las byung du// dmar po'i gos la gzi brjod
che// 'bar ba dag ni mi dngamatshungs// rang las spro bya thams cad du// 'jig rten dbang phyug lta bu r 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dbang chen gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor la ni cher dge ma// dang
po'i lha mo drod dang ldan// rang gi lus la nges par khyab// bsdus nas bdag dang 'dra ba'i bdag/ yid bzhin nor bu'i snang bar 'gyur// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus son par// 'go ba'i sgo/
gtan lha mo na// rang lus lus ldan thams cad du// ljang khu dang na ljang sor ma/ las kun sgrub pa'i dam pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin pa dpal ldan 'gyur// mamo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// shes
rab ye shes dam pa gnas// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dam pa ru// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// kun gyi bdag po dpal dang ldan// kun bzang mnga' bdag chen por 'gyur// bsam
gtun dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yas// thams cad nyidi ni bslab par bya// chos kyi ya gi yang dag sgyur// lha man bdag por bdag 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' sul
to/ gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po lasaM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes mchog gi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs so//
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yab 'khor dang bcas pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur ta/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la glu dbyangs kyi rgyal po
'das gsol ba btab pa/ thams cad khyab pa'i yashes che// nam mkhar rlung ltar cher gshegs pa// yab kyi phyag rgya'i yo shes bzang// kun mchog dam pas bshad du gsol// de nas bcom
ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal po mchog rdo rjedapal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ye shes chen po'i phyag rgya dang dkyil
'khor 'di/ nyid kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ shugs rdo rje rgyas pa las nges par phyung ngo// dbus su'am chen po na// tAM yig sbyor bas bsam par bya// sor mo kun gyi rtsa gnas su// sa bon
lnga yis yab dgod bya// tshigs kyi nang na thams cad du/ ya gi thams cad rnam par bsam// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dag la ni// bzang po thams cad rnam bsam bya// 'khor lo chen po phyag rgya'i
tshul// lag pa g.yon par bsam par bya// de ya dedus sushes rab che// de bzhin gzhan yang dgod par bya// de nas spro ba'i de nyid ni// gsang sngags 'di yis sbyar bar bya// oM pra dz+nyA pA ya
ma yi ge hUM a/ de nas phan tshun sbyar byas nas// rdo rje thal mo rab tuganas// rdo rje bsdams par byas nas su// rdo rje bsdams par rnam par bsam// de nas shes rab ma bsgreng sa// rtse mo/
ga cung zad bskum par bya// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug sang por 'gyur// snying khar bzhugan snying po 'grub// de nyid bsngags pa'i sbyor ba yis// las kyi mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// de nyid sang khar bsdams
pa na// phyag rgya chen po zhes su grags// thams cad kyis kyang mdor bsdus pa'i// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub byed// de bzhin legs par bcing bar bya// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa gnyis//
phyi yi rgyab tu bskum par bya// mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug snying dga' ba'o// shes rab dag ni de bzhin sbyar// dam tshig ces par rab tu grags// lhag ma rnam par spro bar bya// las kyi gnas/
'khod chen por grags// shes rab dag ni zum tshul gyis// dri yi dbang phyug rab dgyes pa'o// bzod dang brtson 'grus gdong pa gnyis// lo ma'i tshul du brkyang bar bya// dam tshig grub pa ltar
bar bshad// 'di las rtsa mo rnam phye ba// las kun byed pa zhes bshad de// re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed// de nyid rtse mor snying khar sbyar// bdag nyid chen po'i phyag rgya mchog/ rgyal po
mchog lta'i rgyal po ru// 'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rdzobasdams pas shes rab mgo/ dril bu'idam pa snying po mchog/ bzodadang brtson 'grus gdong sbyar ba// dam tshig mnyam pa
nyid du gnas// cung zad gdong pa bskum par bya// las byed pa yi mchog tu 'gyur// gdong pa legs par bskyang nas su// snang du shes rab rtse mo gcig/ 'di ni chen por shes bya so// dbang
phyug thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs byed pa mchog gi mchog/ 'di yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rang gis bsdams las shes rab bsang// rdo rje sra ba'ichos dang ldan// gdod pacho
so rin po che// 'ad na dam tshig ldan pa'i mchog/ de gnyis de bzhin rnam par gzhag/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin dge dag// rab brkyang bzhi ya sams dpa' yis// las rnams thams cad byed par
bshad// de bzhin tshul khrims pha rol phyin// 'di na chen po dam pa 'o// bsams las bzod dang brtson 'grus dag/ legs par bskyang sta bstod pa na// sAng po'i zla ba
ltar bcings pa// dam tshig 'od zer 'phro ba 'o// phan tshun gyi ni gdong sbyar ba// 'di ni las byed dam pa ste// lhag ma khu tshur ltar byas pa// phyag rgya chen po zhes su 'grub// rdo rje bsdams pa
legs par bcing// rtsa mo'i rnam par sbyar bar bya// shes rab 'ba' zhig rtse mor bya// lhag ma dag na de bzhin no// lhag ma bsdams te gzhug par bya// snying po chos ni byed pa'i mchog/

tsho khu tshur g.yon pa g.yon du gzung// rdo rje rdo rje can gyis brkyang// g.yas pa'i sbyin pa brkyang nas na// rna ba'i rtsa bar dgug par bya// 'di ni las byed ces bya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub
byed// rdo rje bsdams pa brkyang nas su// sung khar 'khor lo'i tshul du ni// g.yas pa'i rtse mo lcags kyur bya// sbyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol son// de bzhin bcing ba legs bsdam bya//
gnyis ka de bzhin lcags kyu ste// de ltar 'og ma btsug nas su// snying khar bzhag pa las rjes 'brang// de 'di dgug par sbyor ba na// thams cad dgug par rab tu 'grub// de bzhin sbyin pa bsumA
nas su// yang dang yang du brkyang bar bya// snying khar bskor ba zhes su bshad// de nyid 'og tu bstan pa ni// dam tshig can zhes rab tu grags// rdo rje chos su bshad pa ste @#/kha ru g.yo
pas/bar byed pa'i mchog/ las las rnam par tsham zhes bya// las kun byed pa'i dam pa ster// lag pa bcings pa las bkrol te// shes rab mdzod du rab tu brtag/ 'di ni dam tshig cheramadzes/
pa// de phyir de ltar chos mdzad do// g.yas pas rab tu bsgrims pa ni// mi snang mdzod de des na las// rin chen pad+ma ldan pa 'a gdong// sAri khar bzhag pa snying por 'gyur// bsdams nas
go char byas nas su// bskor ba dam tshig ces su 'dod// 'khyud pa chos ldan zhes su grags// bsnun pa las byed paru brjod// bsdams las ni ma rnam par spro// bskor ba dom tshig/
mchog yin no// lag pa'i mtha' ma chos chen po// kun sbyang las kun byed pa 'o// bsdams pa sbyin pa bskyang bar bya// rtse mo gsum bya gnas mdzes pa'o// de 'di stong du bskor nas su//
sngos pas chos sgrub byed pa 'o// rdo rdzob ru sbyar ba las// dbang bskur dam pa sgrub par byed// de nyid stong du spro ba ni// las kun byed pa'i mchog yin no// sAng khar legs bzung sAng po ste//
mdzod spur bzhag pa dam tshig mchog/ khar bzhag pa ni chos shes bya// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// 'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can// re ba kun rdzogs mdzad pas gsungs/
rdo rje bsdoms pa rnam par bcings// pad+ma'i rnam pa mchog tu bya// star byed pa na mig ltar bya// snying khar bzhag pa kun mchog 'grub// de 'di mig bzhag las yin no// bzhad pas/
chos de dam pa'i chos// dam tshig gsang ba'i mig yin te// pad+ma'i mdzod la rab tu gnas// thal ma yang dag sbyar ba ni// snying po mchog tu rmad byung ba'o//
kha na cud zad phye ba na// dam tshig mchog gi mchog yin no// snying khar shan tu gsal phye ba// ma lus las ni rab tu sgrub// rdo rje'anang du pad+ma na// chos snying mchog tu rmad byung
ba'o// 'di rnams kyis namyur 'grub ste// sngags pas sngags kyis bskul bas so// de bzhin 'ching ba legs bcings te// sAng khar 'khor lo 'de du bya// 'khor lo gsum pa
[@]nyid du 'gyur// rtsibs bzhas legs brgyan chos su blta// bskor ba las kyi rdo rje 'o// 'di rnams ji lta bzhin sbyar na// grub pa'i dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje bsdams pa
legs bsgong ste// shes rab myu gu dag tu bya// sbyin pa rin chen ltar byas pa// sems dpa'i gnas su nges par sbyar// 'di ni sangs rgyas shAms cad kyi// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub
pa'o// sAri khar chos kyi dam tshig dang// snying po rig sngags legs par sbyar// de bzhin shes rab gnyis pa bsgreng// 'og ga 'khrug pa de bzhinano// mthe'u chung bzang po 'a kha sbyar pa// kun
gong rdo rje ldan par bya// gnas bzhi yi sbyor ba yas// phyag rgyu bzhin rab tu 'grub// spyi bor las su bshad pa ste// sAng khar snying po brtag par bya// bskor ba yis ni dam tshig ste// dag gis kun
bskul chos yin te// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs// bcings nas shes rab dag na bsgrung// 'od ldan dpan tsa par sbyar// 'dan dang por shes par bya// thams cad nas na thams cad/
'gro// bcings las de bzhin shes rab gci@#// rtse mo mche ba gdug yid 'phrog/ de bzhin du na 'di sbyar bas// las rnams thams cad rab sgrub pa'o// gsang ba'i bcing ba legs bcings te//
rdo rjenang du de bzhin no// snying khar rnal 'byor pa yis sbyar// ji srid las kyis mang bzang po// rdo rje rab brkyang mgrin par gzung// kun tu bskor bar rab tu bya// 'di yis las rnams
thams cad ni// byed 'gyur srung sogs go 'phang bzang// lhag ma chog bzhin rnal 'byor// rnal 'byor de nyid rab tu sbyar// phyug rgya rtags dang mi rnams ni// lha rnams kun la sbyar bar bya//
'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che' ]/dbang phyug dpal rdo rje sems gsungs// de nas de rnams legs tshim nas// phyag 'tshal nas na zol sbyar te// zhu brdo rje bla na med// dpa' bo rdo rje can la
zhus// yongs su rtog ba kun spangs pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams ni rang byung la// yab dang yum ni bla na med// ci phyir 'di dag brtag pa lags// 'khor ba las ni legs pa yi// sangs rgyas
ji ltar 'byung ba lags// grong ga chos na bstan pa las// ji ltar thar pa rab tu 'grub// gong du rnal 'byor pa grol 'gyur// gang na 'ching ba rab tu gnas// gang gis rnal 'byor pa rab 'grub//
rgyu// gang las rnal 'byor pa zhes bgyi// gsang sngags ji ltar gsang sngags lags// snying po zhes bya'i snying po gang// phyag rgyas gang phyir phyag rgyur 'gyur// rig sngags rig pa
jaltar lags// ji ltar lha rnams dgug pa dang// gzhug pa rnal 'byor pa yas brgyad// rnam par grol rnams bcing pa dang// mnyes dang bskul ba de bzhin du// ji ltar gnyis su med 'gyur zhing//
tsam nga 'khyud pa nyid dang yang// mthong nas rjes su chags pa dang// lag pa'i dgos pa ji sad pas// phyag rgyu ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// gar dang glu dang cher dgod pa// sgog dang smra ba ji ltar
lags// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri/ gtso bo ro dang reg par 'gyur// me tog bdug pa mchog dang dri// mar ma gsal ba mchog gang la/ mchod pa thams cad ji ltar 'grub// ji ltar
mchod pas 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal bas zhu ba 'di dag gis/ 'phreng ba rdo rje can la zhus// zhes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen pos zhu ba thams cad rnam par dpyod pa longs

sa skyod pa rdo rje zhes byuba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhu ba zhus pa 'di deg phyung ngo// shes rab yum du legs bshad de// yaban blabs la mkhas pa'o// 'di
nabastan pa nyid kyis ni// grong las thar pa rab tu 'grub// bag chags sbyor ba dang ldan pas// gnyis ka dag ni gdon yin te// grol dngam grol zhes su bshad// de na rnal 'byor pa ru brjod// gsang
sngags yid du bshad pa ste// sAng po yang de bzhin no// yadi la rnam par bzhag na na// gsang sngags mkhas pas 'grub par 'gyur// thar pa chos kyi rgya mtsho yan/ lha rnams gang largyas btab/
pa'/phyag rgya 'di yis 'grub 'gyur te// dngos grub bde ba bla na med// rig sngags yashes ma lus te// rig sngags pha rol phyin par bshad/ de shes pas na 'grub 'gyur te// grub nas bde ba
rnam pa gsum// shes rab la ni shes rab na/ gzhug dang dgug pa de bzhin no// gshegs su gsol ba btang bar shes// btsas pa brtan par byed pa 'o// mnyes pa yis na legs tshim yin//

bskul ba 'phro ba nyid du bshad// bsam pa gcig tu gyur pa ni// gnyis su med pa zhes su brtags// ro gcage de nyid bshad pa na// 'jig rten pa yi lha ru brjod// tsum ba rdo rje rnal 'byor te// rdo rje ye
shes zhes su bshad// shes dang mashes mnyam sbyor bas// tshum ban zhes nges par bshad// gnas pas rtags zhes bshad pa ste// rtags na lus zhes brjod pa yin// de la 'khyud pa reg par
shes// chags pa mthong ba'i phyag rgyu 'o// lag pa'i 'od rnams lha mo ste// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam bgrod pa'o// phyag rgya 'di las phyag rgyas// lag pa'i dgod pa 'i sbyor bas so// gar dang glu sogs
rnams kyis na// lha rnams thams cad mnyes par 'gyur// 'di rnams kyis na sangs rgyas rnams // mchod na dngos grub thams cad ster// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to//
gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa'irgyud chen po las/ gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po yongs su rdzogs so///de nas de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi yum rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dang/ mchod pa'i lan dang/ phyag rgya dang/ phyag rgyu'i lan dang/ gur dang
gar gyi lan dang/ glu dang/ glu'i lan dang/ sal san dang/ sal sAn gyi lan dang/ rnam 'gyur dang/ rnam 'gyur gyi lan dang/ dbrog pa dang/ dgug pa'i lan dang/ bsdadang/ brda'i
lan dang/ dri ba dang/ dri ba lan dang/ blta ba dang/ blta ba' lan dang/ dam tshig dang/ dam tshig ga lan dang/ dkyil 'khor dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi lan dang/ gsang ba dang/
gsang ba'i lan dang/ gsang chen dang/ gsang chen gyi lan dang/ de khon nyid dang/ de kho na nyid kyi lan la sogs pa rnams dung/ glu'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to// sangs rgyas
sems can kun gyi don// ye shes kun don thams cad mdzad// zlums cad khyab pa sams can don// gnyis dang gnyis med phyag 'tshal bstod// 'ad deg thams cad gsung du gsol// sgrub
ba po la phan dgyes pas// sgrub pa dngos grub dag dga' ba// gang gis dngos grub 'grub 'gyur ba// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos thams cad mkhyen pa'i yashes la blta ba rnam par bsgyings
[j]pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// ma tog bdun pa dri zhim dang// gos bzang rgyan dang bza' ba dang// btung dang ro dang sgron ma gsal// mal khri
stan dag yid 'ong ba// 'ad yas sangs rgyas thams cad mchod// yid ni bde bar gnas par byed// slob dpon rdo rjecan dang ni// khyad par du na sgrub pos bya// dgod dang sgag dang de bzhin glu ka
sal snyan gar ni rab dga' ba// mchod pa'i lan te shin tu ni// sangs rgyus phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg pa yid 'ong ba// 'di ni mchod
pa'i lan du 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub bde ba che// phyag rgya skyes bu'i rnam pa sta// phyag rgya'i lan na rang gzugs te// gnyis pa phyag rgya chen po ste// phyag rgya'i lan na las bzang can//
phyag rgya rang gi bdag por shes// phyag rgya'i lan na sgrub pa po// ji srid dbye ba stong phrag na// dbye ba'i gzhi ru brtag par bya// zhes so// gar na gar gyi sbyor ba yis/ gor gyi lanan gar
mkhan ma'o// ji srid dbye ba stong phrag kyang// dbye ba bzhi ru brtag par bya// kun tu bzang po la brten nas// ji srid las kyi rjes 'brang ba'o// las kyi sbyor la yang dag rten/ ji srid
bzang po'i rjes 'brang ba'o// bla 'og yang dag bskyod pa yas// gar dang stong ga gar bskor ba// rtog pa'i sbyor bas brtag par bya// rtog pa yis ni rab tu gsang// ji lta'i sil snyan rdung
spyod ni// rdung ba'i bdag nyid can gyis dkrol// de las byung ba'i sil snyan lan// gsal bas sal sAn nyid du brjod// sngags kyi ya gi'i chog sbyar// ji srid las mchog
sbyod yul ba// de nas sbyor bas 'thon nas su// kun tu bzang por 'gro bar bya// sgrogs pas gru zhes brjod pa ste// 'dren pa gsum las legs par 'byung// dbyangs rnams rnam drugashes par
bya glu yi phyag rgya zhes su 'grub// de nas sbyor bas 'thonanas su// ji srid mgo dang sing khar son// mgrin pa sA ya sbyor ba dang// mgul pa g.yo pa nyid kyis so// 'gyur bas rnam par 'gyur ba
sa lin dang gtong ba'i tshog ram// chos rnams thams cad byang ba dang// gdon gyi tshogs rnams bzlog pa ste// rnam 'gyur las na slar yang 'dir// sems kyi rnam par rtog pa 'o// jisrid las ni
ba rjes sbyor ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang// sems dang lus kyi rnam bsgyings pas// gdug pa thams cad bzlog par bya// lag pa rkang pa'i rim pa kun// rnam 'gyur gyi na lan yin no//
dbrog pa dgug par shes bya ste btang ba dag na dbrog pa 'a lan// dbrog pa mchog tu shes bya ba// bgegs kyi gnas narab gnon pa'o// dbrog pa'i lanan rab bzlog ste// bsdigs pa'i rkang pa dgod
par shes// brdan dran pa'i don du ste// phan tshun yongs su brjod pa yis// 'grub dang ma 'grub sbyor ba rnams // slob dpon slob ma sogs pas bsgrub// brda lan lha mo rnams kyis ni// bskul dang so
sor bskul ba sogs dri bi skya dang 'dra ba ste// mthong nas 'dra ba 'dra bo' lag// legs pa'i gzugs mthong blta ba ste// lha ya ye shes spyod yul lo// blta ba'i lan ni de las slar// sbyor ba mchog
gis sbyor ba 'o// lha dang lha mo rnams kyis ni// g.yas g.yon blta ba blta ba ste// jisnyad blta ba' sbyor ba yis// sgrub par byed pa lan yani'o// dam tshig sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bka' rtagA
byas pa nyid du 'dod// gang phyir thos pa 'dzin pa yi// sgrub po lan du shes par bya// dkya'i 'khor lus su bshad pa ste// ye shes lnga yas byin brlabs pa'o// dkyil 'khor lanan lhamo rnams //
gcig tu byed pa'i dam pa 'o// gsang ba sbas par bshad po ste// gsang ba'i lan na legs sbas pa'o/ gsang chen sams kyi 'du shes te// bde ba'i rnam pa rab rtogs pa'o// so sor rtog pa lha mo
dang// lha yi bde ba bde chen po// sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad kyi// gsang chen lan du brjod pa 'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to// de nas de rnams slar yang
'dus par gyur te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la legs par bskul ba/ rdo rje sams dpa' bde rab mchog/ shes rab mchog reb grol ba 'o// mchod pa'i ye shes legs 'grub pa'i// gsang ba chen

bo gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang gsang ba chen po mchod pa cher gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hUM hUM hUM

bya@#// hUM hUM hUM hUMhU~M hU~M/ ga ga ra ga ga ra/ ga ga ga// ga re ga ra/ ra ra ra/ ga ra ga ga// te te te te/ he te te te ta te te/ na te te te Na te te/ na te te dzA te te/ dzA te tat+ta/ dza te/ ri ti
rA/ te tu te/ dza te tA ra ra ti/ ta ra tar/ te ta ra[% ]/ ra ra hU~M/ te dza ta hUM/ zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag po mchog/ rdo rje su mas dpa' kun
gyi rje// glu yi phyag rgya rab gsal ba'o// de nas rol mo'i phyag rgya ya/ rnal 'byor chenapo thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyis gsungs pa/ lha dang lha mo rgyal bdag dang// gang gis myur du mtshungs

'gyur ba// so hU~M b+ho g+he Ta hU~M/ o hUM b+ho g+he Ta hU~M/ g+ha Ta hUM g+ha Ta hUM/ ru lu ru lu/ g+ho cu g+ha TaM/ g+ha Tu g+ha tuM/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ hUM Na nA Ta yo/ hUM NanA NA yo/ TAr NaM/ Tar N+NaM/ shA NaTANanaM nA/ nAhU~M

wA Na nA Na TaMwA/ dzAnaM/ NaN+NaM/ NaT/ Ni/ o du du du o du du du/ du du du ru du ru du du kr-i TaM/ ta d+haM daM/ d+ha d+ha d+ha daM/ d+ha d+ha d+ha/ dz+hadz+ha/ dz+ha b+haM/ dzId+d+haM/ dzA dzAdzAdzA/ dzI dzI/ dzA/ dzA dzAd+haM/
dz+ha/ sna ya sbubs su bkrol ba dang// lag pa'i mthal dang kha dag gis// sal snyan sbyor bas gsal bar bya// nges par myur du rab tu 'grub// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba dang// chang gzungs
blta ba'i rim pa yis// sgeg cing dpa' ba ma sdug pa// dged dang drag shul 'jigs su rung/ sing rje rngamadang zha sogs kyi// nyams kyi ngo bo legs bslabs pa'i// gang gis rnal 'byor can
'grub 'gyur// gar gyi dbang phyug gtso bo che// bcud ni zla ba sogs mdzes pa// sha sogs bza' ba'i dkyil 'khor dang// tsan dan la sogs byug pa dang// me tog la sogs 'phreng
mdzes pa// bud med bzad mo'i rigs rnams kyis// dam tshig byin rlabs sbyor ba las// rdzas rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// phaT yig hUM dang bcas pa yis// zhes
bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos bka' stsal to// sbyor ldan kun la gnas nas su// g.yas pa yis kyang gar sbyor las// rdo rje bsdams pa'i sbyor ba yas// sang khar de bzhin bsgreng
bar bya// yang na gnas pa nyid kyang ste// shes rab gang yin rdo rjer bya// skar ma lcags kyu de bzhin 'dir// 'dir ni bsems bcas rjes su chags// de las rdo rje'i sbyor ba sbyar// yang dang
yang du dgrol bar bya// 'di yis las rnams thams cad ni// byed 'gyur 'di la gdon mi za// de nyid snying khar khu tshur ti// rdo rje gdong pa skar ma'i kha// rang gi gnas su gzhag pa ste//
dbang bskur ba ni gtus pa 'o// de nyid bsnyems pas cher bstan te// yang dang yang du yongs su bskyod// de nyid 'od zer rnam pa ru// thums cad du ni spro bar bya// de nyid kha ru bstan pa na// rdo rje
bshad par rnam par bshad// 'di rnams kyis ni don rnams kun// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// de nyid pad+ma'i sbyor ba dang// mag ga sbyor ba gnyis pa 'o// shes rab skar ma de nas bsgreng// lte
khar byas pa la khor lo can// rdo rje sna ba lce yi rtsa// ro rnams ma lus 'thog par byed// 'di dag gi na las rnams kun// pad+ma 'od kyis rab tu bya// de bzhin khu tshur legs
par sbyar// shes rab kyisan sAng khar bsnan// de las gnyis pa sna tshogs che// snying khar yongs su bskor bar bya// skar ma rdo rje'i rnam pa mchog/ bzod dang gzi brjid mchab mdzes// de nyid dam
du bsdams pa na// 'ching ba'i las ni byed po'i mchog/ 'di rnams kyis na thams cad sgrub// phyag rgyu dang na phyag rgya'i lan// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// las kyi dam pa ma lus pa'o// zhes
bcom ldan 'das kun tu btsad pos bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan sna tshogs che// pad+ma rin chen rdor mchog 'dzin// gsang ba rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi/ dpa' chen la ni zhu ba zhus// sangs rgyas
dkyil 'khor don phyir dang// ma mo rnams kyi don dam ni// yongs su rtog pa thams cad spangs// sangs rgyas kun mchog dam pa'i gsang// dkyil 'khor thams cad brgyan pa yi// mdzes pas
bcom ldan gsung du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dang po dang ni gnyis pa dang// drug dang lnga dang de bzhin bcu//
mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje rin chen chu skyes las// rang gi dkyil 'khor go rims kyis// gsang sngags 'dzin pas gnas lngar dgod// dkar dang ser po chos dmar ba// sngon po'i 'od zer
glog las byung// tha ma kun gyi thog ma'u// 'od zer bzang po sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor cho ga la// gnas nas sgom dang bzlas pa sbyar// 'di ni da kyil 'khor mang pan te// dkyil 'khor

rgyal ba rnams kyi rten// brten pas sgrub po shan tu yang// dus mi rung bar sa stengs 'grub// 'di ni bcom ldan rdo rje can// kun sbyor dri ma med pa'i gtso// sangs rgyas kun gyi rgyal bo che// skye dang
'chib 'dzoms pas gsungs// de nas rgyal ba thams cad dang// sbyor ba'i ma dang yum rnams ni// legs tshig rdo rjes mas dpa' na// bde ba che la legs zhes gsol// rdo rje kun gyi bdag po
gtso/ sangs rgyas dpyangs kyis bstod par bya// rdo rjeklu sogs sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur kun gyi mchog ldan gtso// dpal ldan sangs rgyas sangs rgyas bdag po tshul// sangs rgyas nas ni
rgyal rnams chub mdzad rdzogs sungs rgyas// sangs rgyas sras po nges par mthu' dag sangs rgyas kyis// sbyor bas blo gros san rnams legs par tshim mdzad pa// dpal gyi rdo rje dri med rdo rje ye shes
rdor// rdo rje'i snang bas 'jig rten rab tu gsal mdzad pa// bsdus pa'i rdo rje sbyor ba ldan pas legs bton te/ rdo rje'i bdag nyid ngo bor mdzad pa'i mdzes rdo rje// dpal gyi rin chen rin chen 'byung
gnas rin chen sprin// rin chen rnams la rin chen gyis dgyes rin chen mdzes// mdzes pa'i brjid ldan rin chen rgyal mtshan gyis// skye ba rnams kyi 'phongs dang sdig pa rnams bcom nas// dpal
rgya bad pad+ma dam pa'i bla ma pad sams dpal// pad+mas rab dgyes bad+ma las 'khrungs pad+ma ya// dra bas pad+ma mtha' dag nges par rgyas mdzad de// pad+ma'i rigs la 'jog par
mdzad pa'i pad bzang po// sna tshogs dpal ldan kun gyi bdag po sna tshogs mkhyen// sna tshogs dbang phyug sna tshogs yul gyis ma gos pa// sems can rnams ni 'dul legs 'jog pa sna tshogs
pa ci dga' 'dod la rig pa dam pa gnang du gsol// zhes so// de nas de rnams kyis slar yang sems can ma lus pa 'dul ba'i don du 'di skad ces bstod do// sangs rgyas tshul khyod phyag
'tshal lo// sangs rgyas 'byung ba khyod la 'dud// sangs rgyas ye shes khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas gzi brjid phyag 'tshal 'dud// sangs rgyas dpa' bo khyod la 'dud// rdo rje khro bo'i mdi
las 'khrungs// sdig pa bcom pa khyod phyag 'tshal// sdig pa bsal la phyag 'tshal 'dud// phyag na rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// gtsugan rin chen gzi brjid can// sdug bsngal btsem pa khyod la
'dud// thams cad grub la phyag 'tshal 'dud// chos kyi dag pa khyod la 'dud// pad+ma dag pa rtogs pa'i phyir// 'dod chags chags pa khyod la 'dud// 'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal 'dud//

snyatshogs rdo rje khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs sbyor ba khyod phyag 'tshal// sna tshogs tshul can khyod la 'dud// sna tshogs bde ldan phyag 'tshal 'dud// bstod pa'i rgyal bo 'di yis ni// chos dang ldan pa
krams cad du// nyan re zhang na bstod byed na// bsams pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos shes rab dang ye shes/

rnam par brgyangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjechos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
gsang// gsang ba rgyan ces bya ba na// sems dpa' chen po legs par zung// sems dpa' chen po na dga' bas// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang phyug rgyal/
bos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo chen po rtsa gsungs pa// rang byung ye shes pa rol son// chos kun dbang phyug dpal dang ldan// 'jig rten gsum gyi sdig 'dzems
pas// ji skad gsungs bzhin sad lan/ legs bzung dra mad ye shes bzang// rdo rje sems dpas bka' sul pa// bde ba chen po bdag gas bzung// zhes so// bcom ldan 'das dgyes

shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sams dpa' yab dang yum gyi tshogs dang bcas pa 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bu'i rdo rje la legs par gnas pa de dag thams cad
rdo rje sems dpa' gsang sngags rjes su dran par gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs gsang ba rgyan gyi bkod pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po
yongs su rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi mkhan po brda sprod pa chen po bde bar gshegs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba dang/ bsgyur byed kyi mkhas ba sgra 'a bgazhung lugs
la blo gros dkar ba kun dga' rgyal mtshan gyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas dam par bsgyur/ mda' lnga'i gtsug ldan yid kyi srub shing gi/ dregs pa'i dri ba rnam par dral ba'i phyir// rgyud rgyal rgya
mtsho'i rgyal po ltar zab 'di// bsgyur la 'gal gang 'di la 'phags rnams dgongasaM/// @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya gu ma Ni ti la kanAm sUtra/
bod skad du/ 'phags pa gsang banor bu thig le zhes bya ba'i mdo/ bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi rdul rog pa med pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa 'a dam tshig ga ya shis rnam pa sna tshogs pa khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
la thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par khong du chud pas las sna tshogs mdzad pa// ma lus shing
lus pa mad pa'i sams can gyi khams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa// thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad rtag pa dus gsum gyi dam tshig la rnam par gnas pa'i sku/ de/

[Iâ¢]0 ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bstan cing bstod pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i rtse mo khang pa brtsegs pa// kha dog rnam par/

bkra ba'i dril bu dang ldan pa// rlung gas bskyod pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang/ me tog gi chun po dang/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pa dang/ zlo bas nye bar mdzes pa'i 'og man gyi lha'i rgyal po'i khang bzang na bzhugs
so/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang thabs cig pa la/ 'ad lta sku/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang/ sban ras gzigs dbang phyag dang/ nam mkha' sAdapo/
dang/ rdo rje khu tshur dang/ byang chub kyi sams bskyed pa dang ldan pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang/ nam mkha' mdzod dang/ bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang/ 'jam

dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang/ gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
gzhal du med rung bgrang ba las 'das pa 'a de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis 'di lta ste// dper na til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su gang bar mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las

kyang gzhal du med rung grangs las 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing mthong bar gyur cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad na'ang chos kyi tshul 'di nyid ston par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan
'das rnam par snang mdzad nam mkha'i khams thams cad la sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje rtag tu zhugs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par ba gor
pa'i rdo rje'i dbyangs thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' nam mkha' dbyings thams cad kyi rdul rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa las byung ba'i ye shes kyi sAng po nam mkha'i khams thams cad
la 'phro ba'i rang bzhin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ya shes mngon par yongs su mkhyen pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag gi rang bzhin dag pas chos thams cad ngo bo de rnam
par dag pa nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad legs par gzigs pa'i ye shes kyis ma lus shang lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod pa'i ye shes mdzad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i thugs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'gugs pa'i dam
ri'i sku/ tshig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su chags pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi legs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che chen/
pos dbang bskur ba'i rin po che dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu chen po'i rin po che 'a tog dang//
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad gad chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi deg pa chen po'i chos dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gsung chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las sna tshogs pa dang/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa thams cad kyi srung ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yongs su skyong ba'i rdo rje gnod sbyin dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rdo rje'i
dgongs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes dang ldan pa ste/ kun tu bzang po don med nga// 'chi med rab tu dga' ba'i gtso// nam mkha'i sing po gzi brjid che// rin chen tog ste cher 'dzum pa//
spyan ras gzigs dang dbang phyug che// 'jam dpal kun gyi snying po dang// brjod bral sna tshogs pa ya las// dpa' bo gtum po dam por 'dzani// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' tshan pa// rin chen nyi ma
rgyal mtshan 'dzum// chos mdzod mdzes pa'i 'khor lo gsung// las dang chos dang 'jags byed 'dzin// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// ma rungs khro dang bzod pa che// gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan//
gzi chen dpa' bo khyab bdag che// u ma'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// 'jug srad rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dngas// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// 'byung
chen sams can don rab mdzad// thams cad sems can pha chen po// 'khyer ba mya ngan 'das dang brtag/ yang dag mtsho dang mchod chen po/ sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che//
srid pa gsum po'ang de bzhin no/ de dag la sogs pa'i yon tan bye ba brgyaskong du ma dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te dkyil 'khor chen po de la
bzhugs nas chos ston par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bcom ldan 'dus rnam par snang mdzad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor la brten te 'khod nas/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mchog tu gsang ba chen po'i thig le zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par bka'
stsal du gsol/ gang gsasams can rnams la gsang ba'i de kho na nyid kyi dam tshig de bdag gis bshad par bgyi lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam
par snang mdzad chen pos/ gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rjegasang ba'i dam pa gang gis sems can thams cad nges par blun med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba de bshad par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
[/ ]kyi bdag po gang gis bdag gsang ba'i bdag por 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar zhugs par gyur to//
de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad ma phyed par mdzad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag thams cad dang ma phyed par gyur nas/
bcom ldan 'das rdo rjesams dpa' de 1de la ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa// e ma'o bdag na thabs chen po// rag tu gsang ba thig le ya// ting 'dzin gang par grub pa yang// gsang ba nyid na zhu
bar byed/ denas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi klugs ka nas 'thon nas phyag tu 'khod par gyur pas// yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
'das rab tu gsang ba'i thig le zhes bgyi ba calags/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/
lag na rdo rje rab tu gsang ba'i thig le 'di ni mchog tu gsang ba'o// ches shani tu gsang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid sbyin pa'o// de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yidi bde ba rjes su rig pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs su byon pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
@#/ cad kyi gab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum mo// 'di ni gsang ba'i mdzod do// 'du ra pad+ma'o// 'di nyid rdo rje'o// 'di nyid dam tshig sa ) de nyid kyisan lag na rdo/

rje dam tshig ma shes pa'i mdun du sa bar ma bya'o// de'i phyir lag na rdo rje das 'ga' la 'ang ma bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes slar yang/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir gang 'ga' zhig la sa bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba gnang//
legs so rdo rjesams dpa' khyod// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// legs so rdo rjetshes khyod kyis// rdo rje las khyod rab legs so// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de
khazhan lag shegs pa kun gyi gsang// theg pa chen po mdor bsdus pa// dag pas rnam par bsgrubs tsam gyis// bde blag tun sangs rgyas thob// bde ba zad med ma zad pa// skye ba 'di la 'grub par

byed// ces so// lag na rdo rje des na shin tu gsang ba'i thig le las kyang mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba theg ba chen po'i mdo sde 'di legs par sba bar bya'o// sems can gang kha cig nyo bar skrag pa dang

bcas pa yod la/ gang kha cag dad pa dang ldan pas theg pa chen po glang po che'i phrag tu zhon pa dag yod de/ de dag las dang po lan gsang sngags dang/ phyagargya dang/ gsang ba thams cad bshad par mi bya
zhing gsang ba thams cad bstan par ma bya'o// dad pa can dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa dag la de dag thams cad bshad par bya'o// legs pa re gsang ba'i tang de 'dzin gyi thig le 'dan

ches shin tu gsang ba rab tu gnas pa'i slob dpon la bshad par bya'o// gang zhig rgyud 'di bshad pa tsam na sems can dad pas rjes su 'brang ba dang/ gang dag ches shan tu dga' ba skye pa de dag ni sngon gyi
sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan par shes par bya'o// de dag la 'bad pas gdams pa dang bcas pa bstan par bya'o// sams can gang kha ga nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang
ma bu'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir de dag la lo rgyus tsam yang ma bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das
da bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sa/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ sems can de dag gis lha'i ras ma mthong zhing/ dam tshig la rab tu smod par
byed pa de dag la gal te smras na/ largyus tsam gyis kyang dmyal bar rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gas/

kyang rdo rje kun nas 'bar reb tu 'bar zhing me lce gag du gyur pa 'dis rags thams cad sreg par byed do// bcom ldan 'das de dag na tshul bzhin ma yin par 'chiba'i dus brgyad par bgyi'i zhes so// de nas
kha nga byang chub sems dpa' chen po la ga na rdo rjes// bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to/ khacom ldan 'das bdag gas nyan thos kyi klog pa ba de dag ga nang du bshad bar mi

bgyi lags na/ de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis shun tu ches gsang ba'i thig le zhes bya ba zlog pa chen po 'i sing po dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig ji srid bde ba dang/ yid bde ba thams cad bskyed pa'i don du

bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa cha mas cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos spo ba'i sbyor ba'i dpa' bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhan gshegs pa de dag thams cad/
gcig tumadzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pes ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting
nge 'dzin gyi khyad par du ma la mnyam par bzhag nas/ de bshani gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren pa'i dam tshig ma lus shang lus pa med pa/ samasacan gyi khams skams cad 'gugs pa/ bde

ba dang yid bde ba bskyod pa'i don du ji srid ting nge 'dzin dam pa 'grub pa'i don du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' sal pa/ so so'i sgrub pa'i thabs rgya che bas mdor bsdus/
tatshog rgyas par 'gyur ba naM/ lagan rdo dzodang po re zhig sngags pas lag pa gnyis a'irnam pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du bsam par bya'o/ a'i rnam pa de dri ma med pa'i gzugs la dkar ba bdud rtsi'i
rang bzhin can te/ de nyid yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje lho phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa thums cad kyi bdag po la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyi'i lag pa gnyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du blta bar bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// 'dir lag pa gnyis zla ba la rdo rje
grwa monas kyi tshad tsam dkar po 'od zer dang ldan pa sngags 'dis bsgom par bya ste/ hU~M:de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen pa la gan rdo rjes/ yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das
ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ rdo rje des ci zhig brgya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje nyon cig/ rdo rje thal mo dam

du bcings nas gsang sngags 'dis rang gi spyi bor dgrol bar bya'o// o sa b+hA ba bshud+d+hA: sarba d+harmA: sa b+hA ba bshud+d+hony+tsa haM/ de nas bdag nyidishel dag pa'i rang bzhin dri ma med cing gsal ba'i gzugs su

sngags pas bsgom par bya'o// de nas sdom pa gzung ste// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag mang che ge mo zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste ji srid snying po
byang chub la thug gi bar du/ ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams // byang chud tun des mdzad pa'i byang chub sems ni bla na med// dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi//
ba tshul khrims kyi ni bslab pa dang// dge ba'i chos ni sdud pa dang// sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum// so sor brtan par bdag gis gzung// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na
med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor las skyes pa'i// sdom pa deng nas brtan por gzung// rdo rje dril bu phyag rgyu yang// de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang
rgyu gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po la'o// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rtag tu sbyin// nyin re bzhin na dus drug tu// rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor gyi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba 'o// byang
chub chen po las byung ba'i// pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// spyi dang gsang ba theg pa gsum// dam chos so sor gsung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad ldan par
na/ de nyid so sor gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang tsanus pas// las kyarigs mchog chen po yi// byang chub sems na blon med// dam pa rab tu bskyud pa dang// sems can kun gyi
sku don gyi phyir// bdag gis sdom pa ma lus gzung// ma bstsal ba rnams bdag gis bsgral// ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing// sems can mya
ngan 'das la dgod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sdom pa bzung/
sa phyag rgya chen po la gnas nas sngags pas chos thams cad bdag med par bsgom par bya'o// 'di dag thams cad phyi rol dang nang du rtog pas brtags pa las gzhan 'ga' yang mi gnas so// zhes de/

ltar sung la bzhag ste 'di skad ces/ 'du byed thams cad na mi rtag cing rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal la gdod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid do zhes brjod par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na
rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sams rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ji ltar bsgom par bgyi ba cung zad bka'
stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par sbyang mdzad chen pos sems so sor rag pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang

chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa'i bdug nyid nam mkha' dkyil ma lus pa khyab pa'i
'od kyis mdzes pa/ dpag tshad brgya stong las lhag pa/ a la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i yi ge/ a A/ i I/ u U/ 23/ lo laM/ e ai/ o o/ oM a zhes bya/ de dag yongs su
gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bsgoms pas bdag/
nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par mthong ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de ngon yong grub pa'i gzugs su gnas so// yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
mdzad kyi thugs kar 'khod de ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ a masangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thog med grub pa'i don yid bdag/ ji ltar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te// bdag nyid zla ba'i
dkyil 'khor gnas// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po la gsol ba
btab pa/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i zla ba zhes bya ba'i
ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ma lus shang lus pa med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi di pa zhan gshegs pa thums cad nyid kyi thugs kar zhugs par mdzad do// zhugs nas

kyang gcig tu ma phyed par gyur te/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje byang chub kyi zla ba de bshad par bya'o//

zla ba de la steng du bdag nyid byang chub kyi zla ba'i tshul du bsgom par bya ste// shin tu dri ma med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i gzugs rnam par rtog pa thams cad sras pa'i mchog gnas ngan len thamA
cad las rnam par grol ba/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad myong ba'i don dang/ ji srid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i dri ma med pa sngon mthong ba'i zla ba lta bu ka la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sangs

rgyas kyi yon tan 'jug pa ste/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tshadza dz+ha3/ Ta bla Nasgyu Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wA/ sha ngas// a laM kA ka la sogs pa'i ya gi 'di dag skar ma la sogs

pa' gzugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu mi phyed par gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsam par bya'o/ yang lag na rdo rje zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de la nam mkha' thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyi rdo rje
rtsa mo lnga pa na ba/ 'od zer dang bcas pa bsgom par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom

dpar brgyu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang gcig tu mdzad nas/ byang chub sams dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje rdo rje de sems dpa'i rdo rje'i gzugs su bsgom par bya ste/ nam mkha'i
khams thams cad rab tu rgyas pa'i tshad kyis rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par grubs pa/ lus thams cad sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan gyi tshul gyis
gang zhang dang ba/ lag pa g.yon pas dril bu 'dzin pa g.yas pa'i lag pas rdo rje sange khar brten pa// zhal cung zad bzhad par sngags pas bsam par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lag na
rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' sal to// sngags ni 'di yin te/ o badzra At+mako3haM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas sems dpa' rdo rje'i gzugs de

bzhin gshegs pa'i skur bsngags pas sngags 'di bsgom par bya ste/ oM ya thAsan+d+ha ta thA ga tas a haM/ de nas su ga yi ge las sngags pas ra rib bsams la stong dang 'og gi skor gsum gsum dgod par bya'o/ de

nas hUM gi ya gi las khang pa brtsigs pa bsam par bya ste/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan// kha dog sna tshogs dag dang bcas// sna tshogs ka bas 'bar mdzes// dra ba dra phyed pas spras

zla ba zla ba phyed pas du// nor bu dang mu tig gi 'phrang bas nye bar mdzes pa/ rin po che'i rgyan du ma dang/ dar dang/ 'phan dang/ me tog gachun pos zhabar spyad pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa'i yon tan gyis
khyad par du 'phags pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa sngags pas bsam par bya'o// de nas bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byas te/ slar yang bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs su gzugs brnyan gyi sbyor bas/

de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba rdo rje'i 'phrang bas rnam par brgyan pa bsgoms te/ de nas hU~M gi yi ge de nyid kyis rdo rje sams dpa'i lus kyi sang khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms la//

nga nas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge bkod de/ rdo rje sams dpa' dang yi ge de dag yongs su son pa las rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa zhi zhing dkar bar bsgom par bya'o// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/
bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje de ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'
stsal pa// rdo rje de yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das

bdag gis sna tshogs rdo rje khum lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bskyod pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ lag na rdo

rje la 'di skad ces bka' sul pa// lag na rdo rje nyon cig rdo rje de nyid 'od zer dang bcas bsams pa dang bcas pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' gzugs cung zad bzhad pa'i zhal ras dang phyag gnyis rdo rjegasor bar
byed pa// sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan can/ stong na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bzhugs pa// dpral ba dang bar ma bskyod pa/ g.yas su rini chen 'byung ldan/ rgyab tu 'od dpag tu
[g ]! @#// med pa// g.yon pa'i drung du don yod grub pa can/ de lta bu 'a yon tan gyi khyad par dang ldan pa rdo rje sams dpa'i gzugs su bsgom par bya'o// de nas byang chub sams dang kha chen po
pa lag na rdo rjes de lta bu'i rdo rjesams dpa'i gzugs su bskyed nas/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid rdo rje
sams dpa'i gzugs su mthong lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes gnang ba/ legs
so rdo rje sams dpa' po// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// legs so rdo rje chos khyod kyis// rdo rje las na khyod legs so// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje theg pa blunamed// de bzhin gshegs
ba kun gyi gsang// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa'o// zhes so// de nas btsem ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rnam par snang mdzad chen pos/ lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka'

stsal to// lagan rdo rje khyod la thams cad bshad par bya'o// de nas rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas brkyang// sngags 'dis lag na rdo rje dbab pa bskyod par bya'o// oM badzra A be sha A be sha a de nas rdo rje

dbab pa bskyed nas sems dpa' rdo rje bcings la dam tshig bsgrag par bya sta/ sa ma ya saM/ de nas dam tshig byin la yi ge brgya pa brjod par bya ste/ o tang+ge badza dri d+ho me b+ha ba/ a nu rak+ta ni b+ha wa sA

satA me b+ha wa/ traM da yaM ma a d+hi ti/ san+d+hAsid+d+him+mA pra yats+tshA/ san+d+ha karma su tsa ma tsit+tathe ya: ku ru hU~M/ ha ha ha ha ho: b+ha ga waM sam+b+ha ta thA ga te badzramA ma mulcabadzra b+ha wa badzra satwa A: de nas rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje ma/

tog spyi bor sngags 'das gzhag par bya ste/ pra dIts+tsha badzra ho: sngags pas de me tog ga 'phrang bar bsam par byas la/ de nas 'brang ba de blangs la sngags 'dis spyi bor btsa'i bar bya ste/ oM pa tA griny+tsa hU~M a

mo satA man ba la/ de nas 'phreng ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bor blta bar bya'o// de nas sngags 'das gdong dbye bar bya ste/ oM badzra satwA/ sa yan+te ar+ya tsak+kad glu Tan ta ta pa ra ud grwa za ya

te sam+b+hatsaklu badzra tsaN+Da/ badzra tsak+kA ra nu t+tarA hi badzra pa bya/ de nas nam mkha'i dkyil na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mthong na de nas grub par shes par

bya'o// gal te snang ba tsam mthong na'ang des dngos grub la ldebar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dri'i chus sngags pas bdag la sngags 'dris dbang bskur bar bya ste/ badzra a b+hi Shiny+tsa

denas pheg rdob gsum dang se gol brdab par bya ste/ badzra tu ngaho: de nas sngags 'das rdo rje lhung ste// o Ar+ya a b+ha Ti ke ta hU~M/ sa bud+d+he badzra a b+hi li ka ta i daM te san+d+ha bud+d+ha tsAgrid+ma badzA su sad+d+ha ye/ de

nas rdo rje sems dpa' rang nyid dam de bzhin gshegs pa ston par mdzad do// gal te slob dpon du gyuran de nas dam tshig ga phyag rgya dang sngags 'das bdag 'di dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badzra a d+hi pa ti siM a
