mchog gyur pa// ye shes ngapa mad thob nas su// de yis sa steng thams cad du// gnas shang de na gtam yang zer// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par
byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ dngos grub sgrub pa'i de kho na nyid ram par phye ba rgyas pa'o/// de nas yang dmyos ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i
bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'od skud ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha'i gzugs gang gsabyang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sams dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lha'i
gzugs la dmags nas/ bangag 'di rang gi lha'i gzugs su bsgyur nas the tshom ma mchis par dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i lha'i gzugs byin gyis rlob pa bshad du gsol/ de
skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang
khyod nga la don 'di yongs su 'dri ba na legs so legs so// de'i phyire nyen la legs par rab tu yid la zung zhami dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan
'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la zhan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// gsang
ba pa'i bdag po de la lha'i gzugs ni rnam pa gsum ste// yi ge dang phyug rgyu dang/ gzugs so// de la yi ge'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ sgra dang byang chub kyi sems so//
phyag rgya'i gzugs la'ang rnam pa gnyis te/ gzugs dang bcas pa ma yin pa'i// gsang ba pa'i bdag po lhab gzugs kyang rnam pa gatras te/ yongs su dag pa dang/
@# yongs su ma dag pa'o// de la yongs su dag pa ni rtogs pa 'a ngo bo ste// mtshan ma bloms rud dang bral ba'o// yongs su ma dag pa ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i gzugs te/
tshalca kha dog dang dbyibs so// de la lha'i gzugs rnam pa gnyis kyis dgos pa rnam pa gnyis 'grub par 'gyur te// mtshan ma dang bas pas na mtshan ma dang bcas pa'o// mtshan
ma med pas na mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i dngos grub kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mtshan mar bcas pas mtshan bcas kyi// dngos grub rgyal ba dam pa bzhed// mtshan ma med
la gnas pas na// mtshan ma can yang sgrub tu rung// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// mtshan ma med pa bstan par bya// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs
par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ lha'i ting nge 'dzin gtan la dbab pa rim par phye ba'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang
ba pa'i bangag po phyag na rdo rje lo bka' stsal pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa mtshan ma mud/
pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgrub par 'dod pas 'di ltar bsam par bya'o// mtshan ma rnams gang nas byung/ ci bdag gi lus sam/ bdag gi sams sam/ bdag gi yid
las byung/ de la lus n las las skyes pa ste/ rtsa dang/ shang dang/ bong ba lta bu r ngo bo nyid kyis bya ba med pa/ blun pa 'am phu rol gyi rnam pa lta bu la bzos byas
pa'i gzugs lta bu r brtag par bya'o// 'di ltar bzos byas pa' gzugs de la ma zhig gis khros te ma 'am/ dug gam/ mtshon tum/ chu 'am/ rdo rjes bshig
gam/ bsrags sam/ bcad kyang ma dga' ba cung zad kyang mad la/ bza' ba 'am/ btung ba 'am/ bkru ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ spos sam/ 'phrang ba 'am/
gos sam/ tsan dan nam/ go pur la sogs pa lha dang mi'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod kyang ma de la dga' bar 'gyur ba'ang med do// de ci'i phyir/
zhe na/ gang ngo bo nyid kyis song pa'i gzugs de la rang gi nga rgyal kun nas bslang ba'i phyin ci log gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa las byung ba'i mchod pa 'am/ gnod par byed
pa'i mang gang yin pa de na byas pa'i rang bzhin can yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa bsgom par bya'o// gsang
ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang semasan nga bo 'di med pa// mtshan ma thams cad dang bral khaM/ ngo bo nyid kyis stong par bsam par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems la/
na dus gsum med de// dus gsum dang bral ba gang yin pa de na ngo bo 'di kyis mtshan ma dang bral ba'o snyam du bsam par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byas pa so so'i
skye bo rnams yid mtshan ma dang bcas par rtog ste/ 'di na yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i tshig bla dgas so// yang dag pa ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni ma skyes pa'o zhes
bya bar na rang du ma shes so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas de ltar pasams na mtshan ma med pa'i ting
de 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po nam mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsang/
sngags rnams mngon du phyogs shing gzhol bar 'gyur ro// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin khyis rlob pa las/ mtshan ma med
pa' dwang nge 'dzin rim par phye ba'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang bzlas brjod gsang ba bshad par bya'o// gtsag dus gcig gam gcig gas gcig/
yid kyi bzlas brjod bya ba 'am// yang na shung bu rnam gnyis pa// rnal 'byor mchog gis brtag par bya// sngags pa yan lag mnyam sbyar bar// bzlas brjod gzhan du ma
bya 'o// phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yis// yan lag ban pas ngas bshad pa// de yang 'jig rten pa yi ste// dmags pa can na zla med pa// slar sdud pa ya tshag gis non//
lha yi rjes su song ba'i yad// shubs te bzlas brjod byed pa' mchog/ dmigs pa can la bstan pa yin/ mad kyi 'jig rten 'das shes bya// slar sdud la sogs rnam par
srangs/ lha dang gcig tu byed pa dang// tha dad ma yin 'dzin pa yis// yid kyis rang bzhin dbyer mer bya// gzhan du bya ba ma yin ne// gsang sngags grangs na sum 'bum
du4 phal cher ngas na bshad pa dag/ lus can sdig dang bral ba ya// sngags pa rnam par dag pa la// bzlas brjod grangs 'di bstan pa ste// gzhan
du bya ba ma yin no// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bzlas
brjod kyi de kho na nyade rim par phye ba'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'kher 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ byams
pa dang sang rje chen po'i spyan gnyas kyis kyang sams can gyi khams thams cad la gzags te/ bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan
'das soms par zhugs ma thag tu yan lag thams cad nas dus gsum du ma chags pa'i stobs can zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal ma byung ngo// tad+ya shA/ ga ga na sa me/ a
pra ti sa mo/ sarba ta b+hA ga ta sa ma trAn ga ga te/ ga ga nab ra la l+yA NesanA/ rigs kyi bu ragi sngags kyi rgyal mo 'don de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gnyis su med pa'i
spyod yul can te/ 'di yis#ni brlabs sangs rgyas dang// byung chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams // gang du sdug bsngal 'gag 'byung ba'i// chos nyade chags/
med 'grub par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dgongs nas/ bdag nyid dang phyag na rdo rje gnyis ka gzod
ma nas ma skyes pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs te/ phugan rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo
nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa so sor zhi bar gnas pa ya gi'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor sud pa rim par phye ba
rgyas pa nyon cig/ de nas yong bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag na rdo rjes phyag 'tshal te/ rdo rje pad+ma'i sman de las rdo rje 'bab pa'i tshul gyis babs nas btsem ldan 'das
la mngon par bstod pa// phyag 'tshal byang chub sems khyod la// phyag 'tshalabyang chub 'byung khyod la// spyod gzugs khyod dang sa dang na// pha rol phyin pa phyag 'tshal lo//
phyag 'tshal zlog mar byed khyod la// stong pa nyid la 'dud phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes de skad ces mngon par bstod nas/
bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rjes bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang dag dang ldan na/ bdag cag rnamasasams can gyi don brgyud
par 'gyur ba dang/ gsang sngags spyod pa ji skad gsungs pa bzhin yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngani 'jig rten dang po ya/ 'jig rten mgon zhes bsags pa yin//
bla med gzod nas zhi ban// mnyam pa med pa'i tshes bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs nas/ byin gyi rlabs gang gis byin gyis brlabs
na byang chub sems dpa' de rnams dang/ rdo rje 'dzan de rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sang po mchog dam pa la bzhugs pa// nam mkha' bzhin du spros pa med pa spyod
pa la gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi mtshan nyid las kyi rnam par sAne pa bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad de// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi yan lag dang
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thams cad nas 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jige rten las 'das pa rnams dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ bsam pa dang/ bsam gtan du
bya ba dang/ dngos grub sgrub par mngon par brtson pa thams cad kyi srog dang 'dra ba/ yagi thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa/ srog tu gyur pa/ skyabs su gyur pa/ dpung gnyen du
gyur pa 'ad phyung ngo// nam: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM 3 a rigs kyi bu dag 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo
nas byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sa sor rtse bar gnas pa yin tre/ chos thams cad na a zhes bya ba'i sgo nas 'jug go/ gsang ba pa'i bdag
po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'dod pa dang mchod par 'dod pa/ byang chub
kyi sems mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs par 'dod pa// soms can rnams kyi don bya bar 'dod pa// dngos grub mngon par 'dod pa/
rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sAng po 'di la brtson par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sang rje
chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di'i cho ga dgod pa dang/ lha'i gnas gtan la dbab pa dang/ dwang nge 'dzin rnam par stsal pa dang/ gsang sngags spyad pa dang//
bsam par bya ba gsungs pa de la slob dpon gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo a zhes bya ba la gnas te srid du blangs la// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas srad bu shar phyogs
logs su bros te g.yas su bskor la/ byang phyogs su kha bltas nas srad bu bres te/ nub phyogs su kha bltas la bsgyur te thag gdab bo//de nas
bdag 'di rdo rje sems dpa' lag na rdo rjer de'i phyag rgya 'am/ ya ga ba zhes bya bas byin gyis brlabs te nang du zhugs lasAng po'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil
'khor gnyis pa la'ang 'ad ltar bdag 'di gzod ma nas zhi ba/ gnyis su med pa'i rnal 'byor gyi gzugs/ de bzhan gshegs pa'i gzugs stong pa de kyi rang gi ngo bor byin gyis
brlabs la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed ngesrad bu bres la/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor de las sum gnyis lha'i gnas su bzhag ste/ sum cha khor
sar bya'o// dkyil 'khor lhag ma gnyis kyang de bzhin du rnam par phye la lca'i gnas bsham par bya'o// de nas yang bdag de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas spyan
gyisabarlabs pa/ ches kya dbyangs rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te/ theg mar tshon rtsi dkar po blangs la 'di ltar byin gyis brlab par bya'o// 'di ni ches dbyings dag pa ste//
sems can khams ni rnam sbyong ba// 'dir ni bdag 'di de bzhin gshegs// nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs// de ltar blo can gyis bsams nas// der ni ra zhes bya ba
yang// zhi ba 'bar ba'i 'phreng can mdog/ dung zla kun da 'dra bar bsam// de nas tshon rtse gnyis pa ni// dmar po blangs nas nan tan du// ya ge zhes bya ba na// 'bar/
ba klad kor bas par bsam// rgyal ba thub dka'i dam pa ste// nyim dang po 'char ba bzhin// de nas sngags pas tshon gsum pa// kha dog sar po blang bar bya// mkhas pas
de nas ka zhes pa// de tshe tshe ga bzhin du bsam// de bzhin gsar 'od thub pa ni// gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas// rkang 'dzin gnas shing stag bcom pa// kun tu rnam par
snang ba yin// de nas mar gad 'dra ba yi// tshon rtsa 'khor ba las sgrol ba// ba zhes bya ba de ru gzhag/ byang chub sange po'i thub chenade// dpa' bo kha dog 'ja' 'dra ba//
kun tu 'jigs pa med par byed// denas tshon rtsi nag po de// mkhas pa yis ni blangs nas su// der ni hazhes bya ba bsam// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba rnam par 'phro// dus
mthu'i ma ltar ma bzad pa// lag na rdo rje rtsa bran brgyan// bdud sde sdang bya thums cad la// rnam pa kun tu bsngags par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i tshe
ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas mag+ga' yas par rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das soms bar zhugs ma thag tu thams cad du thogs pa
med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul las byung ba 'du byung ngo// na mAsan+d+hA ta b+hA ga te zlu sarba mu khe h+phu : a sa
pha ma pa ra ma a tsa le/ ga ga na sA ra Ne/ saN+DU pA nu ga te swAt+tA/ de nas tshon gyi chog byin gyis brlabs nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags sam phyag byas
[â ]te rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad du bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas langs te dkyil 'khor bskor la nang du zhugs nas byams pa chen po dang sang rje chen po'i stobs kyis sgrub pa po
la dmigs te/ bdag nyidi bzhes bya bas las kyi rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa dang lhan cig tu sAng rje chen po'i song po 'byung ba 'di'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o//
de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa na 'di yin te/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po bad+ma dkar po la bzhugs pa/ dbu thor tshugs dang dbu rgyun can/
dAr ram ras kyi spyod g.yogs dang dar lnga'i stod g.yogs mnabs pa/ gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'bar ba'i 'phrang bas 'khrigs pa phyag rgya 'am/ gzugs sam/ yi ge'i 'bur
bri'o// de la yo ga'i 'brurani a shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thoms rud kyi a zhes bya ba klad kor dang bcas pa'o// u0f00 dbang ldan gyi phyogs su sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi yum bcom ldan 'das ma nam mkha' spyan bri'o// yang na ya gi ga zhes bya ba bri'o// ga ma'i phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya yidi bzhin gyi nor bu 'am
ya ge ka zhes bya ba bri'o// ka[>byang phyogs su lag na pad+ma 'khor byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dag dang lhan cig tu pad+ma' phyag rgya 'am yi ge sa zhes bya ba bri'o//
sa lho phyogs su chagasum bor te gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas pa rdo rje'i phyag rgyu 'am ya ge ba zhes bya ba bri'o// ba de 'i cha gsum bor ba la rdo rje 'chang thams
cad kyi phug na 'am yi ger bra'o// de la yi ge'i 'brun hU~M/ de nas bden bral gyi phyogs su bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi 'og logs su ma g.yo ba pha bong gi steng na 'dug pa//
lag na ral gri dang zhags pa thogs pa// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrigs pa/ bgegs thams cad bsngags pa de'i phug rgya 'am ya gir bra'o// de' ya ge'i 'bru ni hU~M/ rlung gi phyogs
su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba bgegs chen po 'joms pa/ gyen du 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba can/ rab tu 'jig pa chen po'i dus kyi mi'i gzugs 'dra ba/ 'jigs
pa'ang 'jags par byed pa// lag na rdo rje'i 'od 'phro ba can thogs pa de'i phyag rgya 'am yi ger bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru na 'di'o// gu de nas phyogs bzhir srung ba chen po
bzhi ngagod do// de la shar phyogs su ma 'dzags pa zhes bya ba'i srung bachen mo gsar gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ gos dkar po gyon pa yade tsam khro ba'i gdong/
lag na dbyug pa thogs pa de'i phyag rgya 'am yi ger bri'o// de la ya gi'i 'bru ni 'di'o// tsa byang phyogs su 'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pa zhes bya ba'i srung bra kha dog dkar mo/
tshe lag na ral gri thogs shing gos dkar po gyen pa/ 'bar ba dang bcas pa/ 'jigs pa k+kamasacad mad pa de'i phug rgya 'am ya gir bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ pa
T+Tha nub phyogs su gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i srung dra a sho ka dmar po'i mdog 'dra ba/ ges dmar po gyon pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la lta
ba de'i phyag rgya 'am ya gir bri'o// de la yi ge ni 'di'o// sa lho phyogs su ma sprul ba rdo rjes 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i srung ba chen mo kha dog nag mo/ bzhani khro gnyer bser ba//
sad g.yogs nag po gyon pa/ sbyor tshugs dang cod pan can/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rang ga 'bar bas mngon par srung bar byed pa/ lag na dbyug pa thogs
pa bgegs chen po med par byed pa de'i phyag rgya 'am ya gir hra'o// de la de 'a ya gi'i 'bru ni 'di'o/ de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas pa phyag brnyan dang bcas par
pad+ma dkar po la 'dug par bri'o// de ltar blo can gyis bkod nas// sngags pa sngags la gzhol ba yis// mog bzhin du phyar byung nas// gnyis pa'i man nges pa la//
shAkya'i rigs na dga' byed pa// grub pa'i rgyal po bra bar bya// mgon po na bza' ngur smig mnabs// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis ldan// bstan pa ya na don mdzad lce//
sams can kun la ma 'dzags sbyin// sngags pas phyag rgya dgod pa na/ lhung bzed chos gos la sogs pa 'am// yang na mkhas pas yi ger gzhag/ de'i cho ga dam pa
'di'i// sh+tsa de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid ches kyi dbyangs kyi ngo bo 'ad du byin gyis brlabs la/ byang chub kyi sams su gyur pa'i yad kyis chagasum bor te/ bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lan gsum rjes su dran par byas nas/ tshon de nyid blangs te shar phyogs kyi chagasum par rdo rje dam pa sbyin gzhon nu'i gzugs can/ lag pa g.yon pa na
ut+pal mthing kha'i steng na rdo rje can thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar ram ras kyi snyad g.yogs rkyen pa/ der lnga'i stod g.yogs na/ kha dog gur kumalta bu /
spyi bo zur phud lnga pa de'i phyag rgya 'am yi ger bri'o// de'i sngags na 'di'o// na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanAn/ tshwa de'i g.yas logs su dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nu'i gzugs can rnam
pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ lag na rin po che'i dra ba 'am lcags kyu sgrogs pa de'i phyag rgya 'am ya shi' 'brur bya'o// de la ya gi' 'bru na 'dA'i//
pha tsha de nas lho phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnamapar sel ba zhes bya ba gsur gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ thor tshugs dang cod pan can/ lag na yid bzhin gyi
nor bu sgrogs pa de'i phyag rgya 'am yi ger bra'o// de la yi ge ni 'di'o// a 6 byang phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sa' song po zhes bya ba kha dog ljang khu/ lag na pad+ma
klogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de'i phyag rgya 'am yi ger bra'o// de la yi ge na 'di'i// i 4 nub phyogs su byung chub sems dpa' nam mkha' sang po zhes
bya ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa// gos dkar po gyen pa/ 'bar ba dang bcas pa/ lag na ral gri thogs pa de'i phyag rgya 'am ya ger bri'o// de la ya ge
na 'di'i// A 4 chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba ya// sngags pa de nas 'duganas su// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi// byang chub sems su gyur pa'i yadi//
shar phyogs kho bltas gnas nas ni// rdo rje can gyi rgyabacings nase// de nas las kyi rdo rjer gyur// nan tan dun mchod pa bya// kun tu khyab pa'i yid kyis su//
[s/ ]sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig ces bya'i rgyu bstan nas// gsang sngags lan gsum bzlas par bya// slob ma gtsang ma tshopa/ ngos te dkyil
'khor mdun dun// de dag gsum la skyabs su btang// de nas byang chub sems kyang bskyed// chos kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhin gyi// phyag rgya de dag kun la bcing// de nas chos
kya'akhor lo'i bsang// yid kyis de yi gzugs bsgyur te// ras kyis gdong pa bkab nas na// sAng rjer gyur pa'i yade kyis su// byang chub tshogs na rdzogs bya'i phyir/ lag
pa stong par ma bya'o// dam tshage gan gsang sngags 'do// de dag kun gyi rna bar bsgrags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam tshagano// de nas de la bdag gis bang// byang chub sems
gyur yod kyis su// de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug/ ma rtog gang du bab gyur pa// de na sngags pas de la sbyin// lus can kun la dam tshag phyir// cho ga de ltar rab tu bya// de
nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo de la yang zhus pa// mgon po sla ba'amchog gyur pas// dbang bskur ba ya chog gsungs// de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das//
chos kyi dbyangs la gzhol ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// chos rnams kun la dbang ba'i phyir// cho ga' mchog nangs bshad kyis// yid gcig bsdus te chog nyon//
gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon gyi bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs su de'i sngags sam phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab bo// de nas slob ma rnams
bos la chos kyi dbyings ngo bo 'di kyi pad+ma'i rgyal po chen po la bzhag ste/ yan lag kun 'byung pa'i phyag rgya bcings la byang chub sems dpa' chen po bzhis byin gyisabarlabs pa rin po chesna
bzhi'i dum pa'i chus spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o// u na klad korab cas pa ru// mkhas pas spyi bor bzhag nas ni/[â ]a zhes bya bsang khar gzhag/ ra zhes bya ba brang du
gzhug/ yang na an kun tu gzhug/ gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas// thor tshugs dang ni dbu rgyan can// pad+ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs// rgyal ba'i mchog gi dpe
'dzan gnas// ya gi' 'khor la rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigasanas/
byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyun du gyur pa//
chos kyi dbyangs rtogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i phyag rgyu rim par phye ba rgyas pa gang gis brgyan na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe 'gro ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mtshan mas btab pas/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkhi' lding dang/ ma 'am dang/ lto 'phye
chen po dang/ ma dang/ ma ma yin pa rnams 'byor par 'gyur zhing// de rnams kyang de dag gi ngag t+pan pa ra 'gyur ba yod kyis/ de kon la legs par rab tu yadi la zung zhig dang
ngas khyod la ngashad de// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab bo// bde bar
gshugs pa de'i tshod la bab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyisade'i tshe stobs blogs pa med pa'i gnas byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das
snyoms par zhugs ma thog tu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs can/ ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i stobs can/ dam tshig la 'jug par byed pa stobs gsum
dang ldan pa byung ngo// na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hAnaM/ a sa ma dris me sa ma ye swAhA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yang dag par
ston par byed pa// chos gsum gyi lam gyi mtshams las ma 'da' bar byed pa/ sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de ya na te/ de'i phyag rgya 'di yin no// la
pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng ngo// rgya 'ad phyag rgya chen po ste// sangs rgyas skyob pa kun gyi yan// sangs rgyas kun kyi dam tshig ni//
phyag rgya 'dal rab tu gnas// lag pa dgun gnyis ka yang// blo dang ldan pas khu tshur bcangs// mthe bong gnyisan nang du gzhug/ mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgrung bar bya// rgyu 'di phyag
rgyu chen po ste// chos dbyings rnam par sbyong ba 'o// gsang sngagasan/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma konyahaM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi sar ma thams
cad bzlog ste bsgol la mthe bong gnyis sprad de// phyag rgya dpal dang ldan pa 'ad// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su bsgrags// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi// 'khor lo rab tu 'das
bskor ro// gsang sngags na/ na maH sa man+ta badzra hU~M/ badzaAt+maka)7 daM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis phyag 'tshal ba'i blal mo sbyar la/ mdzub mo gnyis mthe bong gnyis kyi
tsha steng du bzhag ste ral gri lta bu r bya'o// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po ral gri'i rgyu// 'dus na lhan cig skyes pa yi// 'jig tshogs lta ba gcod par byed//

gsang sngags na/ na ma: sa man bud+d+hanaM/ mahA khir ba ra dza d+harmasan d+ha ra sha ka sa ha dza sad ka ya d+hI ts+tshad ka/ da b+hA ga tAd+hi muk+ta nor dza tA ba rA ga d+hAmAnAre dza ta hU~M/ de bzhin du lag
xxx
'jig rten 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams // zhi nga mya ngan 'das 'gro ba// rdul dang bral ba'i chos 'chad do// gsang sngagasan/ na maH sa man+ta
bud+d+hanaM/ sam+bab+hao/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo kun smol mo sbyar ba las brkyang ste dril bu ltar byas la/ mthe bong gnyis dang mam+me'u chung rtsa gtsag tu sprad de mdzub mo ga'as
ngang gung mo spang do/ pad+ma dam pa dpal ldan 'ad// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// ma shig rje rdzo'agadan yan te// der ni 'dren pa 'tshang rgya zhing// rgyal ba'i sras na
thams cad na// 'ad las skyas dang byang chub 'gyur// gsang sngags ni/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gshibs
te bslangs la/ mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste ngos gnyis su bzhag la rdo rje ltar bya/ mthe bong gnyis dang many+dza'u chung gnyis sbyong ste gzhug/ srin lag gnyis lag pa'anang du gzhug go/
phyag rgya chen po rdo rje'i rgyu// mashes grong khyer 'dzag pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'di// nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te bstan// gsang sngags ni/ nam: sa
man+ta badzra hU~M/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gnyis gshabs te bsgang/ mdzub mo gnyis ngos nas bkug ste sbyar ro// gtsug tor/
phyag rgyu rgya chen te// gtsug tor zhes na bsgrags pa yin// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang// rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// 'di'i sngags ni/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hA
tshwa hUM hU~M/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la snyanema'i mtshams su gzhag go/ rgyal ba dam pas phyag rgya 'ad/ mdzod spu zhes ni rab tu bsngags// 'di na bcings
pa tsam gyis su// rgyal ba'i mchog tu gyur pa yin// 'di'i sngags ni/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a haM dza/ blo ldan rnal 'byor tshul gnas te// lag gnyis lta ba'i
thad kar na/ lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya// lhung bzed phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags// rgya 'dashAkya sgrub pa'i lha// lhung bzed chen po zhes bya 'o// de'i gsang sngags na/
na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ b+ha de bzhani du lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgrengs la ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bu r bya'o/ sems can kun la ma 'jigs pa// de yis rab tu sbyin par
'gyur// gang gis rgya chen de bcangasan// ma 'jigs phyag rgya zhes bsngags so/ 'di'i gsang sngags ni/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sa cha dza dzan d+hI kA ya nAgAnasAk+ku/
de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa sad de dam pa sbyin pa ltar bya'o// 'di na dem ba sbyin rgya zhes// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsgrags// 'di ni khengs pa tsam gyis su// rgyal//
mchog dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// 'di'i gsang sngagasan/ nam: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ba ra da badzra At+mako daM sAhA/ lag ba ga yas pa khu tshur bcangs te mdzub mo brkyang la dpal
bar khro gnyer lta bu r bya'o// phyag rgya chen po rgya chen 'di// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// bdud na rnam par bsngags shes bya// phung byed thams cad 'gis par byed//
'dan b.rungs pa tsam gyis su/ bdud sdeshAni tu mi bzad dang// bgegs dang log 'dren gzhan dag kyang// the tsam med par rab tu 'byor// 'di'i gsang sngagasan/ na mas

man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ ma hA ba la ba to de sha ba la de dzod b+ha be man mi rgya rlud ga te swAcha/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la chung mo dang sran lag gnyis brkyang ste mthe bong de 'jung du gzhag go/
'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyi// thugs rje las byung sbyin yin te// mig gi snying du mkhas pas gzhag/ de las sangs rgyas skrun du 'gyur// 'di'i gsang sngagasan/ na ma
man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ ga ga na ba ra la l+yA Na ka ru Na mA ya ta thA ga to tsak+kosanA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar lasor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol ba'i khu tshur bcangs te/ mdzub mo
gnyis bsgrengs la bkug ste slad la zlum por bya// 'di ni zhags pa mchog ces grags// sdang ba thams cad 'jigs por byed// sngags pas 'ad banges
de yatshi// rtag tu sbrang bu btsangs par 'gyur// 'di'i gsang sngags na/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ hehe ma he pA sha/ pra sa ro dmyasatA d+ha tu ba mi tshu ka/ ta zla ga ta a d+hi muk+ti
u nar dza dasAtA/ de bzhin du lag pa gtis gcig tu sbyar te/ khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bsgrengs te tshigs gsum pa bkug la/ lhag ma rnams na gdu bu'i tshul du gnas par M
bya'o// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// lcags kyu zhesan 'ad bshadade// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// sa b.ru dag la gnas pa dang// snang b.rasams pa
gzhan dag kyang// thams cad rab tu 'gugs par byed/ 'di'i gsang sngags na/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ a sam+b+hASh+Tha/ a pra ti ha ta thA ga ta oM ku sha bo d+hi tsAr+ya pa ri pU
ra ka sAhA/ lcags kyu' phyag rgya las gung mo ga'us bkug ste de nyid du sbyar ro/ 'di nidi bzhin gshegs pa'i shugs kyi phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hA
naM dzAnod b+ha ba satwaM/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis bslangs la lhag ma rnams de bzhin dugazhag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la
na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a mr-i tod b+ha ba sAnA/ phyag rgya de nyid las many+tse'u chung gnyis kyang bsgrengs la lhag ma rnams de bzhin du gzhag go/ rked pa'i phyag rgya ste// gsang
sngags la na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ta b+hA ga ta ti saM b+ha ba sathA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khong stong du sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste nang du gzhug/ srin lag gnyis kyang
de bzhin du bya/ mthe bong dang mthi'u chung gnyis cung zad bkug/ gung mo gnyis gshabs te bsgreng ngo/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi phyag rgyu ste/ 'di'i gsang
sngags ni/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ raM raM raM sAk+ku/ phyag rgyu de nyid las srane lag gtas phyung la bsgrengs te gzhag go/ mtshams chen po gcad pa'i phyag rgya ste// 'di'i gsang
sngags na/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ be lu pu ra/ ba ku ra ba ku le sAhA/ mtshams chen po gcad nga 'a// de nyid las gung mo gnyis bkug la mthe bong gnyis bsgreng/

ngo srung ba chen mo'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta buN+NanaM/ ta thA ga te b+h+yA/ sany+dza b+ha ya ba ga te ts+tso/ bshwa mu khe b+h+ya:/ san+d+ha b+ha daM khaM rak+Sha ma hA ba le
sarbad b+hag da pu N+ya nar dza te hUM hUM dra Ta bla 9/ a pra ti ha te sAhA/ ma bzod pa zhes bya ba srung ba chen mo'o// de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis brkyang la mak+She bong gnyis nang du gzhug go/
kun tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags la/ na ma : sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ dzA la mA lan te skag tu ertsa sAnA/ kun tu 'bar ba'o//
de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la mdzub mo gnyis kyis ngos nas dkra'o// 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ge cha' phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta
bud+d+hanaM/ pra tsaN+Da badzra dza ya ba spu ra hU~M/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha'i// phyag rgyu de zhing las srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis gcig tu sbyar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
ljags kyi phyag rgyu ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa man bud+d+hanaM/ da lta ga te dzahA sid d+hi d+harmupra tiSh+Thati sAnA/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'i ljags so// phyag rgyu de 'di las
mdzub mo ga'as dang srin lag gnyis bkug la nang du sgyur/ mthe bong gnyis bsgrengs la cung zad bkug ste/ rtse mo gung me la phyogs par bya'o// mtho'u chung gnyisan snga ma bzhin
no 'ad na de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal chen po'i phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa man buta naM/ ta g+ha ga ta ma wAbASh+Tha badzA na mahod ya sAhA/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i zhal lo// phyag rgyu de 'di las mdzub mo gnyis bkrol la nang du bcug ste/ dgu bor byas la bstod ngo gzung ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mche ba'i phyag rgyu ste/ gsang sngags la/
0 na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ da zla ga du mahAdis ris ra sa gra sa ma pra b+hU kasan+d+hA ta b+hA ga ta ba re ya saM b+ha ba sAthA/ de bzhin gshegs pa' mchab 'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo/
gnyis bsgreng ste bzung la tshags gsum pa dgug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i soso yang dag par rig pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ a
tshani tu ad b+hu ta ru pa pA ga saM pra tu 'du ba shud d+hA sA ra sat+tA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu thal mo khong stong du sbyar te/
mthe bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la gcig tu mad do/ 'dan stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ dag pa la ga d+ha ra hUM
saM dzi sanA/ stobs bcu'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagasaso// phyag rgyu de nyidi las mthe bong gnyis kyi rtsi mor mdzub mo gnyis bkug sbyar ro// dran pa'abar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya ste/
gsang sregs la/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ta thA ga ta tisatA ha da ad klu dag gnas ma sa ma sAD+ha/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// phyag rgya de nyid
las srin lag gnyis mthe bo'i steng du gzung ngo// gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sany+dzan+nams ma tA prab+ha ta thA ga ta a nu ga tasAthA/ chos thams cad mnyam
a/ pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo dkras la lhag ma
mi rnams nadi bzhin du gzhug go/ kun tu bzang po'i yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sa man+tAnu ga tAbi rA ga d+hamanar dza da ma t+'a ma
bAsAthA/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gsang sngags so// phyag rgyade 'di las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi nang du bkug la gzhag/ lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhanin// 'di'i
gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a dzi tulcaya san+t+ra sha yA nu ga tasanA/ byams pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngagasaso// phyag rgya de nyid las masme bongags nang du
gzhug go/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ A kA sha sa ma ta nu ga ta bi tsitaTaM ba ra d+ha ra sAhA/ nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// phyag rgya
de nyid las sran lag gnyisapa tsaphra'u chung gsanang du bcug la mdzub mo gtas gung mo dang lhan cig tu sbyar ro// gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man bud+d+hanaM/ ad sa sa tAha te a
rgyud ga du taM taMraM raM sAnA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so///bsapo lnga pa// de bzhin du lag pa
gnyis gcig tu sbyar la sor mo thams cad dril bu 'dra bar kha dbye/ mtha bong gnyis dang mthe'u gnyis gcig tu sgyur la lhag ma rnams ni pad+ma lta bu r bya'o// gsang sngags la//
na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ saN+Ta ta thA ga ta a ba lo ka de ka ru NAmA yar ra ra hU~M dza: sAnA/ sban ras gzigs dbang phyug gi par 'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa/
gnyis thalamo khong stong du sbyar la/ pad+ma kha ma bye ba lta bu r bya'o// pad+ma'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ dzaM dzisAhA/ mashu chen po thob pa'i
pad+ma' phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo can du bslang ste/ many+dza bong gnyis kyang de'i drung du gzhag go/ gsang sngags
la na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tA re tA ra Ni ka ru Nod b+ha be swahA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i 'o// phyag rgyu de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis bsus te bsgang/ lhag ma rnamasan snga ma bzhin
no gsang sngags la/ nam sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sazlo b+ha ba san d+hAsan hUM me Ta ya sAk+kA/ khro gnyer ma'i 'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la
srin lag gnyis dang mthe bong gnyis nang du gzhug go/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ta thA ga ta ba'i ya saM b+ha be pad+ma mA le na sAhA/ gos dkar can gyi'i// phyag rgya
de nyid las mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsgrengs la mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo de'i drung du bur nas gang tsam gyis chod pa gzhag go/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta

bud+d+hanaM/ khA da b+hany+dzaspo Ta ya sAhA/ rta mgrin gyi phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags so// phyag rgyu de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang mthe'u chung gnyis kyang gyen du bsgrengs la lcag ma rnams de bzhin ngu khu
tshur bcangs pa'i tshul du gzhug go/ de'i gsang sngags ni/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ gag ha sun da nu sAhA/ sa'i sang po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa
( gtaMs thal mo khong stong du sbyar la gung mo gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis dkris tre mdzub mo gakas kyang mthe bong gnyis kyi steng du bkug so gzhag/ lhag ma rnams na snga ma bzhinano//
gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ he he ku mAr ka ba mut+tib b+ha ste the ta sa ra sa ra pra ta dzA nasanA/ 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur
la bcangs te mdzub mo dgug ge/ dra ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ hehe ku mA ra ya ga ta swA b+ha ba sgra tisanA/ dra ba'i 'od kyi phyag
rgyu dang gsang sngags so// phyagargyu de de las sor mo thams cad dgu bor bya'o// gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ut+palo' phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM he

he ku mA ra ba tsi rba ga ti ku mA ra pra ti dzun ma nu su rasAhA/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung ma gnyase/
gshapis te gyen du bsgreng ngo/ sku can gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM he he ku mAr kyi sho da ya A dzA naM/ sbyar pra dadze na snyanA/ sku can gyi phyag rgya dang/
gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la gung mo gyen du bslang ste gdung rtsa gsum lta bu r bya'o// zhe ba'i sin gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/
na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ bani d+ha ya A dzA he ku mA ri ki swAhA/ lte ba'i sgyu can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo gnyis
brkyang la mdzub mo ge'asi ngos su sbyar/ sna tshogs ma'i dbyug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ d+ha ku mAr ke A dzA na pu ra 'dunas nasAn+ta/ de bzhin
du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la sran lag dang mthe'u chung gis bseng ngo// nor can gyi rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste gsang sngags la/ na mo: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ de sngar dzAn
ka tu sawA/ nor can gyi rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bsgreng sa rtse mo dgug go/ 'gugs mo'i lcags kyu'i phug/
rgya ste/ gsang sngags la// na ma saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ A karA ya san+nAn ku mA ra s+ya sAnA/ 'gugs ma'i lcags kyu' phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so//
de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo ga9sa basbyang ste tshigs gsum pa dgug go/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a bsaya na ye swAhA/ phyag
brnyan ma rnams kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du log pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs tre gung mo bsgrengs la tshigs gsum pa dgug go/ ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/
gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+ha nAM/ ba ma datsud ka sAhA/ ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa bstod la lag
pa ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa lta bu r bya/ mi'i jags pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hAnaM/ a b+ha yanA tAsAwA/ ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya
dngagasang sngags so/ lag pa de 'dra mas yar gyen du 'dren pa'i tshul du bya'o// ngan song song ba'i phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ a sgyud d+ha ra
satAd du na sAg+ho/ ngan song srong ba'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa de nyid drang du gzhag ge yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la na ma
sa man+ta buts+tshan+taM/ nye ma dzA ma hA sa ra pra dAdzAn sAhA/ yongs su skyong sems blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa gnyis me tog 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o// gsang sngags
la na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sa tA badzod b+ha ba sAhA/ byams pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags so// lag pa de 'ang sang khar bzhag la gung mo nang du dgug go/ gsang
sngags la/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ka ru Nong b+ha nga sAwaM/ sAng rjes bsnyan pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa mchog spyan pa'i tshul du bya'o// gsang
sngags la/ na maH sa man puN+NanA/ de yab ra da ba ra prapA sA mU/ gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i 'o// lag pa de nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o// gsang
sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sat+tA shA pa ri pU ra ka sunA/ blo gros bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyagargyu dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur
bcas la gung mo'i sor mo gnyis phyung ste brkyang ngo// sa'i sing po'i me tog ga phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ha ha ha pa sa yo sAwA/ sa'i snying
po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so/[â ]/lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la sor mo gsum brkyang ng// rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+tabud+d+ha
naM hahe ma hU~M ma hA sAhA/ rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa de nyid las srin lag brkyang sta gyen du bsgreng ngo// gsang sngags
la na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ rasnod b+ha ba sAnA/ phyagan rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis bstsal te rgyab sbyar la g.yon pa'i mthe'u chung gis
g.yas pa'i mtha' rlung 'khyud de/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pas kyang g.yon pa 'khyud la lhag ma rnams rdo rje lta bu r bya'o// sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma

sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ d+hA ra NIpAb+hA sAhA/ sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// phyag na rin chen gyi phyag rgyun rdo rje rtse lnga pa ste snga ma bzhin no// gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta
bud+d+hanaM rat+ta nar dza te sAnA/ phyag na ran chen gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo rnams dgod par bya'o// bsam pa brtan pa' phyag rgya ste/ gsang
ga sngagis la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ badzrasaM b+ha ba sAhA/ bsam pa brtan pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bya ba na nam mkha' sang po'i ral gri'i phyag
rgya sta/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ga gan nAn+tatsa ra sAnA/ 'phags pa nam mkha'i sing po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du
byas pa na nam mkha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tsakra ban+tisAhA/ nam mkha' blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// dung gi

phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byis pa ni rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ d+ham+masaM b+ha ba sAnA/ rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgyu dang gsang

sngagasas// pad+ma'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byas pa na spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ pad+mamA lA ya sAwA spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgyu
dang gsang sngags so// ut+pa la'i phyag rgyu snga ma bzhin las kha ma bye bar byas pa ni nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hAnI/ dzAnod sba ba sazhwa/
nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags so// rdo rje snga ma bzhin du byas pan brtan pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ badzra kA ra
sAn+tA/ brkun pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngagasaso// de bzhin du lag pa gnyas gcig tu sbyar te srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la/ gung mo dang/ mthe bong gnyis dang/
mthi'u chung gnyis bsgreng ste/ mdzub mo gnyis gung mo'i ngos su bkug la bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par gzhag go/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya sordo rje'o/ gsang sngags la//
na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hU~M/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi'i// phyag rgyu de nyid las masgre bong gnyis dang mthe'u chung gtis nang du gzhug go/ na ma
kA'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags laM na ma sa man+ta badzA NaM/ DA Na Da NayaNasA/ mA ma kI'i 'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te
bcus la bsdoms te/ g.yon pa'i mthe bong g.yas pa'i mthe bong mnan la bsdamamo// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya// gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa man+ta badza TaM/ tshuban+d+ha
ban+tA/ mo Ta ya mo Ta ya/ brjod b+ha be sarbatA pra ti ha te sa hUM/ rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags so// rdo rje'i phyag rgya de 'de las mthe bong gnyis cung zad bkug la
mdzub mo gnyis kyang de la phyogs par bya'o// rdo rje khro zla gtso bo la phyagargyu ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa man+ta badzakaM/ sIhUMphaT sa nA/ khro zla gtso bo'i 'a//
de bzhin du lagrwa pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo gnyis gshabs te bsgreng ngo// rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta badzA/ saN+Dad+harmanar
be da na badzrasu tsa ba ra de sazhwa/ rdo rje rtse mo' 'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la sange khar gzhug go/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyu ste// gsang sngags la/ nam
sa man+ta badza N+NaM/ spo Ta ya badzra saM b+ha be sA d+hu/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi'o// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te gyen du bslangs la/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs pa'i
mdzub mo gyen du bseng ste/ khros pa bzhin du bsngags par bya ban gdul dka' phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa mnabadzA t+taM/ dur d+hu ra Sha ma nA ro Sha NakhA da ya
saN+Dan ku ru ta thA ga ta A dzA na sAgA/ gdul dka' 'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la brdab pa'i thabs su bya'o// mngon phyogs kyi sgo ba'i phyag rgya ste// gsang
sngags la/ na maH sa man badzA tAM/ rda a h+phe mu kha ma dzAtsats+tshA grAny+tsa grolA nga ya kani tsa ra ya sa sa ma ya ma nu pU ra sA hA/ mngon phyogs kyi'o// snga ma bzhin du lhung bzed/

'dzan pa'i tshul du byas pa ni shAkya thub pa'i lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sam+b+ha k+She shu ni su dan sam+bad+hamabashA ta pAlta ga gan sa ma sa wA/
shAkya thub pa'i 'o// mdzod sbya'i phyag rgya ni snga ma bzhin du'o// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo'i rtse mo kun sbyar te spyi bo'i steng du gzhag go/ gtsug tor thams cad kyi phyag rgya sku/ gsang

sngags la/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ thaM thaM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gtsug tor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa g.yon pa 'a khu tshur bcangs la gung mo dang mdzub mo gnyis brkyang
ste srin lag dang mthe'u chung gi rtsomor mthe bong bzhag la/ g.yas pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis g.yon pa'i mthal du gzhug/ many+dza bong gas yang
ma bzhan du bya'o// ma g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya ral gri shugs su bcug pa'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'an rdo rjes snga ma bzhin no// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu
sbyar la srin lagadang many+dza'u chung ga'us nang du bcug ste/ gung mo gsagashibs te bsgrungs la/ mdzub mo gnyisabakug ste gung mo'i tshigs gsum par gzhag/ mthe bong gnyis mig lta
rabur bya/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' yum gyi phyag rgya ste gtsug tor re// lag pa g.yon brkyang la khas phub ste lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mos gdugs lta bu r gzung
ngo gdugs dkar po' phyag rgya ste gdugs so// laM gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba'i ral gri ste snga ma bzhinano// daM rnam par rgyal ba' na 'khor lo ste snga ma bzhin no// hU~M
tshal rnam par 'thor ba'i na lcags kyu ste// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bkug ste gzhag go/ hU~M gza badz+dzade phung po'an gtsug tor snga ma bzhanano// dzaM cher byung
ba yi phyag rgyan// rdo rje phyag rgya zhes su grags// u0f00 gyen du 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni// pad+ma bzang po sngam bzhin/ tuM[>mag+ga' yas pa ya dbyangs sgron// dung yan par
na ngas bshad do// raM lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la sAn na/tshams su gzhag pa na mdzod snga'i phyag rgya yade bzhin gyi nor bu'o// sman gyi na gtsug tor snga ma bzhin te bye brag tu rdo
rjes mtshan pa'o// ga lag pa g.yas pa pad+ma 'dzin pa'i thabs su sAng khar bzhag la/ lag pa g.yon pa thal mo bsnyan pa'i thabs su brkyang ba na gzhan gyis ma thub pa'i phyag rgya'o//
gsang sngags ni/ dzA raM raM dzar dza ro/ lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la mthe bong gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba las dgug go/ gzhan gyis ma grub pa zhes bya ba'i kha'i phyag rgya'o/ a
Are dza ti dza yan du tre de swAhA/ lag pa g.yas pa 'gram par bstan pa na debang phyug ga phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dang gung mo gnyis bcus pa lta bu r gzung ngo// kun tu

me tog ga phyag rgyu'o// phyag rgya de 'di las mthe bong nang du gzhug go 'od kyi 'phreng ba can gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo dang mthe bong gnyis me tog 'dzin pa lta bu r bya'o//
yong mgyogs kyi phyag rgya'i// lag pa g.yas pa'i srin lag gi snying du mthe bong bzhag la/ mdzub mo dang/ gung mo dang/ masle'u chung gsum brkyangs na ba'i stod du gzhag go/
lag pa g.yon pa'ang de bzhin du bya'o// sgra rnam par sgrog pa'i phugargya'o// lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mthe bong gse rtse sprad de zlum por bya/ sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi rtse mo
dgug/ sa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa ma 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du byas la/ mkhre bong nang du bzhag pa na mi gnyer ba'i phyag rgya'o//
lag pa de 'ad ma 'jigs pa spyane pa lta bu r byas la mkhre bong mthe'u chung ga tshigs gany+tsas par gzhag go/ drang srong rnams kyi su'i phyag rgya// go rams na ji ltar rigs par bya'o// de
bzhin du lag nga gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste/ lhag ma rnams gcig tu bsdus la bstod de bzung ba na gshin rje'i ba sngon gyi phyag rgya'o// lag pa
g.yas pa khas phub ste dril bu 'dra bar byas pa na 'chi bdag gi phyag rgya ste dril bu'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo dang gung mo gas bsgang ban dus mtshan mo'i

phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gyen du bslang ba na drag mo'i phyag rgya ste dri shu la'o// phyag rgyu de nyid las pad+ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du byas pa na tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las
mdzub mo gung mo 'argyab kyi tshogs gsum par sprad pa na gzhon nu ma'i marung nyung ga phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo mthe bo'i rtse mor gzhag go/ khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag
rgya'o// phyag rgyu de 'di las mthe bong gyen du bsang ngo// phag mo'i phyag rgya ste blo ba'o// phyag rgya de 'di las lag pa snod lta bu r bya'o// tsa muN+Di'i phyag rgya ste byed pa'o// bden bral
gyi phyag rgya ral grin snga ma bzhin no// khyab 'jug ga phyag rgyu 'khor lo'ang snga ma bzhin no// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis g.yon phyogs nas bstod de bskor ban dga' bo dang nyer dga' bo' sprin

gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de de las sor mo gsum gyon du bsgrung ba na bde byed kyi mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'i// phyag rgya de 'di las sor mo de dag drang por byas pa na u ma'i pa ti'i s+ya'i
phag rgya'// zla ba'i phyag rgyu napad+ma snga ma bzhin te khyad par du dkar por bya'o/ lag pa de 'de gnyis ka gshubs de bkan la mdzub mo dang sran lag gnyis ngos su dbug go/ ma' phyag/
rgya ma shang rta'o/ lag pa de gnyis ka gcig tu thal mo sbyar la gung ma dang srin lag gnyis gzhu 'dra bar bya'o// rgyal pa dang rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// ba dran gyi phyag rgya ni snga ma
bzhin te rlung ga'i// de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa lce ba'i phyogs su bkan la sor mo gnyis bsgreng sku gzung ngo// lag pa g.yas pa de la phyogs par byas te/ pi wang len pa lta bu r byas
pa na debyangs can gyi phyag rgya ste pa wang ngo// chu lha'i phyag rgyan zhags pa ste snga ma bzhinano// dbyangs can gyi phyag rgyud nyid las mdzub mo dgug go/ lha ma yin rnams kyi phyag rgya sa/
gsang sngags la/ namaH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ gar la yos thA/ phyag rgyu de 'de lasasran lag brkyang ngo// dra ze' phyag rgya ste// gsang sngags la// bshud d+ha sA ra ba naM
nasA nA/ phyag rgyad nyid las mdzub mo dgug go/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ ak+Shayashwa ra swA hA/ phyag rgya de 'de las
mthe bong dang mthe'u chung gnyasi rtse sbyar ro// gnod sbyin rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ yak+Sha ba tu d+hAr sAnA/ phyag rgyu de nyid las gung mo bskyung ngo// sha za rnams
kyi phyag rgya// gsang sngags la/ pad+me shA tse ga tisAnA/ gung mo de nyid bkug la gzung ngo// sha za mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ ma tsamatshisA/ de
bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mthe bong gnyis gyen du bslong ste gzung ngo// gza' thams cad kyi phyag rgya// gsang sngakas la/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ gre heshAr+ya
pApa tsho da rmi ya sa cha/ phyag rgyu de 'de las gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis bzlog sgo sbyar ro// rgyu skar thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma: sa nin+ta bud+d+hanaM/ nak+Sha tra/
tsha nir nad nasazhwa/ phyag rgyu de 'de las srin lag gnyis bkug ste lag pa'i mthiladu gzhag go/ gsang sngar sa la/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ rak+Sha swa d+hi pa ta ye sa/ srin po/
rnams kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngagasaso// lag pa g.yas pa khar bzhag ste lce la reg par bya'o// mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/
hiM: ha gsang ba pa'i bdag bo de lta bu la sogs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa las byung// byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i phyag rgya rab
'khyams rnams te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'on kyang ja tsam du yan lag bskyod pa de dag kun phyag rgya rgyas par rig par bya'o// ja tsam du lce bstod pa de tsam du de dag kun kyang gsang sngags
bstan par 'go par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dang 'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems dang ldan
pa'i yad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas te dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gzhan du byas nasangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams dang/ byang chub kyang bslus par
'gyur te/ nam dam tshig las 'das pas nges par ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa
las/ phyag rgyu rim par phye ba rgyas pa'o/// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa gsang ba pa'i bdag po thams
cad du 'jug pa'i chos kyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs nyon mge/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpas a zhes bya ba la gnas te dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// nam/
sa man but+tAnaM/ a4na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sa/ na ma: sa man+ta badza TA/ ba ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha/ Ta Tha Da D+ha/ ta tha da d+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra lawA//

sha Shas gu/ nga nyaNan/ na ma sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ A na sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sa4 na maH sa man+ta badzaN+NaM/ bA kA khAkA g+hA/ tsa mAdzA dzA/ na nA dzAn+tA/ tAThA dA d+hA/ pA lA bA b+ha mA/ yA rA

lA wA shANasA hA/ dA wANAnA/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM 3[u0f00 ï¼ ]na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ sa na maH sa man+ta b+hAdzA t+taM/ thaM kaM khaM gi g+haM saMtshadzi/ rnga zhi Da[Ã© ]/ taM thaM jid+haM/ paM yaM

khaM g+homaM/ yaM raM laM waM/ shaMdzisaM haM/ paM haMNaMnaM/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a na me: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sa[. ]na ma sa man+ta badzA TaM/ ba[â ]ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dzA/ Ta Tha Da D+ha/ ta tha
da rgyu/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ nga nya Na na/ iA/ u U/ e e/ oMtsho/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ltar na 'di ni yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa' tshes kyi rnam grangs te/
gsang sngags kyi tshul la rnam par dag pa gnas pa'atsho ga/ lce yongs su bzung ba' chog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa// yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul la mkhas pa// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i ril mo ste/ 'das pa dang/ de ltar dang/ ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
04 (kyang bshad/ 'chad/ 'chad par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas nasangs rgyas kyi zhang rab 'byams gang dag na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo/ chos kyi

rnam grangs 'di ma 'chad pa ma magleng ngo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas khyang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gsang sngags kyi tsho ga shes par
'dod na/ grums cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnam grangs la mngon par brtson par bya'o// ka dang/ tsa dang/ Ta dang/ ta dang/ pa rnams klog ma dang/ blam dang/ dbus dang ldan n
ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs la 'jug pas byang chub dang/ stod pa dang/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang bcas pa thob par byed do// de bas nagasang
sngags kyi tshog la dang po la sogs pa'i tha snyad dang ldan par 'gyur ba de dag nyid thog ma dang/ bla ma dang/ dbus dang lhan cig tu gyur par shes par bya// gsang sngags kyi tshag re re
la jiltar 'dod par nges par sbyar bar bya'o// blo yis rnam par rtogasanan// de dag bla med gnas mchog ltar// de ltar 'di ni 'khor lo gcig ste// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs
su 'khor ba na ya gi'i 'khor lo'o/ sngags pas yi ge' 'khor la de shes na rtag tu ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'khor lo bskor ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes par 'gyur ro//
rnam pa thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi ya ge'i tshul rim par phye ba'o// denas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyis
sems can gyi khams thams cad la gzigs nas/ chos kyi dbyangs ma zad pa'i bkod pa bstan pa dang/ gsang sngags kyi srid pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di da kyis semasacan gyi
khams ma lus pa gdon par thugs dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi mdzod kyi mad+hu rlabs de bzhin gshegs po'i mnyam pa nyung bkod pa'i sAng po/
can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma skrag tu/ de nas de shed kyi tshesams can gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung bar
byed pa'i sgo ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du las dang/ tshe dang/ rnam par smin pa'i 'bras buza ba dang/ zer 'jug pa'i gzugs dang/ kha dog dang//
dbyibs dang/ nga ro dang/ 'gro ba dang spyod pa dang/ nges nga 'i tshig brjod pa/ sems can thams cad so sor yang dag par mgu bar byed pa// chos kyi dbyangs
kyis rnam par bskyed pa'i sku rnams byung bar gyur to// byung nas kyang nam mkha' dang mnyam pa' 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rnams su sgra dbyangs gcig gis chos kyi dbyings khyab
00 par rnam par rig par byed pa// de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'ad sgrog par gyur to// chos kyi mtshan nyid gang las na/ chos rnams
dag ni thams cad dang// sangs rgyus rnams dang nyan thos dang// rang rgyal skyob pa rnams dang ni// byang chub saMms dpa' dpa' bo dang// de bzhin rgyal ba mchog rnams
dang// sems can stod kyi 'jig rten dag/ btags pa rim pa bzhin 'byung zhing// chos rnams skye dang gnas pa dag/ gang las rtag tu 'byung 'gyur ba// shes rab
grabs dang ldan gyur cing// yid gnyis som tA dang bral ba// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa'i// lam 'di khyod kyis skyo par gyis// de nas de bzhan gshegs pa'i
sku chos kyadabyings las byung ba de dag gis chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang ga sku rnam par rig par byed pa sprul pa'i sprin rgyas yongs su bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
thugs kyi dbang tsam gyis ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcag nas gcig tu brgyud nas byin gyis brlabs te/ rang rang gi chos kyi dbyangs kyi gnas su zhugs par gyur to//
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dgod pa lha rnams kyi gnas yang
bzha/ @#// dag par gnas par bsam pa sa bon dang bcas pas mtshan pa yod kyis/ de nyon la legs par rab tu yadi la zung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// de skad/
ces bka' stsal pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dang por sngags pas
'a dkyil 'khor de// rang gi lus la dgod bya ste// rkang pa nas na chu so la// khrug gi bar du sa ya bsam// de nas gong du sAng kha'i bar// sdom brtson can gyi chu yi bsam// chu
ya yan chad ma ya ste// me ya u0f7a yan chad rlung yin no// bsams nas de nas mkhas pa yis// sa la gzugs brnyan gzhag par bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das rnam par
snang mdzad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ sprugs kyis la zhugs nas chos mnyam pa nyid la bltas te/ ma 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams la brtags nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po the tshom thams cad/
mi gcod par byed pa 'das so/ na maH saman+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a sa ma ba da/ d+haman+tA du kAr+ya ga dug dzAnaM/ sam+b+hasmA/ oM khaM aM a/ saMsu/ groge/ raMr/ paM pa/ sA AH//
hUMm wA sA wA/ raM ra swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes gsang sngags kyi rgyal bo chen po 'disasam thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu' 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyis phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste// phyag na rdo rje'i sa bor bzhaganas legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyis bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs kyis la zhugs nas thams cad du gsang sngags kyi tshul la mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
la snang bar bya bar 'dod pa'aphyir/ gsang sngags kyi skyel po 'ad sas pa legs so legs so// de phyi'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi seng po la bzhugs te/ tshig bcu gnyis po 'di dag gis chos kyi debyangs rnam par sbyar rung bdud bzhi pham par byas nas chos
kyi dbyangs las byung ba 'di dag gnas gsum nas byung ste bdud sdig can rnams btul bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ skyugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes
nas nam mkha' tshod med pa'i phyir sku tshad med pa b.ros par gyur/ de bzhin du gsung dang shugs tshad med pa'ang brnyes par gyur to// de ltar ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan zhing/ chos
thams cad la dbang thob pas 'di ltar gsang sngags kyi rgyal po tshig bcugakas po 'di dag nyid las brtsams te chos 'chad de// rags kyi bu khyod kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ rgyugs mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pas na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du snang ngo// thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas//
bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la// sngagasasbyar tshig mchog zhus shig dang// cho ga rgyas par bka' stsal to// nged kyang sngon na 'di rnams kyis// bla med byang chub rtogs nas
su/ mya ngan 'das lam 'gro ba yi// mnom pa med pa'i chos bshad pa// 'jig rten khams na bzhugs pa A// rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dpang du gyur// de nas dpal
ldan rdo rje 'dzani// bsam pa mchog rab mgu gyur pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin brlabs pas// 'daskad cesan tshig tu sas// chos 'di rnams ni mtshan nyid med//
ngo bo nyid med gnas med pa// las dang tshe las rnam par grol// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'dod// thugs rjes mnga' na mdzad pa yi// mgon po rnams kyi shugs kyisan//
rnam par sprul nas chos kyi na/ mtshan nyid 'di deg rtogs par 'gyur/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyagan rdo rjes ched du brjod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de spus nas/ ma 'ongs pa'i
dus kyi 'gro ba rnams la bltas te/ gang rje chen po'i sange po 'byung ba'i dekyil 'khor chen po 'di the tshom gcad pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la zhus pa// soms
can kun gyi don gyi phyir// kun mkhyen bstan dang bral ba po// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// 'dren pa khyod la zhu ba na// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du// zhig bgyi ba 'dren
pas gsung// thub pa chen po slob dpon dang// slob ma'ang rnam po du ru bshad// sa gzhi ci 'drar 'tshal bar bgyi// de yang ji ltar sbyang bar bgyi// ji ltarasan dag par 'gyur//
ji ltar de nabartanapa lags// slob ma'i dgos pa gang gis bgyi// spyang ba'ang 'dren pas bka' stsol cig/ dag pa'i mtshan ma ci 'dra dang// gang gas de dag gsung bar bgyi//
sa na gang gis byin gyis brlab// der ni dang por gang gas brtag/ sa ya che las thig gdab pa'i// srad bu rnams dur 'tshal bar bgyi// mchod pa rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi// ma tog
bdug spos pa 'dra dang// me tog dang na bdug spos dag/ ji ltar dbul ba 'dren pas gsungs// lha bgos spyin srog las rnams kyang// gang dag la ni ji ltar bgyi// lha rnams
kyin gangan dag kyang// gang la gang gis bgyi ba gsung// kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams kyang// go rims bzhin du mgon pos gsungs// lha rnams dang ni phyag rgya dang//
gdan gyi tshod kyang bshad du gsol// phyag rgyu rnams ni gang nas byung/ tsa phyir phyag rgya zhes kyang bgyi// dbang bskur rnam pa dur 'tshal brgya// dam tshig rnam pa du zhig mchis/
sngags spyad pa la brtson pa yi// sngags pa byang chub sems dpa' dang// klams cad mkhyen par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar bden pa mthong bar 'gyur//
dngos grub rnam pa dur 'tshal bgyi// grub pa'adus kyang bka'astsol cig/ grub nas nam mkhar 'gro ba dang// ji ltar ma spang 'gyur ba dang// gtso bo lus 'di ma bor bar//
ji ltar lha yi lus 'thob 'gyur// sprul pa rnamasanasna tshogs pa// de la gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur// nyiT+Tham dang phyogs rnams dang// rgyu skar gza' dang skar ma dang// yud
tsam dang na klang mag dang// rlu dang 'chidong rgud pa dang// ltas ngan dug na skrums cad kyang// de la ji ltar 'byung ma 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas dang// sngags pa/
ji ltar 'bral ma 'a gyur// sbyin srog las dang ma dag dang// tshim par bgyi ba dur 'tshal brgya// lha rnams kyang n so so yi// ngo bo 'di na 'dren pas gsungs// 'jigu rten pa ya
sngags rnams dang// de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yi// tshad dang 'bras bu grangs rnams dang// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par dang// las kyi rnam par gang du smin// jaltar rnam
par snyan ma 'gyur// sngags pa rnams na nam zhig na// las dang tshe las rnam grol 'gyur// de nas kun mkhyen rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan bskrun dang bral ba yis//
rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam ngagod pa// lha rnams kyanaMganas nges pa// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/
rdzogasasangs rgyas kyi rab gsang ba// dpa' bo cher 'byung khyod kyis gang// yongs su dris pa de legs so// lag nardo rje stobs chen la// mdor na bsdusanas bshad par bya//
dgyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rel du// bya ba rnams nangs pas nyon// so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis// tshul shes pas na ci rigs par// rang gting 'dzin lo gnas te// ragi
sngags rgyal po stobs po che// yan lag btsuganyis tshig 'byung ba// go rims bzhin du bzlas brjod bya// gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pa'i// slob dpon rnam pa gnyis
zhes bya// zab dang ma zab bye brag las// de ya mtshan nyid shes par bya// zab mo rgya cher shes par bya// lus can rnams ni yid mi rton// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras mchog ste/
mthong ba'i chosan rnam par spangs// gas pa mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis// myos par gyur pa dam sa pa can// sangs rgyas rkang gas mchog rnams kyis// 'jig rten pa
yas dkyil 'khor kun// de yaMs bri bar bya ba'i phyir// rjes su gnang zhing dbang yang bskur// dus dang dus mne bye brag las// slob ma rnam bzhari shes bya ste// gang ge ni
ya mod la sgrub// gnyis su sgrub dang gtis kar man// mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs pa yis// slob ma de na rgyal ba'i mchog/ san dang por shes
par bya/ sems kyis sar na bshad pa yin// sbyong ba sngar nabastan pa ste// de yis de ni yongs su sbyang// nam zhig shes dang bral ba na// sems kyisan ma 'dzags pa//
'a de don deg pa ste// zhes pa thams cad rnam par spangs// mngon par byung chub mthong bas na// de ltar de nabartan zhes bya// de las gzhan dus sbyong ba// de nadeg par ma
'gyur ro// sngags pa rtog la gnas nas su// gang zhag sa sbyong byed pa na// byang chub sems na rnam sangs pas// gsang ba'i bdag po de mi 'dug/ de bas rtog pa rnam
spangs nas// sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya// nga yas dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni// cho ga rgyas par gang bstan pa// de dag thog mar bstanapa na// rmongs pa rnams kyis
mishes te// rtog pa sdug bsngal rgyur 'gyurab// jisrid ma spangs bar du// 'jig rten 'di nas sangs rgyas mni// kun mkhyen ces kyang ma bya'o// slob ma rnams la nan
tan du// byang chub sems kyis sbyang bar bya// bsrung ba mi g.yo mgon po 'am// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bya// slob ma nam zhig dmigs pa yis// nam yang
g.yos par ma 'gyur ba// de tshe dri med nam mkha' bzhin// yang dag par nangeg par 'gyur// sa byin rlab pa dang po na// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bya bar bshad// gnyis
pasams kyi debang gsi te// 'dir na gzhan du ma bya'o// srid bu rnam pa bzhir bshad de// dkar po ser po dmar po dang// nag po zhesan bya bar brjod// lnga pa nam mkha'
lta bu r bshad// bar snang la ni bzung nas su// derani dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// srud bu dganags nga yas// sa la dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sangs rgyas
rnams ni thams cad dang// de'isras blo can rnams kyi gdan// pad+ma yid las byung ba'i mchog/ bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyis bsngags// rang rgyal dang dgra bcom
pa phyogs gcig shes par gang grags pa// de dag stan du shes bya ba// pad+ma las byung 'dab ma'o// 'jag rten gyin lha rnams gang// tshangs la sogs pa 'jig
rten grags// de dgasanan pad+ma dmar// rgyal po rnams kyire bsngags pa'o// phal pa rnamasanas rags par// sa yi brag dag las bsam// mchod pa rnam bzhi'i
shes bya ste// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar ba dang// de bzhin byams dang sIng rje dang// me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'i// sor mo las byung me tog rnams // skyob pa
kun la dbul bar bya// yan lag kun 'byung phyag rgyu ni// bangs nas byang chub sems bsgoms te// sor ma mgon po thams cad dang// de'i
sras rnams la nan tan bya'o// 'di ni skyon med me dogs// rang tu bsung zhim rnam pa mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyi ljon shing rnams // rgyal ba mchod pa'i phyir byung ba//
dung 'dzin dbang gis bsgyur ba yi// sngags kyisade dag byin brlabasan// chos kyi dbyangs las byung ba yi// smin mang rgya cher dam pa rnams // sangs rgyas rnams
kyi spyan sbyar na// de tsho rtag tu char bzhin 'bab// lha rnams phal pa gzhan la ni// me tog 'di rnams bsags pas// rang gi sngags rgyud rgyasashes pas// ji/
ltar rags par dbul bar bya// de bzhin ma tog bdug spos rnams // ji ltar rigs par rnam par bsam/ mthe bong srin lag sbyar ba ni// bokrags pa zhes bshad pa ste/
de yis me tog de blangs nas// rang ga swang kha'i phyogs nas dbul// 'jig rten pa ya lha rnams la// lte ba'i thad ka nas zhes bya/ bdug skyes rdo rje khu tshuraram// yang
na pad+ma' 'phreng ba yis// bar snang lan bzung nas su// 'jig rten mgon skyobs rnams la dbul// de las gzhan pa'i 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la ni go rims bzhani//
phyi dang nang ga bye brag gas// sbyin sreg rnam pa gnyis zhes bya// las dang tshe las rnam par grol// slar yang sa bon 'byung ba ste// las 'dod pa yis sbyin sreg bya/
nang gasmyan srag ces su bshad// phyi rol gyin gsum ldan zhing// gnas gsum dang ni gsum la gnas// las gsum gyi na las grub pa// 'jig rten pa yi sbyin sreg
mchog/ sbyin sregalas na ma shes pas// gang dag gzhan du byed pa na// sdugs kyi shes pa spangs pa ste// rkyen des 'bras bu ma slob bo// de bzhin gshegs pas gsang
stags dang// de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs// dkar dang ser du shes par bya// phyag na rdo 'a thams cad pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug gsang sngags na// las
kyi bye brag dag las dkar// kun tu rgyu bzhi lham pa dang// go rims bzhin du zlum po dang// gru gsum dang zla gas 'dra// dbyibs na legs par bshad pa yin// gzugs
naganyis su shes bya ba// bud med dang na skyes pa nyid// yang na kun tu thams cad kyi// kha dog dbyibs dang gzugasa rnams te// bsam yas ye shes las byung bas// de bas
de rnams bsam yas de// yashes mkhyen gyi ye shes na// sems don bya'i tha dad gyur// yod kyi rgyan dzatsam pa stan dang phyag rgyu dag dang ni// lha ya tshod kyang le rims
bzhan// de tsam du na shes par bya// sangs rgyas gang nas byung ba nas// phyag rgya rnams kyang de nas byung// chos las byung ba'i slob ma rnams // chos
kyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya// de bas mdor na chos kyi dbyings// mtshan ma phyagargya yin par bshad// dbang bskur gsum du shes bya ste// des pas nan tan mnyan par gyis//
phyagargyas gang zhig dbang bskur ba/ las dang bya ba spangs pa ste// skyob pa rnams kyi dbang bskur ba// de ni mchog ste dang po yin// gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis// kun nas
bslang bar yang dag bshad// gsum pa yid kyis shes bya ste// yuladang dusan spangs pa 'o// blo ma legs par mgu byas nas// phan par byed pas gang smras pa'i// dbang
bskur 'dan mchog yin par// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsgrags// sangs rgyas rnams kyis mdor na na// dam tshig can rnams sngar bshad de// dkyil 'khor 'di
spu na mazlong ba las// dam tshag shes pa gamagaces bya// de la phyagargya ma bstanatsang// sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o// byang chub sems kyi bye brag las// sngags dang phyagargya yongs
su gzung// dkyil 'khor mthong zhes bya ba 'di// dam tshig can gnyis shes par bya// dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgyu mas+song// las dang bya ba la yang sbyar// bla mas lung ni ma byin pa//
de yang dam tshig shes par bshad// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor grwa ba rnams // de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan// gsang ba'i shes 'byung ba yi// dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa'ang yane//
gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su na// sngags pa tshogs dbang bskur ba// dam tshig shes pa sngar shes bya// dam tshig chen zhes gzhanAmabya// brtul zhugs bzang po byang chub phyir//
gang zhagasems nasgrim pa na// sngags pa gnas gsum ma dmags pa// de na byang chub sems dpa' yin// thabs kyi snying stobs bskyod nas su// sams can don la sbyor ban///
dmigs su med pa'i spyod 'thob pa// rgyal ba'i mchog tu shes par bya// thog ma nasan zhiba'i chos// ngo bo nyid ni med pa la// gang gsems ni ri rab bzhin/ gnas pa
de nabaden pa mthong/ [u0f8b ]/'dabaden 'di na yang dag pa// de bzhin du nam sleb/[â ]/jaltar sangs rgyas bden gzigs pa// de bzhin sngonan ngesamathong ba'i// byung chub sems thob
gang yin de// dngos grub de las gzhan tsang dgos// de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni// rnam pa dgagan lngar 'dod de// sbyod pa'i rjes su 'jug padang// de bzhin san gnen pa
dang// 'jig rten mngon shes lngar 'dod dang// sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhanano// rgyud las rgyud du gyur pa yi// las ni rjesrid ma nyams shing// rnam smin rnam par ma smin te//
dngos grub dag ga dus su 'dod// mdor na gang tshe dus gcig tu// las dang skya ba 'phangs gyur pa// de tshe'ang sngags pas dngos gruban// yade las
yang dag byung ba 'thob///bamapo drug pa// grub nas mkha' la 'gro ba na// ji ltar sgyu ma 'dzigs med bzhani// sngags kyi du bas
rmongs byed pa// ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin// gang la lus dang ngag med pa// dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin te// de bzhin masnang 'gyur zhes bya// de nadi na gnas pa yani/
dzaltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas su phyin// lus kyang spangs pa ma yanel// de 'de kyis kyang de ma song// de bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis kyang// sngags pa
sngags la gnas pa dag/ bsod nams byas pa'i las rnams kyis// 'ja' dang 'dra ba'i lus kyang thob// lus dang ngag yade las byung ba'i// gsang sngags yade bzhin nor bu 'dra//
de las rnam par bsams pa'i don// ma brtags par yang 'byung bar 'gyur// ji ltar nam mkha'i phyogs rnams su// 'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis// mi gos de bzhin
sngags pa yang// rtogs pa'i spyod yul kun gyis so// 'ad kun 'du shes tsam du ni// nam zhig de ltar bsgoms gyur cing// rnam par bsgoms na sngags pa de// rdzogs
0 sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga'// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso ba yas// sbyin sregagahIs su bshad pa na// phyi rol gyi deng nang gsu// de yang tshim por bya dang bcas// lha rnams
kyang na so so yi// rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas su// 'jig rten pa yasngags rnams kyi// tshad dag legs par gsungs pa na// dbang phyug la sogs mthu chen rnams // bkur
ba'i lha rnams gang yin pa// de dag gsan gang byas pa'i// sngags dang phyag rgya stobs chen rnams // 'bras bu phal cher 'phral du ster// yod na bshad pa de yin no// 'on kyang
skye dang 'jig pa ya// chos can de dag brtan pa med// 'jig rten 'das pa'i sngags rnams na// thog ma'i byed pa med pa 'o// las dang skye ba kun bcad pa// nyes pa gsum
bral rgyul ba dang// rang rgyal bas ru lta bu dang// de bzhani rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang// gsang sngags tshad na sngon bshad pa// dus gsum/
lasan thun tu 'angs// rten cing 'brel pa las byung ba// mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu tshad// ngag yid lus las 'byung ba 'o// 'jig rten pa ya 'bras bu'i tshad// bsal pa
gtsag tu bshad pa yin// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// gsang sngags 'bras bu bsal pa 'dis// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang// rgyal sras rnams kyi tang 'dzan na/
mtshan ma med tsang dag pa 'o// 'jig rten pa ya mtshan mar bcas// rnam par sanang 'di 'di la// las kyi 'bras bu smin 'byung ba// nam zhig dngos
ba grub thob pa na// de tshe las kyang ldeg par 'gyur// sems na ngo bo 'di med phyir// rgyudang 'bras bu rnams sngangs shing// las dang tshelas rnam grolan// nam mkha' lta bu r
'gyur ba yin// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang phyag rgyu'i gzugs su dgod pa rim par phyob/ lha rnams gnas par byin gyis rlob pa/ ting nge 'dzinalta rtogs pa/ byang chub
sgyu/ sams dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ chos kyi debyanges rtogs pa'i spyod yul du gyur pa/ samasacan gyi khams ma lus par bsgral bar ya dem
bcas pa rnams kyi den dang/ phan pa dang/ bde ba'i phyir sngon gyisangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de kon la legs par rab tu yade la zung zhig dang ngas khyod
la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/ phyugan rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' sul
to gsang ba pa'i bdag po dang por yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor dgod pa rim par phye ba gang las 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor
glangs med pa byung ba// gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ sang rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de bra ba'i cho ga 'on nug/ kun tu gru bzhalham pa la//
sgo gtsage pa ni stogs bur bcas/ bzang po rdo rje rnams kyis mtshan// dbus su rdo rje rtsa brgya pa// de steng pad+ma bri ban// sa bon dang bcas rgyas par byas// de yi steng du'ang/
pad+ma che// phyag rgya klad kor gyis mdzes byas// 'dab ma brgyad rnams legs par rdzogs// ze bar bcas pa shan tu bzang// 'dab ma rnams ni thams cad la/ yan lag
bcu gnyas tshag bkod pa// de rnams dbus na mgon bzhugs pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso// dkyil 'a khor brgyad kyi 'khor rnams kyis// kho ra khor yug
yongs su bskor// sAng rje las byung dkyil 'khor 'ad// mchog tu shes par bya ba ste// lung bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams dang na// las dang lus dang de ngos grub dang// dgod pa
rnams kyang des nga yas// 'di las 'byung bar shes par bya// gsang bapa'i bdag be gzhan yang de bzhagashegs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra zhing/
mdog/ dung lta bu yi dbus na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi gru gsum pa// pad+ma dkar po'i stong na gnas// klad kor bcas pa'i mtshan gyis btab// rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste//
dpyad ma dgos par kun nasan// 'od zer dag na gnyis byas pa// gsang sngags mgon las byung nas su// de na phyogs bcu rnams su song// gsang ba pa'i
bdag po gzhanayang// spyan ras gzigs dbang dkyil 'khor na// nges pas nan tan mnyan par gyis// kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su'ang dung 'dra gzhag par bya/ de yi
steng du'ang pa ts+tshan// sa bon bcas byas rgyas par bri// de ya snying du'ang rdo rje tshe// rdo rjelas kyang par che// thams cad sa bon rnams kyis mtshan// rang gi sa bon legs par
sbyar// sgrol ma drang na khro gnyer can// de bzhin gos dkar can dang ni// rig sngags longs spyod can ma dang// mkhru chen rdzob pa'ang nan tan bya// dpal rnams kun dang phyug
banAn ma// dkyil 'khor 'di yi dbus su ni// phyag rgya'i mtshan mdabang thob rnams // khyad par du ni bri bar bya// rta mgrani can gyi bya ba na// gru gsum tshul du 'dug pa ste//
tsham dkyil 'khor mtshan ma bzang pos btab// ma 'char pa'i kha dog 'dra// rig sngags rgyal dang bcas par na// mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya// gsang ba pa'i bdag po
gzhan yang khyod nyid kyi dkyil 'khor mdor bshad par bya'o// kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la// rdo rje'i mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan// thams cad ser po yid du 'ong// dbus na pad+ma
rab tu gnas// de yi dbus su bya ba na// bum pa zla ba'i 'od 'dra ba// 'di ni mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan// klad kor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan// de ya steng du'ang rlung chen
na dbyur gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog/ ba dan g.yo bar sngags pas bya// klad kor gyis kyang rnam par brgyan// de yasnying du'ang gru gsum pa// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can/
de 'dzags par byed pa'i mi 'dra da// sum mdo ras mtshan mtshan gyis btab// 'bar 'phreng 'khrigs pa 'jigs 'jags lta// nyi ma 'char ba'i gzugs 'dra ba'o// de
yi dbus su pad+ma che// dus mtha'i mi 'od 'dra ba 'o// pad+ma'i sdong du rdo rjen// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'phro ba can// hU~M zhes bya ba'i sgra dang ldan// dam pa sa bon rnams kyis
mtshan// dang 'a bo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor 'ad// rgyal ba'igatso bo rnams kyis gsungs// mAs kA ni lu gu rgyud// de bzhani rdo rje ragis las byung// rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje rtse//
rig sngags rgyal mo mthu chen dag/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du na// kun kyang khongs su chud par bya// las rnams shan tu 'grub bya'i phyir/ phyag rgyadakyil 'khor sa bon dang//
kha dog khyad par go rims bzhani// de dag ji ltar rigs par bya'o// de nas gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin// chen po gtser bshad 'di rnams te// nam mkha' dri med rdo rje 'khor//
rdo rje mche ba nges pa dang// rnam par grags pa skal chen dag/ rdo rje mgon po mchog 'dzin dang// rdo rje zhu ba rdo rje che// rdo rje mthang ka de bzhin gzhan//
rdo rje pad+ma yangs pa'i mag/ rdo rje bzang po rdo rje nyid// spros pa med par gnas pa dang// namamakha' mtha' yas 'gro ba 'o// de rnams dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni/
dkar po sar po dmar po dang// nag po yin par yang dag bsags// de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs// rtsa gsum pa dang rtse gcig dang// gzhan yang gnyis
dang gnyis ma yin// 'phreng ba lta bu de bzhin gzhan// kha dog bye brag las shes bya// 'di rnams kun kyang mthu chen te// rnam par rgyal dang ldan pa 'o// mi g.yo
mgon gyi dkyil 'khor na// rlung dang ma yi yin par 'dod// nga ya dung ni 'og logs su// bden khral gyi ni phyogs char phra// rang gis bon mtshan mar ldan// ral
