kun da dang/ zla ba'i mdog 'dra ba/ sger tshugs can/ mgo gsum pa/ lag pa bzhapa/ lag na bgrang 'phreng dang/ gun d+hi dang/ de con thogs shing ma 'jigs pa
sbyin pa/ gos dkar bo bgos pa/ srid bu dkar pos sa ral khar thogs pa/ sAng kha'i sum mdo' ris mtshan pa can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa malce dkar po 'phro ba/ ye shes
rang bzhani can de lta bu 'ame lhabasams la/ 'phags pa ma g.yo bas bsngags pa'i chusngar bshams pas ma la bskor ba'i thabs su bsang gtor bya'o// rdo rjemchog spyan gyis kyang lan
[]gsum du bya'o// na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ maMsAwA/ rdo rje mchog spyan gyi'o// de nasam la rang ga gsang sngags kyi byug spos dang me tog la sogs pa dbul lo// de nas mngar
gsum las sreg blugs gsum ni te dgang gzar chang pas bzung la mar gyi degang thugs gsum sbyin no// de nas shing u dum bar 'am/ AshAt+tA'i rtse mo'i yam shang rtsa gnyis/
mar la bsgugs pa bdun sragag/ de nas yang mar gyi degang blugs gsum byin la bsang gtor yang snga ma bzhin du bya'o// oM ba ra dwagan yeng+gashAn+taM ku ru swAwA/ de bzhin du lha thams

cad la'ang so sor sbyin sreg byas la bsang gtor bya'o// na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ tAM a ma rla shAn+tig ta/ shAn+ti ka ra pranA ma d+hamanaradzad/ a b+hA ba sAb+hA ba d+harmas man+ta pAyA/ a mu ka
s+ya sAn+taM shAn+ti/ thaM ku ru swA hA/ zhi ba'i gsang sngags so// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad dran par byas la bdag nyid kyisanang rnam par dag pas ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyi
sems bsgom mo// de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rang gsarag sngags bzhag ste rang ga lca' phyag rgyu bcades la rang ga lha' gzugs su bsgom mo// de nas yang snga ma bzhin du dgang
blugs gsum la sogs pa phul te bskyor pa'i thabs su bsang gtor yang byas la/ bdagags rgyud las byung ba'i rdzasaM rnams ji srid ma skyo' bar du sbyin sreg bya'o// skyo bar gyur na
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bltas te yang byang chub kyi sems bsgom mo// de nas mchod yon phul la lha rnams la phyag byas te slar gshegs su gsol la// lha rnams slar gshegs/
su gsol nas phyag rgya'i tshogs rnams gos gsar pas g.yogs la/ phyade nyid yang snga ma bzhin du lha rnams so so'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par bsams te tshoga'i
pha ram pa de nyid nam zhabar gyur kyi bar du bya'o// gang zhig tshe ga 'ad yas su// chog shes pa'i sngags sgrub pas// le le med par zhu byas n// zhab myur du thob par 'gyur// zla
ba phyed kyi khams ras chug/ nges pa nyid du zhu bar 'gyur// rgyal po la na zhig btsuganyis// yulo phyogs sun zhag b.rus so// de la zha ba'i cho ga'i las byed pas tshig 'di
ltar spyad par bya'o// gos dkar bges shang gtsang la zhi// byang chub sems la rab tu gzhol// ku sha btung ba'astan la nyal// de las byas pa'i gsang byed sgrogs// nas
chan btses pa'ang 'o ma 'thung// yad kyis sbyin sreg byed la 'jug/ dus gsum sbyin sreg bzlos brjod kyis/ zhi ba'i cho ga spyad par bya'o// zhal bsal rdo rje mchog sbyin
gyis// bsang gtor ma g.yo mgon gyis bya'o// rnam par snang mdzad chenapo mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs las/ zhi ba'i sbyin sreg gi
chog ram par phye ba'i// skal ba chen po de nas gzhan// shani tu rgyas byed spyanasrog kyang// ma yengs yid kyis mnyan par gyis// sngon gyi sngags la mkhas pa
yis// sems can rnams la brtse ba'i phyir// phan par 'dod pas bshad par bya// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// rgyas pa'i cho ga spyad par bya// grong ngam yang na ljongs
dag gi/ shar gyi phyogs su gnas bcas nas// snga ma bzhin du nges pa ya// sa gzhi legs par brtag par bya// ra ya rtsi'am phyugs lhas sam// mchod rten rang bsrel
na dag tu// rgyas pa'i lasan sgrubakhyed pa'i// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bro// na khas pas las kyi chog yas// sa ni logs par brkos nas su// dbus su rin
chen gzhag pan// snyan dang 'bre rnams bcas pa 'o// der yang sa nasor po yis// sa gzhi legs par dgang bar bya// mnyam zhing legs par bcags nas su// de
ya 'og tu dkyil 'khor bri// 'dir yang sngags pa mkhas pas rdo rjemchog sbyin rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas par de'agasang sngags dang phyag rgyas bdag byin gyis brlabs la//
'phags pa ma g.yo bas mtshams gcad pa dang yongs su gzung ba bya'o// zla ba yar ngo'i tshes gsum mam/ lnga 'am/ bdunanam/ yang n zla ba nya la'ang rung ste/ gza'
skar bzang po gza' lag gam phur bu 'am/ rgyu skar go bzhin dang/ mon gru dang/ snon dang/ snar ma la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlabs te/
srad bu ser po blangs la tshad sngar bstan pa bzhin du dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// de nas dkyil 'khor bsar te nang du zhugs la/ bcom ldan 'das ma
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklags la phyag byas te/ yang rnam par snang mdzad du bdag thun gyis brlabs te/ tshon rtsi ser po blangs la der na yi ge gzhag pa// de tshe thub/
pa gser thub na// gsar gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas// ting 'dzin gnas shang sngag bcom pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rta babs can du bris la nub phyogs kya sgo rtag/
chu dbye'o// phyi rol du ra mo gru bzhi pa gsum gyis bskor la dkyil 'khor du lha rnams dged pa snga ma bzhin du bya'o// de la khyad par na'ang yod do// 'phags pa nam mkha'i
sring po'i gnas su kun tu bzang po rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyu ya gi sa dang bcas par gzhag go/ sa4 mdzod snga'i gnas sun 'phags pa dzam+b+ha la shange thogabAdza pU ra'i phyag
rgya dang/ yi ge dza bdud rtsa'i mtshan nyid can dang bcas par gzhag go/ dza 'phags ma 'a gnyer can gyi gnas su grags ldan ma ma tog pri yang ku'i phyag rgya yi ge ya
dang bcas par gzhag go/ ya 'phags ma gos dkar mo can gyi gnas su na dpal chen mo 'phags ma dkar mo zhes bya ba pad+ma'i phyag rgya dang ya gi' 'brar gzhag go/ 1
'phags pa gnod mdzes kyi gnas su ni dpung bzang rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang yi ge 'brur gzhag go/ hU~M: bdud rtsa thab sbyor gyi gnas sun rdo rje'i snga ste/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang yi ge
'brur gzhag go/ sa: gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gnas su na brgya byin dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dgod do// de nas phyi rol gyi ri mo gnyis kyi nang logs kho ra khor yug dang gra
thams cad du rdo rje bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas logs 'khor sa'i nang du ma'i thab khung bya ba na/ gru bzhi lham pa kha ran can// skyoran khru de'i tshad du bya// rdo rje'i
mtshan ma rnams kyis bskor// zabs su khru gang tsam gyi tshad// kha ron mtho gang tshad du bya// 'dzam pa sarapo'i skyang nul bsku// pad+ma'i phyag rgya mdzub gang ba// 'phang
du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya// dus gsumadu ba glang ga lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bsku'o// de nas snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i lha la sogs pa rnam pa dang mtshan ma ji lta ba
bzhin du bsams te/ byug spos dang me tog la sogs pas mchod pa bya'o// de la khyad par n 'di yod do// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gnas su bzhugs
su gsol ba dang/ byug spos dang/ ma rtog la sogs pas mchod pa de'i tshe bdag rdo rje mtshod sman du byanigyis brlabs te bya'o// 'dir byugaspros dang ma tog la sogs pa'i
khyad par bshad par bya ste/ gur ma ga pur bsres pa na// rgyas pa dag la byug sngos mchog/ dri zhim kha dog ser po yang// de ma rnyed na sbyar
bar bya// me rtog tsam pa rab tu bzang// yu tha sna ma ser po dang// de las gzhan pa'ang dri zhim pa// ser po dganadabul bar bya// gur kum a ka ru dang sbyar//
kha ra dang sbyar ba dag/ rgyas pa'i las rnams 'grub pa'i phyir// bdug spos mkhas pas dbul bar bya// gu guladang natsanadan yang// mar dang sbyar la bdug spos mchog/
[% ]gAn d+ha ras gur kum bsres// bdug spos sngags la mkhas pas dbul// mar me'i snod na gser gyi bzang// yang na kham pa sor po'ang rung// mkhas pas rasan
sar po ya// ma mar sang po sor po dbul// sos kyi 'brumar bzang po yis// de yi snum na dri zhimabya// yang na dul gyi 'bru mar gyis// mar me gtsang ma dbul
bar bya// 'bras chan sar po sran tshod tsam// mar dang bcas pa shin tu bzang// tshod ma rnams kyang ser por bya// shing thog bag chos de nga zhin no// spos chu me tog
ser po dang// de bzhin 'bras dang dur ba'i rtswa// snod kyang sar por blugs pa dag/ rgyas pa na mchod yon shes// de ltar mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ de nas
rdo rje mchog spyan du bdag byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol du byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no// de nas nye reg byas te nang du zhugs la sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas te/ me'i thab
khung gi drung du bsag par bya ba la sogs pa sngags kyis bsangs pa rnams snga ma bzhin du bzhagal/ sa la rtswa ku sha btang pa'i steng du pad+ma'i skyalamo krung bcas te 'dug la/ bdag
nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i skur bsams te/ byugasmos sor pos zhugs thub bskus te/ me tog ser po'i sol ma'ang bkram la rtswa ku sha btang ste rgyal ragasakyi
khyim mam rgyalapa'i pho brang nas ma blangs la// bsang gtor bya ste/ shang pag sha dang u dum ba ras me sgyur la/ de nas ma'i zab tung ga zhabs su dbung chen gyi
dkyil 'khor bsams te/ de'ang ya ge ya klad kor dang bcas par pad+ma la gnas pa bsam mo// yaM ya gi ra las thab khung gnang nas me byung bar bsam pa ni gsar gyi
kha dog lta bu'i thor tshugs can/ mag gsum pa/ gdong bzha de/ lag na bgrang 'phrang dang thun d+ha thogs shing mchog spyan pa/ gos ser po bgos pa/ srad pa
ser po se ral khar thogs pa/ sor ris gsum gyis byugs pa/ sum mdo'i ris mtshan can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ me lce 'bar ba kun tu
sa @#// 'phro ba/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa// gsang sngags kyi rgyal pa 'a 'od zer las byung ba de lta bu'i mibasams te/ de nas bsang gtor bya ba/
ba dang/ kha bkru ba dang/ mchod yon dbul ba byas la/ byug spos dang me tog la sogs pa rang gasngags kyis sbyin no// na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ag ye swA hA/
de nas 'o thug sbrang rtsa dang mar la sogs par sbyar ba 'am// til nag po mar dang sbyar ba'i sreg blugs gsum byin te/ dre nas shang bal ba'i dgang gzar dang blugs gzar rgyas
mar gyi dgang blugs bdun sbyin no// de nas shing blagasha 'am/ u dum ba ra'i dbusakya cha las byung ba' yam shangesrog shang sdoms su chang pa gang la/ srid du khru gang ba mar
la bstugs pa'i sbyin srog gsum byani la/ yang dgung blugs gsum sbyin no// de nas snga ma bzhin du lha'i gzugs rnams bsams te/ snying po de dang des srog blugs gsum
dbul lo// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad bsams te/ byang chub kyi samasangasgoms la bdag galha'agazugs su bsams te/ snga ma bzhin du sreg blugs gsum phul nas/
bdag gi dngos gru sgrub pa las bshad pa'i rdzas las smyane sreg bya'o// thog mar lo zhes brjod la/ mjug tu grags pa dang/ dpal dang/ longs spyod dang/ dgo ba dang/
nor las cha zhes bya ba sbyar ro// yang na bdag gas ji ltar bsams pa'i dngos grub kyi rdzas la sAng+gA zhes bya zhing srog blugs dbul lo// de ltar ji lta ba bzhun du spyan sag byas nas
byang chub kyi sems la sogs pa'i rim pa de nyid snga ma bzhin du bya'o// 'dir yang sgrub pa pos cho ga spyad pa ni/ gos nasar po bgo bar bya// gtsang byedasar po gtsang ma thogs//
sems na brtan zhing mkhru yang che// shin tu ma sbaser sna med// byang chub sems la rtag tu dga'// dus gsum cho ga thog mar byed// nas chan btsos pa'am 'o ma btung//
rgyas pa'i las na dertsam par bya// gang gis de ltar rgyas pa ya// las na legs par brtsams pa na// de yis yid la gang bsams pa'i// rgyas pa myur du 'grub par 'gyur/
ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje dang// ljong des mag bsku ga'u wang dang// yid bzhin nor bu bum pa gos// nor gyi char 'bab lham dag dang// gdugs dang shing rta bzhon pa dang//
de bzhani khang pa brtsegs pa dang// pad+ma bum pa mdung rtse gsum// bgrang 'phreng be con gun d+hu dang// pa wang mdung thung mda' yang rung// lhung bzed dang na gseg shang dang//
yang na rdzas na gang 'dod pa// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni bsgrub par bya// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa las/
buts+tsha/ @#// rgyas pa'i las kyi sbyin sreg ga che ga ram par phye ba'o////de nas gzhan yang spyin sreg 'di// dbang ga las na bsgrub pa// 'jig rten sgron ma
mdzad pa yas// brtse bar gyur pa'i thugs kyis gsungs// de nas ma lus bshad par byas// 'byor par 'dod pas nga la nyon// thog maras gzhi brtag pa ni// grong
ngam yang na ljongs dag gi/ me ya phyogs su gnas bcas te// 'gro ba med pa'i khang stong ngam// shang gcig drung ngam dur khrod dam// yang na bde byed gnas su 'am// ma mo'i
sku gnas sam phyugs kyang rung// sngags pas dkyil 'khor bra ban// mar gyi ngo yi tshes dgu la// dbang gi las na brtsam par bya// gza' nyi ma 'am mag dmar la// rgyu
skar rgyal dang smin drug dang// mchu dang sa ga dag la ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de la dang por sngags pas bdag phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la/ sa'i kha
dog dmar po las sbyang ba dang yongs su gzung ba la sogs pa byas te/ de nas bdag rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlabs la/ 'phags pa ma g.yo bas bzlas pa'aphrad
bu le brgan du btsos pa blangs te/ dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab pa na gru gsum pa la sgo shar phyogs su btod pa/ sgo khyud dang/ rta babs dang/ mu ran gyi cha legs par phyo
sa de nas tshon rtsi byung ba na// dmar po shan tu bzang po la// ya ge 'bar ba gzhag pa na// ra ya yo ga klung dang bcas// nyi ma'achar ba 'dra ba ste// shin tu gdul
dka' rgyal ba'i mchog/ de ltar tshon rtsa byin brlabs la// sangs rgyas thams cad dran byas te// dkya'i 'khor kun tu bri ban// khru gang yang na khru lnga 'am// gsang sngags
dngos grub rjes mthun pa// rnam pa gsum du dbye bar bya// lha rnams dgong pa snga ma bzhani// mkhas pas rags kyi bdag pos byas// lhag ma rnams na ci rigs par//
mkhas pa yas na dgod par bya// de la nam mkha'i sing po'i gnas su sku can dang zhe sa can gnyis ba rtson dang zhags pa'i phyag rgyar gzhag go/ gnod mdzes kyi gnas su ni rdo rje lcags kyu
mde' phyag rgyar gzhug go/ spyi bo skyes kyang mda' phyag rgyur gzhag go/ phyi rol tun phyag brnyan ma bzhi zhags pa'i phyag rgyur bra'i// de nas snga ma bzhin du chog thams cad bya'o// byug
spos dang me tog la sogs pa'ang dmar po dbul lo// ma' thab khung yang snga ma'i gnas su bya ste// srid du sor nyi shu'i tshad la/ kha ranasor gnyis pa kha phar blta bar bya'o//
zabs su mtho chung ngu gang la dbus su rdo rje sor brgyad pas dmar pos bskus pa bya'o// mo'i thob khung de na gru gsum la zur gsum du bya'o// de nas bdag phyugan rdo rjer byin gyis
[ï¼ ]@#// brlabs la phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin no// de nas btso blag mkhan gyi khyim nas ma blangs la snga ma bzhin du bsang gtor bya sta/ sang ldang shinge ngas/ a/
pha she ka 'am// shang ka ra wA ra'i mi bus la/ de bzhan du bdag rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te/ me'i spab khung ga zhabs su me'i dekyal 'khor bsams la yi ge ra
skyo gzhag go/ ya la ra de'ang 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'phro ba las mo'i gzugs su gyur par bsams pa na nyami 'char ba 'dra bo/ gdul dka' tha/ mge gsum pa/ thor tshugs can/
sgyur dbu skra kham pa/ lag pa bzhapa/ lag na be con dang/ zhags pa dang/ bgrang 'phreng dang/ gun d+ha thogs pa/ gos dmar po gyon zhange srad bu dmar po sa ral khar sgrogs
pa/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ me lce 'bar ba dmar po' 'od 'phro ba de lta bu'i mi bsams te/ bsang gtor byas la mchod yon phul te/ rang ga gsang sngags kyis byug sngos dang/
ma tog la sogs pa byin la/ de nas shing ka ra wA ra' yam srog shing yungs mar dang tsan dan dmar po la bstugs pa'i sbyin sreg bdun byin no// de nas dkyil 'khor du bkod pa'i lha
rnams la srog blugs bdun phul te snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lha'i gzugs bsams lagazhag ste/ de bzhin du srog blugs phul la cho ga las byung ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin sreg bya'o//
mjug tu'ang byang chub kyi sams la sogs pa'i cho gde bzhin du bya'o// cho ga 'di la'ang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad thams cad kha dog dmar por bya'o// dma' gnas kyang dus gsum du
tsan dan dmar pos byugs tsang ma tog dmar po'i sal ma dgram mo// dpal ldan gis ni dmar po bgos// byug ses 'phreng ba dmar pos brgyan// srad bu dmar po 'i si ral
thogs// byang chub sems kyi bye brag shes// zas su sran chung rtse za// yang na zas su shing thog za// dga' zhing 'dzum tshul ma thub// sems dang sems ni rjes su
sbyor// rtag tu bzlas dang sbyin sreg byed// lha ya gzugs na sems pa yi// mi yis dbang du bya ba yaM// dngos grub ma lus brtsam par bya// gang zhig cho ga 'di yas su/
cho ga shes pas las brtsams na// gzi brjid can nam de yi bu// zla ba gcig gisangabang du 'gyur// sbyin srog zla ba gtus byas na// phyag brnyan pha mas gnod sbyinem// de
bzhin sa 'og bu mo dag/ sngags pas myur du khugs par 'gyur// 'di ni re zhig mdor bsdus te// dbang gi sbyin sreg bsags pa yani// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon
par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs las/ dbang du bya ba'i sbyin sreg rim par phye ba'o////da ni drag shul spyad pa yi// chog ma lus
[ï¼ ]@#/// bshad par bya// gnod sbyin lto 'phye yadegs gtum// lha min dra tha ma 'am ci// sems can rnams la gnod byed dang// de bzhin bgegs dang
log 'dren dang// 'byung po ma mo srin po dang// mkha' 'gro dang na lus srul dang// ma yang rgyags dregs mthu ldan zhung// drag po'i las byed snang ba'ang rung// de dag gdul
bya'i sngags shes pas// drag shul las ni brtsam par bya// zhes pa chung du dag la ni// drug pa'i chog ma brtsam mo// grong ga lho ya phyogs su na// brtul bas sa gzhanag
bo la// dur khrod dben pa'am dgon pa 'am// skyed mos tshal rnying zha gnas su// mar gyi ngo ya tshes brgyad dam// yang na tshesan ru bzhi la// gza' na sprinapa mag
dmar dang// rgyu skar rlung las byung ba dang// mo bzhu dang na neg pa dang// tha mar drang na de bzhin dbo// nab sa dang nas ra deng// rgyu skar de dag drag po ste// de dag gang
yang rung ba la// sngags pakhros pa gni rje'i ngazhan// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa dri ba na// dgra ya srog ni gcod byed pa'i// sngags pa bdag 'di rang girgyas// rdo rje
sems dpar byin brlabs te// sngags la 'jags pa med pa yas// sa gzhi snga ma bzhin du sbyang// de nas ma g.yo mthu chen gyis// yongs su gzung la sogs byas nas/
rang gi pe ge phyag rgya yas// de nas rnam snang mdzad du bya// bu mo gzhon nus bkal ba yi// srid bu sngon po der byungs nas/gsum phyi rol zlum por bya//dkyil 'khor nan tan thig gdab pa/
khru bzhi khri lta khru brgyad dan// de bzhin bcu gnyis bcu drug khru// ji ltar las kyi rjes mthun par//rgyu
nas dur khrod thalo ba 'am// mkhas pas tshonan nag po la// ya ge han der bzhag la//mkhas pas tshad na brtag par bya// ro/mo lce 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'phro/gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mngog

dus ma 'a me ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbyar/khan mche ba gtsigs pa la/ lag na rdo rje rtsod pan can// bdud kyi sngon thams cadlagan rda rdzatshad pan can// bdud kyi sdan thams cad dang/ ba ra dbad pa/snang ba thams cad bsags bong pa/
gan lnga//tshon las/sna nga ba thams cad bsngags byed pa/yacha na legs par phye// lnga pa gtso bo gzhag pan/ya cha na legs par phye// yashes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri ba dmang
ma ba 'gamasan//snga ma bzhin du brtag par bya// byang phyogs sgo na phyi nas su// lhag ma'i sgo rnams gcad par bya// de la 'phags pa nam mkha'i
sIng po'i gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po gshan rje'i gshed gsalashing ga phyag rgyar bri'o// mdzod snga'i gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa gzhan gyis ma thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rjedang dgra sa' phyag
rgya bri/ mthu chen thob dang 'phags mkhro gnyer can/ 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gnas rnams su don yod zhags pa dang/ ral la gcig ma dang/ rta mgrin/
rnams zhugs pa dang/ daN+Das dang/ rdo rje de con gyi phyag rgya rnams garams bzhin du gzhag par bya'o// gnod mdzes kyi gnas su khro zla gtso bo rdo rje'i phyag rgya gzhag go/ 'phags
ba mi g.yo ba'ang ba con gyi phyag rgyur gzhag go/ sgo drung du na gdul dka' ba dang mngon du phyogs pa gnyisi pe con gyi phyag rgyar gzhag go/ gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyi gnas su gshen
rje' 'tshabadag dang/ dus mtshan ma dang lhan cig tu gzhag go/ bden bral du'ang ral gri'i phyag rgyu gzhag go/ 'khorasa'i dbus su ma'i thab khung sgo la phyogs par bya'o// dkyil
'khor gyi phyi rol khor khor yug tu bdan rnams bra'o// ma'i thab khung ni dbang gi las kyi ma'i thab khung bzhin du bya ste/ bye brag tu na phyi rol gyi mu ran zlum por byas la ba dan mang pos
mtshan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du so so'i gzugs bsams te mchod pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du mchod nas/ de nas bdag
phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la phyi rol du phyogs kyi gtor masnga ma bzhin du sbyin no// de la phyug spos la sogs pa'i khyad par ni tsan dan dmar po dang/ duru ka dang/ sol ba bsres
pa'i byug sos nag por dbul lo// ma tog ut+pa la mthang kha dang/ a pa rA dze tu mthang kha 'am/ gzhan yang ma rtog sngonapo rnams dbul lo// bdug spos na sra rtsi pog
bu ram dang sbyar ba dbul lo// mar ma ni yungs kar tsha ba sang po ston pa can mar me'i snod nag po'i nang du dbul la// phashes na kra sa ra dang/ gzhan pa dang tsha ba dang/ kha ba la
sogs pa'i bza' ba dang/ tshod ma kha dog nag po rnams dbul la// sran chan dang/ skra sa ra dang/ sha dang/ 2sha btsos pa dang/ rdzun pa rnams phyogs kyi gtor mar
sbyin no// gtor ma'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas gdol pa'i khyim mam dur khrod nas me blangs te/ khro bo'i rgyal pos bsang gtor byas la dur khrod kyi shang ngam/ shing ba la
da ka 'am/ ba ru ra' shang gas mi bus la rnam par snang mdzad chen por bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ ma'i thab khung gzhabs su rlung ga dkyil 'khor bsams la der ma gahU~Mgazhag
go yi ge hU~M de las me'i gzugs su gyur par bsam pa na kha dog nag po/ shin tum bzad pa/ mag gsumapa/ gdong bzhi pa/ ma g.yo ba dud kha'o// bltadaka' ba kham
pa thor tshugs dud kha can/ char sprin sngon po lta bu'i mdangs can/ gsus po che gos sngon po gyon pa/ srad bu sngon po 'asi ral khar thogs pa// kha nas mche ba bzhi gtsigs
@#/ pa 4khro ba dang bcas shing kha gdangs pa// lag na ral gdang/ zhags pa dang/ ba rten dang/ gun d+ha thogs pa/ sang kha nas sum mdo'i sa
mtshan can/ ya giras mtshan pa/ gdong khro gnyar bser pha/ tsho+udang bcas pa 'khor ba gnag cing rtsub pa dang zas lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba'i 'phrang bcan/ 'jigs pa'adus
sbyo/ mngon du byung ba bzhin du 'dug pa/ de lta bu'i me bsams nas bsang gtor byas te/ phyug spos la sogs pa rang gi rig sngags kyis dbul lo// o an ye dzAha h+pha rlahUM
ra phaT/ de nas yungs mar tshab dang sbyar ba'i kras ra'i srog shugs gsum byin la/ dog dang/ khrag dang/ sku tshe'i sreg blugs 'dun sbyin no/ yang nashang ba la
ta ka dang ba ru ra' shang gi yam sragashing rtsom rnon por gzhogs pa yusayar tsha ba dang sku tshos byugs pa spyanano// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la sogs pa'i lha rnams
snga ma bzhin du bsams te/ rdzas de dag nyid las rang gi rig pas srog blugs dbul lo// denas rang gi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du bsams de bzhag la/ rang rig
pa las byung ba'i rdzas ji lta ba bzhin du mdzub mo dang mthe bas bzung// khro bo dang bcas par gsang sngags zlas shing phaT dang bcas par ji srid 'dod pa de srid du srog
sa[j]blugs dbul lo// de nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub kyi sems sgom pa la sogs pas ngal bso bar bya'o// sngags pa gang zhig 'di lta bu'i/ rab tu drag pa'i las byed
ba de na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi// gnas kyang snumchog bzhin du srog/ 'dir yang chog 'di ltar bya'o// dpal ldan gos na sngon po bgos byug spos 'phrang ba sngon
pos brgyan// srad bu sngon po'as ral thogs// byang chub sems larab tu gzhol// tshadang khadang bska ba dang// kri sar ya kha zas lta// lha rnams dgod pa'i don la
mkhas// gtsang zhing mchog tu tshul khrims ldan// sngo ba chazhing dpa' seng can// khros pa 'jig rten mthar byed bzhin// lho phyogs kha ba ltos mi sna zhing// 'jug pa'i
thabs natsog pur 'dug/ ni srog bzlos la rtag tu 'bad// bsrung dang bskyab pa dag la mkhas// mtshan mo sbyin sreg byed pa yis// drag shul spyad pa brtsam par bya:/
rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs las/ drag shul spyad pa'i sbyin srog gachog ram par phye ba'o//
de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams la stong ba nyidi gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'agong bo rnam
bya/ par ma rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob pa'i rgyu sros pa thams cad dang bral ba gsal zhing dag pa/ yid kyis bsgrubs pa/ yongs su rdzogs par byed ba/
sa kyadabyangs kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sang rje chenapo spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
kyi ting nge 'dzan la snyoms par zhugs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjel sbas pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ya shes kyi spyod yul stong pa nyid kyi
rjesasu zhugs pa// gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba/ gnas med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ ngo bo 'di med pa/ mtshan gyi gzhi dang/ mtshan
'di las 'dus pa/ theg pa chen po thob par byed pa/ bdud rtsi sbyin pa de sngags kyi tshul la rnam par gnas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa rnams kyisaji ltar thob par 'gyur/ de skad
tshig ces smras pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjed bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba ston pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhal du bltos nas bcom
ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasasams can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la lta bsong rjen po byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug de bdag la
'dra zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba la phan par byed pa// theg pa chen po thob par byed pa// mtshan nyid med cing gnyis sumed pa'i spyod yul/ gsang sngags thams
cad kyi tshul gyi dngos grub stsol ba// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po' ngo bo nyidi/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su zhugs pa// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung bar
byed pa/ stong pa nyade kyi ngo bo de kya spyod yul gyi chos bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang 3 bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mdzad pa// rnam par rtog pa thams cad kyargya mtsho lasasgrolas/
sams can thams cad la dgongs pa// gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub stsol ba/ bgegs thams cad skrag par mdzad pa// 'byung po thams cad 'gugs pa// byang
rgudasems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ gzugs med pa/ sa med pa// dra med pa/ ro med pa// gnas med pa/ yade med pa// rnam par shes pa
med pa/ yi ge med pa/ spyod yul med pa/ brjod du med pa// spros pa med pa/ ma 'dres pas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos
gang rgyu las byung ba rnams // de'i rgyu'ang de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// de rnams kyin 'gog pa'ang gsungs// de skud gsungs pa dge sbyong mchog/
gzhan dbang yod pa ma yin zhing// yongs su grub pa'ang gzhan yin no// gnyis po'ang yod pa ma yin te// rnam shes brgyad po de nyid mtshan// de nas 'khor mang po 'dusapa de rnams
so so' ya shes mngon par 'dus byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus bsam pa tha dad pa dang/ blo gros tha dad pas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa'i don ji ltar rjes su mthunapar khong du chud
nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la legs so legs so zhes gsol nas legs par phul lo// gsang sngags tshul la legs gnas pa// rdzogs
sangs rgyas kyis bsags pa yi// yang dag 1de nasgom byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas 'di du 'gyur// denas de'atsho byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras
'bu gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// rnam par rtog pa las 'das pa'i// ma
'dras sems ni 'di kyis kyang// bzlas pas dngos grub thob 'gyur na// chos kyis 'dus byas ci zhagi smos// rta dang 'dra ba'i soms de na// mnyam par bzhag pas brtul nas[/]
tha su byams dang sang rje bstan byas n// dngos grub brtan pa 'phral du 'thob// nam zhige chosa rnams ma skyes pa// de yi sa bon a ya mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyis
gsungs// o ni stongapa nyid ces bya// yi ge'i phyi mo phyi mo kun// da bzhani 'dren pa gnyis dang ldan// mi 'gyur ya 'i dang yang ldan// de bas bsam par bya ba yani/ a dang/
u zhes pa dang na// ra deng r-idang aM du ldan// a dang ldan pa snang ba'i mchog/ 'di las thar pa 'thob ces gsungs// ka ya ris dang tshu ya ras// Na ya ris kyang de bzhin gzhan//
da ya ris dang pa ya si// ma dang ldan pa lnga pa 'o// ya ra la wa sha la sogs// thams cad rgyal mchog yongs su rdzogs// de dag rgya chen don gyi mchog/ rnam pa mang po'adzin
rnams byed// a na byang chub thob par byed// nani de bzhin dgug par byed// u na gsod pa 'grub par byed// ri ni dbang ga las byed pa'o// o na srin po gsod par byed//
ba ni'achi ba yin par 'dod// on klu ya songe po yin// kun kyang gzhan na ldan na mchog/ yi ge mgru can thams cad na// ra dang klad kor bcas gyur rung// chos kyi dbyangs
dang rtag ldan par// bsam gtan bzlas byas dngos grub 'thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanaras
gzigs dbang phyug la sems dpa' chen po legs so legs so// sa bcu rtogs par khong du chud// bde gshegs yang dag ma zad pa// de de khrums cad
khyod kyis bshad/[â ]/lag na rdo rjes smras pa ya// rab tu gsang ba khyod kyis rtogs// zhes legs so zhes bya ba byani no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag
smyo bo phyagan rdo rjes 'ad skad ces gsol to// dpa' bo chos dbyangs rang bzhin ni// 'khor los sgyur brgyal ba mchog/ 'jig rten dpa' bo'i phyag rgya dang// ma skye ba ya ya ga yas/
de bzhin bdag nyidi bsams nas su// byang chub sems kyis shani tu bsdams// stong pa gnyisasu med sbyor bas// las rnams thams cad bsgrub par bya// chos dbyangs rnam
par dag pa'i bdag/ sa bon yi ge dang ldan par// dad cing bkyus brjod mnyam bzhag pas// bsams na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// khrus dang bshags la sogs pa dang//
rab tu dben la sogs pa dang// phyagargya bgrang 'phrang sems dpa' yi// zlos pa'i dngos grub brtan pa 'thob// chos kyi dbyangs dang ldan 'gyur bar// sngags 'di rnams kyis
bsgrubs nan// 'gro dang ma 'gro'i khams gsum na// 'grub par ma 'gyur dngos re mad// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rang gdakyil 'khor la gnas pa'i bzlas brjod byas la/ dbang
bskur ba'acho ga 'dal 'khor los sgyur ba gzhag par bshad do// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyis brlabs las/ sgom pa'i
ya ge dgod pa dbang bskur ba ram par phye ba'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyangs bsam
gyis ma khyab pa sems kyis las 'das pa nyid kyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa de byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thabs sna tshogs kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad lags kyas/
yang ba shad du gsol/ de la thog mar cho ga 'dis sngage pa so sor bshags par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dus 'di nas bzung ste/ nam byang
chub kyi sing po la mchis kyi bar du bdag la dgongs sugasol/ bdag mang 'dazhis bgyi bas skye ba thog ma ma mchis pa nas 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshabadag gis sdig pa mi dge ba'alas
bgyis pa dang/ bgyid du sul ba dang/ bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang bde dag thams cad sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyispyan sngar so sor bshags so// de ltar
lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba gzung bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
ta nyAsi rgya bzhi bcu tham pa//thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag mang 'dazhes bgyi bdus 'di nas bzung// nam byang chub kyi seng po la mchis kyi bar dusangs rgyas bcom
ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku zhu ba bla na med pas sor rang gis rig pa la skyabs su mchi'o// phyogs bzhi'i byung chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags
ba phyir mi ldog pa'i dege 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o// de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o// drenas bdag gi lus dbul ban sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdagamange 'ad zhis bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste byang chub kyi sang bo la mchis kyi bar du sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'athams cad la bdag 'di dus
thoms cad du yong ye 'bul gyis/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag bzhes su gsol/ de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan
gsum du bya'o// de nas dam tshig ga phyagargyu bcings la gsang sngags brjod par bya'o// na maH saman bud+d+hanaM/ a sa ma dris ma ye sa hA/ de nas chos kyi debyings su byin gyis
brlab bo// nam: sa mnabut+tAnaM/ d+haman+tAnan/ d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+makolAnaM/ de nas rdo rje sems dpar byan gyis brlab bo// na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ badzraAt+mako'agaM/
00 re nas byang chub kyi semasabaskyed par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/
nam byang chub kya mAng po la mchis kyi bar du dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ phung po dang/ khams dad/ skye mched dang/ gzung ba dang 'dzizhi pa rnam par sangasar/ chos
bdag med pa mnyam pa'i phyir rang gsams brog ma nas masmyos pa/ stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasa rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de
rnams kyis byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang sems bskyed do// de ltar lan gnyis de ltar lan gsum du bya'o// de nas gang ba'i phyag rgya sbya'or bcanges la de bzhani
gshegasapa'i 'khor thams cad du spos dang me tog la sogasapa'aAnabasams te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dalan gsum brjod par bya'o// nam sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a b+hasar

ya sa ra Nahi mI ga ga khaM/ d+harma d+hA tuA kA sha sa ma rku ya/ sarba ta b+hA ga ta par sho d+han maN+Da le ma ma pra Ni d+hi pu N+ya dzA na ba le na/ sarba ta ShA ga du ad+hAShA na ba len d+hamad+hA tu a d+hiShAn ba
len tsas nA/ ga' ba'i phyagany+tsanas bor pad+ma kha bye ba 'dra bar bya ba ga yon pa// de ni gang ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid yin no// bzlas brjod bya chog ram par bya ba'o//
nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyangs bsam gyis ma khyab pa rnam par rol pa bstan nas/ yang yul bsam gyis ma khyab par
bstan par bzhed pas// dbu'i gtsuganas chos kyi mdzod ces bya bsams can gyi khams mazla' yas pa' sams rlabs po snang bar byed pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba byung ngo// de nas
'od zer chen po'i dra ba bkod pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs rgya chen po rnam par rol pas nam mkha' dbyings rgya chen po chos kyi dbyangs kyi pho brang na bzhugs pa'i
sgyu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bskor ba byas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du snang bar byas te/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa
yongs su bskyab pa la sbyar nas sems can dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro dang/ ya degs kyi 'gro bar skyes pa rnams kyang tshim par byas te/ lha dang mi'i gnas rnams kyang de
a bzhin gshegs pa'i sang po sdug po bkod pa'i khongs su gtogs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ chos kyi dbyangs bsam gyis ma khyab pa'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams
kyi stobs bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa rgyu mthun pas byin gyis brlabs so// chos kyi dbyangs kyi dgos ba ma rdzogs pas snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i mdzod//
ces bya ba somasacan gyi khams ma nges pa yongs su skyob pa'aAng po dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po 'a teng nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas kyang phyag na
rdo rje la sogs pa'i rdo rje 'dzanasangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra ba dang mnyam pa sed la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi budag soms can gyi khams ma nges pa yongs su skyob pa'i sang
po'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa skams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'kher rgyas pa gang la brten nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung dus de bzhin gshegs pa'i
sa thob par gyur rung/ chos kyidabyang sabasam gyis ma khyab pa'ang mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ba yod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje
'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa de dag gsamagrin gcig tu tshigasas pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la shugs brtse ba'i slad du
dkyil 'khor chenapo bkod pa'i byin gyisabarlabs bshad pa de'i dus la bab cing/ bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab ste legs so// bcom ldan 'dasachos kyi rje/ chos kyi
dbang phyug/ chos kyi bdag po mthar 'byed pa dang bral ba/ ye shes chen po la mnga' ba/ ston pas bcu'i dbang phyug gcig pu/ don grub pa/ tshig grub pa/ srid pa'i/
many+dza' las rgal ba dang de khon da mkhyen pa// snyan pa'i rgyal po chen po/ 'gag pa med pa// chad pa mad pa/ mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa//
bzhinanyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' skos pa med pa/ rtogs par khong du chud pa/ sbyong ba gnas gsum du gyur pa// glang du gyur pa// mya ngan las 'das pa/ zhi bar gyur pa/
grol ba thar pa/ ramisand med pa/ dag pa// rdul dang bral ba/ rtog pa dang bral ba dang/ sab dang kun tu sa ba mad pa/ dngos po thams cad rnam par 'dzinapar mdzad pa
bshad du gsol// 'di ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag thams cad rtag tu yid la rab tu dga' bar gyur pas/ mtshan legs par bsgrags pa byas nas rnam par 'dren pa la gsol ba btab
bo/ de dag gis gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas dpa' bo chen po thams cad mkhyen pa/ rims nad dang bral bas/nga rjechen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor yang bshad par bya'o
zhes bka' stsal to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdagapo phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshalanaMs/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ru lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// lagan rdo rje dkyil 'khor
'di'i ming nasangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyagamardo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
do bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams nam mkha'i dbyings khyab par gnas so zhes ma gsungs sam/ nam mkha'
la na skyo ba'angam mas/ 'gag pa'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhags pa rnams la 'ang skye ba'angam mas/'gag pa 'ang ma mas na/ bcom ldan 'das de
ci'i slad du 'di ni sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rtanagyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba'o zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang
gatshol pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe 'dzagi rten gyi khams de dag tu/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgonas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
spyod pa rnams dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che'o// gang nasoms can 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/
g.yo dang/ skya dang/ the tshom gyi bsam pa can/ mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par brgyad pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag na/ bcom ldan 'das shAn tu dka' ba brgyad par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rje rags kyi bu de dag
nasangs rgyas gcig la bsun bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ rigs kyi bu dedag gas nasangs rgyus mang bo la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya'o// chos snang ba'i sgo' tshul gsum las
kyang 'byung ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sung rje'i tshul bya sgo snang ba'i tshul dang/ chos zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo'i snang ba'i tshul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod
pa dang bkur sa byed pa'i tshul gyi sgo 'ad gsum dang ldan par rig par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyang sakyi
[=/ ]pho brang chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lagazags nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rdzoslob dpon gyi mtshan nyid nyon cig/
de la re zhage slob dpon byang chub tu sems bskyed pa// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la sbyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas bsdams pa/ sAng rjecan/ dad pa che ba/
chos zab mo la gnas pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/ skya rtsal rnams la mkhas shang nus pa/ gtsang zhing bag yod pa// gsang sngags spyad pa dang/
phyag rgya dang/ dkyil 'khor gyi las rnams bslabs pa/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las byo ba la blam las lung thob pa sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// gang zhig yade gas med/
gyurang// sems can khams na ma lus pa// yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir brtson pa// mkhas pa des na sangs rgyas kyi// dkyil 'khor dag ni bro bar rigs// mtshan rnams
thams cad yongasardzogs brtan// shes rab rno la dpa' sang can// bdag gam slob ma rnams kyi'ang rung// bgegasan zhi bar byed par nus// yang dag bden pa'i don rtogs
la gang gas mos pa rgya che zhing// bzod daja ldan la nga rgyal med// rlabs po cheya las byed rung// de na rlabs po che la dad// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang/ sangs
rgyas rnams kyis smon lam dag/ thos nas phyi phyir dga' ba dang// rtag tu mgu bar 'gyur ba dang// gsang sngags spyod la brtson pa dang// bzlas brjod byed la gang 'bad dang//
gcam sgyuthams cad ma sams la// 'jig rten chos la mi lta zhing// sngags la gzhol ba'i sngags pa ni// yon tan de la sogs ldan na// slob dpon ston pas bkur ba yin//
yang na chos rnams thams cad na// rnam par dben la gang gnas pa// der yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston par 'os// yang na
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sngags pa'i dam tshig gsum shes pas// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// de la gnas pa'i sngags pa na/yon tan kun dang ma ldan yang// de
tsho la dkyil 'khor 'dra bar 'os// de ltar yon tan kun ldan na// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor dang// 'jig rten 'das pa thams cad kyang// las kyi chog mthong bas byas//
de la slob dpon la gzhan gyis bskul na slob ma don du gnyer ba shes shing de la dad par shes na/ de ltar shes nas slob dpon des// sa gzhi legs par brtag par bya// mtshodang kun
dga' skyed mos tshal// rdzing bu rnams kyis kun brgyan pa'am// 'bras bu ma tog dang ldan pa'i// ljon shang sdong bu de bzhin te// gel ba dam pa nyams dga' ba// 'bras bu
ma tog ldan pa dang// ngang mo khrung khrung ma dang// sar ne tso shar rnams // gang ga yul na yod pa ya// yul de nan tan bskyedade bsnyen// me tog 'bras bu ldan r deng/ gnas
shing mad 'ong chu yaganas// 'bab chu'i mun zhim pa dang// chu rlung g.yas nas 'khor bcan// der na sngags pa blo ldan gyis// dkyil 'khor longs spyod 'phel bar bri//
khul na shin tu snyam pa dang// gtsug lag khang dang khang pa dang// lha yi gnas dang phyugs lhas dang// shang gcig lam gyi bzhi mdor yang// zhi ba'i las la zhi ba yi//
dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bro// khang pa stong pa'amadur khrod dam// snum byed rtsub pa'i las can dang// ngan cangagasumal 'jigs pa can// de bzhin thibs po 'jig
'jags lta// de la sogs pa'iganasa rnams su// drag po'i las kyidakyil 'khor bra// drag por drag po' las rnams bya// zha bar zhi ba'i las bya 'o// rgyas par rgyas//
pa 'di yin te// tshe gang na rgyas pa la'o// yang na yidi na gang dag tu// nges par dga' ba skye 'gyur ba/ yul der dkyil 'khor bra ba ya// las na legs par bya bar 'os//
gang gsoms na rnam dag cing// the tshom lasogs rnam spangasapa// de la las rnams thams cad na// grub par 'gyur ba degs pa med// rnam par rtog pa spangs pa ya//
rnam par ma rtog byang chub yani// de yang rnam rtog spangs pa yis// thob par 'gyur gyis gzhan gyis min// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// blo ldan yodi gnyis spangs nas
su 'jig rten kun la phan 'dod pas// shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// yul med dus kyang yod ma yin// phyu ba med tsang byed pa'ang med// chos rnams dag ni thams
cad la// chos 'di 'ba' zhage yod ma yin// byas pa ma shes pas bslabs pa// rgyu dang rkyen gyis brgyal bas na// stong pa'i chos na ma rtogs pas//
rtag tu bdud kyi debang du gyur// de ltar ye shes dbang gyur pa// ston pa spros pa med rtogs pas// rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa ya// mnyam pa med pa'i chos bshad do// de nas
yang btsom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin lasoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das soms par zhugs
pa dang smanematshams nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan ces bya' 'od zer byung ngo// byung nas kyang kun tu snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di snang bar byas nas kyang gang
garnam pa dang yon tan gyi mtha' bsal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du'ang rtogs par ma nus pa lce'i sgo khyud kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sAne pa las gyur pa me
dog gi gzhi'i song po bkod pa'irgyun 'di thams cad lag maN+Dal bzhin du mnyam par gyur to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa ni gyis brlabs nas/
'od zer de dag gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyagan rdo rje'i spyi bor ma snang bar gyur te// 'od zer de dag mi snang bar gyur ma thag tu phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal
nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyisabarlabs bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang/
bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// lag na rdo rjedakyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das de
ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol nas/ phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la slar ma'an pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyisade la 'di skad ces bka' sul te// lag na rdo rje de la ji skad du bsgrags
pa'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'khor rgya tshad khru gang yan chad dpag tshad gcug man chad du bya'o// dpag tshad gcig pas lhag par namakhya'o// de la sa gzhi mnyam la 'jam// byug
spos dag gis legasapar bskus// yang na 'jam pa gtsang ma yas// srags pas nan tran bsku bar bya// de nas phur bu sor brgyad pa la las thams cad byed pa'i gsang
sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad du btabs grwa bzhir mnyam par btaban/ dkyil 'khor kun tu cis kyang ma tshugs par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// na maH sa man+tabadza tAhaM ko
lnga ya/ sa ma ma AH/ tsaN+Da li lho phaT/ de nas sta gon du gnas pa byas la/ phyi de nyin dgyil 'khor gyi yo byad rnams bsogs la las thams cad byed pa'i gsang sngags sam
'phags pa ma g.yo bas bsrung ba byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su gzhag go/ yang na bdag gis byin gyis brlabs la gzhagago/ de nas phyi da ni slob
ma dad pa che ba/ gtsang sbra chab/ chos la 'bad pa/ morags btsun pa/ mos pa rgya che ba gcigagam/ gnyis sam/ gsum mam ji sAd 'dod ba rnams gzung ngo//
las thams cad byed pa 'am/ 'phags pa ma g.yo ba 'am/ mi bzod pa'i gsang sngags kyis bu mos bkal ba'i skud pa 'am/ skud pa gzhan la btab pa dang/ yang na rtsa
shu la mdud pa gsum bor ba'ang rungaste/ de nas sngags kyis bsngags pa na// brgya 'am yang na lcag kyang rung/ slob ma rnams kyis las 'grubaphyur// dpung pa g.yon la bcing
bar bya// u dum ba ra'i so shang ni// ma rtog dra la sogs pas bsul// shin tu bzang pos bsrung ba rgyas// sor brgyud pa la rtse gcig gshi sa// dge ba'i yid du 'ong
ba dag/ denas mkhas pas sbyin par bya// shar ram byang du kha bltas te// so shang dgunaba' bar bya// de nas blo ldan ma ltos shing// dpyad pa med par dor bar bya//
gang du lhung bar gyur pa las// de bzhin der ni grub par 'gyur// shesa'ab pha rol phyin la sogs// mdo snga'i chos na mnyan du gzhug/ slob ma skyo bar bya ba'i phyir// chos/
kyi gtam na bzang po bya// gal te milam bzang po 'am// ngan pa draganamathong rgyuran// bdagagaskal ba brtag pa'i phyir// bla ma lanange dag bsad// mchod rten/
kun dga' gtsug lag khang// glegs bamadang na lha rnams dang// yid bzhin nor bu 'an chen gos/ yang gam rtog 'bras bu red// ral grwa 'khor lo pa wang dang// grub
pa'i rdzasanasna tshogasa rnams // gang gis rmi lam thob gyur na// de yas dngos grub yodi bzhin 'gyur// zhazla marang tshod dag gam// de bzhin rgya mtsho rgal ba dang// rlung
pa tshadang rta yang rung// de nadangos grub thob ma dka'// de la sogs pa'i rmilam ni// bzang pos dngos grub dmapa brtag/ rmalam ngan pa mi bzad pa// 'jigs pa mthong
na ma 'grub bo// bong bu rnga mo khyi dang bya// stag dang bya la wa rnams dang// man 'bru mar lus bsus dang// gcer bu rtsub la ma sdug pa// de la sogs pa'i rmongan rnams //
blo dang ldan pas spang bar bya// yang na dngos rnams rmilam dang// dri za'i grong khyer bzhani shes nas// blo dang ldan pas rmilam rnams // sung po med par bshad par bya//
de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgonas byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa//
rnams 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la dang po nas blo brtan par 'gyur ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyenan gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sal pa//
'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag na sAnge rje chen po dang ldan pas chos thams cad shin tu mya ngan las 'das pa mthong zhing/ so so'i skye bo' tshogs rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang phyin ci log tu
shes nas mtshan nyid dang bral ba zhig tu shes te/ de bas na de dag chos thams cad la blo brtan zhing nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyidabyangs bsam
gyis ma khyab pa rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs nas/ gsang ba pa'abadag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis
brlabs pa nyon cig/ de la dang por slob dpon gyis gtsangam+mA byas te/ bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas la dkyil 'khor gyi sarnam par dbye bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas te chos kyi dbyangs rnam par dag pa'ang dran par byas/mag+ga' yas pa// rgya chab/ rab 'byams bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs la blta'o//
bltas nas kyang bdag rdo rje sems dpar byin gyis brlabs la/ chon sna lnga ya srad bu 'am// yang na mkhas pas blos kyang rung// lha yi gnas rnams nges pa ni// shes rab can
gyis rnam par dbye// kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la// sgo bzhi rta babs dang yang bcas// sgo khyud rab 'byams rgya chen ldan// rnam par dag pa sems kyis bris// rin chen lnga yi
phyam 'am// yang na sA lu'i phyi ma'ang rung// yang nusbos sam thal bas kyang// dkyil 'khor sngags pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// nub kyi sgo dbye bar bya/ de
nas 'gasngags rgyal mo ni// ma bzodasrung ba chen mo 'am// yang na mi g.yo dran par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran byas nas// bden bralargya na phyogs su 'gro// de nas
srad bu bresanas su// bskor ba byas te slar logan// de nas blo dang ldan pa na// byang dang nub kyi phyogs su 'gro// der yang shar du kha bltas nas// sharakyi phyogs su srad bu bre//
de ltar srad bu'i tshul shes pas// rtag par thog ma 'di du bya// de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni// mgonapo ngan song kun seng dang// ma mchog 'od dpag med pa dang// de bzhin/
sgrab pa kun sel dang// thub pa ma rtog kun rgyas dang// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang// thub chen bdud las rgyal ba dang// de bzhin ma 'khrugasazhes bya dang// sangs
rgyas rnga ya sa dbyangs can// de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran nas// der yang dka' thub can gyis ni// nanatan bskyod de chagasum brtag/ de ltar sa la mkhas pa yis// sa ni
legs par brtags nas su// byang chub sems dpa' blo can dang// sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yang bklag/ yang na zab mo'i mdo sde gzhan// sa rnams /
[/ ]gtan la 'bebs pa bklag bklags nas blo dang ldan pa yis// kun tu bdug spos bskor nas su// rgyal ba mchog gi sras rnams dang// sangs rgyas rnams la phyag byas nas//
sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gzugs sam// phyag rgyamakhas pas bri bar bya// yang na gzhan na gang yang rung// de dag thams rud bri bar bya// de nas yang bcomaldan 'das rnam par
@# snang mdzad kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sbyor ba gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems
dpa' spyad pa spyod pa rnams tshegs chung ngus sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'ang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur ba/ chos kyi debyangs bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i tshul sgrub pa'i
sbyor ba yod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgrub pa'i tshig gang dang ldan na byang chub
soms dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa spyod pa rnams cho ga thams rud yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang mnyes par brgyad
pa'i sgrub pa'i tshogadedag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi debyangs kyi tshul rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs sgrub pa' gzhu rgyu
chen pos byin gyis brlabs nas sbyor ba bzang po bshad de// gsang ba pa'abadag po de la 'khor los sgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad dpag tshad gtsag tsam bri bar bya// gnas tsan dan
bzang po sbrul gyi sange po dam pa las byas pa'i khang pa dril bu dang rin po che'i bla re chen po khros pa// lha'i a ka ru'i bdug sngos kyis bdugs pa// 'dzam bu nA da'i gsar gyi srad bus bskor
ba rin po chesna tshogs kyi dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas stong brgyan pa/ rngamasnyan pa sna tshogs kyi sgra grags pa/ phyogs bzhi rta babs bzang po mu tig ga'aphreng ba brtags pa//
tshon snyatshogs kyi ras btang ba/ bkod pa dang rgyanas tshogs kyis spras pa// rin po che'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyis kyang rnam par gsal bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus
pa'i nang na 'dug bzhin du bdag chos kyadabyings rnam par dag par byin gyis brlabs la/ de'i rnam par dmigs pa 'am/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya 'am/ dum tshig ga phyag rgya
bcings te/ stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes susong ba rnams sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang byang chub kyi sems 'dzan du gzhug go/ de nas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi mgi
rnam par dag dag par bya ba'i phyir dam tshig bstan par bya'o// de la nang gdakyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya 'di rnams yin no// shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thams
cad kyi phyag rgya gru gsum pa pad+ma'i steng na 'dug par bri'o// de'i gsang sngags ni 'di'o// na ma sarba man+ta bud+d+ha bo d+hisat+tAn+taM/ asarba dra Na kas wA/ bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas
logs su sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya yade bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal mtshan bri'o// de'i gsang sngags na/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hAbo d+hasetAnaM sa man+ta
a mr-i ti dzA la sa nA/ de'i 'og du kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgyu ral gri dang gnas kyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu bre'i// gsang sngags ni/ na mo: sa man+ta bud+d+hA bo d+his tAno/ badzar dzam lasan/
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i g.yon logs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bra'o// de'i 'og tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'aphyag rgya lhung bzed dang chos gos bra'i// bcom
ldan 'das kyi g.yas legs su nam mkha' spyan gyi phyag rgya spyan gyi gtsug tor 'dra po pad+ma'i sangan 'dug par khri'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i 'og logs su rdo rje mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya ut+tha
la'i steng du rdo rje bzhag pa bra'o// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i byang phyogs su khyams pa'i phyag rgya gun rlu bri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi nub phyogs su spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug
ga phug rgya pad+mabya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi byang phyogs su mtha' yas par 'phro ba rgya chen po ma ye rgyal po'i phyag rgya bri'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lha phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin
thams cad kyi phyag rgya ba'o// de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor cha gsum du byas pa la 'khor sa'i snam bu bor te/ shar phyogs su pho nya' tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bra'o/ de dag gi
shar lho'i mtshams su pho lhamo thams cad kyi phyag rgya bra ste/ pho 'amo rnams kyi phyag rgyan lcags kyu'o// tshogs rnams kyi phyag rgya nazhigs pa'o// lce dang byung gi ngos gnyis su

bran pho dang bran mo rnams kyi phyag rgya tra ste/ de la bran pho rnams kyi phyag rgya na ral gri'i// bran mo rnams kyi phyag rgyu na khang+ga ra dang rdo rje'i khab bri'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bklag go/ bklags nas langs la dkyil 'khor bskor bar byas te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag byas la/ slob ma byang chub tu sems
bskyod pa gtsang sbra can/ ya dem la brtan pa// sdom pa bzung bo/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i bsam pa can// snying rje ba/ gdong ras kyis g.yogs pa//
lag pa ma gtong bde la sems rtse gcig tu dmigs pa rnams dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khar 'greng la gang ba'i phyag rgya 'am/ chos 'byung ba'i
phyag rgya 'am/ dam tshig ga phyag rgya bcings te/ dam tshig brjod la dkyil 'khor du gzudad// de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug go/ me togagar babs pa de
de'i lha yin no// de ltar dam tshig brtan par bya ste/ slob dpon la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed do// slob dpon gyis kyang bu'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas sems kyi rgyud rab
dang/ 'brang dang/ tha ma bltas nas gsang sngags spyad pa la 'jug pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga spyane no// de ltar byas n dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa 'dir dam tshig mthong bar 'gyur
ro 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thoms cad du zhugs kyang rung ma zhugs kyang rung// dam tshag tu zhugs par 'gyur ro// de ltar dkyil 'khor chen por byin
gyis brlabs shange sAg pa thams cad dang bral ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs las byung ba/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yongs su bskyab pa'i yade la byed pa des
gsang sngags spyadapa'i rnal 'byor gyi chog rjes surngan par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnamapar snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyangs kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams la byams pa chen po dar thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis gzigs nas/ zhal cung zad 'dzum zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug
[po ]pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa'i chos kyi dbyangs shAn tu rnam par dag par stan par bzhed pas/ gtsug tor chen po' dekyil nas srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las bsgral bar ya dem bas pa/
zhes bya ba'i bzhad pa chen po mdzad do// thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa thums cad kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo// 'od zer de byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig
rten gyi khams rab 'byams nam mkha'i dbyings kyis kus pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyidakyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad nasAng bar
byas/ chos kyi dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i yul na bstan/ sems can thams cad kyisoms kyi spyod pa rnams la na deltas/ chos kyi dbyangs rnam par
dag pa mtha' yas pa ni dmigs par byas/ nam mkha' dang mnyam par gyur pa'i tshos mnyam pa nyid rnam par bstan pa// chos kyi dbyangs kyis rnam par rol pa'i sgos rnam par
rol nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par s+sane pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa las mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa las mngon par grub pa/
mos pa'i rlung gdakyil 'khor gyisasangs rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnam pa bcus rab tu brgyan nas/ nam mkha'i ngos la bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs bsham par
bya sa gnas par gyur te/ 'od zer chen po de dag de ltar gnas par gyur ma thog tu gsang ba pa 'a bdag po phyag na rdo rje'asams la sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu
byung bar gyur te// de bzhin gshegs pa 'i dgongs pa las byung ba'i 'od zer rnam par bkod pa sang ba sngon ma byung ba 'di dag bkod pa rnam pa stsatshogasakyis nam mkha'i ngos ni khobs
par byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par rol pa chen po rnams ni bsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du ma snang bar gyur pa de ngo mtshar che'o// de bas nanges par
deng bcom ldan 'das so so yang dag par rage pa chen po mngon par sgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas mnyam pa 'di la 'jug pa/ rnam par dag pa'i gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa'i
thams cad rnam par rol pa 'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed do// de'i phyi'i bcom ldan 'das la bdag zhu'o snyam mo// de nas phyag rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis dang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
thugs bskyod pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bdag rtag tu zhabs 'bring na mchis mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar bzhad ba chen bo
sngar mdzad nas/ dbu'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil nas 'od zer ngo mtshar du gyur pa bdag gis sngonamamathong ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyad byung nas/ 'od zer de rnams
kyis kyang 'pheg rten gyi khams nam mkha' dbyanges kyis mthas klas pa snang bar bgyis pa ngo mtshar che'o// de la bdag nyidi 'ad sim du gyur te/ deng bcom ldan 'das bdog/
cag la so so yang dag par rig pa chen po la 'jug pa'atshul sgrub pa rnam par dag pa'igazhi chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam
par sprul pa bshad pa bzhed pa ni bdag cag gis rnyed pa legs par red de sum mo// bcom ldan 'dasade bas na bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ so so yang dag par
rag pa chen po la 'jug pa'i tshul sgrub pa 'arnam par dag pa'i gzhi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad na/
dus slad ma'i 'gro ba rnams lasnang bo bgyis par 'gyur te legs kyis bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na
rdo rje la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po legs so legs so// khyod don 'di 'dra bar sams pa de'ang legs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir legs
@#// par rab tu nyon la zung zhige dang/ ngas khyed la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rag pa la 'jug pa sgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas/
pha[/ ]mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnam grangasade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar
bgyi'o zhes nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdagab
stong pa nyid kyi gzhin mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gzhon mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'i// mtshan 'ang med pa'i gzhi ni
mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzhan mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o// de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'agazhi 'di dag
byang chub sems dpas bsgom par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa sgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas mnyam
pa nyid la 'jug pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rab 'byams mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlabs nas//
nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i rgyal po rnam par smin pa nam mkha' ltar rgya che zhing mthe' yas nga zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma
thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul snang ba/ yul bsam gyis ma khyab pa rab 'byams ston pa zhes bya ba' 'od zer chen po dpu'i gtsug nas byung ngo/ byung nas kyang de
bzhin gshegs pa dang rjes su maskrun par bstan te/ b.rem ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa bar snang ba chen/
pos gsal bar byas te/ stong ga nam mkha' la gnas nas dam tshig chen po gsum gyi snang bas 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa snang bar byas nas/ sems
can gyi khams rnams la dam tshig chen po gsum gyi myu gu skyabar byin gyis brlabs te/ 'od zer de dag nam mkha' la lhags nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor lhung ngo// 'od zer de dag phyag na
rdo rje'i spyi bor lhung ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyagan rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin chen po thob par gyur te/ de thob pas de
bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnyis su med par gnas par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi dga' bas sang tsham par gyur nas/
mig gnyis ma 'dzums par bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yud tsam zhig bltas te bzhin cung zad 'dzum zhing/ bcom ldan 'das la yad kyis zhus
pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lags// ji ltar rgyal ba dam pa lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lags// ji ltar sangs rgyas zhes kyang bgyi// mgon po bdag gi
tha tson 'dra// grub pa chen pos bsal du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' grugs chen rnams // the tshom yid gnyis spangs nas su// sbyad pa'i rgyal po theg chen la// rgyal
ba' sras na spyod par 'gyur// desad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag
po khyod don 'di lta bu 'dra ba de legs so legs so// gsang ba pa' bdag po chos kyi tshul sgrub pa gzhi 'ad lta bu 'ad bros nas skrag par ma 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par ma 'gyur ba' sams
la can de dag nadakon no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rags kyi bu de dag nasangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur byas pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yan
par rig par bya'o// gsang ba nga 'badag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas thog ma nyid du theg pa chen po rtogs par khong
du chud par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' na tshegs chung ngus gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems/
ngapa'i spyod pa sgrub par 'gyur ro// 'ad ltar gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyong ba yin no// de nas yang bcom
ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' sul pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhag dang/ ngas
khyod la ba shad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag nardo rjes bcom ldan 'das la nyan te// de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
stsal te// chos rnams nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis su med rung mtshan hrid gcig/ gnas ni rnam pa bcus rtogs pa// de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bya// 'du sa
tsam yang spangs gyur cing// rang bzhin nyid kyang bstan du med// ye shes kyis na rang rig pa// de na de bzhin gshegs zhes gsungs// byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de//
rtog pa thamasacad rnam par spangs// gang zhig de ni rtogs 'dod pa// de na byang chub sems dpa' yin// sa bcu yongs su rdzogs byas nas// dbang rnams rtogs par khong du chud//
chos rnams stong pa sgyu ma bzhin// gang gas 'dar na kun rtogs shing// 'jig rten gyi ni rgyud shes pa// sangs rgyas zhes na de la bya// gsang ba pa'i bdal/
po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi gnas skabs rnam par gzhag pa ni de dag yanin// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rang gi
sems rnam par gzhag pa sgrub pa na mid par rag par bya'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcos ldan 'das
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs legs
par bshad pa na bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes kyi bu de dag 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe
ngan 'gro ngan song gi 'jigs pa 'am/ bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa 'am/ mi khom par skyo ba'i 'jigs pa ma mchis par bdagasu'o// de rtsa'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub
sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa la gnas pa na 'jigartan dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam ma gtong zhing/ sems can
[s/ ]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs kyis 'jig rten gyi bya ba thams cad kyang ston to// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las yongs su nyams par yang ma 'gyur/
ro denas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gsang pa chen po sang po'i dkyil 'khor
bshad du gsol/ de na skye ba mang po la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so// de skad ches gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/[â ]/grasang bapa'i bdag po de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhag dang/ ngas khyod la gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor
bshad par bya'o// de'ang re zhig slob dpon dam tshig gsum rnam par dbya ba la mkhas shing bdag kyang dam tshig gsum la gnas pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dam tshig
gsum po de gang zhe na/ chos kyi khyad par gsum ste/ chos kyi khyad par gang la dus gsum du gtogs pa'i dus na sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa de na dam tshig gsum zhes bya'o//
gsang ba pa'i bdag po chos kyi khyad par de'ang gang zhen/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po sems na chos kyi khyad par te/ gsang ba pa 'i bdag po de lasoms kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad med/
pa yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// 'du la chos kyi dbyangs rtogs pa'i rang rag pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa des de bzhin
gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// gang lus dang/ ngagadang/ yade 'jug pa de na rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po da ne dem tshig gsum yin te/
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma rtogs na/ mu stags can gzhan dag gis lha risos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs
so byas pa ma shes pas bsgribs pa// tshul 'di shes par ma gyur rnams // sangs rgyas gzhan du tshol bar byed// 'danaganas par yongs ma rtogs// 'jig rten
khams gzhan gang nas kyang// sangs rgyas rAd par yang ma 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma bstan to// de lta bas na rnal 'byor
pas// rtag tu yid gnyis spangs nas ni/ sems kyi khyad par rnam gsum brtag/ de nasadam tshig gsum shes 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa
de dag gsungs nas/ gas nga ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de nas slob dpon dam tshig gsum shes par bya ba la mkhas pas bdag 'di chos kyi
dbyangs su mos par byas la/ de la dmags pa'i spyod pas sa gzhi rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// de ltar des sa gzhi rnams sbyangs nas nam mkha'i dbyangs lta bu la yang dag par gzhol
pas bdagan chos kyi dbyangs sgrib pa med pa ye shes kyi yul yin na sam du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byon gyis brlab bo// de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la chos kyi dbyings rnam
par dag pa'i phyi gnyis sumad pa'i sbyor bas bdag gi lus la dkyil 'khor yan pa 'am/ dkyil 'khor bdag gi lus yin par byin gyis brlabs te/ rang gsams kyis byas pa'i
tshon sna lnga'i phyi ma dang/ gzhan yang rung ste chog snga mas rnam par dbye bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de nasams canasdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i phyi'i gsang ba'asang
po'i dam tshig la 'jug pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa gang gis byung chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'a yi shes kyang tshe 'di nyid gcig pus thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'achos kyis byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
kyis byams pa chen po dang thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis sems can gyi khams la gzigs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po
byin gyis brlabs bsgrubs pa'i gzhu gang dag gas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par dka' ba'ang bsod nams ma byas pa'i
sams can rnams kyi pha rol gyi rgyud la'ang rab tu 'jog par 'gyur bachos kyi dbyangs kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi gzhi rten cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skud ces bka' stsal pa dang/ phyag
nardo rjes thal mo sbyar te/ bcos ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan nga/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi'i
khyu mchog seng ge'i sgrog pa rnams kyi ye shes la mnga' ba ngo mtshar to/ bcom ldan 'das rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig thams cad mkhyen pa'i
ye shes 'di 'dra ba'i don du nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi mthas klas pa'i bskal par yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal ma bzud pa'ang bzod par ma bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na
rags kyi bu mkhas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal bas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes subaslab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na legs lags kyis/ bdag cag la thugs brtse
ba'i slad du chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi gzhi de dag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa'i phyir chos thams cad na mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi dbyanges dmigs su med pa'i phyir
chos thams cad ni snying pa nyid kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mtshan 'di do/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang dag ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na byang chub kyi sange ba la 'dug ga bar du
bsgoms shang/ lan mang du byas pa ni chos kyi dbyangs byanegyis brlabs kyi gzhi yin te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta ngos na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla namad pa yang dag
par rdzogs pa'i byang chub nad yan no// rigs kyi bu nga byang chub kyi seng po la 'dug pa na'ang 'dadegasams sams pa las rnam par rtog pa thams cad slangs pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thob par gyur to// sgra dbyangs mtha' yas pa slog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo dang/ dadud bzhi pham par byed pa'adabyangs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gnas
mad pa// nam mkha' spyod yul mtshan nyid med pa// 'gro ba med pa// byed pa po dang tshor ba po med pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa'ang thob par 'gyur ro//

[/ ]gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rogi sngags kyi rgyal mo chenamo mtha' yas shing rab 'byams rgya chab bstan pa'i bya ba de gang zhen/ na ma sa ya d+hA kAnaMbud+d+hA ga depra tiT+Thi ted+d+ho/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa/

ne b+h+ya: ma hA kyi be h+phu ga ga na am la rU pa d+hA ra Ni/ te ShA ga ta rU pa lha then/ba ra rU pa d+hare mah+pha kribabasale/sajag tu bsha d+ha na ) de la de ni rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med pa yin
no am hA bas ye hUM khaM/ phyag na rdo rje 'ad ni nam mkha' ltar dra ma med pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin
gyis slob pa sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yanin// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gangan rag sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ma 'chad cing ma brjod pa'i
( sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ngas ma mthong ngo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dam tshig 'ad la 'jug par
'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rgyal po 'di la mngon par
brtson par bya'o// de la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyagan rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
chub sems dpa 'a spyad pa spyod pa rnams gsang sngakas kyi rang bzhin ji ltar ston/ sa thams cad la thob pa'i bar du ji ltar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das
kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjel 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyar pa/
spyod pasaslob dpon la dbang nod par bya'o// 'di snyam du slob dpon 'di na bdag gi ston pa sku/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub la bskul ba'o// des
thal mo sbyar te lta bar song la gsol ba gdab bo// slob dpon gyis kyang de don du gnyer bar shes nas sAng rjen po mngon du byas te/ tshig 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu/
longs de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bla na med pa de khyod la bstan par bya'o// denas sa gzhi yid du 'ong ba rtags la cho ga snga mas sa gzhi sbyangs te/ dkyil 'khor rgyurazhi pa/ sgo gcig
pa lha rnam par dbye ba'i gnas legs par brtags pa/ mchod pa'i gnas rnam pa sna tshogs bkodapa bsgrubs pa/ spos chu dri zhim pos bkang ba 'bum pa dbus su bzhag pa
bras la/ slob ma pad+ma'i steng na 'dug pa rang ga lha'i gzugs bdag yin par dmages pa la gnas pa// yid byang chub kyi sams su gyur pa// 'gro ba mtha' dag yongs su bskyab pa'i
bsam pa can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag bum pa des spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro// 'di skad du 'ges kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes so//
de bzhin gshegasapa'i spyan phya'o zhes sa bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod
pa rnams kyi lha'i gzugs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji snyed pa 'am/ sems dpa' mtha' yas pa thams cad kyi cha lugs kyi bye brag kyang rung ste/ gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin/
gyis brlabs las gyur par rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa'ang ji lta bu yin zhen/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la dbang
bskur ba'i tshe slob dpon gyis pad+ma'i phyag rgyus gdan bkrazhing brtan pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa/ rdo rje ltar mi shags pa// yongs su brtag pa na gsar ram/ zangs sam
'jim pa las byas pa 'am/ ramor bras pa bzhag ste bya'o// de'i stadzadu 'dug pa la chos thams cad la dbang thob par bya ba'aphyir spos chu dra zhim pos bkang ba'i bum pas spyi bo nas
dbang bskur bar bya'o// slob dpon bdag nyid kyang ji ltar rjes su mthun par mos par bya ba 'am/ de'i phyag rgyas rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba bya'o// chos kyi dung gi phyag rgya dang/
gsang sngags kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o// ral gri'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis na'ajig tshogs la lta ba many+dza'[L]
dag gzhom par byan gyis brlab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyudang gsang sngags kyis nadi bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab par/
bya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis na mi shes pa'i grong khyer gzhag par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyu dang gsang sngags kyis ni gtsug tor bltar maM
mthong ba byin gyis brlab par bya'o// mdzod stsa' phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis ni mdzod dang ldan par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// yan lag thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgyu dang
gsang sngags kyisan yan lag thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la pad+ma' phyag rgya 'byung ste/ lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mkhrig ma nam
bskyed de sor mo thams cad go mnyam par brkyang ngo// phyag rgya 'danadi bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gdan yin te dam pa mthu chenapo'o// gsang sngags 'di na ngo mtshar
che ba thams chad kyi sgo ste/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ga ga nA ma la pra b+hA badzra rgyud kyi/ nA ma hA kri pAt+makA/ de la 'di regani rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med pa'o// a ti bslaya
ma hA kru pad+ma dza dz+haM/ lag pa gnyis bsnol te rgyab sbyar la sor mo rnams phan tshun blas pa'i tshul du bsnol te/ g.yon pa'i mthe bong rgyab tu bzlog pa g.yas pa'i mthe bos sen
mo la sbyar ro// rgyu 'ad phyag rgya chen pos// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su bsgrags// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis// 'khor la dam pa 'di
bskor ro// nam: sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ ta thA ga ta a sra tI bi dza ya wasar dza ya ga blad+d+har 7/ kAr ma hA khri pa hUMhaM drahi ma hAr b+hu te hU~M/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya las mthe bong gnyis
lag many+dzaladu bcug la/ mdzub mo gnyis kyis rtsa ba dkras te lhag ma rnams so na bzhag la bsgreng ngo// 'jig rten mgonapo skyob rnams kyis// phyag rgya sams can thams cad kyi//

don rnams rtag tu sgyur byed 'ad// chosakya rung zhes rnam par grags// na mas man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ rgyad tA b+ha ga ba ti pra tiSh+Thati/ a nan ta ru sa ra ba niri glo/dzaM/ sarba ta thA ga ta dzA ka pra sa ra

ra ba sa ya a d+hu ra a wA d+ha ra ma Na ka sarba tAsan to/ shanA rAm hA ma h+'a hU~M/ gang ba'i phyag rgya de 'di las mdzub mo gnyis bkug ste mthe ba' san mo'i steng du ral gri'i tshul du gzung ngo// phyag
rgya rab tu man+tu chen 'di// ral gri'i phyag rgyur rnam par grags// sems can kun gyi 'jig tshogs lta// lhan cig skyes pa'ang gcod pa yin// na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ a ma h+pha khad+ma

pradzA te dza da sad kA ya rAts+tshin+dan kAr/ ta thA ga ta a d+hamu ka da nir dza ta ba d+hu ta saM kalam hA ma hAhU~M dza/ phyag rgyu de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis phyi rol du brkyang sta gung mo gnyis kyi tshigasagasum
bar nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par bzung la rdo rje lta bu r byas te/ mthebong dang/ srin lag dang/ mthe'u chung rnams nang du gzhug go/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten mgon po yis//
phyag rgya rab tu bsags pa 'ad// ma shes grong khyer 'dzag pa ya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyur rnam par grags// de'i gsang sngags na/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ ma sbubasaya te dzod b+ha ba

ma AtsaNA dur dan tA dra b+hany+dzag+ho/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las mdzub mo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi nges su gtsug tor lta bu r gzung ngo// 'di ni gtsug tor phyag rgya ste// 'jig rten mgon po skyob
pa ya// gang gas phyag rgya 'di bcings pa// de la 'di ni gtsug tor 'gyur// de yi gsang sngagasan/ na maH sa man+ta bud+d+hanaM/ sar b+ha dra a pra tA he ta b+ha ba ti/ d+harma shA ba u0f8brI//

saN+Ta ta thA ga du na du d+har+ya b+ha sha ya/ ma hA bud+d+hasarba da b+hA ga du/ ad+mad+d+hen a d+hiT+Thiti/ sur maN+Da ma hopa'as/ lag pa g.yas ba khutshur bcangs la smin mtshams su gzung ngo// rgya
'di rgyal ba mchog rnams kyi// mdzod spu rtag tu rnam par bsgrags// de'i gsang sngags ni/ na ma: sa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ a sha len du ba ma prab+hasarmas tA/ glesha san tu ba brashA

ma na ga ra ma hA dang+ge ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta oM laM ka ra ma hA pu ru Sha ru pa d+ha ra ka ko ta re ta swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i
spyad pa spyod pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la nye bar gnas pa de gang yin pa de dag ni gsang sngags dang phyag rgya 'ad dag yanen// gsang ba pa'i 'dag po de lta bas na
byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'asngags dang phyag rgya 'di dag gas byin gyis brlabs pa rnams na yadi bzhan gyi nor bu gzugs sna tshogs dang 'dra ba'i
lus rnams kyis sems can gyi khams rnams susems can gdul ba'i dbang gis ji ltar rjesasu mthun pa'i lus rnams ston to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/
gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjel bka' stsal pa// gsang ba pa'i bdagapo gsang ba'i sdong po'i dkyil 'khor la sdom pa gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/
