byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lus dang/ ngag dang/ yad bsnams shing spyod par 'gyur ba'i sdom pa dang byang chub kyi sams yod do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sdom
pa gang zhe na/ bsdam pa ni sdom pa ste/ lus dang/ ngag dang/ yade rnams bsdus shang yongs su bsdus pa'i phyi deng/ nang gasdug bsngal sel bar 'gyur ba de na sdom pa yin no//
de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub semaMs dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub
sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa sdom pa ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal/
to gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la slob dpon gyis lha spyan drang ba byas la// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brlags te/ dkyil 'khor la phyogs der 'dug
slob ma rnams la bos te/ 'di skad du bu dus gsum du slob pa med par gnas pas dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom panosashig ces bsgo bar bya'o// des kyang thal mo sbyar/ pus
mo btsugs te/ 'di skad du slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba de dag gis dus 'di nas bzung ste byang chub kyi song po la mchis kyi bar du/ slob dpon gyis
bdag la dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'asdom pa bdag la stsal du gsol ston pa'i bka' spyi bos nod par 'tshal lo zhes su bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad ces gas
kyi bu dgongs shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa khyod kyis byang chub kyi sing po la 'dug gi bar du/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag ga lus sangs rgyas dang byang
chub sems dpa' rnams la dbul bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sdom pa yane to/ sdom pa 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
@#/ dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams na tshul khrims bla na med pa la rab tu gnas pa yin no// gsang ba pa 'a yi dag po de lta bas na gsang
sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo 'di la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa 'di la mngon par brtson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po byung
( chub sems dpa 'a sems gang dang ldan n/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes shange 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa drang/ da ltar byung ba'asangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes
parab tu gnas par 'gyur pa'i byang chub kyi sems de'ang nyon cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse
ba'i slad du byang chub kyisims de bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'ad skad ces bka' stsal to//
tsha gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la byang chub gang zhe na/ byang chub na nam mkha' mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la'ang gzugs med/ bstan du med/ gzung du med pa'o// byang chub kyi
ma tshan 'digang yin pa sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang de yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na sems dang/ nam mkha' dang/ byang chub 'ad deg na gnyis su med do// de la chos
rnams mnyam pa nyade du rtogs pa chos kyi dbyangs khong du chud pa gung yan pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yanin// de la skye ba'i tshul dang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems
skye ba gang yin pa de ni gsang ba pa'i bdag po byang chub kyi sams zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas kyi gzhi lngas byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur
to lta gang zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dngos po thams cad dang bral bar mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// kha cig na phung po dang/ khams
dang/ skye mched dang/ gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa stong pa sgyu ma lta bu r mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// kha cig na chos la dmigs pasaso// gsang ba pa'i bdag
bo 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod pas 'di ltar dngos po thams cad dang bral ba// phung po dang/ khams dang/ sku mched dang//
gzung ba dang/ 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa// chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi rang gsoms thog ma nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyide du rtogs par bya'o// gsang bapa'i bdag
po de la dngos po thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ skye ba'i shed las skyes pa yod pa ma yin gyi/ phung po dang/ khams
dang/ skye mched tsam du zad do zhes 'jig rten pa'i lam yongs su slang bar bstan pa yin no// phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ gzung ba
po dang/ 'dzin ba rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba na nyanazlos kyi lam mngon par rtogs pa yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi klog pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa rnam
par gzhag pa yin no// chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis ni byung chub sems dpa 'a gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams rang gi sems thog ma nas ma skyes
par mthong zhing/ stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo tade rdzas med pa mtshan nyid med par mngon par rtogs par 'gyur// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gnas med
sbyopa/ zab pa med pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba' sams bskyed par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po rnam grangs 'das kyang 'di ltar smeg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas/
u ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul sgrub pa rnam par thar pa 'a sgo ma gtogs pa ra/ sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan 'dogs pa med par
rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhen/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsal pa du mar 'bad 'di brtsal te gdang dka' ba rnams kyang byas pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyu bar
'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi snonas byang chub sems dpa 'a spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis tshe 'ad nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de'ang de ci'i phyir zhen/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po tsho zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba la 'du shes su bya bar zad de/ byang chub sems
dpa' de rnams kyis 'du shes de 'ang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyari khong du chud pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i sngon rol nyid du 'gags pa'i phyir ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang/
mdzad kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gsang ba pa 'badag po dkyil 'khor dang phyag rgya'adam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
chos 'di ldan rkyang rang du slang bar bya'o/ lnga gang zhen/ saras dang/ sems can la gnod pa dang/ the tshom dang/ le lo dang/ gsang sngags la sogs pa la ma gus
pa lta/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po tshos 'di ldan byang chub sems dpa' tsho 'di nyid la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis rgyang rang ru slang bar bya'o// gsang
ba pa 'a bdag po chos 'di rnams la gnas pa 'a byang chub sems dpa' de la byang chub kyi sdud pa cung zad kyang yongs su rdzogs par nga ma sla'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de ci'i phyir zhe na/
chos 'ad rnamasan byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyisams kyi bar du gcod pa chen po'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan
'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rags kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gsang ba'i snying po 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par gyur pa de'i bsod nams ci zhig 'phel bar
'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po nam mkha'i dbyangs
kyi mtha' na rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad ma mchis pas de'i tshad gzung bar ma nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi mtha' na rtogs par nus kyang srid kyis/ gsang ba'asang po'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig mthong ba' rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigasakyi bu mo bsod nams mngon par 'du
byas pa gang yin pa 'a bsod nams de' tshad na rtogs par ma nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po dkyil 'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba mthong ba'o// gsang ba pa'i
bdag po dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba na snying po gtso bo thams cad kyi masgar phyin pa ste/ de 'a gong na de bzhin gshegs pa'asang po med do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi sang por gyur pa//
gnas su gyur pa// skyabs su gyur pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dam tshig 'di la
'jug par 'dod pas dkyil 'khor dang/ phyag rgya dang/ dam tshig la 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ba gang na ba der 'jig rten gyi khams me ma mur gyis yongs su gang ba la'ang rkang pa gnyis
kyis 'bogs te 'gro bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgenas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de rnams la'ang rigs kyi bu 'am/ 'dis kyi bu mo de dag
gsadage ba'i bshes gnyen gyi 'du shes dang/ pha'i 'du shes dang/ ma'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gang la brten nas sems can dmyal bu rgyun chad
par 'gyur zhing/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 'gro ba dang/ gshani rje'i 'jig rten pa'i phung po med par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de dag la ji ltar lan lon par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag nAm mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la gnas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyi
rabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ nam mkha' ltar gnas pa med pa'i spyod yul can du rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po ngas khyod la bsgo bar bya'o// shes par bya'o//
ma 'ongs pa'i dus na maM blun po dmigs pa can la lta ba/ 'jigs tshogs la lta ba/ mngon par zhen pa// blo phyin ci log tu gyur pa// bdag gi sems
kyi gnas gtan la ma phabs pa rnams rnam par 'khrul nas 'di skad du 'ad nasangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yan gyas/ 'di dag ni rang bzo can gyis rang bzor byas pa yin no
zhes zer ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po ma thun po de dag na 'gro ba gnyis su 'gro bar rig par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste// sems can
sgyu dmyal ba dang dud 'gro'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag la nadage ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod par nga masnya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni rtsa ba chad par byed pa la
zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bar du gcod par byed pa/ bdud kyis zil gyis non pa/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can/ theg pa chen po la goms par
bsam byas pa/ nyan thos kyi sgrig pa la sAng por 'du shes pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par
brtson par gyur pa de dag tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos spyod pa de dag la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ga la yod ces mas bar 'gyur te/ ma blun po de dag 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das
thams cad mkhyen pa des sams can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir 'di dag thams cad gsungs so// de dag la lta ba' sams bskyed pas sdug bsngal gyi skal ba can du 'gyur ro//
de ci'i phyir zhen/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'dzan pa lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'os pa yin par rig par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das
rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ phyagan rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab sed la bka' sul pa/ rags kyi bu de rnams bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/
smra ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis/ ragis kya bu de rnams rtag tu rgyun ma 'chad par smra bar gyis shig/ yongs su skyab par rgyas shagi/ gnod pa las zlog
par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed pa de dag gas mgrin gcig tu tshig 'di skad ces
smras so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rjes dzasad bka' stsal pa de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu de dag nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du
bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so// khyod kyis canas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa 'jig par ma 'gyur ba de ltar gyis
[â ]@#// shag/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la sas pa// grogs po dgade bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bya dka' ba brgya stong du mar bsgrubs pa de ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'ad yin te/ de bas na khyed thams cad kyis nan tan bskyed la de dag
srung ba gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di yin bdag cagade bzhin gshegs pa 'baka' bzhan byed pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa srung ba'o zhes byabar
'gyur ro// ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// stobs bcu 'dzin pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ sba
ba'i phyir bdag cag rnams kyis rtag tu brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi budi dag kyang bsrung ba dang/ bskyab pa dang/ smra ba'i phyir brtson par bya'o// de skad ces sbas pa dang/ rdo rje/
'dzin de dag gis mgrin gcig tu sas pa/ bdag gis ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun rang du gnas par 'gyur ba dang/ 'jog par ma 'gyur ba dang/ 'jig par ma 'gyur bar bya ba
'di ni nges par bya dgos so zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba la gzigasanas/ chos kyi rnam grags 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i/
phyir thugs rje chen po thog mar byas nas gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di deg gsungs so// na ma ste ya d+hA kAnaM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA/ ga dza ga te/ a ka d+hams ma ba sarba sa ra Ne//

btse dra rU pa d+hA ra Ni/ san+d+ra sa ta rba/ a b+hi sra ya pa ri pU ra NaM/ saN+Ta bad+hi sa tu drag dmA naso/ dra hi ma sang+gAd+harmas ma ma hA ma hA bi ro tsa na gan+d+hasaM bud+d+hA/ saN+Da tu khA ga ta/ a d+haN+Diti dra
hi ti b+ha ga ba de hU~M/ de nas phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rjes su gnang ba bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byani rgyas brlabs kyis sing rje chen po mngon du byas
to 'di nyid kyi rgyud phyi ma sus pa/ dang po slob dpon gtsang sbra byas te/ chos kyi dbyangs su gyur pa'i yid kyis/ bdag rnam par snang mdzad du phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyis bsgyur te
dkyil 'khor bri'o// sngags pa gsang sngags chog la// rtag par tshe ga snga ma yis// phyi ma dkar po blangs nasasu// sang rjer gyur pa'i yid kyisan// rtag tu ma g.yo dran byas
te dang por tshon rtsa dbye bar bya// de nas tshon rtse gnyis pa na// dmar po blangs nas dgye bar bya// tshon rtsa gsum pa sor po yang// shin tu nges par dbye par bya// de nas
margad 'dra bar dbye// de nas an d+ha ral 'dra dbye// gang gis kha dog ru 'drar gsungs// de yi dkyil 'khor de ri do// lha ya kha dog de bzhin te// zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod pa//
de yi gsang sngags de nyid 'dod// de na gsang ba bstan pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba gang// de dag dbang chen yin par bsngags// phyag na/
pada' chu ya yani// rdoN+Dacan gyi rlung ga yani// pho sha la sogs bran rnams dang// khro bo'i ming du gang rtogs pa/ kun tu thogs med gang rtogs pa// kun tu thogs med spyod pa rnams //
( kun gyi dekyil 'khor me dang rlung// yang na 'du deg thams cad kyang// nus pa'i mah+phu na kun dang ldan// stong pa nyid kyi bdud rtsa ngogs// sAng rjemag gis dri ma med// byams
pa'i go cha legs par bges// dga' ba dri ma med rtsal bral// srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying ba yi// sems can 'don par rab tu brtson// 'khor ba na yang ma genas shang// mya ngan
'das pa'ang gnas ma yin// yang dag mtha' langes byas shing// sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// de nas gsang ba pa'abadag po phyag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
a la bltas nas tshig sas pa/ thoms cad mkhyen pa sngagaphrul ba// ston pa bcom par ldan pa 'dis// bgegs rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gnas// gtan lu bab par bshad/
gyur pa// grogs po kun gyis mnyan par gyis// bgegs na rnam pa du ma ste// lha dang lha min gnod sbyin ma// de la bgags na rnam gnyis te// phyi dang nang ga spyod yul lo//
glo lud dbugs snarams dang skyugs// skya rbab nad dang yi ga 'chus// de la sogs pa'i rims nad na// grang rlung tshab la sogs las// ma brjod ngo bo can byung ba/ rang
gi yin ngar shes par bya// phyi rol gyi ni bgegs chen rnams // ma dang de bzhanim mne to// ye shes tsher ma de dag na// spyod pa rnam pas tshogs kyis// 'jig rten gzhug
pa'i phyir 'byung ste// dka' thub gnasan rmongs par byed// las kyi chog mthong ba yis// de rnams slar na bzlog par bya// tsha bar gyur nas 'ongs pa'i bgegs// bsal
bas nye bar zhi bar bya// shes rab can gyi gnyen po yis// de dgasasor gso bar bya// yang na bgegs rnams thams cad la// sngags pas nges par mtshams bcad la//
bgegs rnams kun la ye shes na// zhi bar byed pa'i mchog du bshad// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa theg pa
chen po mdo sde'i rgyal po gsang ba mchog gi rim par phye ba las/ de bzhan gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dekyil 'khor chen po byan gyis slob pa rdzogs so///rgya/
gar gyi mkhan po shA len+d+ra bo d+hi ded/ zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban rnyedapal brtsegs kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//3// rgya gar skad du/ A:
a tsa la ma hAked+ha rA dzasu sarba ta cha ga ta sa ta su sa pa ra ma ta pa la pa ra kra ma s+yab nas b+ha Sha to nAm kalpa bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa grams cad kyi khro bo'i
rgyal po ma g.yo ba de'i stobs dpag tu med pa rtul phod pa 'dul bar gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i rtog pa/ rdzabatsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzagis dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rlung la bzhugs te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkod pa rin po che'i gzhal yas khangabye ba grangs med pa du mas bkod pa'i yongs su bskor
ba bsam gyis ma khyab cing grangs med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod nams las 'khrungs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri bshams pa rin po ches sprasapa/ 'jig rten gyi
khams grangs med pa rnam par snang bar byed pa// rin po ches tshogs kyi lcags ris yongs su bskor cingashan tu yad 'phrog pa// steng du rin po che sAtshogs kyis sbas pa'i
rin po che'i bla bres nam mkha'i khams go 'byed par srung bar byed pa/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i pad+ma'i rgyal bo rin po ches 'dun gyi rgyu las yang dag par byung ba/ sems can
thams cad kyi bsam pa sna tshogs yongs su dga' bar byed pa// 'od zer chen po phul du byung ba gsal bar byed cing mun nag thams cad rab tu dang ba ra byed pa// byang chub sems/
dpa' thams cad kyi yi shes las 'khrungs pa' sang ge'i khri bsam gyis ma khyab pa bye ba du mas yongs su bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pas yongs su bskor ba
lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ ma 'am ru dang/ lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa du mas yongs su bskor ba
der bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas chos ston to// 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ kun tu bzang po dang/ byams
pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ [â]zheba' blo gros dang/ sna tshogs bkod pa dang/ nam mkha'am dog 'chang dang/ nam mkha' sange po dang/
shan tu rnam dag dang/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bskor ba/ nyan thos bye ba phrag du ma 'ad lta ste 3 shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u
'gal dang/ rta thul dang/ 'od srungs la sogs pas yongs su bskor ba/ grags chen snyan pachen po brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ lus
ngan po la sogs pas yongs su bskor zhing/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa'i shugs kyis chos ston pa 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshul la 'jug pa lasogs pa'i chos
shu'u/ kyirnam grangs gang thos par byed pa'i byung chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ nyan thos de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa' 'khor de dag dang/ bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'asams can gyi khams kyi bsam pa sa tshogs la dgos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod lam phyis zhugs shing rdzu 'phrulagyi cho 'phrul rnams mdzad do// bsam gyis ma khyab pa' sangs rgyas
sgyu rnams bsnyen bkur dang yongs su mnyes par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyatsho 'phrul du ma rnams kyang gzigs so// sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa du ma'ang mngon par sprul pa mdzad do//
bkod pa chen po'ang bskyed par mdzad do// mdor na thabs gang dang gang gis sems can gyi don du gatrags pa de dag de mdzad do// de nas bcomaM ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des 'khor chen po rnams la guN+Digs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje
in bdag gas sA tshogs du ma'i gsung ga 'khor lo dkyil 'khor rnam par phyung ste/ tshig dang yag du ma bkod pa/ sems canasna tshogs mgu bar byed pa/ phyag rgya dang sngags sna tshogs kyis
rnam par mtshan par gyur pa/ 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi khyad par brjod pa// sdug bsngal sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar byed pa// dbang phyug du ma dang ldan zhing yid 'phrog pa'i yi ge gcig
da dung/ brgya stong grangs med pa phyed dang/ gsum dang/ rjes 'jug dang/ ring po dang/ nyung ngu dang/ nga ro dang/ gsal byed kyi mtshan mas mtshan/
pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshos kyi dbyangs byang chub sems dang 'is bstsal sogs pa'i dbye ba dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes
pa lnga dang/ lha'i gnas la sogs pa 'debya ba dang/ mi'i 'gro ba dang/ yadegs dang/ dud 'gro'i 'gro ba la thug par phye zhing brgyad pa rnams gang bdag gas sams can
rnams la phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa bye ba phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun gyis sems can rnams kyi don du gsungs pa yaneno// de'ang gzhi dang me tog gsang pos brgyan pa' 'jig
rten gyi khams 'dir dar bar 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po bye ba phrag grangs med pa bdun cu rtsa bdun po de rnams kun gyi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa
spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ phyag na rdo rjadang/ 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag gas thabs sna tshogs kyi cho ga'i sgo bstan to// gsang ba
pa'i bdag po de rnams la ni mngag gzhug dang/ mngag gzhug ma dang/ pho lhadang/ pho nya ma la sogs pa de rnams kyi phyag rgya dang/ sngags dang/ rtogs pa'i cho ga'ang
rgyas par bstan to// las sna tshogs dang yang ldan pa'i sgrub pa'i skabs kyang bstan te/ sgrub thabs snyatshogs yang dag ldan// ras ras kya chog rnam
par bstan// yang na las kyi cho ga dbye// gang du stobs chen gsang ba'i las// sbyin sreg dag bdag gis bstan// lhag ma ji bzhin yul gnas gzhan// de nas ma lus
ma rbab dang// de bzhin zhu ba rgyas pa dang// dbang du byu dang mngon spyod dang// de nas dus kyi khyad par dang// dkyil 'khor yang na de bzhin bstan// phyag rgyu dag kyang ma lus
bar// sa bon dang ni mtshan ma dang// gsang ba yin sngags nyid dang// rigs kyi mtshan ma de bzhin sku// ma lus pa ya dbyangs dang yang// de lta bu la sogs pa'i las//
de dag thams cad bdagrags bstan// ma g.yo zhes bya'i rtog pa na// de nas slar yang bdag gis bshad// dag pa'i sams dpa' blo ldan rgyas// sngags pas gang zhig bsgrub
tshul bya yi// bsam gyis ma khyab stsa tshogs las// gsang sngags kyin sgrub thabs shog/ rtog pa 'di ru mdor bsdus nas// de yi cho ga yang dag bshad// yang dag rdzogs sangs
rgyus bsnyen cing// bsgrubs pas go 'phang thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras kyi mchog/ chos zhes bya ba skyo bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas zhwang na ma lus par/
de na kun tu dag par 'gyur// rtag par rgyun du rnam rtog med// nam mkha' yan lam la gnas// gzugs can lus la brten nas su// sems can bye brag blugs su chud// soms
can zhi ba gdul dka' dang// bgegs chon dang na leg par 'dren// de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis rtag tu sal// mtshan nam g.yo zhes bsgrags pa/
khro bo 'phags pa stobs po che// dpal ldan gdul dka' 'dul mdzad pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi sras// de 'di'i rgyal mchog rnams dang ni// de bzhin rgyal sras kyis
rtag par// phyag 'tshal tshangs pa la sogs dang// lus can thams cad kun tu mchod// sangs rgyas rnams ni byas pa gzo// de bzhin du na sangs rgyas sras// 'di kun smon
lam yongs rdzogs shing// bsam gyis ma khyab ye shes rdzogs// ma g.yo zhes bu'i sa thob pas// ma g.yo 'di yang de yi mtshan// bdud rnams kun gyis ma g.yo bas//
brtan pa'i ye shes dri med bzang// rtog pa'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// bshad kyis bu khyed tshur nyon cig/ sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// chos kyadabyangos su rab
[} ]gzhel bas// rtag tu tshe dang nad mang mchog/ dngos grub myur du gsol mdzad pa// rtag tu bgegs rnams sel byed kyang// de bzhin bdud rnams rab tu 'joms// sems
can rnams na bde ba'i phyir// rtog pa 'ad ni reb tu bshad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de
dag mgrin gcig ga ngag gis gsol pa// sems can thams cad kyi don dang bdag cag la sprugs brtse ba bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa/
bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bam ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya sgrub pas gsol ba btab pa do mkhyen
nas/ gzhi deng sang po me tog gas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'od zer chen pos srung bar byas nas/ dpal gyi be'u las byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ste/ 'od zer/
bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum grangasamed pas yongs su bskor ba byas nas/ gzhi deng sang po me tog gso brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'danas bzung ste/ ji srid brjod du med pa'i yang
brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthu' gtugs pa'i bar des khyab nas/ g.yas phyogs nas/
bskor te/ de bzhin du byang phyogs dang/ nub dang/ lho dang/ shar gyi phyogs dang/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khebs par byas so// 'jage rten gyi khams
de rnams na bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'ad smras so// shAkya mgon po rdzogs sangs rgyas// gzi brjid chen po gang bzhugs pa//
chos kyi dbyings las byung ba ya// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad gshegs// de ru dri med dam chosazhon// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul dge ba// gang thos 'jig rten mgon pos
na byang chub 'dus ma byas pa brnyes// de nas 'od chen po des tshigs su bcad pa 'di blos nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi depal de'u nyid du zhugs par gyur to// de nas
byang chub sems dang 'a chen po de rnams rang rang ga 'jig rten gyi khams nas khro bo'i mthus/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya grub pa ga la ba der lhags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya/
thub pas thams cad dang ldan pa 'a 'khor rnams kyi sems rtse gcig par mkhyen nas/ slar yang rdo rje bats+tsangs pa bsregs pa'i me lce kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das sems par zhugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yosaso// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos
so )'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gulo/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ 'ur 'ur/
rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'jig rten du snang ba chen po byung bar gyur to//
gzhan yang bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i cho 'phrul mthong ngo// snyoms par zhugs pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ bdud thams
da rab tu 'joms par byed pa// sams can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa// chos kyi debyangs grangs mad par sems can gyi khams rnam par grol bar byed
pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stong pa nyid rang bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzini rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes kyi ma yang dag bar 'byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
kyi byang chub kyi snying po nye bar ston pa/ sna tshogs pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yab/ sems can nyon mongs
pa'i mun nag tu lhung ba thams cad kyi snang bar gyur/ ngan song dang ngan 'gror ltung ba thams cad kyi ded dpon/ sdug bsngal bas nyam thag pa rnams kyi bde bar gyur pa// mdor
pa na sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gang dang gang ldan pa de dang de rab tu zhi bar byed po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po khro bo zhe po'i rgyal po'ang po 'di sems can thams cad la phan pa dang
[+2 ]bde ba'i phyir ro// na maH sang+gashApar pU ra ke sarba da grwa ga te: sarba b+ha hU~M/ brtsem ldan 'das kyis khro bo'i rgyal po chen po' song pa 'ad gsungs ma thag tu gzha deng sang po ma/
tog gis brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bdud kyi gnas thams cad dang/ bdud kyi res kyi sems can gang yin pa de dag thams cad mog mog por byas te/ sems canasdug
bsngal ba rnams na bde ba thams cad dang ldan par byed pa'i snang ba mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas nas ma lus pa'i sridapa'i bdag po'i sa
gzhi rang du 'gul bar gyur te// gzhan yang 'jig rten du bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i ngo mtshar rab tu byung bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/ gsang ba
pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te// lag na rdo rje 'di ni khro bo'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa'i sAng po mchog ga de kho na 'di/ stong nyid 'di las gzhan
ngag byung// chos kyi dbyangs kyi bdag de de// 'di las rgyal ba byung ba mkhreng// 'dir rgyal ba thams cad bzhugs// srid pa'i khams na 'od las sAl// 'das pa'i
sangs rgyas thams cad dang// mabyon pa de de bzhin gzhan// thams cad 'di las yang dag byung// nam mkha' lta bu dri ma med// spros pa thams cad rnam par bral//
ngag gi spyod yul rnam par bas// rtag par sos pa med pa nyid// nam mkha' lta bu r gnas pa yin// sha snyad mngon du byas nas na//
gsang sngags zhes su brjod pa yin// g+ha sad kyang n rtog pa ste// de lded du na brjod pa med// tha snyad la ni brtenanus su// skyob pas de nyid gsungs pa yin// som
can mdade rgyu ma bzhin// yad kya bsgom par bya ba yin// la lar sgyu ma ji bzhin du// rang bzhin med par yang 'gyur te/ stong nyari de ya rang bzhin du// thosAd rnams
rgyun rtogs par bya// de ltar gsang sngags mgon po 'di// rang bzhin med par mnyam par mdzes// 'dod pa'i don rnams rtsol ba yang// thams cad kyang na rdzogs par byed//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ tshangs pa dang/ dbang po la sogs pa rnams shin tu ngo mtshar
rmad du gyuratsang sang po rnams sangs te/ de thams cad bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la bltas nas tshig 'di dag mgrin gcig ga ngag gas gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis/
sngon chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 'di bskor ba bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par
'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di na bsam gyis ma khyab pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sa 'ad na nyan thos thams cad dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags so//
bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdud sdig can rnams dang/ bgegs kyi gzugs can h+phams cad kyis 'gom pa'am nus lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di na sems can nyams cad kyi don
yod pa 'i yade bzhin gyi nor bu lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di na mngon par 'dod pa'i don skong ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang sems
can rnams kyi srung ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di na srin po dang grul bum la sogs pa thams cad kyis 'da' bar ma nus pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lha la sogs pa' 'khor de rnams
la legs so zhes bya brgyan te/ gtsug lagra legs so legs so// slar yang gtsug lag nges par legs so// de ltar gtsug lag 'don tsheg brjod pa mdzes pa de ltar ji lta ba de
bzhin du yon no// 'on kyang gtsug lag gi bstan pa srung bar byed pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po chen po'i song po'i gzhung 'di bdag gsi gdu mug ga mun pos g.yogs pa'i sems can sdug bsngal
ba rnams la bltas nas gsungs te/ 'di na nyen par ma nus pa// go 'phang rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs// de rnams te rtsom phyir bdag kas// yo
shes sgron ma yang dag pa// byis pa sdug bsngal yang dag khengs// sa gzhi steng na 'dane gnas// tshul 'di rab tu ma shes pas// khyim gyi bcing ba dam pos bcanges/ de
rgyunas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes mgaganyis 'bru tshugs su bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to// bde bar
gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das 'dan mthu che ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rkyel pa de'i snying po'i gzi brjid dang mthun bdag gas ma bzod lags so//
bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po'i sing po 'di ni gdul dka' ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas bka' sul pa/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni ji skad du smras pa de bzhin
a no/ 'on kyang gsang ba'i bdag po bdagan gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i mthus nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bdud ji srid las rgyal la// gsang ba'i bdag po gang yang bdag gas 'jig
rten gyi khams na 'dod pa thadad pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams dga' bar byed pa'i gsung ga 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa'i bsam pa tha dad pa rnams la bstan
[4s/ ]pa de rnams na 'di'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gis bstan to// gang yang gsang ba'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chen po dbang thang thams cad thob pa'i ye shes kyi stobs brtul phod pa bsAs
pa 'di'ang snying po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis yanano// gcig tu sems can don rab brtson// sa gzhi la ni rnam par bzhugs// sems na rnams la phan 'dod pas// sprul pa rnams kyang
'gyed par mdzad// mchod cing mnyes par rtag tu ni// rgyal ba zhing na yang dag bzhugs// ji srid phyogs rnams gnas kyi bar// rtag par rgyun du mchod 'gyur ba'i/ sangs rgyas kun ni
mnyam pa ru// byang chub ces bya 'di la bzhugs// rang bzhin med pa'i chos rnams na// skye ba dang na 'gag pa yin// tha snyad lan brten nas su// gang zhig sgyu ma bzhin du gsungs// sgyu
ma stong pa nyid yin ltar// chos rnams mtshan 'di de bzhin no// 'on kyang gsang ba'i bdag po bdag gis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrage brgya stong phrag grangs mod kyi bskal pa stod du sems
can sna tshogs kyi lus blangs nas sprug ngasngal spyad de mgo dang/ lag pa dang/ rkang pa dang/ mig dang/ yan lag gamchog dang/ chung ma dang/ bu dang/ du ma gling pa dang/ rtadang/ shing rta la
sogs pa dang/ gzhan yang phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams yongs su btang ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas/ bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs pa rnams kyi tshul rgyas
bsam ba sna tshogs dang/ 'dod pa sna tshogs pa la sa dbyangs dang/ tshig dang/ ya ge bstan cing spyod lam sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma'i cha byad dang/ dbyibs kyi
khyad par can gyis bdag gis sems can rnams kyi don byas shing/ gang byung chub kyi song por bdud bzhi bcom pa de thams cad gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di'i mthus byas so// 'di ni sangs
rgyas rnams 'phel bar byed pa// bdud las kyang rgyal bar byed pa/ bstan pa thams cad kyi don yod par byed pa/ gzhan yang sna tshogs ma lus pa'i bgegs las kyang rgyal bar byed pa
sku 'di las gnyis pa gzhan yod mni// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma 'gyur sngags// de bas sang khar bzhag nas kyang// ji ltar bde bar rnam par gnas// sdang bar byed pa 'i bgegs
kyang med// glags tshol gzhan yang yod ma yani/ rtag tu dgra pa 'jigs pa med// rkun la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa'ang med/ 'jigs pa kun las rnam par grol/ de ya sAnge khar
ma gnas bsgoms pas// bdag na yun rings bsgral ba ru// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho 'jigs pa las// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i gtso// go 'phang bdag gas ji ltar 'thob//
bdag gis ru yang thob med par// tshul 'di las ni rnam spyodanas// de 'dir ma 'gyur thob par bya// sangs rgyas nyid kyis rgyas pa theb// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ya//
gsang sngags sgrub thabs brten par bya// de nas yid bzhin nor bu' 'od// skun 'di ru thob par 'gyur// gang zhig tshul 'dare gnas pa ya ]/de rnams kyanedangos grub phyir// gang tshe/
sngags pas mnyam bzhag pas// de bas ma mnyes pa'ang 'thob// 'dase na me phyed pa yang 'byed// ma rgyal ba las ma lus rgyal// stobs chen gsang sngags bzlas pa yis// rdzogs
sangs go 'phang sbyin par byed// dranadang rtog dang sems pa ya// sngags rig gang dusong gyur pa// me na 'bar ba ji lta bar// sngags pa gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur// gang tshe gsang
sngags rgyal po bsnyen// de las 'bras med ci yang med// gsang sngags stobs chen dran pa ni// las ni 'dod pa byed par 'gyur// sngags kyi mgon po ma lus pa// 'di namyur du
'grub par 'gyur// gang tshe gsang sngags 'bras 'dod pas// 'dur na spyi tshom ma bya 'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar
ba' snying po ma sangasapar sla skud gcig tu dungs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsol pa/ e ma'o sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab// sems can don rnams sprugs su chud// rtog pa med pa'i rang
bzhan yang// bsam ma khyab pa'i go 'phang shod// gang zhig 'chang bar byed pa'i mi// de yi ngan 'gro rnam par bcad// gang gis lag tu chud pa ltar// de yi dngos grub lag/
maThal gnas// 'jigs pa med cing nga yari mod// dogs pa thams cad rnam par spangs// zad par sa la bzhugs nas su// sems can lan ma bsam
ka byed// gsang sngags rgyal po skyob pa yis// bdag cag thams cad skyob par byed// 'dod pa'i don ni byed 'dod pas// gsungs pa yid kyis sgom par byed// de nas thams
zlo cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'di dag tshig 'di brjod nas/ de ma thag tu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sbyin rgyas shang shAkya'i rigs dga' ba la gsol
ba 'debs pa'i tshig gi nus pa med de// de nas nam mkhar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpas ngo mtshar 'das nas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la steng ga nam mkha' la sna
tshogs pa 'am rtog gis sam pa bkang// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ rtag tu dag cade dri med pa// rtag par rgyun du rtog pa med// rtag tu
rtog pa med par bzhugs// dpa' bo chen po phyag 'tshal bstod// khyod kyis chos kun g.yo ba med// thams cad legs sbyar spyod yul bas// rtag tugayo ba med mkhyen pas/
spros dang bral la phyag 'tshal bstod// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// spyod pa spyad pa gsungs pa ste// dgapa rnams ni yang dag 'byung// dag pa'i sems dpa' phyag 'tshal bstod//
jaltar nam mkha' bzhin du dag/ rdul phran thams cad rnam par spangs// de ltar mgon khyod su yang ni// kun tu rtog pa thams cad spangs// shel sgong bzhin du gdu dag/ nam
mkha' lta bu r spros pa med// dngos po thams cad rnam dag pas// ye shesargya mtsho phyug 'tshal bstod// nam mkha' lan 'ja' tshon ltar// gtso bo khyod na rtag tu mthong// de
ltar drag pa'i sems can gyis// rtag tu gtso bo khyod mthong ngo// ngan 'gro thams cad rnam par grol// dpa' bo chen po khyod de 'khrungs// dbyangs kyi snying po yang dag byung// ya
ga gcig tu gzabarjid che// sa gzhi thams cad nges pa ru// sems can sdug bsngal kun tu gzigs// sdug bsngal 'di ni zad byas nas// bla med go 'phang 'dra bar 'gyur//
gsang sngags rnams kyi gtso sngags 'di// chos rnams kyi ni blo 'phel bar// rgyal ba'i sras po thams cad bskyod// gtso bo khyod kyis gsungs pa yis// dngos po thams cadu yang
dag 'gyur// rgyal ba bdag nyade rgyu med 'khrungs// las dang skye bas rnam par grol// rgyal mchog gtso bor 'khrungs par 'gyur// ye shes ma lce rang bzhani pa/ 'du byed shams
cad rnam par spangs// chos kyi dbyangs kyi rang bzhin gcig/ rgyal ba bla med phyag 'tshal 'dud// ces pas so// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan
'das la tshigs su bcad pas sngags kyatsheg gden zhus pa/ bcom ldan gsang sngags ji ltar bsgrub/ sgrub pa'i thabs na ji ltar lags// sgrub thabs rtsa ba
tsazhis bya// ji ltar ya nga na de bstan lags// ji ltar sems nadag pa'i phyir// gtso bo 'di ni ci zhig bsgom// ji ltar de na 'bras bu med// sngags pa yis ni brten par bya//
de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byang chub sems ni brlan byas nas// sngags kyi
dngos sgrub brjod par bya// sngags kyi dngos grub bya'atshe ga/ gzhan du thams cad 'bras bu med// ji ltar rtsa ba bsdusan na// shing gi me tog 'bras bu med// de ltar byung
chub sems kyin// gzhi las gsang sngags 'bras bu shes// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// bla na med pa'i go 'phang 'thob// 'ad la gnas pa'i chos kun na// skye
la dang gnas pas 'byung ba ste// dngos po thams cad mdor bsdusanas// rang bzhin med cing bsam du med// byang chub sems na nges par 'thob// gzhan du 'ba' zhagi par
'gyur ro// bu 'di sang ge'i sgra yin te// stong nyid 'dus byas sgom par byed// srid pa khromasacad sgyu ma yin// gang zhig bsam pa'i 'bras bur gnas// mu stags rnams ]
kyi 'dong bshad pa// bdag dang srog dang gang zag bcas// gtso bo skyesakhur bshad pa dang// gang du khyab par gnas pa dang/ de ltar 'khod pa rnams brtags nas//
'khor ba'i dngos po 'ba' zhig ste// mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rmongs nas// byas pa sdug bsngal bden pa can// lag pa'i zhags pas bcings pa yis// sdug bsngal ba de
rnams bltas nas// de nas kun la brjed pa yani// 'di skad gsung na bka' stsal to// srog med sems can kyang yod mni// byed pa po med gtso bo'ang med// khyab pa
med cing dngos po'ang med// rdzas la sogs pa 'i rang bzhin med// log shes rang bzhani zhags pa na// srid pa 'a 'ching ba rnam par spangs// dngos po zams cad rnam par
bral// snatshogs ja ngazhan rname bsgoms pas// dngos po kun las rnam par grol// stong pa nyid kyi go 'phang 'thob// phya ril nang ga khyad par byas// de ltar thams
cad rnam par bsgom// dbu ba chu bur dang smyu ma// stong nyid 'ba' zhig las ldang so/ de ltar thams cad rnam bsgoms na// ye shes ga 'phang ngo rnam rtog/ sreg pa'i ge
cha lasagrol nas// 'chi med go 'phang du grolaM 'gyur// phung po khams dang skya mched dang// gzhan yang gzung 'dzin rnams las 'das// kun rkyen yage lugs pa na/
'ching ba'i don ru rab tu brtag/ gang du phung po khams med cing// skye mched rnamasan 'byung ba med// dngos po kun las rnam glel bar// rgyal ba mchog gsi
rtag tu gsungs// gang du kun gzhu rnam shes med// bdag med gang zag kyang yod man// sangs rgyas byang chub sa stangs 'ad// gang du thams cad skya mar gsungs// ngan kun mkhyen
mnga' brnyes pa// sems can don rnams thugs su chud// tshog bya ba la zhugs phyir// bu la ma lus par bshad de// gang zhagi kun gzhi yod pa dang// gal te rnam shes kyang
yod pa// de ya bdag nyid bdag ga bu// yod do zhes kyang bstan gyur pa// dngos po'i gdon gyis b+l+larlams pa ya/ byas pas sdug bsngal rnams mthonganas// bdag gis
gzhug par bya phyir bu// chog rgyas pa gsungs pa yani// sems can med rang srog kyang med// gang zag med cing khyad po'ang med// rnam shes med cing kun gzhu mid//
la gang la bdag med dbang phyug med// skyes bu med cing khyab pa'ang med// gtso bo yod cing rgyu yang med// ngangos po kun las rnam grol ba'i// dam chos dra ma med pa bshad//
de 'de mchog gi gtso bo so// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi go 'phang bstan// rtag par rgyun du bsgom par bya// byang chub sems ni rnam par bsgom// gzung dang 'dzani pa rnam grol
ba dngos po thams cad rnam par bcad// phung po khams dang skye mched myangs// thams cad stong nyid skya ma ltar// byang chub sems na bsdus pa nyid// byang chub
sams dpa' blo ldan gyis// de ltar yade kyus bsgom par bya// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad nye// gang zhig sangs rgyas 'di kya shugs// bag yod pas nA rtag bstan
na byang chub sems kyi myu gu 'char// bsnyen par gyur na 'bras bu 'byung// gsang sngags spyod pas gang dag ste// yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'i sku// byang chub sems kyis
'thob par 'gyur// nam mkha' lta bu r ges med pa'i// sku na kun tu 'thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems na bsgoms pa ya// bsod nams bsam gyis ma khyab bshad//
sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul che kun gyis// 'bras bu'ang bsam gyis mi khyab gsungs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ bcom ldan
'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas rdo rje'i skabs su rtol ba blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes rgya mtsho las byung ba'// khyod kyi sras po nga mnyes
gshani// 'ad dag shin tusom nyi za// bdag gis ji ltar rtog par bgyi// gang yang byams pa la sogs gzhan// sa b.ru ma lus pa thams cad// 'di la the tshem 'tshal zhing
mchis// thub pa chen po bshad du gsol// gang zhig sems can don ma byas// bsod nams ye shes rnam par spangs// de rnams la na sgugs brtse'i phyir//
bcom ldan 'das la 'di gsol 'debs// de ring bdag la ma lus par// sems can phan par brtson pas gsungs// 'di yi mthu stobs kyang n po// 'di yi pha rol gnon pa la//
ma g.yo zhes bya'i gtso khyod kyis// 'dir ni ji ltar yang dag gsungs// 'di las gzhan pa'i go 'phang mad// 'di dag thams cad gsung du gsol// gang gis go 'phang de 'grub
pa'/dkyil 'khor yang na bshad du gsol// gang gis sa stengs 'ad thob pa'i// bsam mi khyab pa'i go 'phang gsungs// gsang sngags kyan tshad kyang gsungs// dkyil 'khor
yang na ji ltar lags// mgon po 'di la the tshom za// gang 'dir 'gro ba la phan phyir// sngags kyi dngos grub de bzhin gsungs// de nyid las kyadabye ba yang// mngon spyod kyang ni rab
tu bshad// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dag gis// mgon pos ji ltar cher myur bar// sngags kyi bzlas pa'i 'bras bu mchis// mgon pos bzla ba'amtshan 'di na// sa stengs 'dir ni ri
ji ltar// me sgrub kyin cho ga dang// de yang ma dang bsang gtor dang// khro bo'i rgyal po dang ldan pa// mgon pos de dag thams cad gsungs// nyi ma gcig gi zhe phyed nas// zla babargyad/
pa'i skad cig tu// dngos grub dag na yang dag gsungs// dugag las kyi gso skyed dang// rdzas kyi sbyor ba'i las sna tshogs// mngon par brjod pa yang dag 'byung// ma lus pa ci
bshad du gsol// gang gis dngos grub thob pa yi// mgon po gzhan na ma mchis te// gtsobo khyod srungs gzhan med de// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams // nyan thos rang rgyal
rdzu 'phrul che// gang yang 'jig rten par grags pa 'a// tshangs sogs rdzu 'phrul cher bshad pa// de rnams kyi yang mgon skyabs na// gtso bo khyod srangs gzhan ma mchis// de nas
byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang/ phyugan rdo rdzolasogs pas/ slar yang bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa// chos kyi rgyal po sngags kyi sgo//
bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' din gyi phyir// gsang sngags sred pa'i sgrub pa'i thubus// gang gas brtses
ldan nyid kyis gzigs// chos kyi dega' bde thob pa na// sa gzhi'i stengan rnam par gnas// gsang sngags mnyes par rab brtson zhing// mthong pa'i chos la bde thob pa'i// sems
canas stengs gnas pa yi// the tshom med par 'byung bar 'gyur// thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs// gsang sngags rgyal po rdzu 'phrul
[% ]nyu'u// che 'jig rten 'ad ru 'byung bar 'gyur// sdang ba'i sun po thams cad dang// 'byung po gdon dang sha za dang// 'jigs su rung dang drag shul las//
sems can rnams la gnod pa bshad// gsang sngags stobs chen dran pa yis// de dag thams cad 'byung ma 'gyur// sa stengs sems can ma rungs pa// rnam pas tshogs
gzhan yang bshad// de rnams gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// rtog pa 'di ni reb tu gsungs// lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang// grul bum dang na lus srul po// so byed rgyu skar thams cad
dang// ma rungs gza'asogs bshad pa dang// sems can sdig can de rnams la// khro bo 'di ni rab tu gsungs// tshangs sogs gdon gyi tshogs kun dang// de bzhin rgyal ba nyan thos
rang// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yis// gang zhig bshad par ma nus shang// de dag thams cad thal bar rlog/ gsang sngags bzlas pa rdzu 'phrul che// sang laganas pa yang
dag bsam// gsang sngags zhes bya mthong dga' zhing// ma lus pa ru thal bar brlag/ tshangs pa la segs dkyil 'khor dang// byang chub semasadapa' bdag nyid che// dbang
po'i gnas bcu bdag po yis// 'di ni bzod par ma nus te// khro bo'i rgyal po rol pa na// sdang ba'i sems can ci nas kyang// ras bal 'da' ba mtshungs par brtag/ mang nas/
bos pa tsam gyisan// phyogs bcu rnams su 'khyer bar 'gyur// de bas rnam pa spoms cad kyis// gsang sngags 'di ru bzlas pa na/rtag par rgyun du dran par bya// gsang sngags
dngos grub 'dod pa yis// thams cad du na 'jags med par// sngags gnas sa stangs 'di ru bya// gsang sngags mgon po dran pa dang// 'chang ba drang na rtag tu zlos// ma yi nang du
gnas pa na// mchab gtsigs pa yi ni skus// 'byor te rtag tu 'dzegs pa med/[â ]/mtho ris them skas lta bu r dga'// 'jigs shang slag pas 'khrags pa na// rgyal po chen pos
'ji sa pa sel// chom rkun gseb tu chud pa na// seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i sku// khro po'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// de yas rtag tu dran par bya// rims dang so mgo gzer zug
dang/ rnyed pa'i rtsibs logs lus las byung// rnam pasna tshogs kun 'byung ba'i// sa stengs lus canand rnams na/gsang sngags dran pa tsam nyid kyis// de dag thams cad zad
par 'gyur// khro rgyal bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i// mthu dang stobs na brtul phod pa'i// kun mkhyen las gzhanas stongs na// rtag tu gzod nas su zhig yod/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i mgru
stobs na// ji ltar sa bar ma nus pa// de bzhin khro rgyal bskyangs pa yis// brjod par yang na mo nus so// ji ltar 'khor la sgyur ba yi// yon tan ma yas bgrang ma nus// de bzhi/
khro bo'i rgyal po pa// stobs na brjod par ma nus so// rdo rje pad+ma' rigs zhes pa'// khro bo'i rgyal po thams cad kyang// khro bo'i mngag gzhug pho 1dang//
bka' nyan pho nya rdzu 'phrul che// de rnams kyan khro bo 'ad// 'khor los sgyur zhes mngon par brjod// khro bo'i rgyal po blo ldan gyi// mthu stobs de ltar bshad pa na// sangs rgyas kun gyi
dpa'i gtsag 'ad// de ya depa' bo zhes su bshad// gang gsungs bdon pa'i tshig gyur pas// ma sla ba nodi yin no// de phyir 'di ni ma g.yo bas// ma g.yo ba zhes mngon par
brjod// ma g.yo ba yas theb pa// bsam gtan rtse gcig blo yaganas// kun gyis sa la sogs pa yi// bdud rnams kun gyis ma g.yo ba// des na mgon pos mtshan gsol to//
@#/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo rnams // 'di na don kun 'grub par byed// gang yang 'dus pa'asangs rgyas dang// gang yang de bzhin ma
byon pa// mgon po da ltar bzhugs pa gang// 'gro la phan phyir cho ga na/ de dag kun gyis 'di gsungs pa// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya bar bshad// sems can khams na thams cad
mya bstan pa gang yin srung bar mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi sprul pa dang// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen gyis// gang yang gsang sngags grangs med pa// sems can phan 'dogs/
bzhugs par gsungs// lag na rdo rje blo ldan pa// 'ad dag thams cad yang dag bshad// mi gang sdog pas bslabs mod kyi// sems can snang ba skyed par byed// mi phyed pa/
ya zhags par bcangs// bla na mad pa'i go 'phang 'gyur// khro ba'i rgyal po blo dang ldan// sngags pas ma bsgrubs par yang 'grub// khro bo'irgyal po'abyin rlabs kyis// 'dod pa ma
lus 'grub par 'gyur// de nas thams cad ngang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar te/ dga' zhing mge rgyas pas mgran gcig dang ngag gcig tu tshig snyan pos gsol pa/ e ma'osangs
rgyas thams cad na// thabs dang shes rab bsam du med// thugs rjer gyur pa'i thugs kyisan// mtshungs mad dam tshig bshad du gsol// gang yang sems can 'jags pas
'khrigs// sa stengs thams cad 'jigs med cing// gang gis gus chen rang bzhan gyis// de ya ngan 'gro snyengs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po lag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir zhugs pa tsam gyis sems can cha mas cad rgyal
po'i dbang phyug ga go 'phang thob par 'gyur ba/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad kyis 'tshe bar ma nus pa/ dngos grub myur du 'thob par byed// dbang phyug thams cad yang
@#/// dag par ldan par byed pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la bka'
stsal pa// lag na rdo rje legs so legs so// lag na rdo rje slar yang shan tu legs so// khyod kyis kho bo la gsol ba btab pa'i don 'darigs kyi bu nyon cig/ khro bo'i rgyal
po'adakyil 'khor 'di gang gis blosapasas stangasasu thams cad ngo mtshar zhing mig rgyas te/ nus pa med pas bzod par m nus te/ de nas sastangs su 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe bdud thams cad sreg pa'i me lce yang dag par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas gsang sngags kyi
rgyal po 'dasams can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa// dus gsum kun gyi byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa spyod par byed pa// sems can thams cad kyi don
gsol bar byed cing yod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa las 'khrungs pa/ sems can thams rud kyis shin tu mthong bar dka' ba/ mthong
ba'i bgegs rnams rab tu 'joms pa/ ngon 'gro thams cad rnam par sbyong bar byed pa// nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa//
gden ma rungs pa thams cad la gso sbyong mdzad pa// bdud kyi degra thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa'i sngags bka' stsal pa// na ma san+d+ha ta thA ga te b+h+ya saNA shA par pur ka b+hu
sarba thA/ tsan+d+ha ma hA ro Sha Na u0f7c Ta ya hU~M phra Na aM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi rgyal po bka' stsal ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag chu shing gi sdong bu lta
bu dang/ nags tshal chen po lta bu r bab chol du kha phub tu 'gyel bar gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'ad thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur pa dang/
ldeg pa dang/ 'gul ba dang/ rab tu 'gul ba dang/ g.yos pa dang/ rab tu g.yos pa dang/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem mo// shar phyogs mab+bon nub phyogs dma'/
lho phyogs mtho na byang phyogs dma' bar gyur to// gzhan yang ngo mtshar zhing rmad du byung ba mthong// ngo mtshar che bar gyur pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
khams sna tshogs pa'ang mthong ngo// gang yang gzhi deng sang po me tog gas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i bgegasasna tshogs dang/ srin po dang/ bdud kyi dgis sna tshogs dang/
'am zla ba rdzu 'phrul che// 'di yi snang ba'ang mun par 'gyur// mun nag sbag na shin tu 'jigs// glog 'gyu yul na 'jigs su rung// phyogs kun tu ni'o
dod 'bod/ sa gzhi thams cad kun tu 'khrugs// gza'adang rgyu sar tshogs kun tu// gang yang lha ya gtso bo gzhan// de dag thams cad 'jigs sngangs nas// sems med kha sgrub
tu na 'gyel/ lha man ma 'am ru dang klu// gnod sbyin srin po lus srul po// 'di rnams lus kyis ma bzod pas// dug gas brtab bzhin gnyid yur te// 'di dag thams cad gcig tu
'bar// bsal pa'i me las yang dag byung// 'di deg thams cad 'bar zhing mchod// sangs rgyas zhingan kun nas kyang// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// sa b.ru gnas kyi dbang
phyug rnams // de yang gnyidi bro yur bar 'gyur// khasngab tunas la 'gyel// khro be mngag gzhug bka' nyan pa// pho'apho me bran dang bcas// lus 'di'itshugs na ma thub par// sems skor
kha kho slab 'gyelabar gyur// gang yang nyanazlos bas ru dang// 'jig rten 'phrulachen po gzhan// lcagamanAshang phu shul ba ltar// de yang gnas su 'gyel bar gyur// tshangs pa brgya byanel
sogs lha// lha man gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che// de dag thams cad thal bar gyur// sdug bsngal 'khrigs bar 'gyuran na// cung zad slar yang phan tshun du// byeratshang 'dzags bas
0 tsheg sus te// bu gcig 'di na ji ltar 'gyur// sa gzhi 'di dag shan tu 'jigs// bde gshegs go 'phang ma gtogs pa// zhi ba rtsa yang ma mthong ngo// bdud dang
bgegs kyi gzugs rnams kyang// rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag gnas// lus n 'gyur ba lta bu ru// sa stangs nA na shing bzhin gnas// tshangs pa la sogs yul rnams ni// 'di
dag thams cad 'bar bar mthong// mnar med gyur pa'i lus kyang na// dud kha dud skyar kun tu gnas// sangs rgyas zhang na ma lus pa// 'di dag thams cad sreg par byed// sAng rje
zhugs shang yang dag ldan// phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad gsol// sems can don du ma bsams pas// bcom ldan bkod pa bsdu ru gsol// byas pa sdug bsngal rten can gyis// 'di
na bzod par ma nus so// 'gro ba'i sems can kun gyi mgon// thugs rje rnams na byung bar mdzad// thugs rjegacig pu'i ra las 'khrungs// sems can sdug bsngal sgrol mdzad pa'i//
'gro ba'i mgon po khyed gcag pu// gnyen du gyur pa'ang khyod kho na// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol ba'i// mnyan pa yang n khyod gcig pu// nad rnams thams cad gso mdzad pa'/
khyod nyade gcig pusman par 'gyur// dam pa'i lam ston pa yang khyod// khyod ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor pha// sa stangs nying na khyod 'ba' zhig/ mgon po thugs rje bskyed nas ni// sa gzhi
thams cad yang dag 'phal// dpag bsam shang bzhani don gnyer nga'// yang dag dpa' bo byang chub sems// sa bcu'i gnas kyi dbang phyug rnams // mgon
pa khyod nyid gcig pus 'phal// thugs rje pad+ma 'dam skyes bzhin// sems ni ngan par 'gyur ba ya ]/'gro ba'i mgon pos sreg par mdzod// gang po med pa lta bu r 'gyur// chu shang ga ni
sdong po bzhin// phye ma leb bzhin skye bo rnams // drag tu 'bod pa'i lung pa thob// bsregs kyang zug rngu ma 'byung ste// de bzhin 'dir na byas pa rnams // bgegs dang log 'dren thams
cang dang// grangs med bcu yi stobs kyi bdag/ gsang sngags rgyal po brjod pa yis// de dag thams cad skral bar brlag/ de bas rnam pa thams cad kyis// bcom ldan khyod la bdag
gsol 'debs// khyod kyi sras po bdag ma nyes gshazhi// bdag gden gsan pa'i rigs// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thugs rje dang ldan nga 'i thugs mnga' bas/ phyag na rdo rjes
sgra sems can la phan pa'i phyi'i/ thub pa mchog gi gtso bo la// gsol ba btab pa 'i tshig 'dan// shani tu rgya che ba legs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad
kyi srog 'byung zhing/ ye shes 'khrungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la soms par zhugs so// snyoms par zhugs nas rag pa'i rgyalapo 'di sems can thams cad la phan par byed pa/
[/ ]'dus byas thams cad rab tu 'gyur bar byed pa// 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ dgra thams cad dang/ me dang/ chusel bar byed pa// sems can thams cad kyi/
dpal phun sum tshogs shing skal ba bzang po zob par byed pa/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang/ nyan shes dang/ rang rgyal skyed par byed pa// 'jigs pa thams
cang skrag par byed pa// rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad 'joms par byed pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bzhed pa gsus pa/ na maH sarba ta b+ha ga ta b+hu: saN+Das
par pAr ke sarba/ oM sarba saM ska ra pa ra skur ba shud+d+ha d+harmate ma wAn ya pa ri bA re swAhA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bde
ba thams cad gtad cing/ kun nas rgyal ba dang ldan pa// dbang phyug go 'phang b.ros pa na// rang gi lus la soms bcug pas// ngang tshul bzang por yang dag 'byung// sdig pa thams cad/
rab tun// bcom ldan 'das na gzigs par 'gyur// rig par gyur pa'i sems dang ldan// thams cad rang gi srog dang ldan// rdzu 'phrul brtul phod par gyur pa// shin tu ngo mtshar go
'phang 'thob// de ni rgyal mchogaspyan sngar gnas// rang gzhan brtul zhugs brtan 'gyur ba// rig pa 'ad pa mthu stobs kyis// rang gi rdzu 'phrul g.yul las rgyal// sasungs pha rol
ganon pa 'byung// thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob// bdud kun gyi na gtsor gyur pa// sa stangs gyur te rtseg kun n// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par
ba bral// ngan 'gro zhes na gang bshad par// shan tu sdug bsngal gange gnas te// ngan 'gro thams cad rnam bral nas// bde ba yi ni snod du 'gyur// dmyal ba'i ma zhes bya ba ya//
shani tu blta dka' 'jigs rung de// de tshe lhag par bsal bar gyur// ston ka' zla ba' cha ltar gnas// gang yang dmyal ba zhes bshad pa// shin tu grang ba'i mun nag 'khrigs//
drag shul mo chen 'bar ba bzhin// de dag thams cad dro bar 'gyur// ya degs zhes bya'i sdug bsngal gang/ shan tu ma bzad 'jigs su rung// rig pa 'di ya mthu stobs
kyis// 'di dag thams rud bral bar 'gyur// gang yang 'khor de thams cad na// sdug bsngal gyis nasoms gdungs pa// bde ba thams cad yang dag gtad// phan tshun
du na dga' gtam s+sa/ bgegs chen log par 'dren pa dang// gzhan yang srog chags gyur pa gzhan// sa stongs 'byung po rang soms gnas// des par gyur nas 'di rnams na//
gcig la gcig ni lte bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang// tshangs pa la sogs rdzu 'phrulache// rangasams mdzes par rnal mar na// de rnams thams cad bde ba
'thob// pho nyamangag gzhug bka' nyan stsol// 'byung po gdon dang sha za dang// thams cad dbang phyug go 'phang 'thob// sa gzhastangs na rnam par gnas// gang yang byung chug
sems dpa' brtan// thams cad dang na ldan pa ya/ rdzu 'phrul chen po 'kher rnams kyis// 'gro la phan phyir tshig gsol pa// e ma'o kun mkhyen mtshungs pa med// thalas
kyi ye shes bsam ma lang// sa stangs khyod ma gtogs pa yi// 'byung 'gyur gzhanan su zhig yod// masha' pas bde ba'i snod du na// 'di deg thams cad gad 'dzan mdzad// thams cad
dbang phyug ge 'phang brnyes// sa ya steng na rnam par gnas// srid pa'i sdug bsngal slar yang med// de ltar shin tu ma bzad 'jigs// thams chud sangs rgyas sras su gyur// sems can
kun la phan dga' bas// sems na rtse gcig gyur pa yis// snyan pa yi ni tshig gas gsol// kun gyi gnyen du gyur pa yis// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa med// sems ni smad pa'i
rgyur gyur pa'ang// so so nas na bde bar mdzad// skyes pas yang dag bstan pan// ji srid mya ngan ma 'das pa// de srid bar du 'khor bar zhugs// sangs rgyas theg pa tshul kyi mchog:
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang// tshangs pa la sogs 'khor rnams // thams cad stan las las gyur te// gtso bo gang na bzhugs pa der// byang chub sems dpas yongs
su bskor// tshangs sogs rdzu 'phrul che ba'i lha// lcan rig yang dag par lhags te// bla med go 'phang gsol ba 'debs// sams can kun la phan bzhed/
pa rdzor sa sangs rgyas la bskor bar byas// 'jig rten mgon la rab btud nas// 'daskud kyi na tshig gsol to// e ma'o sangs rgyas che ba'i bdag/ sems can kun la sman
par ngagyes// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa ya// k+khabs na mtshungs med bsam ma khub// gang gis 'di na gnas par byas// sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong// 'gro la snyan
pa khyung mthongan/ bde ba yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas shugs rje dang ldan pa'i thugs zab pas sgra dbyangs 'ad skad kyi tshagi bka' stsal pa//
byang chub srems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul che// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa khyed ma 'dzags// rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis mchog gis na// bsam gyis mi khyab 'di dag gsungs// de 'dra'i chos ni
brten nga na// sdug bsngal gang gis slar yang n// 'khor bar de ltar 'chang 'gyur ba// bsnyen par 'gyur bas 'byung ma 'gyur// rdzor sasangs rkang gas mchog gsan// theg
pa chen po yang dag gsungs// laman yang dag bsdus nasan// thams cad sdug bsngal las rab grel// denamchog gdi nyidi zha// sangs rgyas rnams kyi thig par brjod// theg
pa dom pa 'ad bzung nas// sangs rgyas des par gdon ma za// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kun dang na// de bzhin gang yang ma byon pa// mgon po da ltar bzhugs pa rnams // 'gro la phan
pa'i tshul nyid las// de dag thams tshud yang dag gzung// sdug bsngal zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur// de phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi// 'dod lta bu yi dam chos bstan// gtso bo 'ad ni bstan
'gyur na// sdug bsngal rnams nasal bar byed// gang yang byang chub sems dpa' gzhan// tshangs pa la sogs rdzu 'phrul che// sems can phan par zhugs pa yi// spyan sngar snyan
pa'i tshig 'di gsol// mgon po khyed kyis cazhig gsungs// bdag gi yod kyang rten gzhan med// khyod nyid skyabs su gyur pa las// mchog gzhan zhig na yod ma yin// kun gyis
dbang phyug go 'phang brnyes// rang gi rdzu 'phrul snyems tshul gyur// 'jigs pa kun dang rnam par bral// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par spangs// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun
la rdzu 'phrul chen po gus par ldan// theg pa chen por yang dag gnas// byang chub mdzad pa la sogs 'thad// ces pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa thams
cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rgyal po bdag cag la shugs brtse ba bskyed de/ sams
can thams cad dbang phyug gi go 'phang 'thob par byed pa/ nad thums rud gso sbyong mdzad pa/ dpal thams cad dang ldan pa/ dus ma yane nga'i 'tsheb dang/
bgegs thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ dkra nyams cad dang/ 'bar 'tshab dang/ chom rkun dang/ ma rnying dang/ rgyal po'i gnod pa dang/ sang ge dang/ stag 'a sogs pa dang/
rams dang/ sranarang/ mtshan bar rdol ba dang/ sdig sprul gyi gnod pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/ gang gas khro bo'i rgyal po'i dekyil 'khor gyi chos 'di mthong bas/ sams
can thams cad kyis dbang phyug ga go 'phang 'thob par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol bcom ldan 'das// shAkya'i mgon po rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje byung ba che ba'i bdag/
snyan pa'i tshig gis bka' stsal pa// sa stengs kyan dkyil 'khor mchog/ bshad par bya phyir bu khyod nyon// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa'i
ka gsang ba na// khyod la yang dag ngashad par bya// phan pa'i sems kyis tshur la nyon// khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor na/ 'di dag thams cad ma gsungs pa// ngan pas sems
na 'khrigs pa la// bu khyod kyis na sbyin mi bya// re zhigaslob dpon rab tu bshad// bu khyod mnyam par bzhag pas nyon// de na kun tu rab gnas 'gyur// gang mang cung zad bdag gis
[z]bshad// tshul khrims phun tshogasasIng rjer ldan// bzodadang brtson ldan legs par gnas// gtsang zhing chog phun sum tshogs// bla ma la yang stod ma byed// bdag nyid ji bzhin
gzhan phan lta// spyan la dga' zhing tshad du brtson// bden pa' tshig dang yang dag ldan// gtong phod la dga' mnyes gshin pa// lus kun yon tan phun sum tshogs// sangs
rgyas nyan thos rgyal sras rnams // rtag tu mchong par gyur pa dang// bla ma la gus nga rgyal mad// 'gro la gcig tu phan zhing dge/ blo gros zab mo dang yang ldan// dus dang dus min/
shes dang ldan// dbang po don gyi charade pa// rtag tu sems can phan par dga'// gsang sngags mnyes par shan tu brtson// dkyil 'khor 'dir rab tu bsngags// rdzu 'phrul/
chen po lha rnams dang// sangs rgyas nyan thos chos rnams dang// skyob pa byang chub sems dpa' yang// cha shas rig nas rtag par yang// zab mo' don na rab tu bstan// ser
sA yang ni yod ma yin// khro be gang yang brtsa bar sA// bsdu ba bzhi yi ngang tshul shes// pha rol phyin pa drug gis brgyan// byang chub sems dpa'i go cha bgos// sgyu ma lta bu'i
go 'phang gnas// nyan thos rnams kyis ji bzhin bshad// bden pa bzhin sgom byed pa// sngags pas de bzhin 'dir gsungs pa// byang chub sems kyi sgom pa 'o// byang chub
sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// 'di na yid kyis sgom byed pa// bsam pa'i ye shes thob par byed// theg pa chen po las byung ba// bslu ba'i dngos po rnam
bzhadang// pha rol phyin nyid drug tu 'dod// bsam ma khyab pa 'a 'bras stsol ba// shes rab can de sgom par byed// ljang khu dkar dang ser ba dang// mdor na nag por gyur kyang
rung// rang dang thung yang mdangs bzang ba// phyag gis dus mor bsub pa nyid// rtag par rgyun du zhalarang zhing// mgo bo mnyam par rnam par rgyas/ smin mtshams ma chad
shangs mtho ba// rkang pa'i leng bu cung zad dmar// yon tan thams cad yang dag brgyan// sdig pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par sbyong// chos rnams thams cad mchod par bya// de nyid
kyang ni ston par byed// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi chashes pa// sngags dang phyag rgya'i tshogs kyang ngo// rjes gnang dang ni dbang bskur 'thob// gang zhig yang dag yashes 'gyur//
bla ma la gus lha dang na// sngags dang phyagargya bsdus dang ldan// gsang sngags rgyal po'i gsang sprugs shes// sems can ma'os shing brtse ba sgras// bzlas dang spyane srog de 'di/
shes// zhi dang rgyas pa'i ri de shes// mngon spyod dang na debang bya shes// sngags dang phyag rgya shan tu sbyor// bla ma yang dag bsten pa yang// ston pa bzhin du sems par byed//
ka 'byung po thams cad mchod par byed// 'jig rten pa yang de 'di 'ge/ sems canasoms mang phun sum tshogs// skye ba dang na brtan par gyur// gang gi dbang phyug shes rab sngags//
thams cad dbang du byed pa yin// khro bo rnams na rdeg tu bzlos// lha mnyes pa la ched du byed// tshul khrims dang ldan phun sum tshogs// sku dang gsung las yang dag byung//
brtul zhugs kyis na yang dag brgyan// rtag par thams cad skyong bar byed// de ltar yon tan mdor bsdus pa'i// mtshan nyid bdag gis bstan pa yin// 'di rnams yang dag
yongs shes nga// slob dpon du ni rab tu bsngags// sngags kyi bzlas pa'i cho gan// gzhan du na na 'bras med bu// gsang sngags rang ka ma 'khrub cing// gzhan la bstan
yang grub pa med// dkyil 'khor 'bras bu bcas pa man// sngags kyi sgrub thabs dag kyang med// bsrung bar bya ba kun kyang mni// sbyin sreg lha yang med pa ste// 'di ni sgom pa
med gyur pa'i// mtshan nyid 'di ni rnam par spangs// de bas rnam pa thams cad kyi// slob dpon mtshan nyid bsngags pa yin// de bas gsang ba'i ya shes 'di// sangs rgyas thams
cad 'byung b.ran// gsungs pa ru na shes par bya// gzhan du na na 'bras med 'gyur// slob dpon dang ni slob ma yas// rtag tu bag yod gyur pas kyang// rtag par rgyun du bsrung bar
bya bdag nyid srog na ji bzhin no// bskal pa bye ba brgyar yang na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba shan tu dkon// de yang sa stangs gtso bo yase// bad
pa yis na shAn tu dkon// de phyir rnam pa thams cad kyi/ yon tan kun gyis yang dag brgyan// slob dpon gyis na rtagapa ru// gsang sngags yi ge partse lta bzos// 'bum
phrag gcig bzlas gyur nas// sbyin sra yang na brtsam par bya// de ltar byas pa'i sngagasashes pas// dkyil 'khor mchog ni bri bar bya gdug pa mang chung bgegs kyang
mang// gzhan yang 'byung tshogs la sogs mad// mthu stobs kyis ni bgegs byed pa// go 'phang 'bras bu yod ma yin// thams cad dbang phyug go lA yang na klob//
kun kyang bde bas yang dag brgyan// 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bral// ba tsam med par 'gyur ba yani// gzhan du thams cad 'bras bu med// bgegs kyis glags
na btsal nas su// sngags pa'i lus ni 'phrog par byed// choga' 'bras bu bya ba med// de ltar byas na sngags pa bdag/ dkyil 'kher mchog ni bra bar bya// sangs rgyas
gshes ga 'phanganaM// de ni thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/ dbu la sa gzhi yang dag bshad// mnyam par bzhag pa'i yid kyis nyon// dkyil 'khor ra dzes mchog rmad du byud/
'di na gang du bra banaM/ chu klung mtsho bran yang dag bshad// ra ba me tog 'bras bus brgyan// skyed mos tshal du'ang bshad pa ste// mya sdug rma byas rnam par brgyan// kun dga'/
na ba khang bzang dga'// phyugs lhas dris dang bzhi mde dang// gzhan yang phyi rol gang zhig tu// gtsug lag khang dang ri sul dang// khang pa brtsegs dang khang pa dang// mtshan/
rnams gcig la ji bzhin du// chu klung kun dga' ra bdang// de ya khong gsob khyad par du'o// gzhan yang rnam pa sa tshogs pa'o// gang du yad la 'dod par bya// de la/
sogs pa'i gnas rnams las// gang yang rung ba'i gnas bzung ste// lha ni spyan yang dad byas nas// yang dang yang du mchod par bya// yid nyid kyis gshegs su gsol//
phyogs na rab tu b.rung bar bya// rang 'di go cha bgos nas gnas// lus la gtsug tor yang dag brgyan// lag tu rdo rje thogs nasan// lha na ra da kyis byon par bsam// de ltar
bdag nyid gnas nas su// skya bo bsrung ba dgod par bya// de ru bdag nyid byan brlabs te// sa gzhi gzhan la shin tu bsdad// pus mo gang tsam brkos nas ni// 'bu srin rnam/
par bsal bar bya// skyon ni du ma dang bral ba// 'bad pas slar yang gdul bar bya// ba yi rnam lngas byugs nas ni// me tog bdug nga sa dge bar mchod// sa gzhi ya ni phyogs
tshakagyu@#// kun tu// gtor mard tu gtang bar bya// ma rtog sel ma gcal dudagram// dri dang bdug pa choga' mo// spyan srog cho ga bzhin du bya// rnal 'byor dge
bar 'dod pa yis// de ltar rab tu 'bad pa yis// gnamasu nyamagacig tu bya// legs par sbyangs par gyur pa la// lhan spyan yang drang bar bya// khyad par du na gtor ma dang//
dri dang ma tog yang dag dbul// shes rab blo ldan mtshanam bslab// dge dang mi dge'i 'bras bu byung// gal te rma lam bzang mthong na// yade na spro bar gyur pa yi// bdag
dang gzhan nangesgrub bya'i phyir// dkyil 'khor rgyal po khri bar bya// nganan shes rab can gyis srung// 'jigs dang rtsub pa' ma dege ste// bdag dang gzhan la dngos grub med//
de la 'bras med 'bras bu byung// dkyil 'khor dngos grub 'dod pa ya// shes rab can gyis de dbus bri// den khru brgyad de bzhin du// bcu drug dag gi grangs kyang yod// rgyal
ba mchog gis rtag tu nu// gtso bo lnga ni rab tu gsungs// de ru rma gnyis su bgos nas// khru tshad gang na phyi rol yani// chagacig yang dag bshad pa na// dbus ma yin par
rab tu brtag/ khru tshad gang du gnas pa der// dbus su sangs rgyas bstan pa ya/ gas pa rgyal ba'asras po ste// mdo ru bsdus nas bstan pa yin// gnyis pa'i phyi rol
gnas nga 'a cha// der yang de bzhin rab tu brtag/ khru tshad gang du mdor bsdus na// chan thams cad rab tu brtag/ sgo bzhi rta babs dang bcas pa// bum pa yanargyan
gyis brgyan// sa gzhi thams cad 'bar ba ltar// sa dang mtshams su rdo rje ste// mtshams rnams su na gtso bo ru// bum pa thams cad nges par gnas// rdo rje rta bas
b.rungs pa dang// zhags pa b.rungs pas rnam par brgyan// 'di dag thams cad kun byas nas// dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bcas// de ya sAng po mdzes ngo ra na// de
la bum pa yang dag gnas// bum pa yin stong ga snod// pad+ma dkar po gnas pa der// de la zhugs pa 'gro ba'i mgon// gtso bo bstan pa'i don mdzad pa// skyob pa shAkya'i
mgon po ya/ lhung bzed phyag rgya rtag tu bri// de nas de yas kun tu khyab// dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs pa byung// 'di ltar sor mo bcu drug na// skyob pa de la dekyil
'khor yan// de yis thams cad rab tu bshad// lhag ma snyam bu g.yas bskor du// byung ga phyogs la brten nas ni// skyob pa 'jig rten dbang phyug bzhugs// pad+ma'i
steng du rdo rjen/ kha dog dkar po gzi brjid che// khyam pa ya nagi cha bgos// byams pa'i bdag de las byung ba'i// dbang ldan phyogs son phyag mtshan na// de na spyi
blugs phyag rgyas// ngo mtshar brtul phod bsam ma khyab// kun tu bzang po rtag tu bris// ma ru mtshon nas bzhugs pa na// gtso bo yid bzhin nor bu
bsnams// ye shes rgya mtsho yongs su gang// zab mo' don narnam par bsgoms// dbang po phyogs la brten nas na// ye shes ut+pal bsnams pa bzhugs// gshin rje'i
gnas su nyer mchis pa// kun gyi dgra ya gshad du 'byung/ gnas der bzhugs pa 'a mgon pon// rdo rje rtse mo'i rogs su 'byung// bden bral phyogs su brten pas na//
rlungasogs de yi dbus su bzhugs// ye shes ral grig cha bgos// khro bo'i rgyal po stebs chen bzhugs// khro bo grangs med pa yi mgon// kun tu 'khor rgyas yongs su/
'thob// dkyil 'khor yon tan rgya mtsho ni// kun nas gsal bar gyur pa yani// rlung gi phyogs la brten nas ni// rgyal ba kun bdag las byung bzhugs// thamasar/
ye shes lta bar mtshon// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs// chu bdag phyogs su bstan nas su// rdo rje phyag rgya shan tu sbyor// pad+ma dmar po'i stong na bzhugs//
mdzes pas dus zad lta bu r bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs la brten nas su// gang yangs bcu'i gnas dbang phyug/ de yang ji bzhin bkod nas bzhugs// rang ga phyag rgya'i
mtshan mas mtshan// de la 'og gi char gnas dang// stang ga phyogs kyi cha nyud du// bdag nyid chen paskyon bral ba// de dgakun la dpa' bo bzhugs// dbus su
gag pu bzhugs par 'gyur// so sor byang chub la brten nas// shAra'i bun bdag nying che// de nas ye shosanam mkha' mkhyen// rdzu 'phrul yul na mchog tu gyur//
mo 'u 'gal ya nyid dang ni// 'od srungs bdag nyid chen pon// rgyul mchogade nas sa stongs su// rta sbrul dang na ba lang bdag/ drag shul dwabang chen chang bu can// b+ha ra d+hA
pa 'di dang na// kun dga' bo ni dga' zhes bshad// sgra gcan 'dzan yang rim ji bzhin// 'di ru ji bzhin bkod nas gzhag/ lhung bzed chu skyes rnam par brgyan// phyag
na rdo rjesras po kun// dpung bzang la sogs de bzhin kun// phyag na rdo rje lte b.ran// de rnams ji bzhin bkod nas gzhag/ dam chos sras por bshad pa na// gang yang
'jam dpal la sogs gzhan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang lta bar ni// de dag thams cad gzhag par bya// gang yang khro bo yang dag bshad// phyag na rdo rje'i rigs las byung//
lho yi phyogs su brten nas su// 'di ni rim pa bzhin du gzhag/ rdo rje dgra sta yang dag ldan// rdo rje tho bde bzhin no// shani tu drag shul yang dag bshad// 'bar ba'i 'phreng
ba'i 'od kyis 'khrigs// khro bor yang dag bshad pa na// rta mgrin shin du mthong bar gnas// khragasher can dang yang dag rol// sgrol mar grags
pa'ang red par dka'// rang ga phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan// brtson pas der yang bri bar bya// sgrol ma khro gnyer canangag bri// dge ma bcom ldan ma de bzhin// mA ma ka dang
tshu lcags sgrig bshad// nam mkha' sangs rgyas spyan dang na// rma bya 'od zer can nyid dang// dug sel ri khrod lo ma can// rang gi phugargyu mtshan mar ldan// skal ba chen po de
yang bri// byang gi phyogs la brten nas su// shin tu rdzu 'phrul che ba bzhugs// phyag rgyu gang tshe gzugs can ma// sku la rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// pho 'pho mo de bzhin du//
mngagagazhug pho mo shani tu rtsub// rang gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ldan// nub kyi phyogs su bla bar bya// sa ya dkyil 'khor zhes bshad pa// rgyal ba'i bdag nyidi las 'khrungs lha//
'jig rten skyong pa la sogs bri// sa stangs dam tshig gnas pa na// lha yi rgyal po lha min che// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// rang ga phyag rgya'i mtshan mar bcas//
shar gyi phyogs la brten nas bra/ gang yang drang srong bshad pa na// sna tshogs bshes gnyen 'gro skyod dang/ rgyu/ ngan srong gshin rjeme dang mtshungs// gzhan yang shin tu mthong ba
dka'// ragabyed bden pa yang dag ldan// de na byang gi phyogs su bu// zhim zla ba chu bdag dang// ma yang shan tumathong bar dka'// gnod sbyin dbang po rtag tu na// lho ya
phyogs char bri bar bya// gang yang ma mer yang dag bshad// sa stengs shani tu drag pan// rang gi mchod pa'i phug dang ldan// de yang nub kyi phyogs su bra// gang yang sring mor

0 lomol 'che mabshad pa na// sna tshogs gzugs can 'phrul mo che// sems can phan pa shin tu brtson/'chen po skyong zhing srung/ ngaga' beng 'ang gsesang zhadze// de bzhin lu nanganaseng ngo//de yang de ya phyogs brten bzhugs// shar gyi sgron nag po bzhugs// rdzu 'phrul
dga' byed byang ga sgri srung zhing// de bzhin lho na ngan song ngo// nubasgor yang dag bshad/nub sgor yang dag bshad pa na// bgegs chen 'gas las yang dag sbyang// rang
gi phyag rgya mtshan mar ngarus// rdzu 'phrul chen po srung zhing bzhugs// bu gcig mdor na 'di dag ni// shin tu rgyus par bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas kun nor thams cad pa//
sa stongs na na gzhan ma mthong// rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas// bdag nyid srog na ji bzhin pa// de ltar mdzes pa'i rang bzhin srung// sangs rgyas thams cad kyas nasrung//
byas pa so so'i skya bo la// khyod kyis yid ches par ma bya// rmongs pa de ni rang rlag cing// gzhan yang rlag par byed par 'gyur// bdag gis dam chos bshad pa 'di// sdug
bsngal thams cad grol bar byed// de na drug par byed ba na// ma shes bslabs pas 'byung bar 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i//
mchog 'dadad pa med pa dang// sdig can 'jigs shing rtsub pa yi// drag shul mchod par 'gyur ba la// bu yas cung zad ma sbyin par// khyod la rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis
gsungs// rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis dam pa yas// shan tu gsang bar yang dag gsungs// khro bo'i rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor na// 'di dag thams cad bshad mi bya//
[% ]rtag tu bag yod par gyur pas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa bsrung bar bya// dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba la// 'di ni ston rung skur ba na// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad dang//
byang chub sems dpa' bslu bar bgyi// sdug bsngal kun gyi lhar gyur pa// sngage pa can du nges par zho// sdig chen de ya gsang sngags kyi// dngos grub nges par 'byung mi
'gyur// bstan pa'i donan mdzad pa yi// gtso bo dang la ldan rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor ma mthong ston byed kyi// mgo bo rdo rjes 'gems par byed// de yis gsang/
sngags ma 'grub cing// bgegs rnams kyis kyang brlabs par 'gyur// sngags kyi sgrub pa 'bras bu med// de phyir sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i// gsung 'ad bu
khyod tshur nyon la// rna shes tsam du'ang ma spyan te// dam tshig rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas kyis gsungs dam tshagan// gang zhig shan tu 'da' byed na//
'jig rten gsum bzhugs rdzogs sangs rgyas// dbang phyug bslus par gyur pa yani// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag ngo mtshar du gyur nas mig bltas te/ shani
tu ngo mtshar yid kyis su// 'di skad kyi na tshig gsol to// oma'i sangs rgyas bsam du med// khrugs rje'i dbang gis sgyur ba yani// rgyu dang ma rgyu ma shes la// dam
chos 'di ni rab tu gsungs// de rnams kyi na ngan 'gro bcad// sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig par mdzad// gang ga lage na gnas pa de// bsam ma khyab par sangs
rgyus gsungs// bgegs dang log par 'dren pa dang// sdug canaMshan tu drag pa gang// sngags pas dkyil 'khor mthong ba yasi// de dag thams cad zhi bar 'gyur//
'di kun gang du gnas pa na// dam pa'i chosan gnas med do// sngage pa 'di dag thams cad dag/ de tshe 'jigs pa las grol 'gyur// thums cad dbang phyug go 'phang
slob// sems can thams cad dbang byed pa// the tshomamed par rab tu 'gyur// sems can sa 'og gnas pa dang// ji srid gdug pa' sems can rnams // sa la
gnas pa'i bar du ni// de kun dbang du byas nasan// mngag zhug dag na nyen par gnas// sa gzhu many+dzal gyi lha la sogs// lha 'am lto 'phye che
'dis na// cung zad gang du gnas pa der// bdag nyid chen po srung bar byed/ thams cad bka' bsgo rab tu byed// lha gang gnod sbyin ma ya bdag/ sa gzhasteng
ga rgyal po 'dir// cingagyi zhes ni smra bar gnas// bgegs kyis nye bar 'tsho ba dang// nad kyis sdug bsngal gzir bar byed// rgyalaM po gdug pas sngangs par byed//
thams cad 'phrog par byed pa dang// ma mo gdug pas 'debs par byed// sang ge stag dang chud bzhin// sa gzhi'i steng 'dir mkha' 'gro ma// srin po lto 'phye 'jagis
pa dang// yul 'khor du ni mu ges g.yogs// nad rnams kun gyis 'jigs par byed// rims dang blo nad dbugs ma red// lhag pa dang ni mtshan bar rdol// mgo
dang meg ga zug gzer dang// lte bar zug gzer 'dabs padang// nad rnams kun gyis 'debs pra dang// nye bar 'tshe bar kun gyis gdungs// yun du bkren par
gyur pa dang// 'thab dang 'thab mo rtsod pa dang// rgyal po chom rkun po sogs// tha snyad du nagyur pana'ang// srung chen 'di ni zung zhagi par// rgyal ba mchog
gas rdzag tu gsungs// gnod sbyin la sags lha ya bdag/ 'byung po gnod skyon ma 'am ci// gang yang sa sangs gnas pa yi// dam tshig lan gnas pa kun//
dam tshig dgur na gsungs pa las// de rnams thams rngad ma 'da' 'o/ rdzogs sangs rkang gnyis mchog gis na// gsungs pa'i bsam ma khyab pa kun// bsam
ma khyab pa'i las gsungs pa// 'bras bu'ang bsam ma khyab pa 'byung/ 'dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tsho 'khor de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byani te/ legs
so legasaso// bdud thams cad 'da' bar ma bya ba'asams can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshig 'ad shan tu ngo mtshar to// de nas bcom ldan
